review: This really allows me to stay productive when doing homework. As long as you have a little self control to not leave the app, it works great. If you leave the app, it will kill your tree and you have to restart your timer. It’s fun to see how large you can make your forest!

title: Really Helpful
review: This app has been really helpful for keeping my hands off my phone during times when I need to focus on something for a sustained period. I guess I won’t kill even a virtual tree, because I actually have guilt if for some reason I have to end a session early.

title: PERFECT GAME BEST GAME
review: This game has LITERALLY saved me from myself. I can’t thank this game and the devs enough! I would have trouble getting ready for the day, but now it forces me to, since you feel bad killing the tree! 😅 Thank you so much for saving me from myself, this has been LIFE CHANGING for me! Thank you so much ☺️!!! I will request this app for everyone!

title: Somehow a PHENOMENAL MOTIVATOR
review: I can’t put into words how much this has helped motivate me to stay focused on my task at hand.  I have tried a plethora of other applications and none have come even slightly this close to being as addicting, engaging, and motivating to be a productive and connected human being in the world.  Thank you so much! ❤️

title: Great app if you struggle to focus
review: I got this app because I struggle to put my phone down and away when I need to do homework or focus on an important task — this app really helps me keep my mind on the task at hand. It has also shown me that the majority of my tasks take way less time than I think! Great app!

title: Cute app
review: Really great way to help stay me stay off of my phone whenever I am glued to it when I need to be studying or working on homework. It would be nice if there were more goals to reach though to get coins. As soon as I got my 30 day in a row challenge I haven’t planted nearly as many trees. But its still fun and effective to help stay off of the phone.

title: It helps me keep my hands off my phone!
review: I receive many calls, texts, and emails throughout the day. This simple app helps me filter what needs an immediate response and what can wait. I don’t want to kill my poor little tree for something that can wait until a break!

title: AMAZING!
review: This app has really helped me stay focused! It is kind of like a game, but it helps you stay off your phone and helps you achieve your goals. It can be rewarding for everyone, because if you save enough of their currency, you can plant an actual tree somewhere! It helps you and the environment.

title: Finally something that works
review: Love this app. For The longest time I couldn’t find anything that prevented me from getting sucked into my phone when I was supposed to be working but now you just planted a little tree and then you feel real bad if you let it die so I guess that works great

title: I love this app
review: I really like this app!! It really helps me do homework and study for tests!!! I also love that you can use this app to help the earth!! Save your coins to grow a real life tree guys!!!! Also I love the cool bonus of the earthy music that you can choose to play or not play!!! Thanks for helping me succeed in school for just a simple 2 bucks!!!

title: Love. It.
review: Why does a simple animation of a tree give me enough of an empathic response that I’ll stay off my phone to keep it alive? Who knows, but it works. You can track your focusing time and there aren’t annoying ads, and if you focus enough (and thus earn lots of seeds), you can actually plant a real tree.

title: Highly recommend
review: Love this for myself (works well with pomodoro method), require my children to show me how long they’ve had it on if I’m out and about and want to make sure they haven’t spent the whole day on their phones, and evangelize about it to the college students I teach (as well as coworkers).

title: Changed my life!
review: This app was presented to me by a friend as a joke because I lack concentration BUT boi I got super addicted to this app! I love building my own little forests and I’ve even planted 4 “real” trees! The only thing I’d like to know is the actual status of these real trees. If I can track them and their progress would be a nice touch.

title: Helps me put the phone down
review: I use this app a lot at work. It helps me be less distracted during phone meetings. It also is a good reminder to not play on the phone when I have other things to get done. Killing off trees or bushes turns out to be a strong deterrent for me. And I love looking at the forest I create!

title: Great app for students and scholars
review: For those trying to break, or even just loosen, their incessant phone-checking habits (addiction?!)—refreshing email, social media, the weather, etc... far more often then needed, often when intending to be working on something else—this app is a great resource!

title: Great for Nature Loving Students
review: This app is one of the most important apps I’ve downloaded in college. This is an essential study tool that I’ve used for almost four years. I tend to get distracted by SM or games on my phone, but  (as an Environmental Science Major) once I turn on the app the possibility of killing the poor trees keeps me on task! Simple but sweet!

title: What a great app!
review: I find Forest really useful; it helps me a lot when I have to focus on any task. Furthermore, the idea of creating my own forest motivates me and makes me feel productive. I recommend using this app for those people who procrastinate a lot. I know it’s a big issue sometimes, but you can help yourself with Forest!

title: Return on investment
review: Given the couple bucks I’ve spent on this app, the return on investment I’ve gotten from the extra time I’ve spent focused on my work has definitely surpassed my expectations. Plus that fulfilling sound at the end when you grow your tree makes it all worth it.

title: It has already helped me so much!
review:
I really enjoy the cute little trees that you can grow in this app!
I’ve only had it for 3 days now, but whenever I have stuff to do and don’t feel like it I just turn this on and get it going. 10/10 helps me stay focused and motivated to get stuff done!

title: My New Favorite Productivity App 🌳🍄
review: I've always struggled with putting the phone down (and keeping it down) while working. This little app has actually help me undo that bad habit, it actually works, and I recommend it to anyone looking to try and get more done out of their limited time! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

title: Just found out you can plant a REAL tree just by doing what you’re supposed to do
review: I have ADHD so I found this app out of necessity & months later just now found out you can plant a REAL tree with 2500 coins! Which has motivated me even more! It’s such a great & positive app love it!!

title: Practicing
review: I’m a pianist and an owner of a music school. This is a great tool that I use all the time in my own practice, as well as my students. I hate “waking up” after 10 minutes of Facebook scrolling. This app saves me from the endless scroll.

title: This App is Fantastic!
review: This app always performs perfectly whenever I use it. The rain sounds are a nice touch, as is the tracking of how much time I’ve spent. I love that it encourages us not to even TOUCH our phones while concentrating. I recommend this app.

title: It works!!
review:
The app simply works to both produce discipline in undertaking focused blocks of study time—but also by allowing me to track and thereby see that I haven’t actually put in as much time as I need to, for example. 
It’s charming and so straightforward and fun!

title: Helps Increase Focus
review: As someone who can easily lose focus, Forest has really helped me increase productivity & also increased my motivation to really complete the time I carve out for myself. Highly a great app & also a great cause that Forest does by helping plant trees around the world.

title: Would recommend
review: Definitely a good and fun app for spending less time on your phone, though ultimately you’re going to have to be the phone that brings your phone addiction to a standstilll. And all for what?, two dollars?.

title: Pretty satisfying to see
review: I really enjoy seeing my forest grow. Been using it for over a year, and it’s pretty nice to see the amount of trees it plants. Wish it wouldn’t have to reset every day. I remember when it didn’t, and I was surprised to see it change to a daily reset. It’s still fun, though!

title: Best app for deep focus and relieving work pressure
review: Enjoyed so far! Keeps the work exciting and provides a sense of achievement after each task and by the end of the day. Also, helpful in keep the track of time, knowing how much time I invested in specific task/activity

title: Love love love this app!!
review: This app helps me study and has been incredible for keeping me off my phone in the 3 years I’ve used it! 10/10 would recommend if you have trouble focusing on your work with your phone close.

title: The best productivity app ever
review: The only app that’s actually kept me focused. This feels like the most natural gamification of any other platforms I’ve tried, and the only person that can keep you honest about your own forest is yourself. 10/5 stars.

title: Good for staying on task
review: I used to use the timer in my phone to set a reminder of when to take a break from work, which helps me stay more focused and on task since I know a break is coming. This is so much more fun though! Totally worth it.

title: Favorite app + some suggestion PLS
review:
Amazing app altogether for reasons everyone has mentioned, but there are a few things I would really like to see:
- could we please plant more than 5 real trees? The digital price for it could be double or even quadrupled but it really kept me motivated
- could we have more achievements? I've heard others would want it a lot too
- could there be a way to connect this app with the sleeptown app?

All in all the app runs out of motivating things after a while of use. Still love it though!

title: Makes studying more bearable
review: Purchased this app while I’m finishing up my prereqs for the nursing program where I live. It definitely gives you a little incentive to not look at your phone while studying, which is great because my phone is my biggest distraction.

title: KEEP ME FOCUSING 100% OF THE TIME!! <3
review: I love this app!! All the cool trees you can get, the different sounds you can play, the deep focus mode, all as you grow and focus on building a lil’ forest on your phone. It’s oddly addicting and made me want to be productive. This app has me reaching for my phone only to plant a tree and turn it right back off again.

title: so useful for school!
review: I waste a lot of time on my phone, and this app has seriously helped me decrease my amount of screen time! It’s also the only app on my phone that’s helped me focus when doing school work. I do wish there was a version of this for the computer?

title: Excellent App
review:
I love this app, it is very motivational and user-friendly.  Some things which I think  could make it better are:

#1: Some sort of an alarm/“ding” sound at the end of the work sessions.

#2: A feature which allows you to see the average focus time spent per-plant.  For example, if you have planted two trees total, one after 50 mins and the other after 30 mins, the “average time spent” per tree could be 40 mins.  This could be extended into average focus time spent per-plant in the last day/week/year/etc, and could also be something you could turn on and off.  

Otherwise, very well done.

title: Great App!
review: I have been using this app to help me remain focused while working from home. This app has allowed me to remain focused on work tasks while still maintaining breaks for quick household tasks. I have my most productive days when utilizing the app in Deep Focus mode. It’s a game changer and well worth it!

title: Cute and helpful
review: this app is a great way to get yourself in gear for a bit, and the image of the plant growing as your selected time elapses is a nice way to feel like you’re making progress. the cuteness of this app makes it nice to use, and its settings/customizability make it useful for a variety of purposes. i love this app :)

title: Great app if u stick with it.
review: I like this app a lot. I can stay focused and study with the constant reminder to get back on track. I think it’s beneficial and by using it if I can help plant some trees while sitting in my bedroom studying Why not? It makes me feel good about studying and doing what I’m doing so I like it.

title: Best app for focusing and being present!
review: I can be easily distracted while at work or at home when trying to get things done, but this app really has helped me stay focused with ease. I highly recommend this app to everyone who’s trying to dilly dally less and get more done in life!!

title: A Great Studying App
review:
A friend recommended this to me, and if it weren’t for her I’d probably be failing a lot of classes right now.

If you’re the kind of person who’s easily distracted by stuff on the Internet, this app is a godsend for keeping you off your phone. I’d sing more praises, but I reaaallly need to get back to work, soo...

title: Helps with Productivity
review: I’ve always had trouble trying to manage my time and stay off my phone more. But with this app, it’s helpful to set my own time limit to have for focus. This also lets you create a virtual forest which adds on to a creative/development phase.

title: This is really nice!
review: This app has helped me focus and get some serious projects done in college. Since I got it, I’ve found that it helps me to stay focused when I’ve got daunting assignments to do, and my grades are showing that! It’s well worth the purchase!

title: Love it!
review: i used forest while i was in school to help me focus, and it works beautifully. while you do have to pay, it’s worth the little bit of money. now that i’m out of school, i use it to help me focus on cleaning or reading, and it’s got really cute graphics. 10/10 recommend.

title: great app for people who get distracted easily
review:
this app helped me focus on my work in highschool and is helping me yet again in college. as someone who spends A LOT of time on their phone (it’s a problem, i know), this app has definitely aided me in not using said phone to procrastinate on work. 
recommend 100%

title: I like deep focus mode
review:
The app is really simple and user friendly
Deep focus mode is an extra push for productivity
I like that I can turn it on and off because I may have to look something up or work on my phone
When I don’t need my phone, it’s a good way to ensure productivity

title: Good time tracking app
review: I love this app- as a doctoral student I need Forest to make sure I don’t go into information overload. The 5 minute breaks make me use my brain in other ways. My only wish is that it would allow you to schedule how many 5 minute breaks before a longer break.  In this app you have to track that yourself.

title: Focus and feel productive!
review: This app helps me stay off my phone, and that is incredibly valuable because I can burn hours just scrolling. The added bonus of getting things down and also getting rewarded with a beautiful tree is the cherry on top of a successful studying day. 🤍🌱🤍

title: Love it! Sm more productive!
review: This app is easy to use and helps me get my work done with a simple yet effective incentive of a digital tree. It comes with new trees to unlock while you improve your productivity and allows you to listen to soothing sounds while you work. Over would def recommend!

title: Staying disconnected getting things done
review: I really like this app because it is a fun way to motivate myself away from my phone. I use it when out with friends and during the work day to force myself to be present! It’s a great way to increase productivity and connectivity!

I am very tempted to play on my phone while I’m doing homework and as soon as it says that my tree is about to die I freak out and go back. Its so helpful! I have never been on my phone while doing homework again after downloading this I recommend if  you have trouble focusing.

title: Great
review: This app really helps me to focus on my homework instead of being glued to my phone. I get easily distracted by social media and Netflix, but this app helps me put my phone down and gets me motivated to do my work. I usually don’t spend money on apps but this was worth the $2 dollars for sure.

title: 10/10 recommend
review: This app changed the study game for me, I have a terrible habit of continuously picking up my phone even with notifications off and forest forces me to keep my phone down and just focus on work! I’ve been using it for 3 plus years and have no regrets

title: helps with everything!
review: I always encourage my friends to get this app because it helps me stay off my phone for all occasions, like going to dinner, studying, even sleeping! I got this app a year ago and whenever I use it, I instantly focus again. It truly helps planting these adorable little trees ! :)

title: $2 is Worth it!!
review: This app has helped me focus so much on homework. I typically spend 3 hours on AP World History notes and this has helped me cut that time down to 2 hours. I now realize that i use my phone most of the time I do work. The two dollars is definitely worth it in my opinion

title: The best!
review: So cute and definitely helps me stay focused! I like to do kind of a pomodoro method where I set a timer for like 25 minutes and then take a break, but I often find that I can continue working, or at least stay off my phone much longer than the initial timer I set.

title: Lifesaver
review: I have severe ADHD (I’m an adult back in school) and very limited impulse control when it comes to distractibility. This app is the absolute only thing that helps me get things done, ever. I love having a visual representation of how hard I’ve worked when I feel (irrationally) like I’ve accomplished nothing. This app is great.

title: Almost perfect
review: The app is fantastic and has aided in all sorts of things. From reading to doing some exercise this app helps with putting down the phone and helps you focus on the task at hand. I am rating it 4/5 because the customization options are absolutely ridiculous. It’s not a huge deal, but it certainly isn’t a perfect app.

title: update messed everything up
review: I really liked this app but the latest update has messed everything up. My trees keep dying when I haven’t touched my phone at all, it seems like getting too many texts or notifications while the tree is growing kills it. Please fix, I really loved this app, it helps me so much to get through the work day but it’s sooo frustrating to not touch my phone for the entire time only for my tree to die anyways.
developerResponse: {'id': 10188348, 'body': "Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. This issue has been resolved in the latest version (v.4.10.2). Please update to the new version, and your trees won't die again because of lock screen navigation or notifications. We'd really appreciate it if you update the review and rating when you've seen the improvement. Thank you! :) - Forest", 'modified': '2019-08-15T18:49:53Z'}

title: I Found my Focus
review: I like this app because it shows me what I can accomplish during a certain time period. I feel a sense of extra pride when I have a time goal and I complete the task before the time is it. If you need help focusing or want to see what can be done I recommend this app.

title: Best study-helper app
review: I use this to study as a pomodoro timer. It’s the best app out there for staying focused while studying and being present (as well as being off your phone lol). I also use it to meditate and keep traje of how long I’m spending doing certain things. Really helps you set (and crush) goals !!!

title: Less time on my phone, more time enjoying
review: Normally, I don’t write reviews. But this app makes it super simple and rewarding to put down your phone for a few minutes. I use it at work, before I go to bed especially. And it’s helped me a lot, have more free time and not be on my phone so much and be more present with what’s going on in my life

title: No distractions
review: I love that you truly can’t exit the app without it killing your plant. It has really helped me to be more focused and not get distracted with social media on my phone. I have really seen an improvement in my business because I am more focused on what is important and what I need to get done!!

title: Stay on Target!
review: In the original Star Wars, During the first run on the death star pilot of the fighter kept getting distracted. The squadron leader kept telling him “Stay on target.” “Stay on target.” As I have used for us for the last few days I keep hearing that squadron commander’s voice in my ear every time I’m tempted to shift my focus. Thank you FOREST!

title: An app for everybody
review: This app is for anybody. You can use it to focus and stop fiddling with your phone. For the person who wants to monitor his time and where it is spent. You can also use it as a family for game night to everybody be off there phones and be together. A wonderful idea to disconnect.

title: The best focusing app ever
review: I love this app! I set the time and focus on what I need to do! It’s also great to track your time and see how much you spend on working, reading, etc. To be able to plant real trees was a huge motivation when I start to use this app. After that, it became like a healthy habit to use this app!

title: Great app for focusing
review: Loved this app, it’s almost addictive, but in a good kind of way. Helped me realise why just deciding to use my phone didn’t work so far, 5 minutes after you put down your phone you completely forget about your decision and look something up.

title: Effective
review: I get distracted very easily and this is perfect for getting me off my phone when I need to study. It doesn't take away the option to listen to music while doing work which is great, and it plants actual trees which I didn't know when I bought the app!

title: I’m So Productive Now!!
review: I love this app!  It really gives me motivation to study and do my work, and it prevents me from using my phone or going onto random websites while I’m doing homework or schoolwork that needs to be done online. If you are looking for a great app to help you stay productive, this is the right app for you!

title: Simple perfection
review: I’ve been using this for weeks now to help keep me focused. I’ve definitely seen a boost in my productivity.  The interface is simple. I can track my focus on work for my job and home separately by using different types of trees. The background sounds are helpful as well.

title: Would LOVE a pause option
review:
This has been my favorite app but I would love if there’s an option to pause. I like to keep track of exactly how long I focused for so a pause button would be helpful whenever I need to take a bathroom break or take a call.

Also, a sound notification for when time is up would be great.
developerResponse:
{'id': 6284333, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app
feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2019-04-16T20:45:20Z'}

title: Track Trees
review: Hello! I really love this app (have been using for months and just bought my first real tree). It is nearly perfect, but I wish there was a way I could track my tree being planted using my tree ID - maybe a location of where it is, a picture of it planted, etc - just so I know it’s real :).
developerResponse:
{'id': 5877047, 'body': 'Hello,

To plant real trees, we partnered with the organization "Trees for the Future"; we give them our donations to plant real trees across five countries in Africa. In June 2018, the Forest team flew to Africa to visit our partners at Trees for the Future and to understand the operation of their planting project. Besides witnessing the trees planted in Africa by Forest users' efforts, we also learned that Trees for the Future uses many of their resources to help local farmers set up sustainable farming lands, and offer them training on farming skills. However, for this reason above, they do not have additional resources to track every single tree they plant. If you want to know more about our visit to Africa please refer to the posts on our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/posts/1726695590717934
If you want to know more about the Trees for the Future planting operations, please visit their official site: http://trees.org/
(You can also contact them directly via email.)

Thank you for the inquiry, we hope our explanation has answered your questions. In the future we hope you can keep on focusing with Forest, and help make our beautiful planet a better place. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-11-09T15:11:06Z'}

title: Simple and motivating
review: The best part about this app is how it translates personal self-discipline into benefits beyond oneself; if environmentalism floats your boat, the potential to eventually plant real trees just by staying the hell away from your phone is very motivating—much better than meaningless badges or pointless competition through toxic social media.

title: Improves Focus
review: I use this for my study sessions and it has honestly made such a difference in my focus. I  started with only being able to focus for about 20 minutes at a time but because of this app, I can easily study for 3 whole hours. Definitely recommend ❤️

title: Keeps me focused
review:
The gamification aspect of this app keeps me focused like no other timer I’ve tried.  Great concept.

Recommendation: if you work in an environment with a lot of distracting background chatter, your first “purchase” should be the Paris Café sound. I use it at work and I can barely distinguish people in my office from the murmur of the app.

title: Brilliant
review: Loveeeee this app. I’ve never actually bought an app but this looked promising and it’s AWESOME! Love the idea of making it fun by having the ability to get different bush and tree species once you gather enough coins, as well as sounds. Very easy to use and worth every penny. Who doesn’t love games that involve unlocking and collecting?!

title: amazing!!
review: I need motivation it stay focused and these trees are the cutest things!! it seems dumb but the satisfaction of creating something while you  study or whatever is amazing. also, the comments include "keep going!" or "you can do this" and it is very encouraging. I would recommend the buy

title: Totally worth the $2!
review: I love this application, and cannot imagine my life without it! It helps me stay away from the heavily addictive Snapchat while doing my homework, and keeps me off my phone when I’m in bed. I have lots of fun competing with my friends and building beautiful gardens. I totally recommend this!!

title: Apple Watch Support
review: Great app to focus. It would be nice to be able to set timers and pick trees from my watch so I don’t have to rely on picking up my phone. Would definitely help with focusing on getting any task complete. Other than that, an amazing app!

title: Great, Thorough, Detailed, Productive
review: Best money I’ve spent, extremely clear that they have care and skill and in turn help you be productive. I could spent a long time rambling about how great this app is, but instead I am going to go plant some more trees and be productive elsewhere! Thanks Forest App :)

title: Great for my ADHD
review: Having adhd makes it difficult to focus on doing my work but with this app, I’m able to feel that sense of survival mode and focus better on my work! I’ve been able to finish my assignments on time and efficiently :)

title: Great but one feature is missing…
review: Great app that’s actually keeps me focused. However I do wish that the app would also put the phone in do not disturb mode when planting a tree. It is still distracting when I’m supposed to be focused and still get buzzed with notifications
developerResponse: {'id': 24376971, 'body': "Hi,\nwe don't currently have this feature, but thank you for the great idea! We will forward your suggestion to our team. Have a nice day. :)", 'modified': '2021-08-08T09:34:47Z'}

title: Helpful for focus
review: This app is great for focus time for someone like me who doesn’t want to see their little trees killed off by exiting the app. 😅 It’s helped me really step away from my phone and be more productive in my devotions, work, and personal reading.

title: Very Helpful!
review: A pomodoro time management app with a very calming interface. It’s pretty simple. You plant a tree and set aside your device for a set amount of minutes (that you choose) to stay focused on a task. The app then notifies you once that’s done. Very effective so far.

title: Ehhh
review: Honestly, you have to pay for the app. Why are the trees and plants so expensive. Like I get it, study hard to be able to get up enough coins to buy the tree or plant you want but it’s kind of a bummer trying to save. But other than that, the pomodoro works like it’s supposed to do.

title: Haven’t left a review for an app before
review: But I think this one is really great. Helps bring my attention back to more important parts of my life and away from social media in a really fun way. Lots of love to the app designers for making this.

title: Awesome and so fun!
review: I love this app!  Most study/work timers do nothing for me.  But I use this one regularly.  The whole concept makes me want to use it which is great because I also need this method of focus for any work to get done.  In addition It’s design is visually pleasing.

title: Really helps stay focus.
review: As a young person growing up with technology, I have a very hard time focusing. This app has helped me stay focus for hours without touching my phone! Really recommend especially when studying.

title: I love this app!
review: I’m a high school student who procrastinates her work a lot and tends to spend a lot of time on my phone and Forest has helped with getting my work done! the interface is very minimalistic and subtle which I like very much! Definitely recommend for those who are students!

title: It’s really good!
review: This app has helped me stay off my phone when i’ve needed to get work done. I like how it rewards you with trees to add to your garden. This really helps me stay motivated to focus and stay off my phone when i need to get work done.

title: Cute
review: Really cute and does exactly what it says it does. The best thing its good at is keeping you going. Even when you start something and you want to quit, this app provides motivation to just keep going. Would recommend if you have trouble finishing things.

title: Worth it
review: I find myself distracted by my phone a lot and this app definitely helps me stay focused. Even though it seems like a simple idea, the idea of being able to unlock trees and other things makes it so I don’t waste time or kill any of my virtual plants.

title: Great tool
review: A great little incentive to stay off your phone; simple and charming. I was worried it would drain my battery, but it doesn't and in fact saves it because I'm not using my phone as much! Worth the two bucks.

title: Great little motivator to stay off my phone
review: I get distracted pretty easily, but this is a great motivator to stay off my phone, especially during peak business hours. It’s a great way to pass the day, and you get a little kick growing your own forest. It’s helped me stay on track, for sure!

title: Amazing app wished I would’ve found this sooner
review: I had a friend recommend this app for studying. I LOVE it. I have it on my phone and computer and iPad and it has helped a ton. I love being able to see the “fruit” of my labor and the reminder that is there in each of them.

title: Love it
review: It helps me focus for so much longer when I need to stay off my phone. But you can still swipe off for long enough to change the song you're listening to as long as you go back fast enough which works out perfect

title: It’s cute and helpful!
review: This app is really cute, but also super helpful! It forces me to put the phone down and study! I just wish there were more designs that could be achieved quicker. Although I understand the need to study an hour at a time, there should also be rewards (via other plant designs) at lower increments of studying as well.

title: Very Cute App
review: I’d been using my phone constantly. A friend of mine recommended this app to start managing my time in a more enjoyable way. Instead of having that urge to pick it up, I can just plant a few trees for a small break. It’s a bit frustrating with the lack of trees at the beginning. Still would highly recommend it.

title: It does exactly what its suppose too!
review: I've only used this for 4 days and i've already improved my focus and productivity for work and studies. Its also forced me to use my phone less in general. Highly recommend this to anyone who want to get more done in their life!

title: Perfect App for staying focused.
review: Great app for holding yourself accountable while trying to get work done. I get incredibly serious about keeping my plants alive and building my forest. The awesome ambient sounds/white noise are a nice touch and there are plenty free features and some premium ones also. Def worth a try!

title: Can only plant 5 trees total, love the app
review:
I really enjoy using the app with the intention of planting trees and also being productive. I see a notice that "due to budgeting" I can't plant anymore trees so I feel like it's a bit of a waste otherwise.

Hope y'all can budget yourselves for more trees, otherwise I don't see a use in using the app since planting trees is my primary motivation.

Thank you for letting me plant 5 trees at least

title: Amazing
review: Nothing gets me to put my phone down AND to not pick it up again. NOTHING... except Forest. Whoever invented this app deserves an award of some kind...For helping phone addicts like me to retrain our brains to get out of the habit of constantly being on our phones AND planting real trees in the world at the same time! Genius.

title: Thanks for the A’s.
review: This app really helps me to stay focused when I’m doing a long reading session for class. Normally I would get distracted or have a thought about going on my phone to check something. But then I know my tree would die and I stop myself and keep working.

title: One of my favorite apps!
review: Forest helps me be more productive. I love this app so much: the developers put tons of thought into the details - from continually updating awesome new trees and sound effects, to having holiday changes in your forest. It makes me way more excited to study and it's a great tool to stay motivated!!

title: Love this app!
review: I’ve tried many apps like this before, but this once gets me good! The fact that I spent money on it makes me want to use it more and not let the money spent go to waste. As an additional bonus, the game continuously reminds you to focus!! You don’t want dead trees in your forest.

title: Wonderful App for a Wonderful Cause
review: While it can be hard to figure out how to be part of a special event the customer service is so responsive and helpful on Twitter! I love staying off my phone for a great cause and have found this app fantastic for studying. Love the concept and looking forward to planting my fourth REAL tree!!!

title: Thank you so much!
review:
My time has been saved by this! Hi! I love what you have created. I've already gotten things done I wouldn't have otherwise.  Thanks for listening. Love this app!

Update. Happy fifth birthday Forest! Still love this app and grow a tree any time I need time away from my phone, and the big forest is great!

title: Cute App
review: I like using Forrest because it makes me more productive when I study! I wish it cost less in game tokens to plant a real tree. I would like to unlock other types of plants and trees, but I need to save up to plant a real tree. Maybe when you plant one real tree you can get a new tree type as well?

title: Screen time saved
review: My screen time dropped drastically after the first day of having this app. So worth the money, and it really makes me feel more productive. Nothing is more motivating then only having 3 seconds more of studying and being rewarded with little trees. Love this app.

title: Great App!
review: I really like this app because it helps me to take time away from my phone and study or simply read a book without distraction. It motivates me because I don’t want my little plant to die and I want to build a tiny forest of my own on my phone while doing something productive.

title: love this app
review: I’ve been using this app for a while and love it. As a Highschool student, it helps me stay focused by removing my phone as a distraction. Another thing that’s awesome about this app is if you use it consistently you can track how productive you are being over the months and years.

title: Great but I’m broke
review:
I really love the purpose and idea behind this app, but there are a few things wrong with it. 
1) I’m broke and I would love to plant a real tree like it gives you the option to, and different trees cost money so... you get the idea.
2) A lot of work I have do complete on my electronic device, but if I leave Forest to complete these tasks, then I kill the tree.

title: LOVE THIS
review: I’m in love with this app and I get SO excited when they come out with new plants. I’m hoping they’ll move towards building your own cabin so that it looks cute in your own forest? Just sayin. There’s so much potential to how good of an idea this app is and it does wonders to keeping me away from my phone to do work!

title: If you’re easily distracted GET THIS APP
review: I tend to just reach for my phone all the time, and this app helps to keep my focus on my homework. You can write your own messages, and buy different trees, and make “study groups” with friends when you all want to focus. 10/10 this works :)

title: Love
review: This has helped me not use my phone so much and has also made me realize how much I just mindlessly grab my phone when I don’t need too. Definitely recommend this app to anyone who needs a little push to get off their phone when studying or working.

title: Essential for College & ADHD People
review: I been using this app for a year now and it has changed my life. I am a college student with ADHD. This helps me stay on task and be less distracted. It’s also good to know you’re helping a great cause. Whoever created this is a genius! I rarely buy anything in the App Store, but this was worth every penny.

title: WOW!!
review: I’ve been using this app since November of 2018 to help better my study habits during my first semester of college and I haven’t stopped using it since!! I love that this app allows me to feel like I’m genuinely making a difference in the world while making a difference in my own personal life.

title: Keeps me focused!
review:
I have used forest for a while and I’ve always enjoyed it. Having the different trees available allows for me to coordinate to a study a specific topic and have some diversity when I’m monitoring my study hours. 

Highly recommended for anyone who has trouble staying off their phone while they’re working or studying!

title: Wish trees and bushes were different prices
review: I love the beautiful plants, but I don’t love how expensive they are to purchase new ones. In the beginning, it’s not too bad. But as you progress, all items increase in price. I don’t necessarily think that is awesome. I think the bushes should be fewer coins than the trees. Personally, I think that just makes more sense.

title: Extremely helpful
review: It does require some motivation on your part - i.e., not just clicking “give up” whenever you need a break, but I found that, surprisingly, the motivation of growing my tree and earning currency was more than enough to keep me working while forest was on.

title: bless this app
review: this is the only way I get any homework done. I like using it as often as possible, because I’m determined to gain enough to plant an actual tree. it is efficient in not only helping me focus, but motivates me to do more work than I would plan to in the first place, in this way as well.

title: An amazing way to be mindful of phone use
review: Applicable in work and when spending intentional time with friends, it’s a great daily reminder to be more focused on the present, and a great way to break the habit of unconsciously checking my phone. I love the idea that time being present ultimately adds up to planting a real life tree!

title: Wonderful concept, could use some more work
review: Love the concept and what the application aims to do for the user. Definitely helps stay focused and off ones phone. I do wish that all my trees from day to day went to building one big forest instead of starting all over each day, and I think it would add to the aesthetic of the app if the graphics were better or more well finished.
developerResponse: {'id': 3881165, 'body': 'Hello, if you tap on the icon at the upper-right corner of your daily forest page, you will enter your "big forest". You can view your weekly/monthly/yearly forest there! -Forest', 'modified': '2018-06-18T15:45:01Z'}

title: Changed the way I work/study
review: This app has kept me focused on my goals and it shows me how much time I really am spending on my tasks. The visuals make it feel like a game. So I just want to keep “one-upping” myself to stay focused for longer (new high score). Liked it so much that I just had to review it!

title: Surprisingly well done
review:
Great job in making pomodoro timer plus forest abstraction work so well. Adding ability to start timer on Apple Watch plus tighter integration of Chrome Plugin (or full Mac app) would put it over the top. 

Bonus points for Trello integration. Being able to see how much time I focus on each Trello card would be awesome. 

Keep it up!
developerResponse:
{'id': 3613854, 'body': "Hello,
We'll consider implementing this feature in future updates. 
Thanks for the feedback.
Please feel free to contact us if you have further questions or suggestions. :) -Forest", 'modified': '2018-05-28T02:29:24Z'}

title: Great at reducing time on phone
review: I use this app on the days I can’t stay off social media. Works great. I just wish it would allow you to white list apps like phone and texts so I can still respond to people. I have to wait for the tree to finish before I can answer any texts.

title: Great app
review: I love the little trees, and it gives me incentive to concentrate on my work. I use it every time I am working, and I find myself wishing I had more time to plant trees! I do wish the trees wouldn’t get more expensive each time you purchase one. There are so many adorable trees and bushes that I want them all!

title: Does what it says it will
review:
This is so simple and easy to use. Best of all, though is that it really does make me more aware of my focus (and lack thereof). I’ve shared it with others as a way to start building the habit of staying in an activity long enough to get something accomplished.

I like it very much.

title: Amazing when I was a student and even better now that I’m in the workforce
review: I used this app to help write my masters thesis, and the browser app is also extremely useful now that I am at work. I’ve introduced this to so many people and not one has said it wasn’t worth the money.

title: Forest Focus
review: One of my favorite writers (Sarah Rhea Werner) recently posted about Forest in her newsletter and talked about what a great tool it had been in terms of focus. I downloaded immediately and have loved ever since! Keep doing what you’re doing, and I’ll keep planting trees while I focus.

title: WOULD BE 5 STARS WITH ONE CHANGE
review:
I use this application the most when I am working on my iPad in landscape mode. I would immediately give this app 5 stars if the developers added landscape support.

Update: they added landscape support thank you developers!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 17131188, 'body': "Hi,\r\nCurrently we don't have a complete landscape mode interface for iPad users, but you can view your Forest in landscape mode by going to your Forest page and then rotating your device.\r\nThank you for the suggestion, we'll relay your request to our team. :)", 'modified': '2022-01-27T15:17:35Z'}

title: Really helpful
review: I find Forest helpful for motivating me to buckle down and stay buckled down so that I can get things done rather than bounce around half-finishing tasks. I like this latest 2022 challenge … I love free stuff and having that goal set for me is a miracle. Thanks Forest!

title: Helps me not get distracted
review: I have a problem with my phone when it comes to studying. This app makes it a fun little game to study definitely recommend to anyone struggling to stay off your phone!

title: Excellent
review:
I haven't a found a pomodoro timer that's better than this one. Keeping the trees alive actually helps me stay focused. The user interface is clean. It's fun that you can add additional tree types.

Feature suggestions:
-A break timer between sessions with optional background audio

-The option to pay money to have a real tree planted (similar to Ecosia) every time a virtual one is planted--you could charge a small commission of a couple cents for each tree planted, which would increase revenue while sequestering carbon

title: Very good as long as you show minor discipline.
review: App helps a lot and keeps you off the internet but bring a bit of discipline and take it seriously to reap the benefits of not being poisoned by your phone and wasting valuable time.

title: Great
review: I’m a teacher and we promote the 10:2 wait time. For every 10 mins of instructions, the brain requires 2 mins of processing. So I put a 10 min timer on to study. Then for 2 mins I write down the main ideas. And repeat the cycle.

title: Very motivating
review: I like this app a lot, it’s super motivating, and doesn’t mess around. I am grateful for the lack of ads, and the art is beautiful. I like that you can pick different plants and trees. I do that for wok, and it is a lot of time and effort, so just know that it’s appreciated!

title: Great but ....
review: I’m using an ipad for this and i really love this app and it’s so great for motivation but i wish it can be in Horizontal screen mode because it’s so frustrating sometimes that it can only be in vertical mode 😅 Also if it could be cut with another app on screen it would be perfect!.
developerResponse: {'id': 23489426, 'body': "Hi,\nCurrently we don't have a complete landscape mode interface, but you can view your Forest in landscape mode by going to your Forest page and then rotating your device.\nThank you for the suggestion, we'll relay your request to our team. :)", 'modified': '2021-06-21T06:08:20Z'}

title: Amazing app to focus
review: Forest is an amazing app to focus on your work, study or any other activities you need to focus on. You can collaborate with the friends and focus together to build more trees. The awesome thing about the app as you can convert the virtual trees into real trees to save the forests

title: Should have more of a monetary accountability
review: I love this cute little app but maybe have something more serious as accountability by setting amount of money that will be donated if the tree dies. Maybe just me because I forget about my trees sometimes!

title: Best focusing app
review:
Forest has helped my manage my time better and helps me maintain my focus just by thinking about my cute trees growing. 
I also use this app with the pomodoro technique to prevent myself from becoming burnt out easily while studying. Very satisfied with it

title: Great way to get rewards for putting your phone down
review: I have a habit of picking up my phone during work or when I’m reading and I hate it but now it’s easy to leave it alone because I get to grow a beautiful forest :)

title: SUPER HELPFUL
review: i have adhd and this app has really helped me not get distracted. i always look at my phone when i’m supposed to be studying or working, but this app reminds me that i’m not supposed to! very well organized and i love the analytics it keeps track of!

title: This app is amazing
review: I love this app it has helped me to stay off my phone more and focus. It doesn’t matter if I’m doing homework or doing a home project or just wanting a break from my phone the forest app is there to help and I love how the app helps out environment this is the best app I’ve ever downloaded

title: Good dopamine booster
review: Seeing the forests each day really helps me stay consistent with productivity.  I wish I knew more about the features of the app. I have a few free things like a coral, for example, but have no idea what they are and what to do with them.  Also, not sure how notes work.  Also, how do you label activity and projects?

title: Pros outweighs cons
review: My last review was not good because of the lack of screen rotation and font change! On second thought, the white noise music, group study, and real tree planting outweighs the cons! Maybe when there’s an iPhone 25 there will be rotation and font change! Lol
developerResponse: {'id': 16470270, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for your feedback. We will take it into consideration. Providing our Forest friends a better platform is our pleasure. -Forest', 'modified': '2020-08-04T00:42:24Z'}

title: Five years of love
review: I’ve been a Forest user for five years and I just cannot express my love enough for this amazing app. Forest has made me more focused, more grateful, more controlled and more successful. I’ve recommended it to many of my friends and family. Please try this Forest if you want to be indistractable.

title: Helps me to stay focus
review: It makes you conscious of how much you tend to look at your phone to get a distraction and makes you think twice before you want to Give up. Also every time makes you want to be less phone depending

title: Still No Landscaping mode
review:
I see update after update where they claim “bug fixes”, but I never see any improvements. Are these developers even still working on this app or do they just keep releasing the same app claiming “bug fixes”?

I still can’t believe there is no landscape mode for this app. It claims to be an app to help you focus and stay productive, but if I’m going to be doing that, I’m going to be using my iPad in landscape mode and there’s absolutely no support for it. That is just crazy and very lazy app development
developerResponse: {'id': 9668120, 'body': "Hello, the improvements might not be obvious, but our developers work very hard to improve the app and increase its stability. We apologize for the lack of support for landscape mode, and yet we receive a lot of suggestions and requests on a daily basis, so it takes time to implement new functions and features. We'll keep working on it, though. Thank you for the feedback! :) - Forest", 'modified': '2020-07-05T12:14:29Z'}

title: Good and inventive way to keep focused
review:
As a constant “use-my-phone-when-I’m-supposed-to-be-working” man, I’m grateful for a creative way to keep focused on things that actually matter.

The interface is laid out nicely and is easy-to-use. I’ll update as I use and unlock more features.

title: Perfect for the ADHD Perfectionist
review: I am a university student with diagnosed ADHD, and I love this app!  I love the ability to adjust growth/ focus time. It’s the perfect reward for my time spent working. I set it to the hard study mode, and it actually forbids me from opening other apps so I don’t kill my tree. If you struggle to focus, try this app!

title: A must have
review: Honestly, with all the craziness going on in the world I’ve been struggling to stay motivated. This app has really made it enjoyable, and I’ve noticed every day that I end up using it I am way more productive than the days I don’t. Definitely would recommend!

title: I stay focus alright
review: My boyfriend recommended this to me and I absolutely love it. We always share trees, and I gotta say... sharing it makes me even more alert about me picking up my phone! I don’t want out tree to die! It’s like I’m killing something that is OURS. So ya, now I do my school work pretty consistently. Thank you.

title: Elegant pleasure to use
review: This app makes me feel cheerful and helps me focus. Just wanting to make my forest grow & unlock more tree species is a charmingly powerful motivator. The little sounds upon successful tree growth are gently happy-making rewards, & option for white noise while focusing is a great optional feature. Thank you!
developerResponse: {'id': 13588266, 'body': "Hi,\nThank you so much for your feedback! We're more than glad to know Forest is of help to you. If you have any suggestions, please feel free to let us know via the in-app feedback system - we're always happy to hear from our users! Happy focusing! :)\n- Forest", 'modified': '2020-02-19T18:11:45Z'}

title: My dream focus tool
review: It is not only a tool to help you focus but also keep you motivated. Watching your forest grow day by day gives you sooo much fulfillment that you will want to keep on doing it until you have a big big big beautiful forest. Addictive but in 1 million ways of good!

title: Love the app
review: i stumbled upon this app because of a study instagramer! I just tried it out and i love it! it helps me motivate and keeps me in focus because you don’t want your cute trees to die. i will definitely use this app every time when i study so i can unlock more trees to plant. worth the money!!

title: Love this app!
review: I hardly ever pay for an app but I read an article and this was mentioned so I looked at it in the store and was intrigued! I love trees and as a teacher that graded papers I’m constantly tempted to check my phone and get off task.  Well this worked! I didn’t want my tree to die! And I got my grading done faster!!!!

title: Great app for focusing
review: I started using this app first at work and it allowed me to have longer focus time. Now I'm using it to read, do yoga, etc and it is a great wat to reduce phone screen time. Being able to donate your coins to plant a real tree is a great plus and motivation to continue using the app!

title: Actually works
review: It definitely keeps me focused because I’m motivated to not let my tree die. However I wish it didn’t take so long to gather up the coins to buy more trees. Also, there should be a sleep option. One you can use so you don’t check your phone in the middle of the night to promote a healthy sleep cycle.

title: Helps a ton!
review: This app has greatly helped me stay on task. As odd as it is, growing a virtual tree is very motivational since it takes really time to earn it. I highly recommend this to high school student or any student that struggles to focus and quit fumbling with their phone. Keep up the great work on this app.

title: Forest
review: The forest all is amazing and it helps me stay on track whenever I’m studying. I have a bad habit of going on my phone all the time while doing something important and lose track of time but forest has helped me beat that habit. 10/10 would recommend.

title: Great for studying!
review: I didn’t think growing a “tree” would keep me off of my phone, BUT surprisingly this works. You get so attached to keeping you tree alive and growing your Forrest that you wouldn’t sacrifice it to check Snapchat, Instagram etc. I use this during my revision period at uni and it is truly effective:)

title: Excellent
review: This app really helps me stay focused! Sometimes I can’t put my phone down but once I plant my tree I don’t want to kill it so I keep working and don’t look at my phone until my time is complete. Would recommend if you have trouble getting off of your socials

title: Great app, have a few suggestions
review: This app is great!! I get sooo much work done when I use it. The only problem is, I can only get one type of work done. I can’t do math homework on this app because I need my graphing calculator app. Math is also one of the only other classes I need help staying off my phone with. Maybe put a calculator into the app?

title: A must-have!
review: This is the only app I’ve found so far that can break me loose from my phone. Knowing that I can’t touch the thing without harming my growing tree is truly effective for enforcing time out from scrolling through screens. And the graphics are awesome too! I’m soooo thankful for this app

title: Nice graphics, seems like a game, keeps me motivated!
review: I highly recommend this app for those who need extra motivation through a rewards system, and if you want a fun way to keep you away from your phone. It has helped me be more productive than ever before!

title: Helps keep me on track!
review: I’ve been using this for about a year and it has been an amazing experience. When I started using the app, I noticed how much I’d reach for my phone while working. It made me become more aware of my habits and has helped me to stay on track.

title: So awesome!!
review: I love this app! It’s super helpful to keep me focused because I don’t want to kill my little tree. Not only does this work on your phone, but also on computers! So I can really focus my time on not being distracted  while trying to study because I’m a hardcore procrastinator. But highly recommended!!

title: Best Productivity App Ever!
review: I noticed every time I was procrastinating I was on my phone. Now when I find myself on my phone and not getting work done I just plant a tree and it motivates me to get things done. The best part of it is that after you collect a couple of coins you can donate them to plant real trees🙌🏻

title: So Cute!
review: This app is great, definitely worth every penny. It really gives me a reason to stay off my phone. You wouldn’t think the threat of a dead virtual tree would motivate you so much but it DOES. I would recommend this to all of my friends who have trouble staying off their phone.

title: Recommend it!
review: This app has helped me for a long time. It helps me stay off my phone for certain periods of time. I think the only thing that I would like is if they had a custom setting rather than the 2 hour or 120 minutes limit. Besides that, I love it.

title: Helps you take control of your phone
review: I used to always be glued to my phone it was becoming unhealthy. Using this app has helped me tremendously with staying focused and being off my phone. It can be homework, job, or even having dinner with loved ones I make sure to plant a tree.

title: neat!
review: If you want to effectively block yourself from using your phone for up 2 hours, this is the app for you. Honestly, it’s a major boost in productivity as well as a great way to break an addiction to your phone, all while having cute and eco-friendly incentives to do so. 10/10, indeed

title: Love the app!
review: I use forest so much! As a teenager, I find myself on my phone A LOT. So when my friend recommended forest to me I wasn’t sure about it. This app is great for studying and for wanting to put your phone down and going to sleep. This app is great and I find myself on my phone way less thanks to this app!

title: I love this app so much!
review: It’s great and really works! It makes me actually focus and want to stay focused. I felt bad when I left the app to go on social media and my tree died. So, now I actually make sure to stay productive for the allotted time. I’m so happy I discovered app, I didn’t think it would work but it does!

title: Great productivity tracker app
review: I’ve used a lot of pomodora timers to study with but this one is by far my favorite. You’re not only timing your studies but you’re able to look back and have a visual of how much time you’ve put in studying. Really fun way to stay on track! Highly recommend.

title: This keeps me focus
review: Im super addicted to my phone. Every time when I was studying, a new notification can keep me off from my work for a good 10 minutes, which is not good. Thus I purchased this app. I purchased flora(the free version) first, but I want to grow a real tree and help out the community... so here I am.

title: Great App
review: the forest app has helped me tremendously with my school work and staying on task, but it's sometimes frustrating. for example, if i'm doing math work and i need my calculator app my tree will immediately die. i definitely think this app should allow the purchaser to pick a certain app they need to stay on task such as calculator, google classroom, notes, etc.
developerResponse:
{'id': 4924760, 'body': 'Hello,

Due to the limitation of the iOS system, we cannot determine what app the user is currently using. Therefore we cannot implement the whitelist feature for the iOS version. As a workaround, we built a "Work with Phone" feature, which can be enabled in the settings page. This feature enables users to use work related apps during their planting periods, but users will have to be honest with themselves when using this feature. 

The trees planted with this feature enabled will not be counted towards the leaderboard, and users will only receive half the reward if they exit Forest during the planting period. 

Currently, the whitelist feature cannot be implemented for iOS. If you see features similar to whitelist on other apps, please let us know so that we may figure out how it was implemented. 

Thank you for your suggestion. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-04T03:54:22Z'}

title: best app to stay focused
review: at first i was scared that i would still have the urge to go on my phone while using this app, but I realized that I care so much for every little tree that I planted. This app is so helpful when I have to try and focus and do my homework and it is definitely worth the money!

title: Good, could use a tweak
review:
I am strongly motivated by game style apps and this one works well without being exploitative. I appreciate that there is no way to buy the rewards; I have to focus.

I would make it easier to enable certain phone apps to work while using the timer. I would like to be able to dictate but I can’t use my phone.

title: Actually helps
review: I was very much struggling to focus towards the end of the semester, but after using this app it became a lot easier. I started caring for my trees more than I cared about answering a Snapchat which really helped me get more work done.

title: SUGGESTION
review: The plants should be a little cheaper to keep us motivated. Sometimes they can take a little too long to reach. But overall the app is great just wish  I could get the flowers I want without having to put my phone down for 20 hours. Great app though! Love the deep focus mode :)
developerResponse: {'id': 32145039, 'body': 'Hello,\nThank you for the feedback, we will forward your idea to our team and see if we can make certain adjustment to the current mechanism in the future. Let us know if you have other questions or suggestions. Thanks again and have a lovely day! :)', 'modified': '2022-09-21T08:59:44Z'}

title: Productive
review: In between working full time and studying in grad school, focus is really difficult to do but thanks to this app. This has made a huge difference with my study habits let alone the fact that I can contribute a real tree someday

title: Keeps me focused!!
review: I’m Someone that really needs motivation to continue to work. I found the feature that keeps growing the tree if you work overtime to be quite rewarding!! Really excited to work so I can grow my forest. Really love this concept

title: Quite affective!
review: I use his app on my iPad while doing homework or exams for my college classes and it actually helps me quite a lot. I also really like the rain Forrest sounds that you can turn on. Definitely helps with focus

title: Honestly great.
review: I’m able to maintain a lot more focus when my phone is unavailable. My only problem is the store. I want a tree to plant but it’s pricy but it does encourage me to focus more and save up. So take the good with the bad ig. Definitely worth the buy

title: Seriously Helps
review: I used this app all the time in grad school and now I use it at work, it SERIOUSLY helps me focus and get in the groove. The rainforest sound helps me time things out and it’s motivating enough to not exit the app for mindless scrolling. VERY worth the download!

title: Perfect Mind Trick
review:
I love this app. To remember to use it each day, I set 3 reminders on my phone to notify me early in the morning, again around 10:00am and again around 2:00pm.

It’s a great tool to help lock yourself into flow with a reward at the end of it

title: Effective and necessary
review: Extremely useful if you can be very unorganized most of the time, because instead of planning you get lost in the phone. It’s a great start for a less dependable life of the phone.

title: Fun but not practical
review: It’s cute, I’ll use it but I wanted more lock down. If you leave the app you lose your tree which is boring. I wish the app didn’t allow me to leave the app unless it was an emergency. It really shouldn’t be a paid app. I thought it was more strict so I bought it but it would have been nice to try before I buy.
developerResponse: {'id': 21157774, 'body': 'Hi,\nThank you for your feedback. We will forward your idea to our team.', 'modified': '2021-02-19T07:45:03Z'}

title: Love this App
review: This was recommended to me by my girlfriend who’s in medical school and recently got the app to hold herself accountable while studying (she frequents TikTok). Simple to use, you can get different trees by studying longer and accumulating coins, and it only benefits you by focusing on the task at hand.

title: Keeps me productive at work!
review: This is the answer I was looking for. I needed something to enforce the habit of staying focused at work instead of looking at my phone and this is it! It makes me feel good about both work and planting trees for the environment! ✌🏽🌱🌳🌎

title: You won’t get distracted
review: This is great if you have trouble staying off your phone while doing homework because you will not want your tree to die and you can be more focused on actually doing your homework.

Haven’t used this app much this year but I’m glad it exists because I’m implementing it into 2021 to help me be more in the moment. I’ve been spending too much time on my phone recently. Thank you for a beautiful app and happy new year!

title: One of the only things that keep me away from social media these days!
review: This app has taught me discipline in ways I couldn’t teach myself. I’m so happy to have found something to help me keep at it even during quarantine!

title: Tree just die on its own
review: I love this app but lately this happened to me multiple times: I set the phone and put my phone down, I swear without touch my phone when I came back the app tells me sorry you left the app and your tree is dead. This is very frustrating. I am not sure what was the problem but please fix this.
developerResponse: {'id': 20011192, 'body': 'Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us via our in-app feedback system for us to assist you further. Please provide details (for example, screenshots or videos) of the problem if you can.\nTo visit our in-app feedback system, please go to Settings, enter our FAQ, tap on the top-right icon and go to "contact us". Thank you. - Forest', 'modified': '2020-12-27T08:26:14Z'}

title: How to pause
review: I pretty like visual effect of the app. And overall experience is great. But for one thing bugging me is that I do not know how to pause. When unexpected things happen, I have to pause it or else what is the point of keeping the time running while you’re not focusing on the task.

title: Amazing!
review: This app is actually amazing! And no of your wondering because sometimes I do, I’m am a real person. Not just a paid person or whatever. Anyway, I’ve only had this app for a little and it’s super cool! It’s made me exited to study and is super fun.

title: Plant-Based Focus
review: As someone who is adamantly concerned about the environment and simultaneously my schoolwork, this app is perfect for me. It helps me to stay focused while also providing a fun little way to stay on track by creating a forest of my study periods. Everyone needs this in their life who cares about the earth!

title: Great app for graduate students who struggle with social media
review: This app helps me focus, keeps me off Instagram. Not only while studying, but while I’m doing other chores, because I have a habit of unconsciously reaching for my phone which I’m trying to avoid. So I plant trees and reduce my screen time on a daily basis.

title: Great idea, mediocre app
review: Despite the fact that all different trees cost literal dollars unless you want to use the app every day for a year (Your trees are far too expensive, Forest.) The app itself is also lacking for anything more than bare bones functionality. They could have easily hit a homerun, but opted instead, for a single probably because it was cheaper to produce. Oh, and they bribed me to write this review by giving me one of their expensive bushes. Weak.
developerResponse: {'id': 18289547, 'body': "Hi, thank you for the feedback. You don't actually have to pay money for the trees, you can earn the coins by focusing more. The main purpose of this app is to help users stay focused on their tasks and the coin mechanism is there to motivate users to stay focused more and unlock the trees that they like. Pretty trees are worth the effort. :)", 'modified': '2020-10-06T01:09:21Z'}

title: Great App!
review: I love this app, I use it a lot in school and when doing homework. It really helps me tune out everything and really focus on my work and treat studying as a game in a way. Overall i’ve found that after using Forest, I have been more focused and I engage in my work way more.

title: Perfect for working from home
review: It is so easy to get distracted when you are working from home between family and the phone and daily tasks. I love this app because it helps me to stay focused so that I stay in the moment and complete my work.

title: Great App, helps me focus
review: This is a great app to use especially now that a lot of people are working from home or are doing classes online. I get easily distracted through TikTok and Snapchat, but this app helps me feel accountable for staying off my phone and getting my work done.

title: it works-stay motivated
review: YOU GOT THIS! show that exam who is boss. many have done what you are doing before and you will succeed too. this app helps. you can get so much accomplished when you really take the time to boggle down and focus. a friend mentioned it to me and it worked.

title: Motivation on point
review: Extremely motivational App. I have been finding it hard to focus due to the stresses that this time has brought upon us. I have been able to focus more yesterday and today that I had in the past month.

title: Best focus app!
review: I’ve struggled with phone addiction for years and this app has helped so much with that. I love taking different breaks throughout the day and being able to get a tree and coins for each one! I can’t wait to be able to plant a real tree and help the planet! I love this app so much

title: Love it
review: I love this app but I wish there was a feature to have it start at a specific time in the day. I have trouble putting my phone down before bed so I wish there was some setting where I could set it to open the app and plant the tree at a certain time each day. Other than that, it's so helpful!

title: Very Interesting concept to get you focused
review:
The concept of planting a tree while you spend the duration being focused is very interesting can be quite addicting. It definitely makes focusing on a task while ignoring the phone a lot less painful! Highly recommended 

PS. The UI is gorgeous ! What a beautiful app

title: Worth the money
review: Love this app. Allowed me to stop wasting my life away endlessly scrolling on my phone. My only qualm is that there’s currently no timer visible on the lock screen. Sometimes I’d like to just glance at my phone to see how much time is left without having to unlock my whole phone. But other than that best $2 I’ve ever spent.

title: Does what it says perfectly
review: This app is wonderful for studying, I often on impulse pick up my phone and get distracted, so this app definitley keeps me in check. I would highly recommend it to everyone, my only criticism is that I wish buying other trees to grow was cheaper. I think it is a little too expensive

title: Very Helpful and Useful
review: this app is very is helpful and useful if you want to focus on your work or when you’re studying. you can plant trees in your forest if you finished the timer that your set and receive coins. i recommend this app :)

title: Great for staying focused & staying off your phone
review: I use this app to restrict my usage of my phone when reading for school or other school related assignments. I love it. I also am grateful for the fact of the ability to use the time you stay focused to out towards donating trees.

title: Excellent
review:
Forest is as gentle or harsh as you set it to be; if you get distracted and use your phone, at one setting, it will let you keep your tree, and at the other setting, your tree will die. 
This app is just the right amount of motivation to ignore the phone for a couple hours and focus.

title: Great for productivity
review: This app has helped me tremendously to be more productive. If you have trouble staying on task and find yourself on social media often, for no reason, this app will be great for you. I love the deep focus feature that when activated, causes your tree to die if you leave the app. It’s great motivation.

title: Absolutely lovely, effective app
review: Beautifully makes sure that I have a slightly absurd motivation to stay off my phone (who wants the disappointment of killing a tree, even if it’s virtual?) - it works much better than I thought it would, initially. Gorgeous design and easy to use.

title: Great for easily distracted folks!
review: This is a great app for those who always picks up their phone to browse social media without even realizing how often they do it. The app reminders to put down phone, stay focused, and get back to work really helps me to stay on task and stay productive!

title: Helps me focus a lot!
review: I’ve had this app for quite a while, and I love its simplicity and functionality. It really motivates me not to pick up my phone and I think it’s smart that you can’t spend real money to unlock trees faster because it makes me use the app even more!

title: Love This App
review: I have the tendency to get distracted while doing homework by my phone.  This completely solve my problem I love the app and I don’t see anything wrong with it except it does take a while to gain coins. But the more you stay focused the more it helps the world around you!!!

title: Great!
review: This app is very helpful. I often don’t realize how much time I spend on my phone but this app lets me keep myself in check, especially when studying. It’s so easy to get distracted but this allows me to stop mindlessly teaching for my phone every few minutes.

title: Functional but could use more
review: The app is very functional in incentivizing me to not use my phone, but I wish it was a bit more flexible with what additions it added, ie I wish certain trees had certain properties, or that planting a certain number of trees would get you some wildlife in your forest. Alternatively, make a Forest app but with animals?

title: Worth it
review: Literally the only app I have ever purchased and it has earnest changed my work ethic for the better. The addition of getting to do something nice for the environment is a lovely bonus. Only thing I wish is that they added a “crackling fire” as one of the ambient noise options.

title: Productivity
review: I think this is a great app! It has really helped me keep up with my school work and see where and how much of my time has been spent. I like the different trees and plants that you can pick and it helps me feel accomplished. Highly recommend, and worth the price!

title: Simple and Intuitive
review:
Forest is a wonder and intuitive app that helps with time management. It forces you to commit to the task at hand, because you do not want to lose the trees you’re planting. 

Highly recommended for those who need an extra push to focus on work and studying.

title: Forces me to focus
review:
First off, this app is so delightful. I love the concept of growing trees as a sign of productivity. The app is aesthetically pleasing and for me this is a huge plus. I love it when I can purchase new trees and bushes.
This app, above all, compels me to be productive. Even though I could be distracted in other ways, the fact that I am on the clock makes me want to get my stuff done.

title: Really nice productivity app
review: I love this app. It’s useful for the same reasons as many Pomodoro technique apps, but I love the added ability to see my progress as a Forest, and to unlock new trees. I would like this app to add a timer to the lock screen and a timer viewable from the Apple Watch app, then it would be perfect!

title: Enjoying so far
review:
This app is really fun. I’m definitely staying more focused with it. 
I think a great feature would be having set goals and then getting coins for those goals. 
For example, a daily goal would be like “study for 2 hours” and the app would remind me.
developerResponse:
{'id': 6624660, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app
feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2019-01-01T11:17:45Z'}

title: Best fun way to track your time!
review: This has been such a joy to find and use for tracking my time and keeping me focused! Much better than other pomodoro type of timers. I love how easily it lets you track what you are doing with your time into categories or “tags”.

title: Very helpful
review: I had heard about this app via a podcast and forgot about it. I was reminded recently of it via a vlog and then again on Twitter. I’m so happy I downloaded it. I feel inclined to get more work done and I never want to click “give up” so I make sure I complete whatever allotted time I set!

title: I love this app!
review: This app is amazing! As a design student, I really enjoy the minimalist gamified interface; It’s adorable and great for my add! Thank you so much for such a cute, challenging little app! My homework actually gets done now, so I recommend it all the time to my classmates!

title: Brings me joy, rewards for focusing, could use more variety
