review: Love the app and it’s features but would love more trees to plant. The thing I like the most is when they change the longer they’re planted. Not where all the stages look the same. I’d like more plants with noticeable progression.

title: Loving Forest
review: I have ADHD and this app has proven itself to be extremely helpful for focusing on work and study throughout the day. Sometimes it takes just a little motivation to stay on task - growing a digital forest has been that for this tree hugger. 5/5!

title: So effective - in my life and the world!
review: Use this to tutor my brother. We both care a lot for our forest and are inspired to work extra hard to earn more interesting trees! And the fact that there’s a real world impact is even more encouraging.

title: Enjoyable
review: When it’s time for my break I have something to look forward to. It also shows that you’re making progress towards something.

title: Amazing cognitive trick
review: Got me back on track for increased ability to complete my work without distraction. Seems to me that this is short circuiting the reward pathway in my brain through the same pathways that normally lead to distraction. Fascinating concept and execution.

title: Does the job
review: This app is very simple but it helps me stay off my phone when I need to focus. I think the “are you sure?” messages that come up when I think about quitting encourages me to keep going.

title: Motivated and excited to plant trees!
review: Found out about this app through a medical student Youtuber and been building my concentration endurance as I study for the MCAT. Such a brilliant model to plant trees by staying focused! Love this and looking forward to growing my forest, gaining more tokens, and eventually building a real tree!

title: Helps me be present
review: My friend got this app for me to help me focus on my studies. It’s such a fun way to motivate you to focus on being present and reaching your goals. I highly recommend this for anything! I use it for studying, resting/relaxing, and even working out.

title: Great App to help stay focused!
review: I have been using the app for 4 years now and it really does help me avoid getting distracted by my phone and stay focused. The trees are so cute and I love the ambient sounds! I hope they expand to more sounds in the future.

title: Great app!
review: I enjoy this app! It has helped me stay off of my phone while doing work/school work and I love the fact that I can create my own little forest. I will definitely be recommending this to friends and family.

title: Missing key component
review: You cannot pause your study session. If you have to leave you must simply “give up” which is very inconvenient when you are in a study situation where you may have to stop what you’re doing. Also, there is no way to set goals. I wish I understood what this app was missing before I took a chance and purchased. Great concept, but missing what I needed.
developerResponse: {'id': 19351570, 'body': "Thank you for the suggestion, we'll consider implementing the features in future updates. Please feel free to contact us again if you have further questions or suggestions. :)", 'modified': '2020-11-25T17:37:01Z'}

title: Helps me so much!
review: I’m the worst at focusing because I get distracted and always wanna look at my phone. I love the deep focus mode because it means I can’t do that. The trees give me incentive to study and it helps me keep track of home long I’ve worked

title: Keeps me off my phone when studying. Thanks, Forest!
review: Usually I feel like I’m studying with no reward. With forest, it’s makes studying and cleaning and working that much more satisfying because I know I’ll get a beautiful garden out of it when I do right. Totally worth the few bucks.

title: Amazing focus miracle
review: I find myself having a really hard time keeping folks from simple tasks because of my lovely handy-dandy phone being so exciting all the time. This app helps me take myself out of that and focus some time on getting things done.

title: Cute!
review: It’s a nice app. I thought I would blow right through the timers and not care if my plants whither. Turns out I care enough to put my phone down for 2 hours and every time I pick it up I think, “Ope don’t want my plant to die” and put it back down. It has helped my productivity!

title: I’m actually getting work done
review: I can believe I’m actually getting work done. My main motivation is trying to get a full forest lol. This app helps me track of how long I’m doing work and times my breaks which helps me get back on track. Breaks are just as important yall!

title: THIS APP IS AMAZING
review: I once left the app and it broke my heart when it said that my tree died. I get so much work done when I use it and it is kind of addicting to collect coins for more plants. If you’re one of those people that need A LOT of motivating to get school work done, this is the app for you.

title: When I use it, I’m productive
review: I don’t use it as much as I should but when I do, I get so much work done. I honestly didn’t mind paying for this app — seems to always work as intended and it’ll motivate you to keep studying just so you don’t kill a tree... which is sad if you do.

title: Love it!
review: I have had this app for a little it I love it especially when it is in deep focus mode because it prevents me from leaving the app and if I let the tree die a dead tree shows up in my forest which I would like to be only green so it really gets me to try and stay focused.

title: Great way to put your phone down!
review: With social media set up like a game, it’s all too easy to get stuck scrolling when you have better things to do. With Forest, you’re rewarded for leaving your phone alone. Exactly what I needed to gain more self control!

title: Covid-19 study tool!
review: Staying home it has been hard for me to get off my phone to do homework (senioritus has hit harder than I believed possible) I was not completing assignments and almost gave up. Then I remembered the forest app and it has helped me gain my productivity back. Best purchase ever!! Plus my trees are cute :)

title: Great for Online School
review: It’s hard to concentrate for classes when you know that the professor won’t take your phone from you. This helps to not check on your social media every time you get bored and force yourself to pay attention

title: Helpful and cute
review: I’ve definitely been more productive since getting this app. It discouraged me from going to other apps on my phone while my trees are growing so I get less distracted while working. Also, looking at how my forest is coming along is really satisfying. 5/5

title: It doesn’t sync right
review: Hi. First I want to say that I really like this app and always use it. I’ve just come to a problem recently. I have this app on my both devices, iPhone and iPad. Unfortunately sometimes when I sync on one of the devices, some trees won’t show up and I just lose them.  Can you please help me with that?

title: The Best
review: I usually am never able to stick with a program because I just end up getting distracted or procrastinate anyways. Although, forest has really helped me stay on track. I think it’s because I want to have a pretty forest that I want to be productive :)

title: Great app!!
review: This app is very cute and has a nice layout. I have no issues so far and it is keeping me busy with life, not looking at my phone whenever I plant a tree. I really like it and recommend it to anyone who wants to put their phone down more as well as be more productive.

title: Kinda good but not really
review: I’m leaving a review bc I’ll get something for free but anyway. I like the app but not so much anymore. It used to kill your tree if you left it which was good and bad. If you needed to call or text someone your tree would die but it would still keep you from playing games. Now you can leave and do whatever so it kinda defeats the whole purpose of this app.

title: Very good app!😁
review: I enjoy this app very much! It keeps me off my phone for longer than I ever could without the app. It is very helpful and whenever I have a lot of work to do, I always use this to help me stay off my phone. This is very easy and simple to use and very effective!

title: Fun & Creative
review: It is really helpful when it comes to studying!! College is HARD & getting on my phone has always been a huge distraction for me. This app has kind of turned being off of my phone into a game, and I am DETERMINED to get enough coins to plant a real tree lol. Definitely recommend.

title: I love it!!!!
review: I used to stay up until the early hours of the morning trying to finish homework because I would get so distracted with my phone, but this app has done so much good for me. I now get a healthy amount of sleep and I’m so much more productive and prepared for the day ahead!

title: life saver
review: for a person who procrastinates A LOT, this is such a good app because even if you want to stop studying, looking at the timer pressures you to keep studying and once you finish studying for the specific amount of time, you feel good and want to keep doing it.

title: I love this app!!! 🌱
review: My phone is a huge distraction when I’m working so I have found Forest to be super helpful! For me, it is superior to other apps because the fact that my staying focused will translate to ACTUAL TREES being planted motivates me to stay on track like no other thing! Forest + Ecosia is my dream team. Love you! 🌱🌱🌱

title: Graduate Student’s Study Time
review: Although I spend lots of time reading papers for my research, sometimes it feels like I have nothing to show for it. When I use this app I feel like the papers I read for my thesis are literally trees and after I graduate I hope I can see my work reflected in a forest.

title: It’s literally the only thing that gets me to study for long periods of time
review: I’m on my phone all day, every day. But I’m also a grad student. This app is the only one that actually made me feel guilty enough to make me study for a reasonable period of time without looking at my phone.

title: Helps me develop god habits!
review: I started using Forest a year ago and it has really helped me develop good habits as far as setting time aside away from my phone and social media and staying focused on more important tasks. I also love the fun and cute design, it makes staying focused more rewarding and entertaining!

title: Fun and Functional
review: Forest is a great way to stay focused and to get a small, yet fulfilling reward for doing so! It has personally helped me eliminate distractions from my phone and help me study better. Its well designed and has an amazing option to use in app money to plant real trees! overall an amazing app!

title: Excellent App
review: This app is clean, simple, lovely. I would like to be able to assign trees to certain tasks or goals, and white list music and meditation apps. It would be great if we could donate bee colonies through it too. Those would be bonuses though. Otherwise it's a very handy and well-developed app!

title: Great! But what if someone calls me?
review: I love it because it helps me with my work and homework. It makes me stay focused and I love the white noise. However, I have been getting urgent calls and texts and I have to kill my tree to answer them. Could you try to put settings where you can enable calls and texts while growing the tree?

title: Good motivation, cultivates self-control
review: Great variety of plants and trees; wish unlocking one didn’t cost as many coins but I guess that’s a goal to work towards. Nice how they plant real trees too. Easy to use, the feature to use your phone without penalty is great just in case I need to check something in my Notes app but the timer is running

title: Excellent! New complications on AW?
review:
This app cut off a huge of time I wasted on social networks. 
Only one feature request: Could we have a new complication on apple watch? Current one is only available on one watch face. Could we have a mini counting down widget available on all faces?

title: Study Time!!
review: This app is very affective in keeping me from my distractions (such as Instagram and games hehe). The only reason I give it 4 and not 5 stars is because each different species of tree/bush costs 500 coins and coins can be hard to gain, even if you study for 2 hours every day. Maybe bushes should cost a little less than the trees :)

title: Amazing if you want to build good habits
review: This app gives me motivation to be productive. It tracks what you do when you’re off your phone and it’s motivating to see your progress. I highly recommend this for people who wish to focus on things like studying.

title: You might think you don’t need this app, but you do.
review: God I love this app, I mainly have only used when I’m watching a movie on my TV and found it impossible to put my phone down, but now thanks to this app I can really focus and take all a movie or a show has to offer.

title: Great for productivity 👌
review: I love this app so much it keeps me off my phone, I never even knew I was so attached to it! It has actually improved my grades because I’m not on my phone as much. it is really encouraging for me, cause Who wants to kill cute little tree? Well I am absolutely in love with this game! Great job forest!!! 😆

title: Changed how I work. 5/5👍
review:
Using this app made me productive with homework and whatever else I need to do. Makes u realize how much time u waste on the phone. 

I do wish there were better/ more feasible achievements. I would suggest adding a lot more that don’t relate to leaderboard or friends.
developerResponse:

title: Love it!
review: I LOVE Forest. It keeps me on track for long periods of time and is the only app that can truly prevent me from touching my phone. I love that when I earn enough points through focusing and getting my work done I will be able to plant a real tree to help our environment! So cool, definitely recommend!

title: Productive and Helpful Study Tool
review: I love this app, I feel so compelled and motivated to study knowing that while I'm doing so I'm planting a tree! This is the best tool I've discovered and already have recommended it to friends, if you need more incentive to study and learn or just put down your phone, this is the app!

title: Really good
review: I think it’s a great app that helps me stay off my phone, I just wish there was a feature that sets timers automatically. I am really productive when I use this app but it’s hard for me to actually turn on a timer and make myself get off my phone.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5190346, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-24T05:28:23Z'}

title: GREAT APP
review:
This app is the only reason I’ve gotten any writing done in the last four months. 😂 It stops my ADHD self from sitting on my phone when I should be developing my plot. Thanks so much!!

I really love all the different tree/shrub options, and I can’t wait to save up enough to unlock the little pumpkins. 🤧

title: amazing app- one suggestion
review: i love this app. it has really helped me to get off my phone and pay more attention to my surroundings. i especially love the idea that i can plant a real tree. i do have one suggestion, however. i noticed that it costs 2500 “coins” in the app to be able to plant a real tree. i think that this should be a more easily accessible opportunity for users who are new to the app or maybe only stay focused for 10 minutes at a time. i think it’s a great way to help the environment but that we should make it easier, not harder to do.
developerResponse: {'id': 3954623, 'body': 'Hello, thank you for the suggestion :). -Forest', 'modified': '2018-06-24T14:56:26Z'}

title: I love this app!
review: I use this app all the time! Sometimes it can be hard to put my phone down and concentrate, especially when I'm studying material that's otherwise kind of boring. This app really helps me unplug and the trees are so cute! You really start to care about your little forest.

title: Idea is great, execution is lacking
review: I give 4 stars. The final star lacking because the developers kinda missed imo. The idea is great and I have definitely been more productive using this app. Only thing is, I've never seen a forest grow on a grid. Some sort of more realistic forest that I can be proud of!  Instead of something that looks like the starting land on SimCity.

title: I really love this app
review: I wish more of my friends used it! It would be fun to have that accountability. Anyways, I have found no other app that keeps me off my phone and working at whatever I’m doing like the Forest App does. I love my cute little trees. And I love the seasonal stuff too! Thanks for keeping me focused. :-)

title: Nice App
review: Today was my first day using the app and I’m impressed. I use other time tracking apps for my work, but I like this one because it has a visible reward connected. Lol My only wish is that there was an option to get credit if you stop the app early because you’ve finished whatever you’re doing.

title: Great in Every Respect
review: I was skeptical that growing a pixelated tree would actually help me, but it really does. This actually works really well with DEEP WORK by Cal Newport; I just finished his book and this is helping having a little incentive to not turn on my phone. This has been the best use of $2 for me in a long time.

title: Incredible productivity booster
review: This has helped me stay on track so much. The graphics are very aesthetically pleasing and I have encountered no glitches so far. Definitely worth the $2; I recommended it to several friends within the first two days of having it.

title: SO HELPFUL
review: I have started school like 2 weeks ago and I have lots of trouble staying focused, but this game helps me a lot! I like to go against my friends to see who can have a better forest. Overall this is a really helpful game that can help you a lot if you have trouble staying focused like me! 😜

title: I highly recommend this app!
review: As an engineering student I am always constantly on the lookout for apps that increase my focus. Not only is this app effective at keeping me focused, but the designs are also super cute and I love that the app actually plants real trees!!! Yay for the environment.

title: Great
review: Good app but please make it so that we don’t have to study for two hours straight to get the full design of the tree. The whole point is to utilize the pomodoro technique for efficient studying which is usually in 45/60 minute intervals so we would never be able to grow a tree with the full design, rather a barren tree. It’s annoying
developerResponse: {'id': 32229210, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you so much for the feedback! We will be forwarding your request to the internal team and take it into consideration. Thank you again for supporting Forest!', 'modified': '2022-09-26T09:06:37Z'}

title: Love how focused I’ve become
review: This app is very fun and helpful in staying focused. I’ve only had it for a little time but I’m really enjoying growing trees and meeting the goals I’ve set for myself.  I can’t wait to have enough coins and have a real tree planted!!!

title: Awesome app
review:
I learned how important it is to not look at your phone at ALL when you’re studying, and this app is a powerful tool to do that!

Only downside is that I never get the free species that come with the updates so im stuck with the same 3 plants lol

title: Really helps
review: Its a nice reminder that im gonna stay off my phone even when i forget and start reaching for it. You can have the screen locked and it still works so it doesnt waste battery

title: Surprised at how much this helps me
review: I get pretty sad when I lose focus and kill a tree. I’ve become pretty close with these trees and don’t want to kill them. So I’m motivated to stay focused. Can’t believe it’s come to the point where I need an app to help me focus, but hey - GET THAT DEGREE SIS!!! DO WHATEVER WORKS !!

title: entertaining and focusing :)
review: i am an honor/AP student in high school who is also a student athlete who competes at the high school, regional, and national levels . it can be hard to manage my time with training and school, so i use this app to help me manage my time :)

title: Staying focus
review:
I love the app more than this focus timer app I had. The app stops me from touching my phone while I focus on my school work. I got more work done. Knowing that I’m growing trees and earning points to plant an actual tree in the world. 
The only downside is that if I get a phone call, it kills the tree.

title: Absolutely amazing
review: I love this app so much!! It’s so helpful and actually works. I am so much more productive and have no trouble staying on task ever since I began using this app. If you’ve been debating whether or not to purchase this, this is the sign to do it!

title: The most wholesome app
review: I used this app a lot in college and it helped so much!! Now that I’ve graduated and work on my phone a lot, I use it to help me stay grounded and do productive things with my life instead of watching tiktok for hours like I’m prob to do lol

title: Perfect for the current times
review: Working from home has been a struggle. I have always suffered from ADHD so the new change is less then ideal. This app motivates me to dedicate time but also stay true and finish cause I want that tree!

title: I DONT EVEN BUY APPS
review:
idk if anyone will ever see this, but i never have purchased ANYTHING from the app store with my money but this app really cut it for me!! makes you focus and pushes you to want to do work bc YOU ARE SUPPORTING A GR8 CAUSE and actually planting trees !! i’m really determined to plant hella trees

-severely unfocused college freshman !😀

title: Really helps you focus
review:
This app has helped me so much during finals week because I derp heavily on my phone

UPDATE: it's been years and this app still keeps me off my phone when I turn it on. Great for building habits at work 💯🤙🏽

title: Really helps me stay focused
review: At first I was hesitant to buy an app without knowing if it would work for me but it really does help me stay off my phone. I always feel bad about killing my tree so I’m kind of forced to pay attention to my work. Really good at keeping me productive!

title: Love this cute little focus game!
review: I love this app so much. It helps me concentrate while having such a nice charm to it. I don’t care too much for all the tree options. But I like that the option is there. I primarily just enjoy the mechanism of the app and the relaxing music that comes with the focus time.

title: Really helps my focus
review:
Forest has actually gotten me to notice my phone pickups - even when I’m not using it. Awareness is the key to reducing screen time and this app has made me think twice about each time I pick up my phone. 

Highly recommend!

title: Whenever I use this I can focus!
review: I usually have a hard time focusing on work, I get distracted by the tv and when I pull myself away from that I use my phone to distract myself. This is fun and easy to use, and I work in 25 min increments with 5 min breaks. The only negative is that it ends when you pick up calls.

title: Just Starting Out
review: I have a really hard time staying focused at work.  I feel like there are so many other things I could do before the thing I should be working on.  Really hoping this app will help!  So far it seems to be working!

title: so amazing
review: this app is amazing. It is definitely worth the two dollars. It makes me so productive and helps me stay away from my screen. It also makes me so happy that you can save up your coins to plant real trees. I love this app. Please buy it. And please use the plant real trees feature.

title: Keeps me on track
review: Now that I’m in my new job mostly working from home, this helps keep me focused. I don’t have a huge amount of trouble getting my work done, but I can be led astray into weird rabbit holes online. This keeps me focused on the work and it is a good reminder for me.

title: Great app!!
review: This app is great for staying focused!! It makes doing even 30 minutes of work seem like a breeze, and I get so much more done when I’m not procrastinating, because I can think “I still have to fill 30, what else can I do real quick?” It’s great incentive!

title: Pleases my inner child!
review: What I love the most about this app is 1. That I can buy real trees with the coins I make for focusing and getting stuff done, that’s just awesome!. 2. I love the story telling, the graphics, the colors, the badges. I feel the good intention behind it and makes me want to use it more and more!

title: Awesome to stay focused!
review: This has helped me a lot during the quarantine to stay off my phone and remain focused on hwk. As a college student, it’s definitely tough being distracted by my phone when studying. Overall this app has helped me to combat my usage problem!

title: Been using this for so long
review: When it comes down to me getting work done I usually open up this app in order to get myself from procrastinating. I love the reward of planting trees and seeing them grow as well as planting trees in really life through the app.

title: The most basic setting is missing
review:
I'd like to be able to separately configure the volume of the in-app sound effects instead of having to control it from my phone only.
Please consider my request.
Thank you, I enjoy the app.

title: Very helpful
review: As college student with a mild phone addiction this app has really helped me put the phone down and be more productive. From doing homework to cleaning my room this app has kept me from the millions of distractions I find on my phone.

title: Best app for students to stay off of phone
review: I love using this app when I am at my highest point of procrastination. I set a timer and force myself not to use my phone while studying and I am proud of myself at the end for not getting distracted. Truly my favorite app on my phone❤️

title: Useful
review: It’s a pretty good app, and does its job. I’ve found myself deleting it a couple of times once I get better at not spending so much time on my phone. But usually within a few months I download it again. It’s cute and fun, and definitely useful.

title: Great App
review: A wonderful app to help you stay focused. I love the variety of plant/tree species to choose from and the fact that you have to get a certain number of coins to unlock them gives incentive to stay focused longer. I also love the background noise option.

title: Forest Review
review: Great app with a cool design. Simplistic, and easy to use. It doesn’t lock down your phone or prevent you from doing anything, rather your goal is to build your forest and your tree can’t grow if you get distracted and leave the app. It has helped me grow my self discipline. Thanks Forest.

title: Incredibly effective
review:
Exactly what I wanted. They have a timer that vibrates when done, not blares an alarm. And when it buzzes, you can set a timer for a break.

It’s also nice that you can collect points to unlock different plants. Nice touch!

But now it’s time to study some more.

title: Adorable!
review: I love this app. I can't bring myself to kill such an adorable, innocent plant like the ones available here. Im looking forward to when I have unlocked all the trees and bushes, so I can organize my time through both the tagging system and the type of tree I pick.

title: Great App!
review: This app has really helped me to focus on my school work and not get distracted with all the social media apps on my phone. I also like the feature of when you get to 1000 coins, you can plant a real tree! This app is so helpful. I even recommended it to friends. 5/5 stars!

title: Great!
review: I love this app. I debated getting it for a long time but it has inspired me to work harder and longer. I feel obligated to do work when the timer is going. It overall helps me see how my time is being managed and how productive I’m staying. Would 100% recommend.

title: Really helps
review: I usually use this app to stay focused when working with my math, and it really works. I don’t look as my phone as much, and if I do, i kill my tree. It forces me to chose between playing another game on my phone, or keeping my tree alive, and I always choose my tree.

title: Helps me focus when studying and doing chores!
review: I started using Forest to see if it would help me stay focused on my homework and studying.  I love the variety of trees and bushes and now I find myself using Forest to stay off my phone when doing lots of different things (laundry, studying, chores, etc.)

title: The most helpful app I’ve ever used
review: Frankly speaking, I used to be a person who extremely easy to be distracted by my phone while I’m working on something else matters. But with the help of this exquisite app, I’ve formed a habit of long-lasting concentration and remarkably reduced my screen time. Thanks a lot!

title: A good cause and helps me focus!
review: Sometimes I need a little extra motivation to focus on work or just to stay off of my phone for a while. I like knowing that I can save up coins to plant actual trees and help the environment. It gives staying focused on the present a little more incentive.

title: Very simple, yet wildly useful
review:
I have many untouched apps on my phone that seemed like they’d make life easier when I downloaded them. 

This one does by getting you away from the smart phone and those other apps, therefore making me much more productive. 
Kudos!

title: Gets the job done!
review: I've used it a couple of times and I have to say, it has gotten me to avoid checking my phone! I kind of wish it literally locked my phone though. I could see myself giving in after a while. So far, so good!

title: I love this app; could use improvements
review: This app is amazing. It helps me get so much done. I just wish it didn’t take so long to rack up coins. The trees and bushes go up in price whenever you buy a new one, making it hard to get all the ones I want!! Otherwise, great app.

title: It really helps
review: Somehow having this app literally tell me to put my phone down and focus on work really helps. Plus, I like seeing my trees grow. It's cute that they are Christmas trees during the holidays and coral in the summer, etc...the app works fine and I do use it almost every day.

title: Forest App
review: This is a super good app if you’re looking for a nice way to focus. I appreciate you can play your own music in the background. I’ve used this during many late nights while writing papers. Lastly I love the idea in mind for this app and the conservation that it cultivates. Would recommend!

title: Easy way to stay productive
review: Easy and fun way to stay off my phone when it’s time to buckle down and study. I’m a nursing student and have found this to be super helpful when working in study groups to keep EVERYONE off their phones! Highly recommend

title: Overall Great App!
review: This app has really improved my focus! I do wish that instead of a 10-second time limit to cancel, it was a full minute. This would give users an opportunity to cancel without killing their trees. I also wish that when users sign up they have more base tree options. Otherwise, the app is great for users looking to increase focus!
developerResponse:
{'id': 8330393, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestion to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2019-04-23T09:50:00Z'}

title: Helps you concentrate by making you feel guilty
review: I don’t know about other people but I love using this app because it feels like a game too. I can create my own forest and every time I give in to social media I kill a tree and it makes me feel guilt so I won’t do it again.

title: Useful App
review: Delightfully surprised how much the app actually helps think more about how I’m spending my time and helping me redirect my attention away from just picking up my phone and flipping through it constantly. I really love the idea of planting a bunch of trees during my focus time, too!

title: This app makes me feel more productive
review: This app makes me feel more productive by not checking my phone as often when I have the forest app on. When I have the app on, I am more likely to carry through with my school tasks instead of procrastinating.

title: Recommend for anyone
review: Have been using forest for a number of years and have always been enjoying using it. The features were great, with the planting real trees and also the different plant species always keep people interested in using this

title: Forest
review: Adorable app that helps you focus by forcing you not to look at your phone. Sometimes temptation gets the better of us, and this app is perfect for when you simply need to be productive and have no disturbances. It takes time to unlock all the different kinds of trees but it’s definitely still worth it!

title: Great study tool
review: I really enjoy using this app because it helps me stay off my phone and provides excellent encouragement for sticking to the timers I’ve set. The relaxing rain sounds that the app comes with is what makes it my go-to app because I focus better with gentle background noises.

title: The best 1.99 I have ever spent
review: This app has changed the way I go about studying and focusing. It helps to have a numerical and visual representation of how much I have actually been studying and working, and be able to hold myself accountable. I’ve been trying to plant 3 25 minute trees a day and I’m currently 112 trees in!

title: Amazing app.
review: This app helps me focus and concentrate without distraction. This doesn’t even have to help with work or studying!  If you want to clean or spend time with your family then just set the timer and do it without distractions on you device! Money well worth spent.

title: Can’t sync on iPad
review:
I love this app on iPhone. I’ve used it on iPad since the day it was made compatible. However, for 4 weeks now my sync hasn’ worked. It shows last sync ‘4 weeks ago’, and if I hit the Sync in preferences it crashes the app.

I’m afraid to reinstall because I’ll lose a month of progress. I’m hoping an app update fixes sync and saves my trees. That would make the iPad app 5 stars, but until then I’m reluctant to use it again.
developerResponse: {'id': 5580554, 'body': 'Hi,\nSorry to hear this is happening.\nPlease provide us the details and the screenshots of the problem via our in-app feedback system. We will look into this issue. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-10-19T17:18:53Z'}

title: Makes focusing a little more engaging
review: It makes me want to keep those little trees alive, but sometimes I need info stored on my phone to work and then I have to kill some trees. It also would be nice to have it integrated to the computer as well so that when 1 distraction source was occupied, I couldn’t just turn to another.

title: Good App
review: Good app.  I know I’ve got bad tech habits I need to break.  I wish they would allow friends to see everything that you can see with respect to your own profile.  If friends could go back a week into your history that would be nice for the sake of accountability.  If they added that feature I’d change to 5⭐️s.

title: Forest: A great and helpful app!
review: This app has really helped me, especially when I really have to get things done and can’t afford any distractions from my phone. Also a creative and fun way of actually also doing something good for the world. Overall, Forest is just very helpful

title: A fun way to stay focused.
review:
I have been using this app for week, and it is been one of the most productive weeks that I’ve had in a long time.

I’ve tried lots of different productivity apps, but this one is simple, fun, and user-friendly. It almost feels like a video game.

title: Love the concept + it works!
review: I use it to stay focused when I have tasks to do. I'm waiting to save up more coins so I can buy different species of plants that can then correlate with the different types of tasks that I'm doing. For example: type A tree for studying. Type B tree for relaxing. Etc.

title: Game changer
review: The key to this app’s success is how quickly you can turn it on- you’re immediately forced to put it down. Not to mention how cute the trees are, and how simply fun it ends up being to look back on a week of progress! I’ve never regretted paying for it.

title: Great start!
review: I really love it, but there’s a one feature I would love to see added: a place to take notes before and after a session.  This way I can set goals before and reflect on how I did after.

title: The Cutest Way to Focus
review: It’s so encouraging to watch your little forest grow. I’ve used other Pomodoro-style apps before but Forest takes the cake with their cute, encouraging visuals and a timer option that goes on for as long as you can focus.

title: A fun way to curb phone use
review: Like many people, I have tried to use my phone less but struggle stick with it. This app has helped tremendously because it is a fun positive enforcement to *grow* a tree. Especially if you’re a nature lover.

title: Great studying tool
review: This app is great for keeping you off your phone - super helpful for someone like me who just checks their phone out of habit and ends up getting caught up in social media and other distractions. I appreciate this app :)

title: I want to really love this
review:
But it would be so much better if I could launch a focus session from my iwatch! 
I try to distance myself from my phone when I need to work so hate I have to walk to my phone and often get sucked down the rabbit hole of notifications. I really wish I could plant a tree from my watch.
developerResponse: {'id': 25234150, 'body': 'Hi,\nCurrently, you cannot start a planting session from your watch because we cannot sync the planting progress on phones and watches simultaneously, meaning that users could still use their phones if they started planting on their watch.\nWe will continue to work on syncing these plant sessions nevertheless. Thank you for the feedback! :)', 'modified': '2021-09-21T16:21:46Z'}

title: Great app !
review: Been using this app for about three weeks now since I started school again and it’s come in handy ! I’m definitely a lot more focused now and since I can unlock more plants, I’m more motivated to study. :-)

title: Perfect Study Help!
review: As a student during the COVID- 19 pandemic it gets difficult to stay focused on the never ending work. However, since i’ve downloaded forest, i’ve managed to leave my phone and feel more focused while studying

title: Helps keep me off my phone
review: One of my goals is to use my phone less and this app has been a tremendous help for that. By utilizing the different tags I can track how much time I’ve been applying to new habits.

title: Studying improved
review: This makes me keep track of how much time I have study and just by having the purpose of a reward and the satisfaction that I might be the reason a new real life tree is planted motivates me. It’s like Pokémon go but for studying

title: Helpful
review: Turns out when I study 8 hours a day, I’m actually only studying 4 hours a day! That’s what this app showed me lol. So now I’m actually getting in 8 hours. Crazy how you don’t notice procrastinating until an app shows you

title: Cute and Helpful App that encourages productivity.
review: I’d definitely recommend for people that like to see quick results for productivity. Even if I’m just accomplishing little things in my every day life, seeing the trees grown because I’ve stayed focus really helps my scatter brained mind. And I have ADHD

title: Very good!
review: Got this app to study for my APs and it definitely worked and got me to stay focused and get off my phone. The time ranges from 10 minutes to 2 hours in 5 minute intervals. You can plant different kinds of trees and there are a lot of achievements to unlock!

title: LOVE IT! Helps me stay focused
review: I am not one to usually leave reviews but, this app is AMAZING. It really helps me stay focused enough to get stuff done. I’ve never been more productive. In addition to helping me stay focused, once you rack up enough sunshine elixir you are eligible to plant trees IRL, my favorite thing about the app.

title: beautiful app, helps me focus
review: i love the simple and straightforward design of this app. I like how you can customize your forest by buying different plants. Every time i start my homework i always need to plant a tree before i get started. it’s so soothing and satisfying to see your forest grow.

title: Great for students
review: I’m in my 3rd year of college and this is great for when I need to keep clear from distractions and notifications. I turn it on and just put my phone in my backpack and when I open it up after class, my tree is grown!

title: It’s awesome!!
review: The app has really helped me study for my tests and quizzes. It keeps me focused and concentrated on my work. The only problem I would have with the app is that you need to pay for it. It is frustrating when I have to buy an app without knowing what it does. (Other than what it shows in the preview)

title: Make focus more fun
review: Elegant, simple, happy, this app does exactly what it promises... makes your focus time more consistent by making it fun! Being able to visually see the results of your work in something simple like a little forest is surprisingly satisfying. Well done folks 👏👏👏

title: What a great app!
review:
I love this app! It is a great way for me to stay off my device and actually get what I need to done! I love choosing a tree and letting it grow. I can’t wait until I get enough coins to plant a real tree!

I totally recommend this app if you need help to step away from your electronic!

title: Great App!
review: I love this app! I like leaving it on the mode to where I can’t leave the app or else my trees will die because it makes me stay off my phone! If you have a hard time staying off your phone when studying then I really recommend this app ((-:

title: Great app for getting things done!
review: The overall premise of the app is great! Once you set the timer you really don’t want your tree to die ,and it forces you to get things done! It would be cool if somewhere on the lock screen it said something about how much time was left and an encouraging saying to keep on working!

title: Trees of Motivation!!
review: This app has helped me focus on my studies for the GRE and the TOPIK. Seeing the tree grow gives me such motivation to finish a task within the time I set for myself before I can take a break. I use the time after I set for focusing as time to relax, and then I go back in! This app is amazing for that.

title: I LOVE THIS APP!!!
review: i absolutely love forest. it gives me a reason, a reward for studying! i probably wouldn’t study as much if not for this app! it’s absolutely excellent. if you feel like you want to study but you just can’t because you get distracted by your phone, then this app is for you.

title: Great for Focus
review: This app has helped me put my phone down when I need to focus: whether it’s writing a paper, working in my art studio, driving, or just any situation where I need to stop getting on my phone. I love my little trees that I plant and they help motivate me to keep using the app.

title: I can't stay focused without this app.
review: I'm literally at the point where I depend on this app to do my work - it's great. I use it in conjunction with the Google Chrome extention, and it keeps me off my phone and off websites that distract me. There's even a feature to whitelist certain websites!

title: Love this app!
review: When I’m studying normally it takes me time to get accustomed to things for example, music or any other things that can help since I can get distracted, but fairly this app is amazing >.<! I don’t have problems in concentrating! Recommend 10/10

title: Worth your money!
review:
It helps me focus so my easier. And you can plant real tree. How cool is that? 
My option suggestion is the app should have more event or options to ear more points. Right now it’s really heard to earn enough point to unlock new types of tree, let alone plant a real one

title: Really love this app!
review: As someone that easily loses focus and gets lost down rabbit trails on my phone, this app has really been incredible so far. I know it’s just a little thing, but the reminder has helped me to keep focused. Love the premise of planting little virtual trees to plant real ones, and love this app!

title: Great
review: Honestly it’s just straight forward and gets the job done. Anything you might be procrastinating for hours on end, Just play at that little 25 minute minimum requirement tree and most of the time you’ll break all distraction and be locked in to good habits for the long-haul

title: Need more time options.
review: I love this app. Would be better if we could focus for weird times like 11 minutes or 12 minutes etc. I know the timer can go past the mark but it doesn’t ding so it makes it hard if you’re timing something. Would be good to include that in the next update

title: Does what it says.
review: This is a fun way to ensure that you stay focused and on task. For more rewarding than wasting time using other methods. Also, the customization options in the app really help with allowing you to be sure your experience is tailored to suit your work style.

title: So Useful!
review: I use this everyday to help me focus on my motion design work, and it works so well at keeping you off your phone and put all your attention into your work. The unlockables are a great thing to keep you wanting to use the app too! Would totally reccomend!

title: Love it👍 With one request
review:
Helped me throughout college and now still in general👍
I would love to have the ability to start a tree and keep track of the time inthe widget section, just so I don't have to unlock my phone to see the timer every single time!

title: Simple and fun for adults and kids
review: This is such a cute concept and actually effective, simple, and fun.  It’s also great for kids: if you ask them to do something for a specific amount of time, they can succeed in planting a tree if they keep themselves occupied with the activity!

title: This is the first study app that worked
review: I have tried several apps before but this one was the first one that worked. The design of those trees are soo cute that I just want to save as many coins as possible to upgrade my tree type so that my garden is prettier.

title: Cool
userName: I am a random person number 1
review: This app really does help me stay focused on my work, I don’t want my trees to die. I think getting more incentives to grow trees would be cool like right now that cake thing for the apps birthday is going on I think if the developers added more things like that it would be a good improvement.

title: Good for procrastinators
review: I use this app to keep track of my deep work time.  I’ve been using it in the past year to keep track of my study time for professional licensing exams.  Definitely recommend for those of us who are procrastinators and need structure to study.

title: Forest
review: This is a great app to use. It prevents me from going on my phone and finding distractions. I would totally recommend this app to anyone who is always has a lot of work but want to be on their phones, teens, college students, and so many more. It totally is worth the money.

title: Fantastic app to stay focused
review: On a whim I download this app to see if it would help me stay focused. It definitely does. I love watching my little tree grow, and if I exit the app the tree will die. It’s a great app to also make me realize how much I pick up my phone. Definitely would recommend

title: Grow grow grow
review: I really enjoy the simplicity of this app. It’s helping me cut down on screen time and increase productivity. I also like that if I unlock my phone to look at an email forgetting I “planted” the app notifies me that I have to get back to the Forest before automatically killing my tree :-).

title: Changed My Work Habits
review:
This app is amazing. I had used pomodoro type apps in the past and found them functional enough, but Forest took the productivity tracker to a whole new level. 

The ability to tag and categorize time and then see it in your forest and graph: stellar.

title: Growth
review: To measure one’s focus in terms of time spent growing a virtual forest. This app utilizes a clever approach to abstain from the apparent “need” which smart phones today demand. For 99 cents, you support a good cause but more importantly, your purchase should aim to foster a habit that is key to sustainable happiness: engaging oneself in the tasks at hand, whatever they may be.

title: Motivating!
review: I love this app! At first I had my doubts that it would actually help me to focus, but after a day of using it I fell in love with it because it made me determined to get work done and beat my time each day. I also love having friends on it because it creates a motivational competition.

title: This app is a gem!
review: This app has increased my productivity so much! It motivates me to stay off my phone and focus on work. The only thing I would add is the ability to turn on Do Not Disturb mode from within the app. So that when I plant a tree, my phone automatically goes into Do Not Disturb.

title: Helps my focus immensely
review: I, like many of us, struggle staying focused with all of the digital distractions present. This app helps me set guidelines for myself, so I consciously make reasonable goals and stick with them, rather than mindlessly reaching for my phone during a work session. The "game" element is rewarding, but not intrusive. Great app!

title: Perfect app, just needs one extra thing..
review: I definitely love this app and you guys deserve more than 5 stars. But I just want to add one suggestion: can you guys add more special effects like the winter one, and also provide more choices for trees/bushes/etc?  Surprises will keep users excited ;)  esp those who don't have a big ddl or goal ahead.

title: Great For Studying
review: I always have trouble concentrating and always find myself distracted on my phone. This app really helps me to stay focused and gives me a motivation for not picking up my phone. It helps me study consistently.

title: Love this app!
review: The Forest app has been helpful in keeping me away from scrolling through my phone when I need to be working. I love that I’m rewarded by watching my trees grow. Great productivity app for anyone who needs a little encouragement! 🌲

title: Worth Every Penny
review: I usually refuse to pay for apps. When I saw forest, I was going to get one of the free knockoffs like Flora, but I’m so glad I didn’t. This was the best 1.99 I’ve ever spent. Forest has really changed my life as a student. Don’t hesitate, it’s worth every penny.

title: Nice app, but need more functions
review:
Can you implement the following functions?
1. Show timer at the Locker Screen.
2. Allow me to pick BGM when starting a room or planting a tree.
3. Allow setting routine schedule. Send notifications before routine times.
4. Send notifications to Watch.

title: Amazing for college students
review: I’m a college student and I sometimes get distracted on my phone when I should really be studying or working on homework, so this app had really helped me focus! I definitely recommend it. 😊

title: Good but Stagnant App
review: This app is pretty good. It does what it says it does with few errors or issues. However, I’ve been using it for a couple of years and not much has changed in that time. They have improved the bugs as needed though, app technical performance has no issues I have noticed.
developerResponse: {'id': 23373795, 'body': "Hello, Thank you for the feedback. Please don't hesitate to let us know if you have any suggestions for our app! :)\n", 'modified': '2021-06-14T14:25:12Z'}

title: App has bugs
review: Recently this app has been bugging up. I started my stop watch, left it for an hour then got credit for 120 minutes in 1 hour which is impossible. Obviously. Right now I’ve got 60 minutes already accumulated for 6pm when it’s not even 6 yet? So my numbers are wrong half the time. Used to love this app but the bugs make it worthless.
developerResponse: {'id': 22701488, 'body': 'Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us via our in-app feedback system for us to assist you further. Please provide details (for example, screenshots or videos) of the problem if you can.\nTo visit our in-app feedback system, please go to Settings, enter our FAQ, tap on the top-right icon and go to "contact us". Thank you. - Forest', 'modified': '2021-05-09T09:43:08Z'}

title: Great app so far
review:
Simple to use; Easy to navigate; Deep focus mode lets me focus better.
Stopwatch gives me the flexibility to see how long I could focus. 

Sounds are soothing. Wish there could be more options to choose from.

title: Helpful!
review: This app has been super helpful for me to focus on school work, especially with the “deep focus mode” and calming music. Also a lot of the trees/plants are really pretty but I have to focus for more amounts of time to unlock them so that’s a big motivator lol :)

title: Such a cute little app!
review: This app really does motivate me to study a lot and plus, the graphics are beautiful and I just love to watch my little garden grow into something massive. I would like for it to have a task list where I can put down what I have to do, that would be really awesome!

title: I like it!
review: My boyfriend gets mad when I say he should not touch his phone when studying, and now instead I can just say wanna grow a tree! It totally works and makes us both focus for a long time!

title: Deep focus mode ?
review: I had recently bought the app and I can’t seem to enable the deep focus mode on the app. I tried for the like a good 10 minutes just trying to figure out how to turn it on . I kept pressing the button to turn it on but didn’t . If someone knows what might be the problem, please let me know .
developerResponse: {'id': 21158726, 'body': 'Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us via our in-app feedback system for us to assist you further. Please provide details (for example, screenshots or videos) of the problem if you can.\nTo visit our in-app feedback system, please go to Settings, enter our FAQ, tap on the top-right icon and go to "contact us". Thank you. - Forest', 'modified': '2021-02-19T08:10:19Z'}

title: Nice
review: an asset to anyone struggling with managing time and staying on task. removing one distraction is sometimes all it takes. haven’t even played around with it that much but it works, even at the most basic level

title: Useful app to improve focus
review: I really enjoy using this app to maintain focus while working. This makes it easier to visualize the amount of work that you have completed by watching your forrest grow!

title: Loving it
review: Over quarantine I’ve realized that I am so unmotivated. I did some research and found this app and it’s helped me got some work done. I downloaded this to help me get rid of procrastination habits I have so i recommend this app if your unmotivated and procrastinate!!

title: Never really used this til now
review: I’ve always had this installed but never really used it until I sat down to work on my novel. Now I use it when I really need to focus. It’s a fun little thing and I guess when you plant trees in the app you can also plant trees in real life?

title: I LOVE IT
review:
this app genuinely keeps me focused because i don’t wanna kill my lil trees ): 
i love viewing my forest at the end of the day or the week to see my progress and i love being able to tag what i was doing during that time to keep track of what i’ve been doing most.

title: Amazing app
review: I’ve been using this app for a couple years now. Worked amazing in my undergrad to get me off my phone. Works amazing to let me focus now in Law School while zoom sessions are happening and studying. Overall and amazing app and I’m glad to see new updates.

title: I love this app!!
review: I get so much done not being on my phone!! I’m addicted to my phone so this is so helpful. Wish there was this app for computers to like block you from certain sites for a certain amount of time. Definitely recommending this app to friends!!

title: Easy to use
review: I’ve been using this to help me study in this new climate of online learning, I have ADD and struggle to pay attention to a screen, but I have found some success using this app. The only thing I would like to see is more aggressive feedback when you leave the app while a tree is growing.

title: Excellent productivity tool
review: If you struggle to focus no matter what you do because you constantly go back to your phone I highly recommend spending the $2 for this app. It has greatly helped with my productivity and saved my life in college

title: Focus time!
review: I love using this app for work - when I need to focus on any given task I set up my Forrest app and choose a time period. It’s rewarding to watch your tree grow and the app alerts you to put your phone down or stay focused if you even touch the screen. Awesome!

title: Works GREAT
review: I am highly attached to my phone. I either use DO NOT DISTURB, or this app in order to get more done throughout my day. My favorite part to this app is that if you earn enough coins (reward for your concentration), you have they option to donate it so that an ACTUAL tree can be planted. 🌳💚🌲

title: Changed My Study Habits
review: This app seriously made me stop procrastinating and actually start doing my work. I think the concept of planting trees is so cute and being able to plant them in real life is great. I would recommend it to my family and friends!

title: Loved it
review: I’m not sure about you but for me I get distracted really easily by a phone buzz of thinking that someone might be looking for me while I’m working. However, this app eliminates that distraction. Personally, I’d say that it’s definitely worth the price of just two dollars

title: Great choice
review: This app helps me stay off my phone when I need to study and focus on other things. It also is great at the dinner table to keep people of their phone. I even have the add on for Firefox. Now if they could just do safari I would be set.

title: Pretty Good
review: I like this app a lot because it helps me to stay off my phone although I wish there was an option like on Samsung’s to pick certain apps that you can still use. For example if you need to text someone then you can still you messages and your tree won’t die.

title: Simple but it works
review: Amazing how easily this works. Just making an agreement with yourself. I’d set shorter times to build up a sense of accomplishment first then expand times. Also have tried with a friend and it makes it even better - social contract

title: Amazing app!
review: I'm a screenager and this app, by using my phone, counter-intuitively helps me stay off of it while I'm doing homework! I'm SO much more productive and it makes me realize how many times I'm tempted to pick up my phone. Really cute display, good rewards, and definitely worth the 2$!

Simply brilliant! I have used this app for studying the past month and my productivity levels have increasingly skyrocketed. It’s an efficient UI with a fluid design. The best part is that there’s a positive environmental impact too, allowing users to plant trees with their in-game coins. It’s a cheap investment that’s worthwhile!!

title: Love it!
review: I was recommended this because I have very erratic studying habits. This gave me a goal to work towards and is definitely worth the amount I paid for it. I love that it also gives you ambiance sounds to help you focus as well. I can’t wait to see my forest grow!

title: Great! 👍🏼
review: Definitely helps me stay off my phone, and planting a tree each time I study makes me feel accomplished, because I have a cute visual representation of my work.  It’s a great incentive considering how many times I pick up my phone or even glance at it while studying.

title: Amazed
review:
So happy I have this app, I get so distracted on social meeting and before I know it time has flown by and I do not feel productive.

This app has helped me work towards the goal of not looking at my phone and has made me more efficient at home and work. I rave about it to everyone.

title: Nice app for a good cause.
review: When I first got this app it was to help me with focusing on my work instead of my phone. I thought the price was a bit iffy but bought it anyways. The app is a good app with a good cause, encouraging you to stay off the phone and help plant some trees while you’re at it.

title: Helps me focus!
review: I really love this app. Growing my little forest is so pleasing and provides just enough motivation to keep me from procrastinating on my phone when I really need to focus. Unlocking new types of trees is a fun little bonus as well. I’ve recommended it to so many friends!

title: Get it!!!! Especially college students
review: I always get distracted by social media while I’m supposed to be studying. This app has helped me establish no-phone times even outside of studying. Even just going tech free for an hour or so. Plus saving enough drops to plant a real tree is worth it

title: Keeps Me Focused!
review: I started using this app to stay away from videos and games while doing homework. It definitely helps when I realize i’m using technology more than working on assignments, and it’s just a cute way to keep me off of my phone!

title: Makes Work fun
review: Tracking progress as you work is proven to increase performance, and this app goes a step further by giving instant rewards for small tasks. I highly recommend this app for anyone that struggles motivating themselves to get things done.

title: Only app I use to focus, and it works!
review: ADHD working mom of 4.  I have dozens of unused apps on my phone to help my productivity but this is the only app I ever use, and I use it every work day.  I guess bc it’s so simple, gives reminders when needed, and builds a forest at the same time.  What’s not to like? I love it!

title: I love it!
review:
I bought this app a few years ago for a few bucks and honestly it’s been worth it! it helps me stay focused and I love all the little tree and bush designs. I also like the events they hold and just the general happy feeling I get while using the app. 

Great work!

title: Love tracking feature
review:
This app is great for productivity and tracking time spent doing work.
Only thing that could be better is it gets exceedingly hard to get trees, I believe the price should raise after each tree buy but not by so many coins.

title: Good at keeping me honest
review: I find Forest offers just enough resistance to keep me honest throughout my day.  After a couple days I find I lose the urge to look at my phone constantly, and then tend not to use it for a while.  But it does the trick, it was a good investment that keeps me focused.

title: It’s amazing!
review:
I’ve been using it for a week
I love trees and I love productivity. I’ve been looking for an app like this for a while. I have noticed how much I’m distracted when I’m on my phone when I got the app. I’ve been so much more productive since I got it.  it is really nice to have apps like this!

title: If I pick up my phone the app tells me to put it down (lol!)
review: I enjoy this app. It is easy to use and keeps me on task. I love that it tells me to put my phone down if I pick the phone up when I’m supposed to be working.

title: This is genius.
review:
I love this app because it ACTUALLY helps me use my phone less and lowers my screen time by a lot. Also it helps me to let my phone charge instead of being in it while it’s charging. 

Great app! 🧡

title: Good for group focus
review: I am part of a program that make this app available so that groups of students can plant a tree while studying together. Even through we’re located all over, it helps me to focus knowing others are busy studying too.

title: Real Tree Limit
review:
I’ve had this app for 3 years now. I didn’t know until today that there was a real tree limit. I would use my coins to buy different trees to plant and every so often, plant real trees.
I think it’s lame to limit the real tree planting. Yeah, the makers say it’s because of costs… they should be more up front about that.
developerResponse:
{'id': 24804347, 'body': "Hello,
sorry for the inconvenience. Since the cost of planting real trees is covered by the company, complications might arise when users plant too many real trees; the cost can also easily exceed the app's revenue. Therefore, the number of real trees that each user can plant is limited.
We hope you understand and we will keep looking for other possibilities.
- Forest", 'modified': '2021-08-30T13:29:37Z'}

title: Fun study buddy
review: This app really kept me off my phone and focused when I needed to be. Plus it’s cute that u can build your own little study garden! It’s worth the money both because it is cute and because it works

title: Love it!
review: I love, love, love this app. It really has helped me a lot to focus and not get distracted. I feel so happy every time I get to plant a tree while I listen to some relaxing sounds and focus on whatever I have to do. It encourages me a lot, I’m so happy I found it. 🥰

title: I love this app!
review: I keep coming back to it as a favorite way to stay focused. I can’t help but want to grow those trees. I do wish it had the ability to put in time you were working you forgot to track, but it’s still my favorite timer.

title: Help
review: It’s a great app for getting work done without out distractions. But it’s having problems on my Apple Watch. I can’t even download the app on the watch even thought I have enough memory and I have it downloaded in my phone. Can some help me download it ?
developerResponse: {'id': 23511022, 'body': 'Hi there,\nThank you for using Forest! Please refer to the following article and set up the Forest app on your Apple Watch. Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions or suggestions! :)\nhttps://faq.seekrtech.com/Forest/articles/128', 'modified': '2021-06-22T01:15:21Z'}

title: Cute app
review: I’ve had this app for a long time and come back to it often. If I believe correctly, I had to pay .99 for it, but its worth it. Real trees get to be planted by our studying. Hehe. It’s a super cute app, I would recommend it.

title: Awesome app!
review: I usually always get distracted by something on my phone. I got the app like a week ago and it’s been incredibly helpful finishing projects and getting ready for finals. Simply because I don’t want to kill my trees haha.

title: I love Forest!
review: My kids and I love this little app. It is so much fun to ‘plant’ a ‘forest’...with time, you earn points that allow you to get new trees, and they are pretty alone and in the forest you create. Also if you ever need support, the support staff are very prompt and gracious.

title: Love that I’m helping the planet while keeping on track
review:
I haven’t used the app for very long but already I’m seeing a difference in how I approach time.  

I’m particularly grateful that my use is going to a good cause, helping communities and planting trees.  It makes me more incline to use the app to ensure I do my part.

title: Great App!
review: I used to just use the screen time function on my IPhone, but I ended ip ignoring that notification. Now, I can’t touch my phone till the timer ends because otherwise I’ll feel bad for the rotting tree.

title: Good Job
review: Does everything implied. This has become one I have my favorite study apps. I use that not only the stay off my phone but to record how much time I'm studying and reading. This is been a great investment.

title: Would recommend
review: This is the most creative focus app that I have tried (and as someone who battles ADD, I’ve tried a lot). I like that it provides a reward (in the form of growing your forest), rather than just a timer. Really stands out from other apps in this space.

title: Good App
review: Sometimes I forget I have it, but I have a hard time focusing, so setting this helps a lot especially if you’re with a group you can all set it and anyone going off the app kills everyone’s plant.

title: Cool app!
review: I like this app but I wish they had more tree options that are free (there’s only 3) or had it so you could make “money” easier when you study or don’t use your phone for a long time- as the app is right now you only get 10 coins for 25 minutes of studying. It’ll take forever to unlock any trees.
developerResponse: {'id': 20100119, 'body': "Hi, thank you for the feedback. You don't actually have to pay money for the trees, you can earn the coins by focusing more. The main purpose of this app is to help users stay focused on their tasks and the coin mechanism is there to motivate users to stay focused more and unlock the trees that they like. Pretty trees are worth the effort. :)", 'modified': '2020-12-31T05:57:13Z'}

title: It works!
review: I’ve been using this app for about seven years (I may have that wrong it was an estimate) ever since I was in college. Now I work from home and I still use it. It works very well. I very much recommend it!

title: Lovely App
review: I love the graphics of the app and how easy it is to use! I genuinely get excited after the end of my study sessions to see a new tree in my garden. This app really does help motivate me to stay off my phone and to focus on my work.

title: So helpful for studying in college!!
review: I am forever getting sidetracked by my phone when trying to study for my anatomy class and this app has been a lifesaver!! I would definitely recommend it to anyone, shout out to my roommate who recommended it to me!

title: Great app!
review: I don’t know about other people, but this app genuinely keeps me motivated to keep focus. I usually use this app when i’m studying and I keep it in deep focus mode where if I exit the app and use another, it’ll kill my tree/plant. If my plant dies then I get sad, so honestly it keeps motivated!

title: Honestly, the best thing to happen to me!
review: I am so bad at keeping my focus, but this app makes it easier for me to stay on track! The deep focus option helps me stay accountable by not being able to exit the app unless I’d be okay with my forest dying. I love this app!

title: Helpful for focus!
review:
Pretty helpful for focusing/ staying off your phone! I am happy with the trees you unlock and the sounds you can play during the session of growing. 
Wish you could move the trees around in your land/garden on the app tho. Otherwise pretty awesome app to help focus!

title: Time control
review: The best app to keep organize the time and control the procrastination that always affect the performance, highly recommended specially when you are working in team all them will take care of the forest very interested methodologic.

title: I LOVE THIS APP!!
review: This app has truly helped me focus. I spend WAY too much time on my phone and I cannot bear to let any of my trees wilt. So, I put this timer on whenever I really need to focus or I want to be off my phone, and I am happily growing my forest in the process. Would highly recommend!

title: Still learning, but I really enjoy the app already
review: I really like all the animations, concept, everything. Still learning and looking at all the bells and whistles but I like everything I see so far. Really excited to share my experience with friends.

title: Love this!
review: I have stuggled to stay focused for as long as I can remember, this app has changed that. I love it, I loved how fast time seems to pass when I use this app. I do 45 mins intervals and 10 mins break, and I don’t feel tired after work anymore.

title: Love it!
review: A very cute app that really helps me keep myself off my phone when I need to focus! I would definitely recommend giving this a try if you find yourself having a hard time putting your phone away.

title: Great App to help stay focused
review: I’ve always had trouble staying focused to the point that even putting screen time on myself doesn’t help. With Forest it has completely helped me to stay focused during my period where I need to be focused on work.

title: More focused than ever!
review: I love this app but I wish you didn’t have to pay for it since there are so many other things in the store you also have to pay for. This app keeps me really focused, gets me back on track whenever my mind wanders and I want to go on social media on my phone!

title: Relaxing, focusing
review: I use this app to combat by ever scattering attention span. It might seem counterintuitive to use a smart device as an attention aid, but thus far I’ve found Forest to help me ease into concentration. I like the looped rainforest audio, and I look forward to unlocking some of the other nature tracks!

title: Great app to track focused work
review: I use this when I need to dig into projects or am feeling overwhelmed - just plant the tree and start on the material and it all goes from there. Lovely graphics, no one wants to kill a tree. I happily recommend this in a distracted workplace and will continue to do so!

title: Actually helps
review: I have so much trouble staying focused on work I need to get done. Out of all the methods I’ve tried, this helps the most. There’s something about a little plant as a reward for working that motivates me. I think it’s worth a go, and I recommend it.

title: Makes focusin a game
review: So far this is one of the best pomodoro focus apps I’ve used. It pushes me to want to focus for longer periods and for more time throughout the day. The Forest sounds are very helpful. They keep me in a deep focus state of mind when working, studying, or making art. Well worth the $2

title: Great way to study
review: This is a great way to study because it shows you how much time a effort you are putting in to your work and it shows you how much you are growing over all by the tree and your self as well. So enjoy this app and good luck on your study’s.

title: Great for all students
review: I love this app. It really helps with procrastinating because if you try to go to distract yourself with a another app it tells you your tree is dying and you are forced to go back! I would recommend to all my procrastinators out there!

title: Awesome
review: Haven’t had any problems with this app. The only thing is I wished the screen would turn when I place my phone horizontally so as to also use it as study timer beside my ipad. Apart from that great app and it really helps me not use my phone.

Great investment. People say time is money. And you believe that, then this app helps you organize and save money. Through constricting your time to focus on something, you're able to finish without the temptation to surf the web or watch The Office for the 8th time.

title: Review
review: Amazing app! So helpful... and it motivates me to not use my phone during study time. It also helps me get my work done quicker and without distractions. I would totally recommend this app to anyone who’s having trouble getting all their work done!

title: Issue with reminders bugs!
review: Although I deleted all my old reminders it is still popping up in the same old timing... Nothing in reminders, I closed notification s and it still popping up! Any solution for this?!

title: A life saver
review: I am a college student with adhd, and staying on task (or disciplined in any way) has been a lifelong struggle for me. Who would have thought the fear of killing a virtual tree could help! This app has done wonders for my motivation to focus on the task at hand, and i am so glad I discovered it!! Thank you forest!!

title: Great way to stop procrastinating!
review: Whenever a text came in or I thought of something, I would look at my phone and become distracted for a while. This really kept me motivated to stay off my phone and keep working! Keep those trees alive!

title: I LOVEE
review:
this app actually forces me to
focus. A lot of times i go on my phone without realizing I’m even on it and then i get distracted and off topic. with this app the minuet i go into my phone and see my tree growing i am forced to put my phone down and go back to focusing. totally worth the $1.99!!!

title: Nice!
review: I like this app! It even has rainforest sounds that you can turn on to help you focus if music is too distracting for you! The overall aesthetic of the app is very cute and I would recommend this app if you need help staying away from your phone!

title: This app is the reason I pass all my classes
review: I have no self control but I am goal oriented and this has enough of a goal to keep me off my phone and focused on what I need to do. Simple and effective. I’ve used it for years and haven’t had any problems.

title: Wonderful for the easily distracted
review: Great simple product that makes you feel accomplished while giving your full attention to a task. I use it every time I go out to eat with a friend, and it has made every meeting ten time better!

title: fantastic
review:
this app really keeps you on task, and if
you are like me (emotional and sensitive) then you hate to see your tree die. also the longer to stay focused the better tree you get and the more coins you get, this app is perfect for students who really need to study and get their homework done. it could also be used just to stay off your phone if you think you are on it to much. i would really recommend this app to anyone who needs to buckle down and work instead of procrastinate and be on your phone. :)

title: Great for study/quiet time
review: I love using this app as motivation to keep studying and for reading required books for school! The trees are too cute, but I wish they were easier to earn :) My friends and I use it as a friendly competition sometimes.

title: Forest
review: I love this app. I love the group trees you can make. It helps me hold myself accountable since other people are relying on me staying off my phone as well. The fact that you can actually plant trees is an incredible feature of this app that makes it stand out.

title: Helps unplug for ever aspect of life
review: Getting a goodnight’s sleep and staying off my phone during an essay has never been more motivating. The rewards and ambience music this app provides will make lonely homework nights bearable. You will be surprised how much a dead tree will keep you going.

title: Very useful for a distracted student/entrepreneur
review: Between schooling, work, and trying to get a new company around it is sometimes hard to set time aside for a single task with so much going on. This app helps me focus by preventing that instinctual “phone check”. Plus what other app plants trees?
