title: Such an excellent little app.
review: For me, having little trees to growing when I pick up my phone because I’m feeling stuck on my work, it’s like the tree growing is doing something so I quickly return to my work instead of scrolling emails or Instagram.

title: Effective and fun!
review: It’s so satisfying to grow a forest and see how much time you’ve spend focused on your work. I never buy apps but this one is SO worth it! I’ve only had a few days but it helps me focus on my schoolwork and at the end of the day I get to see how well I did. Love it

title: Incredible!
review: Love this app! I’ve always had a hard time with these kinds of apps because they lock you out. This doesn’t, but the level of motivation I get from a tiny tree is unbelievable. I would highly recommend!

title: The salvation of this grad student
review:
When nothing else can get me focused and I'm procrastinating like mad, starting a tree growing usually does the trick. Also, it motivates me to put extra time in. My little forests are points of pride!

A year later: still Iove it! More trees please! A nice willow? A bougainvillea? A delonix regia (flame tee)? A rainbow eucalyptus? Sam Van Aiken’s Frankenstein tree?

title: Helps me get off my phone and focus!
review: This app really helps me to get off the phone when it’s causing too much noise in my head and unfocusing me. The little tree is just too cute to kill, and it helps to reduce that craving to check Instagram or whatever it may be. I love it!

title: Helps me focus
review: This really helps me focus as I am prone to procrastinating. Definitely recommend and it’s great that they plant trees. I do wish that if you go over the original time set, say 45 minutes and it goes to an hour, you get the next stage of the plant. Otherwise, it’s great!

title: This is the best app to help you focus
review: I started using it while I was at work to keep myself from getting distracted, but I use it all of the time now, even if I’m just watching tv. It really helps you break the habit of reaching for your phone constantly.

title: Perfect for studying
review: I love using this when I have little motivation to study. By planting trees you have a little bit more motivation as you can customize your forest by getting more points to buy new trees. It’s also a great way to be competitive with friends!

title: It works!
review: I’ve always had a problem with being on my phone too much and it interfered with my work efficiency. Forest has done wonders to help me focus on my work and on more important things in my life instead of being absorbed in my phone.

title: Forest is awesome!
review:
I love forest so so much! It really helps me focus and I don’t know what I would do without it.

If you are questioning whether or not you should get the app, totally get it! It is really rewarding and actually fun. If you love incentivizing, fun, focusing, and rewards for your greatness, get the forest app! You won’t regret it.

title: Excellent!
review: I use the Forest app when doing regular light studying for my classes. But I’ve started using it more frequently since I’m studying for the GRE exam and my goodness it’s been so helpful! I focus more and I even feel motivated to study more to get more points and build my forest. I love this app.

Forest is an amazing app and it keeps me productive because if I ever want to go on an app on my phone, I stop myself before I do because I don’t want my tree to die. Forest motivates me to actually get work done, and lately my work habits have improved ever so slightly. 10/10 satisfied.

title: Gr10 app!
review: Low key, this app is making me more stressed out bc I’m so overly competitive BUT, it has also shown me how much time I spend on my phone and how much more time I could be spending on work. Plus, all the graphics are super cute! I’m currently trying to save up my coins to buy the ghost bush, hehehehe. 10/10 would buy again.

title: Tree time
review: Simple, effective, and cute! However I wish there was a feature to pause tree growth. I find myself in situations where I may have to do another task or attend to someone and I can’t pause the time. Pausing the time would be a good option to have to more accurately reflect the amount of time invested in what I am focusing on.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5787846, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app
feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-11-03T12:36:40Z'}

title: I’m confused on what the point is
review:
Is this app for iPhone addicts or something?  It’s #1 in Productivity after real to-do list organizer apps, but all it wants is to be left on while draining my battery so a cute tree can grow and to keep me off my phone, all while telling me this is how to stay focused??  What the??

 I’ve read & reread the description. If the point of the app is to simply keep you off your phone, then say so!  No need for all the smart sounding fluff about being based on a timer theory.  

I found this app while looking at the top productivity GTD To-Do List apps to try as a better alternative to to doing this manually in Evernote. 

That’s my 2 bucks worth.

title: great app!!
review:
this really helps me focus ! i have a hard time prioritizing on my own so when i use this and my planner hand in hand, i can EASILY get the job done !!

I highly recommend this app to everyone & link up with family and friends on it, it helps a ton ! :))

God bless !

title: Awesome way to stay on task
review: I am a chronic procrastinator and this keeps me off of sc, fb, and instagram when studying. I love the idea of me studying going to planting real trees and was excited for the earth day challenge. Overall a great app to keep you off your phone and you can even add an inspirational quote.

title: Be productive for a good cause!
review: This app is perfect, I use it all the time. I feel bad every time I “kill” one of the little plants. If you collect enough hours not using your phone they plant a real tree, so it’s a win win- you get stuff done, and you help the earth a little bit!

title: It just works 🙏
review: Maybe all the idea of planting trees in your phone sounds silly to you and I was a little bit sceptical at the beginning, but it just works. Let's give it a try, it is not magic, it is habit building process 👍. And it is definitely worth it.

title: It’s definitely helping me!
review: I think it could be a little less cumbersome, especially with respect to their workaround for when one is using phone for work tasks, but it seems that’s not something they can really avoid.

title: Great app!
review:
I use this every day and it helps so much with my productivity! 
One suggestion I have is that once a user has planted a certain amount of trees during the day, animals could appear in their forest! Just to add a little bit more cuteness to this already adorable app.

title: Amazing
review: This app is really good and addicting! It really helps you stay of of your device and you feel acomplished after making a tree and getting coins! It really is a good app and I would recommend it to anyone who has trouble focusingw with their devicd around.

title: Wish I knew about this app before!!!
review: Forces me of the phone while I’m suppose to be studying. Also it’s helped me time manage. Another benefit is  saving battery since I’m not on my phone so much. Nothing wrong with it. Can’t wait to earn enough coins to plant a real tree. 🌳

title: This app really helps!
review: I’ve been using Forest for a day now and already I have seen drastic improvement on my focus and even stopped checking my phone as often

title: Why doesn’t it have more features?
review: For $3 it should have more features? It’s kind of cute I guess… but there are so few settings and customization options. Not even a dark mode theme. I dunno. They could do a lot with this app but it’s clearly been abandoned because not much has changed since I used it years ago. Wish I had saved my 3 bucks 🤷‍♀️
developerResponse: {'id': 32525476, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for the feedback. As a small company, our resources are limited and we have to strive hard for the operation of the app. Adding new features or making adjustment to the current ones requires long time for planning, design, and development, not to mention that our development team have to maintain the daily system operation and problem solving. But we will keep striving hard to improve Forest. We kindly ask for your understanding and thank you for your support! ', 'modified': '2022-10-12T06:43:06Z'}

title: Fabulous
review: There is no better way to spend 2 bucks. Two birds with one stone: relaxing over watch of a forest growing from your hard work, and a perfect way to keep you on task with manageable work and break increments.

title: Awesome app
review: Amazing app. A very simple and easy design. Keeps me from using my phone while I do my school work. And I love unlocking the different plants! And the best part is it’s only a one time purchase and there are no ads!

title: Nice app
review: I love this app. However the leaderboard has a bunch of fakers. Please don’t download this app just to make a nice garden. The leader board has a lot of people like. I don’t think its possible foe anyone to work for 22 hours in a single day, but coffee does wonders.

title: So Much Focus 🥳
review: Love this app! It gets me excited to study and keeps me at work! Rather than getting distracted, I’m getting more determined to get my things done and keep my forest nice and lush! 10/10 would recommend, best purchase evaaa!

title: Works great
review: I use their to be intentional about the time I’m spending on my phone. It seems counterintuitive that to spend less time on my phone I would use an app.. on my phone. But it really does help.

title: App actually helps
review: I thought this app sucked when I first got it. Then I gave it a second chance. And all of a sudden I’m out here growing plants everyday getting that study time in 🤣. I actually love this app now.

title: Amazing!!!
review: I have ADHD and this really makes it so I won’t touch my phone and I actually work on stuff with no distraction. I’m always careful with it too because it brings me happiness and a reason to focus to grow a tree. Best $4 of my life!!

title: LOVE IT
review: let me tell you guys when my teacher told me to get this app I was kind of lost at how growing a tree would be so helpful with studying but it truly keeps me so focused. I highly recommend for anyone who has a hard time not looking at their phone during studying.

title: Amazing
review: This app helps me get all my homework done, when all I want to do is lay in bed and scroll through tik tok for hours. Without it i would never get anything done, 10/10 would recommend.

title: Love this app.
review: I think this app is the cutest. It makes me want to study so I can see my forest grow. I love being able to document how long I’m able to focus on a task, and see where I spend most of my time.

title: Productivity!!!
review: Ive been using this app for like 5 years and wanting to keep my trees alive keeps me from going on my phone when I’m supposed to be doing school work, cleaning, or just taking time for myself.

title: Great
review: This has helped me concentrate more than any other apps I have tried before it’s almost like playing a game. This app works well however if you wanted something to end procrastination then you have to do your part as well

title: Simple but effective
review: Really does a great job implementing the Pomodoro technique and stay off of your phone when you need to be focused. Also, the coins are for a great cause 🙂 if you collect enough coins, you can plant a tree in real life!

title: Great for motivation
review: This was certainly money well spent. It’s been extremely motivating to me and is the reason I’ve even passed this year. I’m not being paid to say this its just my honest opinion, I seriously love this app.

title: Perfect for a millennial PhD student
review: As a millennial I am tragically attached to my cell phone. This app helps me focus on my doctoral studies by locking me out of my phone so I’m free from distractions! Not to mention the added benefit of helping the environment. I couldn’t recommend this app more!

title: Good app to keep you focus
review: I use this app sometimes when I’m trying to do homework but keep on getting distracted. It’s nice to get a little plant for staying off your phone and getting your work done.

title: Store Doesn’t Work
review: Love the interface, general idea, and functionality of most of the app but the store is always flashing an error message. Sad because I can never get any new trees, which feels like a waste of money. Don’t know if I’d recommend anyone pay for this if you can only have the two default trees.
developerResponse: {'id': 20292975, 'body': 'Hi, please contact us by sending an email to: support@forestapp.cc for us to assist you further. Please provide details (for example, screenshots or videos) of the problem if you can. Thank you and sorry for the inconvenience. - Forest\n', 'modified': '2021-01-10T14:24:10Z'}

title: So far VERY beneficial
review: It even knows when I touch my phone. It tells me to put it down. I even tried to check my Snapchat SUPER fast and my tree died in LITERALLY 5 seconds. I’d definitely say that’s holding me accountable for sure!

title: Great of people who can’t put their phone down
review: If your competitive but also can’t seem to keep your phone out of your hand this is probably a good choice for you.

title: Fantastic app, helping me finish my thesis
review: This app forces me to focus because I don’t want to kill my adorable little tree, and I especially don’t want to kill my friends’ trees when we study together. It is forcing me to focus on my thesis!

title: Very helpful!!!
review: Love this app! I have a tendency to scroll social media when I’m supposed to be doing work or chores, and this helps me a lot! I’m trying to train myself to not automatically click on my phone and this is definitely helping that.

title: Great app
review: In a work from home world, the distraction of a phone has never been greater. This app has saved me hundreds of hours in idle scrolling, swiping, double tapping, and liking. Thanks to the dev team for creating something that helps keep me focused and productive!

title: Makes reading way easier
review: While this app won’t stop you from doing things in the real world, it does help you get away from your phone! Reading has been way easier since I’ve gotten this app.

title: I love forest
review: This app is so lovely and helps me focus and the trees are so cute definitely use it if you have a hard time putting your phone down when you work. Also their sounds are really nice and you can listen to block out noise

title: Already helping my busy mind
review: This app is already helping me to focus, to keep me from grabbing my phone or look at my calendar, and just focus on what I’m reading or doing. It can’t help with everything, but it’s amazing what this little nudge will help with.

title: Simple UI & functional
review: Application is easy to use, has great focus time tagging and break which has the capability to change how you focus on the task at hand be it at your workplace or home. Totally recommend it if you wish to improve focus !

title: Awesome for distracted studiers of all ages
review: I’m a 24 year old medical school student who has a hard time staying off my phone when I study. This really helps! It’s fun, effective and for a good cause. My friends and I challenge each other to see how long we can go!

title: Great
review: It’s a positive way to stay focused, and it’s fun to use. The only problem is that there is synching problems across devices that’s a bit discouraging since the data from my computer doesn’t transfer, but the phone app is the only way to buy new trees. Overall really nice though.

title: So far so good
review: Bought this app last week and so far has helped me focus. When I unlock the phone and see the timer counting down is a good reminder that I am about to get distracted and get back to what I had previously set my mind to do.

title: This App Really Works
review: I very much enjoy this app. It helps me focus while studying and also helps me with taking a break from using my phone. Coming from a college student like myself that’s a procrastinator this app really help me and hopefully it will help you too.

title: Dropped my screen time by 30%
review: Since using this app I have dropped my screen time by 30% since the week prior. I know it’s silly but I want to see the trees growing and it keeps me from pick up my phone when I get a notification.

title: Helpful
review: This app is extremely helpful as to helping a college student like me focus. I love to go to my school’s library and focus with friends using the plant together mode. I also love doing whatever I can to help the environment, so this app gives me the best of both worlds

title: Adorable and Important
review: Not only is this an ingenious app, but the fact that it sponsors actual trees to be planted is amazing and has the capacity to change the world one study session at a time. It’s a positive way of staying focused, rather than some of the more unpleasant and naggy methods out there. Really love this app!

title: Great motivation for putting down the phone
review: This app has really been helpful for me in and even after college. It motivates me to put down my phone long enough to do something actually productive. It’s good training for my brain and attention span

title: Good app
review: I don’t understand all the functionalities even though I’ve had the app for years, but I use it to try and force myself to walk away from the phone sometimes, and most of the time it works. Sometimes the pull is so great I don’t mind the dead tree. The art for the dead trees is still kinda nice.

title: Great overall
review: Forest has helped me manage my phone use tremendously. I usually only use it when i’m studying but also when i’m practicing with my team. I would definitely give it a shot, the little trees are too cute to let them die 🥺

title: Helps me stay on task at work.
review: I work from home and the iOS games can be a big distraction especially with all the “open your free chest/crate” notifications every couple of hours. Forest helps me ignore them and stay on task so I don’t fall behind on my projects.

title: First day!
review: Looking so far so good! I’ve had it done short tasks, but more important tasks are yet to be done where I can use this, like cleaning.  My biggest enemy is distractive thinking that goes beyond the phone, although the phone is a major part of distraction.

title: Love Forest!
review: It helps me focus and keeps me from reaching for my phone. It also motivates me to put my phone down more. I personally don’t need the different types of plants (though they are very fun!), and am more motivated by the fact that you can “purchase” a real world tree 🌲🌲🌲

title: Great app
review: I am racking up points because I like to put my phone away and interact in person, so if that’s working towards planting trees this app is 100% worth it I have no complaints. The app is modern and I haven’t noticed any bugs on the latest iPhone. 🌲save the trees, use bamboo!!

title: Thank you, & please add a Fire sound
review: Really enjoy the app and trying to use it to focus more. I notice that crackling fire sounds really help with concentration and would love to be able to listen to fire sounds in the app. Thank you for helping so many people concentrate.

title: Great app for you to make you feel focus
review: This app helps me concentrated on many thing that was going on around me and not being on my phone the whole time. I got me time to get work done, communitace face to face with people more and I highly recommend it

title: For achievers
review: Excellent app that acts as both background noise and incredible support in focusing on your task at hand! It’s well worth the payment for the amount of value it adds to your work. Also useful for a variety of activities that require concentration!

title: Great App!
review: This app is amazing! It helps me stay focused on the task at hand and it is always rewarding seeing my forest grow in size. The only thing I would change is possibly making the trees less expensive, it is fairly difficult to save up to get a new tree and I would like to have some variety in my forest.

title: I love it!!
review: The rainforest music really helps me focus. Seeing my plant die when I exit out the app really makes me feel bad. It helps me be patient and focused. Although, I wish it automatically had the different variety of plants you could plant without having to purchase them. My forest looked a bit boring..

title: Great app!!
review: It really helps me do the work I need to do, especially if I need to write a paper that I’ve procrastinated on for two weeks! It’s also VERY nicely designed and contains SO many options for the type of tree you want to “grow”! Would highly recommend!! ☺️

title: Amazing App!!
review: I used this app all the time to prevent me from constantly looking at my phone during my class and study sessions! Totally recommend this app for students! Worth it! I love to be able to save up points to be and buy a real tree to be planted in their forest.

title: Great app for study motivation
review: This app is a really great app for focusing and motivation! When I set the timer, I feel obligated to spend every last second studying. I also love the little rewards in this app! It’s truly a life saver for those who have the attention span of a goldfish (me)!

title: Very effective
review: What a great app. I’m already a pretty disciplined person but this really helps me sit down for half an hour and do my daily reading without distraction, and makes you realize how often you pick up your phone for no reason.

title: Changed the way I work
review: This is a simple but powerful app. I can’t believe how much more quality, deep work I can get done during the day when I block out 30-60 minute chunks of time. Even better when paired with the Chrome extension!

title: Timer
review:
Please make a toggle switch to hide the motivational text(“You’re almost there!” “Stop phubbing!”)
Please make a toggle switch to hide the countdown timer. I want to occasionally glance at my phone and look at the little icon of my tree growing but I don’t like seeing the timer. 
Thanks!!

title: why doesnt my tree die?
review:
thanks for the great app! this app makes me away from smart phone during class.
But i have a question. why doesnt my tree die when i leave the app? the tree doesnt die unless i hit give up button. Please tell me how to fix this. I never changed any setting to use phone during work.
developerResponse: {'id': 6127918, 'body': 'Hi,\nPlease provide us the details and the screenshots of the problem via our in-app feedback system. We will look into this issue. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-11-27T12:40:38Z'}

title: Simple and effective!
review: I love the minimalist design and simplicity of this app. It’s easy to use and VERY effective. You can change the setting so you get extra ‘rewards’ for going over your allotted time away too, which is cool. I’m really glad I found this thing!

title: Life saver
review: This incredibly simplistic tool has turned my life around. It's an addictive way to break the bad habit of multitasking and free yourself from the guilt of having to answer every text message and email immediately. Things get done, and life becomes less stressful.

title: Super good!
review: I really like this app and the idea behind it. The visuals look super charming and nice, and there’s a lot of variety in the tress and bushes. I just have one question, is there a way to enable it so it doesn’t kill my tree if I leave the app because I do all of my work on my iPad and I don’t want to have to buy his app again on my phone.
developerResponse: {'id': 2671164, 'body': 'Hello, you have the "work with phone" option in the settings which allows you to use other apps while planting a tree. However, your reward will be halved. We hope this helps! Forest', 'modified': '2018-02-25T08:54:25Z'}

title: Best app for changing life.
review: Thank you for this amazing app that’s really helpful for focusing on Sth what are you doing. And I’m the person who’s always get distracted when work on iPad or iPhone. So this keep telling, remaining me for what I’m focus on. Amazing app.

title: Super worth the cost
review: Distraction on line costs me far more than this app did and I love seeing my progress in a tangible way.  After nearly two years of the pandemic I am ready to scream but Forest helps me stay on task!!!

title: Life saver for ADHA
review: Really encouraging giving positive feedback to keep me focus on my study and tasks! This is my first time writing a review and I really recommend Forest to anyone who needs a little push and green plants to achieve things in life:)
developerResponse: {'id': 26620703, 'body': 'Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope you continue to enjoy Forest! :)', 'modified': '2021-12-03T08:48:45Z'}

title: Forest app review
review: Love this app so much!  The trees are so cute and it is so fun to label your current task.  It helps me stay so much more focused.  Planting a tree for a certain amount of time then taking a break and getting back into it.  Pomodoro method at its finest, and in a fun, unique, way.

title: Fantastic app
review:
My only wish is to have a to-do list under every tag.

Sorry I have another one.
It would be awesome if you could join Shortcuts too. Like every time I would open an app it would automatically set a stopwatch in forest!
developerResponse: {'id': 26547699, 'body': "Hi there,\n\nThank you for your suggestions! Unfortunately, we don't currently have such features but we'll forward the ideas to the rest of our team. In the meantime, please check out WaterDo: To Do List & Notes, another app developed by us that offers to do list! Hope you'll find it useful! :)", 'modified': '2021-11-30T01:43:18Z'}

title: The best app for time management!
review:
Honestly, I don’t need an extensive, detailed time management app and this is perfect.
I was looking at the analytics of the time I spend on social media and it’s ridiculous so this has been helping immensely!

title: Awesome way to stay motivated
review: I've been struggling with productivity and motivation while studying for some expert level exams and this app has helped me sore through chapters that I previously couldn't focus long enough to tackle.

title: Productivity Booster!!
review:
I don’t what it is about planting and being awarded more plants that makes more motivated to study for school, but it works!!
I honestly use this app almost everyday to help motivate me for completing work for school, read, study, or even clean the house. It’s amazing and such a cute app:))

title: Very fun way to stay focused
review: This is one of the best apps I’ve found in a long time. It keeps track of how productive you have been, and provides digital representation of your progress in the form of cute cartoon forests.

title: Productivity made fun.
review: I need some pressure to do stuff sometimes. In this app I feel that I can build my cool virtual forest while working, so there is a little pressure to make my forest grow- and keep my procrastination in check. Fun times.

title: A sense of motivation!
review: It helps to deter you from using social media while trying to be productive and provides a small reward that displays how much work you’ve put in day to day.

title: I love this
review: This makes it so much easier to stay off my phone when the impulse comes to do so. Something that has so much power over me, yet leaves me peaceful is a rare thing to come by.

title: Helpful app
review: I really liked the notion of growing something it helped with my motivation especially with the deep focus mode restricting my access to distractions cause I’m a very good procrastinator— I think this really helped me a lot. Thank you.

title: Great app
review: Keeps me on track. Only problem is I go over my slotted time and could probably have extra trees but it doesn’t automatically start over, which is ok. But I enjoy. Worth the $2

title: Definitely seeing a shift in my productivity!
review: Love this app! It’s a really effective way to get me to focus on my studies and school work and not start browsing Facebook on my phone. I love getting to watch my forest grow over time!

title: Love!
review: Love the app so far! It’s always difficult for me to stay focused on school and work now that it’s all from home. Forest has turned productivity into a fun game and I find myself studying just so I can fill up my forest with new trees!

title: It really helps
review: It’s hard for me to concentrate on only one thing and the app helps me do that, I’m addition the “plant a real tree” side of It I think it’s wonderful because I love helping the environment as much as I can and it’s really an incentive for me

title: So helpful!
review: This app helps me get in the zone to study. I love that you have the option to listen to a sound as well. I can’t wait to see how the developers will continue to expand the selections.

title: Gr8 app
review: For someone who loses attention very easily, this app helped me get a lot of school work done. It motivated me even though my learning is up to me when it comes to at home learning nowadays. I love this app so much my forest is cute 🥳

title: This is an awesome app.
review: I always had been thinking that a smart phone was harmful for mental health until I found this app. I found this app very useful for studying and focusing on my work. Thank you very much for developing forest!

title: Great for zoom classes
review: Usually I have trouble staying off my phone during online lectures but with this app, I easily stay off of it. Would recommend if you have trouble with same problem as me.

title: Forest has really helped me focus
review: Forest is an incredible way to gamify productivity. I used to turn to my phone for distraction either for news or games and Forest helps remind me that I have work to do and allows me to put my phone back down.

title: Simple, Modern, Effective
review: This has worked great for me so far. Little rewards for staying off my phone keeps me focused when I need to be. It’s like a little game to play with huge rewards like being more present and focused. Highly recommend.

title: Helping me stay focused one tree at a time!
review: As a PhD student juggling tasks from writing manuscripts to analyzing data, Forest helps me break any and all tasks into manageable 25 minute chunks. I end my day feeling more productive with my thriving forest as evidence of the work I’ve accomplished. Highly recommend!

title: Love this!
review: I have ADHD and this has done WONDERS for me to break my perpetual habit of being on my phone at all hours of the day. It’s just enough of an incentive to pause before picking up my phone. And, since the environment is obviously important, every little bit helps.

title: Worth It
review: I’ve tried other “timing” apps to keep myself productive and off my phone, but this is my favorite app. The concept of keeping the tree alive works and the interface is simple. I recommend this app if you need to keep yourself working.

title: I don't know how but it works
review: Every time I am studying or working and I feel tempted to reach for my phone I always remember that forest will kill my precious tree :( I find it very helpful to stay off my phone at times when I need to be off my phone

title: Worth every penny
review:
I have the tendency of being on my phone a lot while I’m supposed to be studying and/or working. Using this app with deep focus mode helps me break the habit of being on my phone constantly. 

It’s definitely worth the $2 for this app!

title: Little motivations for focusing do matter !
review: Small victories (even planting virtual trees and unlocking new trees) can motivate you to focus more and do it more often ! This app actually helps me a lot and it’s amazing that there are ways you can actually make a difference on here!

title: Love! With one request
review: love this app so much, helps me do my work without getting super overwhelmed. However, it would be sick if there was a way for the app to vibrate when a session is over, as I often keep my phone on silent while doing work

title: My favorite study tool!
review: I often have a lot of trouble focusing due to my phone, but this app helps so much! This app is not going to be your magic solution, however, and personally requires a degree of self-motivation. This app really helps me get in the right mindset!

title: Useful, Buggy
review:
A useful idea and implementation of a pomodoro type timer. I couldn’t use it for long though, there were major crashes in various screens which rendered a lot of features useless to me.

Additionally I would love to see improvements over the native iOS Timer in the way of better integration with Apple Watch and alarm buzzes on the wrist.
developerResponse: {'id': 11677637, 'body': 'Hello,\nSorry for the inconvenience. Could you kindly update to the latest version (v.4.11.2) and see if the bugs are fixed? We will also relay your suggestions to the team. Thank you for the feedback. -Forest', 'modified': '2019-11-06T01:59:23Z'}

title: Helps me a ton.
review: I’m a college student and it is so easy to be sitting in my dorm room doing homework and get distracted by going on my phone and the app lets me set small intervals of 30 mins for myself where I have to work that just gets me in the right mindset to be productive.

title: So cute and motivational.
review: Worth the money paid, it is so cute and it motivates me to get my work done in order to add trees and bushes to my forest. As a student that procrastinates, it’s very helpful to keep me in check; the thought of having a dead tree in my forest bothers me and the concept actually works.

title: Helpful anti procrastination tool
review: Love this app. It’s such an effective tool for when I’m trying to work and not look at my phone every 10 minutes. I love seeing the trees grow the longer I’m working and to see them all in a beautiful forest at the end.

title: So functional and cute!
review: I’ve used Forest for about 6 years now and it has been so helpful for motivation and focus. If I had to make a suggestion, I guess it would be to add more styles of trees and background noise. It would be so nice to have seasonal themes like an autumn walk or winter holidays!

title: Disappointing!
review: I have loved this app but the recent update has almost ruined it for me. I don’t receive notifications when my tree is dying and if I even try to respond to a text notification by pulling down (which used to be find) the tree immediately dies. And the non “deep focus” mode makes 0 sense. Please address these issues. I used to love this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 10787745, 'body': 'Hi,\nCould you please contact us via the in-app feedback system so that we can help you solve the problems? Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience caused.\n- Forest\r', 'modified': '2019-09-20T10:41:17Z'}

title: Helps me study :)
review: This app is great. It encourages you to study and keeps you from being distracted by social media or any other apps you may have. Just turn your phone on do not disturb, play some classical music, and get ready for those finals!

title: Helpful but not Perfect
review: This app has really helped me stay focused and study or complete projects. I just wish it had a way to stop me from hearing my phone go off with alerts and it’s actually giving me a solid distraction from my English paper I’m writing by having me write this review... So it’s overall pretty good.

title: Very Helpful
review: I have trouble with getting distracted by my phone while working. This app has helped me build good habits as I don’t want to kill be tree to do other things. I also really like the idea of reward in the app so you are more motivated to keep your tree alive.

title: Got focused
review: For the last IDK forever I’ve had major anxiety attacks when I go to do anything with writing. This app helped me to Focus myself and being me back from the writer’s block . I gave up long ago writing a review but I have to say this app is special to me. Thanks.

title: Keeping Me Focused Tree by Tree
review: I love this app! As a high school student, I always get distracted by my phone. This app allows me not only to stay focused, but also do some good while I’m at it! My grades have dramatically improved, and I can’t wait to see what other success this app aids me to achieve.

title: Great app!
review: This app helps me a lot. Though sometimes, when a part of my work should be done on phone, like phone calls with looking at some info, my tree will die. Phone can not be used :( so I run the app only when phone is not involved...

title: KEEPS ME FOCUSED
review: I love this app because although killing a hypothetical tree doesn’t seem like a big deal I always feel bad if I’m even close to doing so, so this app really helps me- and easily distracted college student- stay focused for long periods of time without my phone as a distraction!

title: Awesome app
review: After downloading this app, I have been motivated to actually focus on my homework and even little things like going out to dinner and eating lunch at school with my friends. I would definitely recommend getting Forest to anyone and everyone.

title: Love!
review: Great app, it was worth my money. It keeps me off my phone and I love how I can use different trees and bushes, that must be bought by coins which you earn from keeping off your phone. It’s a great little incentive if you need to study and also love their quirky plants lol

title: Best App Ever
review: I have zero complaints. Sometimes, I wish I could use my phone, but this app makes me so much more productive. Once you get used to being away from your phone, it’s so much easier to stay away. I love this app and use it all the time!

title: Amazing app
review: This app is so aesthetically pleasing and so good for me when I’m doing homework. You’re able to be productive and feel accomplished after you grow your tree. This helps so much and I love this app so much. Definitely worth the tiny amount you spend to get it!!!

title: Active tree planter
review: This app it’s awesome! I love trees and this lets me get my stuff done while after so many grown trees get to plant a real one! Becomes kinda like a little goal that allows to much more growth in life by staying away from your iPhone and focusing on getting your stuff done!;)

title: Accountability & Monitor Progress 👌🏼
review:
Great if you want to keep track of how long you spend on certain tasks (plus keeps you focused). This app keeps you accountable and allows you to monitor progress.

Will be trying to reach 10,000 hours for piano!

title: Bought elixir, no elixir, no reply to email, lost $3
review: Hey, I bought elixir and it never showed up. When I click to buy it again is says you have already purchased this product and then says “restoring purchases”, then the app freezes. So I tried to buy the $2 box and the same thing happened. So I lost $3 and you guys never replied to my email. And I haven’t been getting my 3x reward for the past sessions :( come on.
developerResponse: {'id': 7612797, 'body': 'Hi,\nWould you please contact us via our "in-app" feedback system and provide us with your order number or receipt? We could further investigate this issue for you. :) Forest', 'modified': '2019-03-07T03:54:48Z'}

title: Very berry goot
userName: the one and only whatnot user
review: I like this app a lot, it helps so much with productivity! It also has sounds, so if you can’t focus in silence, it will play some rainforest recordings n’ whatnot. I didn’t give this a 5 star just because if you leave the app, your tree dies. That’s exactly the point, but then I can’t track my hours on Duolingo or coding apps.

title: Great tool to be present and disciplined
review:
If you’re looking for an app to keep you from going down a social media or procrastination rabbit hole, this is the one for you.

Very nice to use app with incentive to spend more time being present to unlock more foliage to build in your forest.

title: Writing a Book- helps me stay off my phone!
review: Nothing gets me more distracted then jumping on my phone- and then the next thing I know I have wasted so much time. This has significantly helped me stay on track while writing my book. I love this app!

title: Overall, fun and motivating.
review: I do really like this app and I have fun with it. But they make it really difficult to expand the forest and buy more trees. I think it’s a little crazy how expensive in coins the trees become, and there aren’t enough achievements to get enough coins to buy the trees. So that’s kind of frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 6949868, 'body': 'Hi,\nWe will consider modifying the formula of earning coins in future updates. Currently, you could earn extra rewards by unlocking achievements! Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions or suggestions! :) Forest', 'modified': '2019-01-22T06:22:49Z'}

title: Great for a phone addict
review: You don't realize how much you unconsciously pick up your phone when you should be being productive. I use this for work, cleaning, anything when I need to really focus. I recommend it to my friends all the time.

title: Great app
review: As a dev, hats off to the team behind this app. Really simple to use and an elegant design overall. Though I really wish the other types of trees didn’t cost an arm and a leg, it gets boring seeing the same tree. But even then, they motivate me: more productivity —> more coins. Great job!
developerResponse:
{'id': 4667131, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-08-15T09:28:14Z'}

title: Good app
review: I like this app a lot, but I wish I could grow more elaborate trees with less time. While it’s possible to not check your phone for several hours, it is unrealistic to focus non-stop for longer than 40-45min. I’d like more reinforcement for being able to focus within the realistic time frame.
developerResponse:
{'id': 4897031, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app
feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-01T11:12:48Z'}

title: Awesome for productivity!
review: Loving the app so far. Gives a nice little inventive to keep focused on your work. Pomodoro technique has been my go to for years and the app makes it enjoyable to see your progress through each day, week, month, and even year!

title: Best Productivity Ap In the World
review: I’ve tried many productivity apps but so far this one is the best.  I like that it keeps me off my phone so I can stay focused.  I also like the tracking by tags and the earning of coins to make purchases such as different sounds or trees.

title: Worth the money
review: I never ever write reviews but I love Forest. It's so simple but it's actually been a huge help for me. I don't like being told I can't do things so plug-ins that block sites make me angry .. Forest is a constructive productivity app and it makes me feel good about focusing. Highly recommended!

title: Love it
review:
It’s really hard for me to focus, especially with a smartphone, but this really works well for me. I was surprised how hard it is for me to kill the little trees! And it’s nice to see how many hours you’ve been focusing.

Also love that you can donate your points to plant a real tree!

title: Conditional success
review: If your phone use makes it hard to be present in your life, you will have to recognize it as a problem and commit to making a change.  Then, this app works perfectly.

title: GREAT FULL FOR THIS APP AND COMPANY
review: Forest is the only focus app that actually keeps me off my phone! It also makes me want to keep planting more trees and focus longer so I can see my forest grow, and unlock new types of trees. I use all of their apps, but forest is my favorite. ❤️

title: 10/10 it is a fun app to focus with!!!
review: i have been using this app a lot lately to help me focus and break my bad habit of always going back to my phone and scrolling mindlessly. it has encouraged me to focus what i am working on whatever it is i am doing. i love how it is also helping the environment with the feature that allows u to plant trees!!! overall it is an amazing app and would recommend it to anyone!!! plus everything is free (no membership pr whatever) so that is fun!!!

title: Forest is Inspiring
review: I like that I can not only help focus but I can plant real trees too. Only wish there was the option for “allow” list on app. For instance, most of the trees I kill are because I have to access a work app.

title: Saving me mentally
review: I cannot make myself study unless i plant my stupid little tree for my stupid little forest. Thanks for that I guess, it forces me to actually sit for a while. The custom phrases are sick, I’m kinda stupid so they’re all really mean but it’s funny.

title: Love
review: I really do enjoy and appreciate this app. I’ve been using it on and off for the last 3 years now and every time I use it I’m far more productive. And it’s so cool to see what little garden you can create.

title: Great app but suggestion
review: Forest is a good app and I have been using it for years now. However I wish there was an option for longer time periods like “phone detox” 5hours plus or unlimited time.

title: Simply the bees knees
review: This app is fantastic. My trees keep me accountable. I love my trees! Which makes me love my work! It works great for me because even if I really don’t want to be productive I do love the idea of growing a forest and even though it’s virtual it keeps me motivated :)

title: Good app
review: I enjoy the app and it really helps staying focused. My only problem is that I would like that all the option to have all the trees not change since my schedule doesn’t allow me to sit for 2 hours at a time.

title: I knew you are hiring already!
review: How many times do you have to pop up a window saying you are hiring? And do you really have to pop up windows saying a new news is there, and I have to click Okay to be able to use this app ??? These cannot be manually turned off so good bye. Have switched to Focus Keeper. They don’t forcefully feed me trash like Forest does.
developerResponse: {'id': 22703303, 'body': 'Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us via our in-app feedback system for us to assist you further. Please provide details (for example, screenshots or videos) of the problem if you can.\nTo visit our in-app feedback system, please go to Settings, enter our FAQ, tap on the top-right icon and go to "contact us". Thank you. - Forest', 'modified': '2021-05-09T13:07:21Z'}

title: Fun
review: Very helpful in that I am able to set my phone aside and it is motivation for me to continue doing my work without checking my phone every 5 minutes.

title: Helps me so much!
review: I struggle with easily getting distracted by my phone while I’m at work or trying to study & this app seriously is the only thing that helps me stay focused. Also I love working towards new trees :)

title: Amazing results
review: I have been using this for a week and am so productive! I like that you can label what you are focusing on whether it be work, entertainment, social etc. I can’t wait to unlock all the flowers!

title: Helps me focus
review: This app is great! It really keeps me aware of my phone usage and encourages me to stay focused! When I pick up my phone it says something like “put me down” that helps me elicit the self control to do so! Love this app!

title: Great for studying!
review: Makes me feel so bad to see dead plants in my forest. This app has really helped with my productivity so I’d give it five stars but I’m taking one off because it’s a bit annoying to try to extend sessions/do one session right after the other

title: Helps me stay focused!
review: This app is amazing—it even makes me want to do work so that I can watch my forest grow. I love that you can unlock more types of trees with coins earned by completing study sessions, and that you can visualize your productivity in little plots of land. 10/10!

title: Love this app!
review: Forest helps me stay focused, which is essential especially now, because with the pandemic going on it’s hard not to get distracted when working from home! But forest helps you stay on track and get things done.

title: Forest App
review: Love this app. Helps you focus while also giving you reason to do so! Whether unlocking different features for your forest or striving to plant a real tree, this app will help you put your phone down and be productive while earning points.

title: Oddly helpful
review: At first I thought this was a cheesy rec from my friend but I love using it especially on deep focus mode so you cant use your phone. It’s satisfying to see your trees grow and you feel this ridiculous but effective guilt killing them by breaking the time limit lol.

title: allow the team to continue another plant task
review:
Hi forest developers, 

I am an addicted user and I love this apps very much. I urge you to propose a new function. That is to allow the team members to continue another plant task after the previous task is done. Currently, when the plan task is done, the team is disbanded. It’s very inconvenient to reorganize another team with previous team members if they were not the host’s friends. I strongly recommend you fixing this and allowing the host to commit another plant task with the last team members.

Thanks,
Yushi

title: Auto break time after session
review: I would like if it just did auto break time and a cue sound for break time. It so time consuming after the session is over you have to manually tap the alarm clock for break

title: I’m slightly more productive?
review: Not sure it was worth $3, but I like the lack of ads so I’ll keep it. It keeps me off my phone and there’s white noise options, which I really like. Quarantine homework has been hard to stay focused on, but this helps

title: Genius
review: This app is excellent! It is incredible how these people came up with a productivity app and kind of turn it into a game. I use it every day. It is fun, but it also keeps me focused on my work. On top of that they plant trees, and we could always use more trees on this earth. DOWNLOAD THIS NOW!!!

title: Love the concept
review: Already recommended it to friends so we could track each other’s commitment. You just have to make sure you don’t end up with distractions on your laptop, but it’s a good nudge away from phone!

title: Focused on me and also planting trees!
review: This app is helping me tremendously by keeping me focused throughout graduate school. It’s crazy how much we don’t realize how often we reach for our devices. I love that when you earn enough points they will plant an actual tree:)

title: My productivity has improved drastically
review: I’ve been using this app for at least 3 years now. I can tell you there’s a big difference in my productivity level when I use this app vs when I forget. One of the best in the App Store

title: Great for homework!
review: I got this app not too long ago so u would finally stop looking at my phone while working. Totally worth it and now i spend even more time studying. Would recommend for anyone who struggles with their phone.

title: Amazing app
review: I love forest. It helps me study and not procrastinate or get distracted. I would recommend to anyone it’s worth $2.00 USD and if you get a certain about of coins you can plant one real tree! I love forest for its ambient sound to. As a student Forest helps me to get off my phone and stay focused.

title: Simple and effective
review: My favorite part about this app is when you’re tempted and you open your phone it tells you to get back to work. Or it will give you motivation by telling you to keep going.

title: LOVE THIS APP DEFINITELY HELPS
review: I don’t have good time management skills and this 100% helps. If you use deep focus mode it means when you go off the app you are killing your tree. So it almost makes you feel bad for not focusing WHICH IS WHAT I NEED. 10/10 recommend for a very busy college student like me.

title: The only app that has worked!!!
review: Honestly, this is the only app that has helped me focus. I use it almost daily to help read scientific papers and keep me on track. I was struggling to focus and tried this app  I was skeptical at first, but it really does work!!

title: Really Pleased with this App
review: I’ve tried several of the other work timers. This is the only one that is actually nice to look at. It’s peaceful and motivating at the same time. I love that ability to add custom phrases to help me stay focused. All in all, worth the purchase price.

title: Great Study Tool
review: I have a huge problem staying off my phone while doing homework. This app totally changed that. I get excited about staying off my phone bc I want more coins to buy more trees to make my forest better. It’s a really motivating app.

title: Just a lil’ suggestion
userName: 这是一个诚意满满的好评颗颗
review: Dear developing crew: Among a sea of five stars, I gave you four stars so you would notice my comment. Please please pretty please extend the maximum time above 2 hrs. 120 minutes no longer satiates my eagerness to study and I would really appreciate if there’s a higher limit. Thank you, this is indeed my favorite app of all times.

title: It’s awesome
review: This made me so much more productive. I love the friends feature. One thing I would like for the iPad version is to able to turn the screen in landscape mode. Other than that this app is amazing. Can’t wait for more updates!

title: Actually effective!
review: Love this app. I’ve been a longtime user and downloaded way back when it started out. I love that we can actually help plant real trees once we collect enough coins. Definitely will keep using and recommending to others.

title: Pomodoro while saving the world
review: I love using this app as a pomodoro timer to keep me focused in deep work. It is just an added bonus that I get to help plant trees. I like having a couple friends with a friendly competition also with study rooms and what not. Adds to the "game."

title: Forest App
review: Forest is a wonderful app because it lets you be present without using your phone. You can study for tests, quizzes, etc. without getting off track. This will allow you to be more prepared and not get sidetracked by going on other apps!

title: Great App for ADHD
review: I love this app so much! I have a real problem with screen usage and the desire to keep my trees going and collect coins is a really powerful motivation for me to not just give up on my time! I think this app is really great for people with attention problems

title: Great app!  Helps me stay focused
review: I was using tomato for a long time, then my daughter introduced me to this.  I enjoy the fact that you have to stay in the app to avoid killing your trees.  Helps me stay heads down while I study.  Highly recommend this as a study tool.

title: Is great!
review: The app helps me focus and it’s very motivational because you grow your own tree as you study and focus. I hate when my tree dies so I never get distracted by notifications on my phone. I wish it was free though, because after I bought it, so many other apps just like this one came out for free.

title: I love this app
review: This app is a great way to help keep you focused. The sounds are so nice and ambient, the trees and bushes you can get from the store are so cute. And what’s even better is knowing that you can help plant a tree out in the real world, all you have to do is use the app and accumulate coins.

title: Incredibly useful for students!
review: I love this app because it really forces me to just put my phone down and devote my attention to whatever I’m working on. Whenever I set a time, I can’t NOT see it to completion, because I want to see my little tree grow!

title: Good for studying
review: I love this app when I am really trying to focus and stay off my phone. I wish the sounds didn’t require so many stars because I enjoy the sounds as white noise and have to end up using my music instead.

title: Great but...
review: It would be so much better if there was a timer option on productivity, counting up how long the productive action can last. I love the counting down, but if being rewarded for lasting a specific time was incorporated, it would be so much better!!

title: Love It
review: I use this when I’m with my friends and family, at dinner, watching tv, doing homework, at work, working out, and so many other things! I love that I can make a difference by using coins to plant a real life tree, while also increasing my focus and presence.

title: Lovely app
review:
I really didn’t expect this app to make much of a difference when I first downloaded it, but it’s really turned out to be a great way to keep myself off my phone and focused on whatever I’m working on
The different trees and flowers are charming. It’s very calming

title: Love it 🥰
review: This app has cut down my phone dependency by so much!! I went from using my phone on average 8-9 hours a day and now it’s 3.5 hours a day!! (I got these numbers from the screen time app on my phone). This is so awesome, my productivity has never been this high.
developerResponse:
{'id': 7290887, 'body': "Hello,

We currently have an anti-cheating measure in place:
1. If total planting time in a day reaches 24 hours, trees planted after the 24 hour mark will not be counted towards the leaderboard.
2. Trees planted in the future(this is done by changing the date and time on the user's device) will not count towards the leaderboard
3. Planting on multiple devices at the same time will only be counted as one tree.

We will do our best to eliminate cheating, but may not catch them all. Thank you for understanding.If you have further questions, feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system.", 'modified': '2019-04-11T23:55:13Z'}

title: Wow
review: I LOVE this app, it is 100% worth the money. I am really busy but always distracted by my phone; but with this app, just yesterday, I got done all my work and still was able to get to bed by 9:30. I am so committed and just really want them to plant that tree. 100% recommend.

title: Good iOS app, underwhelming watch app
review:
The app works well on iOS but leaves lots to be desired for the watch app. 

On the watch app, all you can do is look at the forest. You CANNOT plant a tree/start a timer. The complication doesn't show remaining time properly either(as shown in the 3rd watch app screenshot).

Had high expectations because of the reviews but was pretty disappointed so far.

title: Can’t donate?
review: This app is great and I helps with my productivity and phone attachment. However it is very difficult for me to plant an actual tree with the coins I earned from time off my phone. Every time I am directed to safari, I am unable to log into my account and nothing appears to help me fix that problem.
developerResponse: {'id': 7077764, 'body': 'Hi,\nSorry for the inconvenience. Could you please provide us with the details and the screenshots of the problem via our in-app feedback system?\n(We are sorry that the information left on the review is not enough to know the root cause of the issue ,please contact us in-app so that we could clarify all the problems.)  :) Forest', 'modified': '2019-01-30T08:47:40Z'}

title: One of my favorite apps EVER!!!
review: I have been using the app for a little less than a week, and I have definitely been more productive since using it. Feels like I’m playing a game, being productive, and helping the environment at the same time. Thank you guys!!!

title: Why is there a limit to how many trees you can build?
review: I could have sworn i bought more trees but i just went to pay for 2 more and it said i already had 5 and reached my limit? It was a major motivator for me, i would like to request that they at least increase the limit

title: Love it!
review: I like watching my trees grow (not literally - that would really defeat the purpose of an app that helps me focus on something other than my phone) and rarely have something so pressing come up that I need to kill a tree to access my phone.

title: So Much Productivity!
review: It holds you accountable and helps you focus when you are DREADING doing your homework. After a set limit of studying you get to reward yourself with some phone time. Highly recommend if you are looking for some extra motivation.

title: Stay on track
review: I love this simple app. Keeps me on track to grow trees and stay off my phone while working and helps me be more productive by limiting distractions. I would like a few more achievements in future updates but overall great app.

title: Worth the purchase
review: I have using this app for the pass 2-3 months and it’s been great. I stay focused at work, and any other task that require my undivided attention. I just set a time frame to be productive and it allows a time section for breaks. Give it a try!

title: Simple......but AMAZING!
review: This app is is just flat out fantastic. I just recently had Finals and this app kept me on track.......My forest is so lush! It has also help me break the habit of being addicted to my phone, and for that I thank Forest. I can see my self using this app for a very long time. Thanks Forest!

title: Great app!
review:
I use this app because it shows me how much have O worked per week, day, month, and Year! 
Another thing I like about this app, is that for each tree you plant in the app, the team will plant a REAL tree on our planet 🤩

title: Improves my focus!
review: I’ve only had this app for a bit but it’s helped improve my focus 10 fold. I like working in 30 minute increments and this is perfect for that. Love seeing my forest grow too. 10/10

title: Very good!
review: Lately I’ve been busy with some work that I need to get done, and I’ve been getting very side tracked checking messages and such. This app has helped make sure I’m not doing anything else on my phone and getting my work done!

title: Cute app, takes a while to get coins
review: This app is really cute with lots of different types of plants and trees to pick from. The only problem? It takes forever to acquire enough coins to purchase a different option.
developerResponse: {'id': 29461476, 'body': 'Thank you for the feedback! You can get more coins by completing longer sessions, unlocking achievements, inviting friends to join Forest, and tripling your coin rewards with Sunshine Elixir. Hope this helps! :)', 'modified': '2022-04-29T03:22:18Z'}

title: A perfect reminder to not slack off
review: This app has truly changed my productivity, my workload often has me slacking off and checking my phone, this app reminds me to stay on track, thanks forest dev team!

title: How good this application is
review: This app has an item which you can turn it on so it doesn’t let you to be distracted by social media and you have to focus .so my rate to this app is  ten out if ten

title: Super helpful!
review: It encourages you to stay focused when you suffer from chronic procrastination. I never buy apps that’s how you know I was desperate but it was money well spent! I got an A on my first test thanks to this app helping me keep focused 🥲

title: Good app but some features could make it better
review:
I like the app I thing it’s great but pls add a count  option , not only a time option and also make the time more customizable like being able to have 5:27 , 1:37  or 20:56 

Pls and thank you 🤗
developerResponse: {'id': 26520990, 'body': "Hello,\r\nThank you for the suggestion, we'll consider implementing this feature in future updates. Please feel free to contact us again if you have further questions or suggestions. :)", 'modified': '2021-11-29T02:23:59Z'}

title: Love this app!!
review: as someone with ADHD this app helps me a TON with staying focused on homework. I don’t want to kill my little tree before it’s grown so I actually put my phone down when I’m studying, socializing, or just unplugging. Great idea and great execution!

title: Has helped me SO much
review: I have been able to use this app as accountability between me and friends and keep track of how much I am studying and recommend it to everyone!!

title: Great way to stay focused.
review: I often get distracted by my phone when working, but this is a great way for me to stay focused. Love all of the different types of trees that I can plant. Seeing my forest grow motivates me to keep on using the app.

title: Best study tool!
review: As a college student with a social media addiction, this app does WONDERS! The little trees help remind me to put my phone down in class. If I’m struggling with focusing while with other people, I’ll use it. When I struggle to disconnect, I plant a tree.

title: Helps you stay on track while saving the environment!
review: I gotta say, this app has definitely helped me stay off my phone and focus on studying! Highly recommend

title: Overall good
review: i have used this and it has helped me concentrate a lot more the only thing is i wish it had a 5 min timer instead of 20 min being the shortest

title: Great App!!
review: I love this app! I like how I can see how many trees my friends have and how many hours they have been studying. It provides good motivation and a healthy competition. I wish the app included some ambient music while we are using the timer.

title: Great way to focus
review: I downloaded this app based off a peer in my writing group’s opinion. I have issues with focusing and picking up and scrolling social media, which means I waste a lot of time. This helps me stay focused because I want my trees to grow and flourish.

title: Pricey, but nice
review: I really like the idea of growing trees while I study and not killing them. It keeps me off of my phone. But once you grow trees that’s all you can do to interact, I wish there could be more features. Also,  after paying for the app it is weird that there are in app purchases.

title: Absolutely LOVE
review:
Helps me to stay accountable to my focus and gives me a common language for not checking texts, “I’m growing focus trees over the next hour”
Even better if:
Please include an auto-reply option, like we have for driving!

title: Perfect for the easily distracted
review: I find when I don’t want to do something, it’s easy for me to procrastinate and do anything but the task at hand. Forest forces me to look away from my phone. Now if I could only do this for everything else!

title: Tree Collector
review: The design of the app is wonderful. It'd be cool if they could ask on the 10 second mark if we wanna  add another # of min before we hear the final ding. For those who wanna push themselves further through their focus time. Also, for breaks, it'd be funny or encouraging to share any focus puns or tips on the screen.

title: Love it but one issue
review: Physiologically, when I first bought this, I’d check on the timer all the time, obviously going against their principal. HOWEVER, after recently rejoining, I’m glad I can leave the app when an emergency pops up, so thank you developers for listening to everyone 😊

title: Amazing app
review: This app keeps me on check whether am working or simply spending time with my loved ones. It really helps you focus on the things that matter at the moment and let’s you leave distractions behind.

title: Easy to stay on track !
review: Super easy to use. Makes staying on track fun and interesting! Totally Recommend to people who need a push of encouragement and enjoy a challenge to stay off your phone to be productive.

title: Makes you productive!
review:
Great app to main the reward-study method because we all like to plant a virtual garden right? Animal Crossing who?? 
You chose however minutes you want to study to plant that tree! 
You get that tree! 
Make your study fun but learn to finish things quicker!

title: Best App for Quarantine
review: This app has helped me to stay focused and be more present!! My productivity has sky rocketed and I wish I had know about this app sooner! This is an absolute MUST if you’re trying to get things done during quarantine! Idk what I would do without it!

title: Good start
review: This app is great for putting people in a more tech conscious mindset. It really makes you think about how often you use your phone. By rewarding you for leaving your phone, it tricks you into not wanting your phone. All you have to do now is focus on other things!

title: Hard time studying
review: Great for when you have a hard time studying, I use it every time I study and it makes me want to not use my phone as much because I feel like I’m accomplishing something when I use this app.

title: Supremely satisfying
review:
I really enjoy using Forest for work and my personal development. It’s fun to see what you’ve grown and get into a present moment with a little digital reward at the end.

I do wish you’d get more points per session but maybe that’s just me.

title: Finally free from my phone!
review: Like most other millennials, I’m addicted to my phone. I literally sleep with it in my right hand. This app has helped me free myself. As the tree is growing, I take the time to talk to people, look at nature, and enjoy being in the moment. That’s priceless for me.

title: Best productivity app ever
review:
I love using this app when I’m studying. It keeps me away from my phone all because I want to watch my trees grow and not die. In fact, I’m writing this review in-between two sessions. 

Love the design of the app, too. It’s so cute and friendly to use!

title: Fun way to stay focused
review: This turns staying focused into a game. I like being able to label each tree so I can look back and see the tasks I worked on throughout the week. This helps me keep track of billable hours for my projects.

title: Nice, Simple Interface
review: I like the simplicity of the app, and some of the added features like making your own motivational quotes. However, I do wish the forest of all the trees looked less like Minecraft, and more like a beautiful 3-D forest. That's my only complaint. Otherwise, love this app and use it often.

title: P rad
review: Hey the idea behind it is p rad but you have to pay for all the new species of trees and shrubs which is kind of irritating since I already paid 1.99 to get the app. Even then, I only agreed to pay it since the money goes to planting trees (I hope). Helps me focus. I’m tryna publish a book so it’s kinda nice to get rid of the cell phone distraction.

title: Best
review: I’m still I school and this is the best thing to not use your phone.I don’t like to see that I kill my tree so I try not to use it and also the music “rain forest” is really calming and I recommend for anyone who want to learn not using there phone.

title: good for school
review: this app helps me stay focused. it makes me feel bad when I leave the app and kill the cute little tree so I use my phone way less. great for when I need to get lots of homework done but keep getting distracted by social media

title: This app has literally changed my life
review: I saw a friend using it and when I tell you this app has changed my life I mean the metrics it has given me to hold myself accountable to my studies may determine the next three years of my life/career. Thank you Forest.

title: The trees help.
review: This helps me track how long I spend doing something when I remember to start it. I would like for new trees to grow when I continue to work past the time I set. So rather than getting one for the time I set it I would get the number of trees for the amount of chunks of time I worked.

title: Awesome for my adhd
review: This fun interactive app has helped me cut down my phone usage so much. Most other methods make me want to constantly check them or I forget to use them. The cute layout of this app however makes me want to use it and I love it a lot

title: So far so good...
review: Have been using for a few days. Easy to install and use at basic level. No problems so far. May review again after I’ve advanced to a high enough level to earn some of the fancier plants.

title: BEST APP EVER!! #WORTHIT
review: At first I was thinking that this wouldn’t be a good a app put it is totally worth it! I love it so much! There is one thing though, I wish there was an easy access help button. Either than that it is my go to app to use for when I am studying and don’t wanna get distracted!

title: This works for me
review: This works for me because I am wired to earn rewards and not fail. So I plant trees and don’t want to lose at resilience. If you think you won’t care, and the image of killing trees won’t affect you, the. This might not be enough of a deterrent for you. Worth it for me!

title: I like this App
review: I think it works well. It’s fun to being able to pick different trees. I also love that there is the incentive to earn money to plant a real tree. I think it’s great for college students. I would like to try and do alt least one study session daily

title: Forest is a 5
review: I did give this app 5 stars. It has worked for me. I have used this throughout my college career. I used customs sayings that are shown on the screen, “keep reading” “you got this”. It helps if you get distracted easily and are eager to reach for your phone.

title: Great focus app
review:
It’s a great focus app. The only reason for one star less, I thought it might disallow for certain apps, but still let you use your device.
I.e can’t get on Facebook, but can still use device to study. So it won’t go on my iPad...but I haven’t killed a tree yet and my phone gets to rest.

title: That extra little nudge
review:
Forest is a fun way to give yourself that extra little nudge to get down to work and STAY down to work. When I really need to get through a block of deep work I use Forest and it works every time. 

Almost every time. 

It’s a great, fun app.

title: IM PRODUCTIVE NOW
review: This app is so effective in keeping me off my phone and having fun at the same time. I love looking at my progress over the week, day, month through my little tree forest. If you are hesitant getting this app GET IT! Definitely worth the $ for the output you get in work done!

title: The Best App in my phone
review: Definitely worth it. It helps me stay focused and it encourages you when you see your little forest grow. I really love it. I just wish that there were more tree species but I think they are probably already working on it.

title: Super helpful
review: I find this app very useful w staying away from my phone while studying. It also helps me to keep track of how much I've studied for each class. I use different trees for different classes. 10/10 do recommend

title: Great
review: I use this when I don’t need my phone and I get coins to buy background music when I study and I’m saving up my coins to buy new tree/bush designs and to finally plant my own tree! Totally recommend if you have a spare 2 or something dollars 😍🥰

title: Such a great tool!
review: I use this to keep myself focused and on track on so many of the days when I work. It gives me goals outside of just staying off my phone, like being able to grow trees and earn points.

title: Useful academic tool
review: I'm in my eighth semester of a rigorous computer science program. This app helps me focus and nudges me to take periodic breaks. Looking back at the amount of time I spend studying for each class gives me a sense of accomplishment. It also provides data I can use to identify patterns and make appropriate adjustments to my study routine.

title: A Review
review: Amazing app! I recommend it to everyone. It taught us how to not use the phone and keep our eyes’ health. In addition, planting a tree will have tremendous benefits whether it’s for nature, animals, or people. This is what excited me the most. A huge thank you to the founders and all the staff of this app.

title: The most productive gardening I’ve done all year!
review: I use this app every day to get research papers and various bits of homework done, as well as just using it to take a bit of a break from my phone. It’s so helpful and works amazing for using the pomodoro technique of studying.

title: Love this app!
review: It really is a wonderful incentive to grow a tree. To put my phone down for 25 minutes at a time as many times a day as I can. This is been such a refreshing interesting way to be more present and put the phone away!

title: Simple and effective.
review: I love the simple design of this app. It’s easy to use and quite enjoyable as well. I especially enjoy the ambient sounds provided by the app. I use these sounds regularly to help filter out background noise and help me concentrate on my work. Excellent job!

title: ♥️❤️💕👌 this app
review: This app gives me that little extra kick I need to stay focused when working on my college course load. Thank you to whoever developed this app. Please don’t change anything. It’s totally perfect and I love it. This app is great for people who need help staying focus. 👍 👌

There is not one negative thing I have to say about this app. If you’re really questioning whether it’s worth money, just know that it is worth every penny. As someone with the attention span of a goldfish, this is super nice to help make sure I don’t play on Instagram or something.

title: Definitely helpful!
review:
Usually 1 scole for every 5 minutes , but 25 minutes has the most bonus. So plant more trees with 25 minutes! (Below goes "Minutes and Scores Relationship":)

10m, 3 scores; 15,4; 20,5; 25,9; 30,10; 35,11; 40,12; 45,13; 50,14; 55,15; 60,21...

-------
In newly updated version I unlock the mushrooms. Thanks to their help, now I know that mushrooms can be planted with less than 20 minutes.

-------
I treat it as an cellphone game, and I do find it helpful if I want to focus.
If you plant a tree when you get up or before you sleep, the scores go up very quickly.

title: Great app and fast feedback
review: Edit: I gave it three stars before because of a bug but the developers got back to me in a day and fixed the issue. Thanks so much!! This app has been awesome in helping me stay productive and helping me keep track of time :)

title: Really useful dopamine hit app!
review: This app is ideal for people who like to check off the daily to do list boxes and get that dopamine hit from doing so. I also recommend their other app water. Happy accomplishing!

title: Time spent on subjects
review: This helps me with classes. I get to see which areas I am spending more/less time. It’s great for a student! I’ve also added in things like watching tv or playing vball
