developerResponse: {'id': 30632816, 'body': 'Hi, so glad to hear you enjoy focusing with Forest! Thank you very much for your support! :)-Forest', 'modified': '2022-06-30T03:50:55Z'}

title: Really helps
review: I love that this app really helps keep you off your phone while studying or even just trying to stay off your phone. Really convenient!

title: Makes being productive fun
review: I love this app! Forest is a huge help in keeping me focused and making my work pleasant. My only request is that there would be more sounds to purchase in the store.

title: Helps so much staying away from phone.
review: Definitely recommend to everyone who struggles putting away the phone and concentrate on work.

title: A True Motivator!
review: This app motivates me to do my work even in my most procrastinative states. I am pushed to continue focusing even when I don’t care to and allows me to celebrate life at the end of every focusing period!

title: Nice little app
review: Helped me cut my social media use down by an hour, my days are more productive. I’m still a big procrastinator but this app helps me get at least a few productive hours in my day!

title: Wow, this REALLY helps me stay focused!
review: I am blown away by how much more productive and less distracted I am when I’m using forest. It’s also great how the app can sync to my computer for maximum focus. Would definitely recommend!

title: Easy to use
review: I dont have to waste time write down what I do nor spending too much time on this app figuring how it works. Easy to use and tempting enough to make me actually focus. Great concept!

title: Awesome App
review: I always get so much studying done because I don’t want my trees to die so I can get enough money and trees to plant one else where!! I highly suggest this app if you are struggling with studying or getting work done!

title: Awesome!
review: A friend showed me this app a few years ago. My mom and sister about it they since downloaded it too. It helps me stay off my phone and get more work done. I’ve planted 1 real tree so far!

title: Get it if you have exam
review: Best app ever. Apps usually don’t motivate me. This one with the features I’m finally productive. And the best thing beside all of that I get to plant a real tree 🤩 also I’m on my phone all the time. This app keeps me sharp focused

title: Best. Study Tool. Ever.
review: I’m a sucker for the little trees and don’t want them to die. It keeps me off my phone when I’m studying not out of guilt but out of love for the little plants!!! Anyways, it’s one of my favorite apps in my study toolbox.

title: So far so good
review: I’m loving this app so far! By using the feature that withers your tree if you leave the app, it gives me more incentive to stay away from my phone while I’m suppose to be studying!

title: Very helpful!
review: This app actually really helps me a lot because it helps me block out and also pinpoint my distractions. I’m able to zero in on what’s important whether it’s studying or work.

title: Super helpful with focusing on school
review: With school being fully online now, it is much easier to get distracted by my phone. This app helps me stay focused, and getting to grow cute little trees is a bonus

title: It gets the job done
review: I feel tempted all the time to answer to messages or check insta stories. I mostly set 15 minutes of “study” so my trees don’t die, and I actually complete the time!

title: Great app
review: I have been using this app while studying and I love it. It keeps me off my phone for how ever long I need to study for. Me and my friend like to study together and keep each other accountable!

title: The trick of growing a pretend forest actually works
review: It’s a cute gimmick, but it works! It motivates me more than just setting a regular timer. The more I focus with this app, the more my brain retrains itself to focus. I appreciate having found it. 👍🏽

title: Reward system
review: This helps me stay focused on my work but you should include a system that rewards the person with a gift card or something.

title: Landscape
review: For an app called Forest you’d think the developers would understand Landscape mode. At this point, you can’t really call the lack of landscape mode on iPad an oversight or something to be expected but rather a slap in the face to users. How obtuse can you be to not include landscape mode? I’ve seen countless threads online about the lack of this feature and at this point it’s Ridiculous. Don’t waste your money.
developerResponse: {'id': 19833541, 'body': "Hi,\nCurrently we don't have a complete landscape mode interface for iPad users, but you can view your Forest in landscape mode by going to your Forest page and then rotating your device.\nThank you for the suggestion, we'll relay your request to our team. :)", 'modified': '2020-12-17T14:59:26Z'}

title: Great App!
review: I think this app is great if you want to hold yourself accountable. I use it most when I study and need to be away from my phone. I love that you can also support a great cause that helps plant actual trees. Very cool app.

title: Quarantine
review: I really enjoy this app especially during quarantine because sometimes i'm on my phone and i'm not doing Work. This app is helping stay on track with my assignments for senior year!

title: I love it
review: This app is a great way to keep me focused and I had hesitated to pay for it but it was definitely worth it!! I am a student and my phone distracts me so easily but once I plant my tree, I get to work and actually be productive.

title: It helps!
review: Have been trying to solve concentration problem for studying and avoid phone usage when needed. This app helps and provide a great feeling of satisfaction from seeing my new trees grown up after focus for couple hours.

title: Great app
review: I love this app it’s fun way of keeping my self focus on my task and stay productive throughout the day without being distracted by my phone. I thing I would like to be added on this app would be a to do list or such I like keeping track of my habit and it’d be great if I can keep it all in one up.

title: Needs some work
review:
I’ve rated this app 3 stars.  It does the job and looks nice and friendly but... 

1) Please add landscape mode - if it’s available, I haven’t found it.  This is my biggest grip by far.  

2) The unlocking and gamification could definitely use a lot of love.  I know this isn’t the crux of what the app does but penalizing me for canceling a session by charging 60 coins seems too penalizing.  Earning coins takes too long.  The ‘reward’ of seeing the variety of the forest is meh...  

This could really be a killer app if these two things were added... I better get back to work :-)
developerResponse: {'id': 18249474, 'body': 'Hello,\nThank you for your feedback. We will forward your suggestion to our team.', 'modified': '2020-10-03T15:33:18Z'}

title: Really helps me focus in grad school
review: I love this little app! The playfulness of it also helps reduce my stress when I’m working. As a grad student I feel a lot of pressure and breaking up my tasks into little chunks of time with cute trees helps make things feel more manageable.

title: Amazing app use it everyday but keeps crashing
review: First off love the app use it everyday but ever since iOS 14.0.1 the app keeps crashing still keeps time but when I open it it crashes and have to open it again

title: Enjoyed but can be improved.
review: I use this and a works well while I use it. However I think it could be improved with notifications reminding you to use the app. As a millennial addicted to my phone distractions I found it quite useful. (When I remember to use it)

title: Expecting for more functions
review: Why don't you add a function to allow users move their trees to certain places and create their own pattern? It would be really interesting and I think it can motivate people to plant more trees!

title: Nothing works better
review: Forest is the perfect app to help me focus on my work. I am easily distracted, but the prospect of killing a tree (gasp!) is a quick reminder that I should be working, not staring at my phone. The fact that it is free makes it even better! Thanks Forest!

title: Forest App
review: I Love this app it amazing, after you get like 2500 coins they plant a tree in your honor. I have  competitions with my friends to see who can plant the most trees, I also use it during school for the sound it plays while I am studying and as a timer

title: Didn’t think it would work for me
review: But strangely enough, I have uneven using this app pretty much nonstop and it has 100% helped me with my cell phone problem bordering on addiction. I recommend trying it to see if you’re like me.

title: LiskaU
review: This app actually motivates me to put in more hours to focus and focus better when studying. I like the fact that I could get different types of plants after collecting some amount of coin, it feels rewarding when I see my forest.

title: Useful for passing exams
review: I use the forest each time I have to study for an exam. You get oddly attached to the forest and each time I reach for my phone while it's on, I think of the cute tree I'll be killing. It's helped me ace several exams, I can't recommend it enough!

title: Just relaxing
review: I work in an office all day with no windows, so the music helps me relax when things get a little stressful. I can’t have plants either for maintenance and sanitation reasons so this is the next best thing besides a fake plastic plant. And my little forest looks cute!

title: Really changes you
review: Each time I look at my phone I always need to use it. With this app, there’s an incentive to not use the phone which greatly gives me more time to do other things. Great app to change habits!

title: Great app
review: This app helps me keep focused while studying!! I wish we got more coins when we grow a tree because it takes a long time to unlock other options. But other than that this is a great app for productivity

title: Really enjoy. Worth the couple of bucks
review: I’ve always had a hard time staying motivated. I’ll study for a little, take a “quick” break, and it ends up being a couple hours. This helps me keep focused

title: Very Helpful
review: very helpful in enabling one to stay focused while working. I have ADD and often find myself distracted from doing my hw by notifications I am receiving. This app helps me stay focused and enables me to get my work done. Would highly recommend!

title: best app ever!!
review: I’m so glad I got this app. I feel like I’ve been able to become motivated to work hard without distractions! I like the option to work with a group as well: this app is my favorite studying app. It evens works on my chromebook! Student approved :)

title: Would reccomend
review:
It’s a unique way to incetivize people to study efficiently and take a social media detox.

The only suggestion I would add is to for people to see the amount of coins they can earn before choosing a certain time limit.

title: Pretty helpful
review: Not going to lie, this app was more helpful than expected. Whether I need to get off my phone to sleep or study, my investment in this small adorable forest gets the job done. If you have a strange and unhealthy attachment to unreal things, this app is for you

title: Amazing app for students
review: This is really an amazing way to gamify the methods of concentration and also help the user relax at the same time stay focused on work. I got this app a week back and have been using it daily. Love it and highly recommend it.

title: Great app for motivation
review: Forest keeps me on track since I often lose time reading news or twitter on my phone instead of doing homework. This app has been great and I look forward to more ways to earn points

title: DOWNLOAD FOREST
review: I love this app so much. It helps me be productive and stay productive. I usually set it for about 30 minutes but I find that after being off of my phone for 30 minutes, I stay that way. And why now plant a tree and be a good human while I’m at it??

title: Good for staying off my phone
review: Staying on track of my work and away from my phone has always been a challenge. Letting me grow my own forest by helping stay off my phone is a fantastic method for me to stay studying. It’s cute and I love it.

title: So easy to help out :)
review: Whenever you put your phone down (even if just for a shower or while you're watching an episode on Netflix) you can work towards planting real trees in essential regions of the world. Also the choices of trees are super cute.

title: Growth on Growth
review: Awesome app that gets you in the proper mindset. I would love the ability to customize my forest placement and by buying the trees and shrubs I like from the beginning. Perhaps a tree for loyal users who are consistent as well. This helped me achieve my goals in just a few days!

title: Great way to stay away from phone
review: I’ve been using app to study and it’s been helping me from mindlessly scrolling through my phone. You can buy different trees through coins you earn with the time you plant trees.

title: Recommend strongly
review: This all had helped a lot more than I thought it would, not because I really love growing trees but because it gives me an action to start focusing that way it’s not so vague in my own mind. Wonderful app, I recommend it strongly.

title: Great for focusing!
review: This app really helps me concentrate with the bush or tree that you plant based on the time you want to be away from your phone. It has so many cute features and you also get to plant a REAL tree if you get enough coins from the time spent focusing.

title: Amazing
review: Really helps me to stay focused when I’m trying to work without distractions. Prevents me from going on my phone when I need to be doing work. Planting the trees provides me with motivation to set aside time for doing work and set aside time for relaxing

title: It helps
review: I’m an overthinking when it comes to doing homework assignments. Which is pretty bad since I’m in college now. This app helps me to remind myself to take things one step at a time and you also get awarded with cute trees too. It’s a neat idea I’m glad I got this app.

title: About the app
review: The app is honestly amazing. It has its way to make sure that you don’t get out the app and when you manage to not use your phone, you get a little reward that can later on be used to get prizes. It’s an amazing app.

title: Super fun and helpful!
review: This is a great app! It makes being productive feel like a game! I just wish there was an option to whitelist certain apps for the iPhone version, because if I have to respond to an important phone call or text, then I have to kill my trees :( but other than that I love it! 😄

title: Great for those who get distracted easily
review: I started using this app because I kept getting distracted by my phone. After using this app this past semester, my grades have gone up because I'm not on my phone as much. Highly recommended.

title: Awesome app
review: The use of planting/harvesting your time works very well for me. I usually stay away from my phone because I know ill get that reward at the end. They have succeeded at implementing this amazing psychological strategy into their beautifully designed app !

title: Great app!
review: This app has been a massive help with my time management! I use it almost every day at this point. Would definitely recommend for students, or anyone that’s trying to take a break from phone junk.

title: I love Forest!
review: The first app is hands-down the best way to make myself focus. In fact, in our family all we need to say is, "I'm going to go plant a tree" and it means we are going to do some focus work without our phones and do not want to be disturbed.

title: Thank you!!!
review: I’ve been using Forest for about eighteen months, on all devices and my computer. As a freelancer, I really appreciate the reminder/tool to stay focused. I only wish one could plant more than five real trees—THAT would be a huge motivator! Very cute, thoughtful app.

title: Excellent
review: My little sisters and I have all gotten forest focus and absolutely love it. We have a daily competition to see who has the most hours of focus and it keeps us from getting distracted when we should be fully together.

title: Awsome to focus!
review:
Honestly it’s worth downloading this app. It gives a cute way on how to focus. It silences my phone and everytime i reach for it while doing my school work, i get reminded on getting back to work. I don’t want to kill the plant. 

I love it and totally recommend!!

title: Altruistic Procrastination Substitution
review: This app gamifies and pro-socially influences my self-sabotaging behavior. By planting a tree (timewise) we are able to assist farmers across the globe. Furthermore, impact our corner of the world by improving our own behavior through achieving our own goals. By helping ourselves we help others! Love this app! Novel idea.

title: Best Focus Help I’ve Ever Come Across
review: Title says it all. I’ve recently been diagnosed with ADHD and have struggled a lot with procrastination, I was a little skeptical of this app at first but it works really well and helps me greatly. 13/10 have recommended to many (13 is my lucky number)

title: Perfect App for Me.
review: I love this app. Helps me to make the most of my day, excited to see my weekly achievements with a meadow of trees.  It shows the analytics of what I’ve focused on day, week, month. Which gives me insight on what I need to spend more time in or what focuses I’m too heavy in. Perfect app for me.

title: Great tool!
review:
What an excellent app. It helps turn productivity into a game! It both positively reinforces meeting the time goals you set (pretty forest), tracks accumulated progress, and has a negative (dead trees) associated with being off-task. Great if you’re familiar with how useful pomodorri can be, too. 
Thank you!

title: Cute little trees!
review:
As a grown adult with adhd, this app is great for when I’m trying to get housecleaning done. 

However, since I read books on my phone most of the time, I’d like to see something that would let the tree grow only when using a certain app. I don’t know if that’s possible but it’d be nice.

title: Fantastic app for those who want to focus and track hours
review: I love this app so much! It has definitely helped boost my productivity and it’s nice to see my hours of being productive on a weekly/ monthly/ yearly basis. I also love there is a google chrome extension of this app!

title: Works great
review: This really is great. It helps a lot when I’m at work and I just, as a reflex, reach for my phone. And next thing I know I’m on Facebook when I have other things I need to be doing. I also really like that I can use the coins I get to plant a real tree.

title: Super Helpful
review: I've only had the app for a few days, but it's definitely helped me stay on track for the goal of getting things done, but also for trees and coins in the app. Highly recommend to everyone

title: Successful Forest Review
review: Forest has helped me a lot with limiting my phone usage. I’ve been wanting to put my phone down for a while but didn’t know how to start and that’s where Forest came in. This app has helped me remove my eyes from my phone and do more active things like riding my bike or baking cookies. Thank you Forest!

title: Surprisingly helpful
review: The only reason why this doesn’t get 5 stars is because sometimes I need to work or stay focused but I have tools (drum machine, metronome, etc) on my phone which I can’t use. Not the end of the world - and honestly this app really does help with efficiency - as long as you’re honest.
developerResponse: {'id': 3068264, 'body': 'Hello, why not try out our "work with phone" feature? It allows you to exit the app without killing the tree. However, the reward will be halved. You can find this option in the settings.', 'modified': '2018-04-09T02:52:36Z'}

title: This is the best.
review: I’m an environmental engineer so this app employs the tree hugger inside of me. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve gone to turn it off and when it says “are you sure you want to kill your tree?” I just can’t do it. Brilliantly designed. Large fan.

title: Love!
review: I love this app! Been using it for quite a while now. It really helps me stay off my phone. Especially if I wake up in the middle of the night. I plant a 2 hr tree. Then I have a chance of going back to sleep. I do wish they would add more species though.

title: Love this app
review: I've been using this for about sic weeks and it's the most useful app on my phone. I am motivated to work on a project but terrible at time management. Using Forest, time spent on the project has gone way up, and more importantly, I have been consistent. Best $2 I ever spent.

title: I’m obsessed with my forest
review: This app may seem silly but once you start growing a beautiful forest it’s a bit addictive. Imagine that. Putting your phone down and ignoring it can become addictive!

title: Enjoying the app
review:
I really like spending my time off screen Knowing that I am growing trees. 
Something that I would change is giving the user the ability to choose the square where the plants will grow. ;)
developerResponse: {'id': 32570954, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for your feedback. We will forward your suggestion to our team and take it into consideration. :)', 'modified': '2022-10-14T08:27:53Z'}

title: LOVE THIS APP!
review: I realized just how productive I can be when I use this app to study or work. As a college student burn out is REAL! But with this app I don’t feel it as much since I know I can work in timed intervals. 10/10 recommend!!!

title: Wonderful App for those with ADHD
review: This app has been really helpful in providing me skills in self-discipline in which I struggled with before. I really recommend this app for anyone to be honest, but it’s already helped me a lot.

title: I’ve had this for years
review: I’ve had the app for years. Helped me keep on track in college and now in my career as well. Can’t recommend it highly enough.
developerResponse: {'id': 26597837, 'body': 'Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope you continue to enjoy Forest! :)', 'modified': '2021-12-02T08:03:29Z'}

title: Great
review:
This app helps out with concentration a lot,
When I turn on deep focus mode it helps me stay in the app and not distract myself by going on other apps when I’m supposed to be studying. It’s great I recommend

title: Phenomenal
review: This is a great motivator for trying to focus on whatever you’re doing! From Working at home to working out I definitely recommend this app, best investment I’ve made in a long time’

title: Great app
review: Honestly so weird that just having a tiny virtual tree depend on leaving your phone alone is so effective—but it is so effective! Highly recommend to anyone who struggles to stay off the phone

title: Great app for focusing
review: I love to use this app when doing homework and it’s also rewarding when you see all the trees you’ve planted over time, to show how hard you worked.

title: A Glorified Timer
review: You either play the game or donate a tree - you get points for planting trees and not killing them. You can spend those points on stuff to make you’re Forrest look more pretty OR  get a tree donated. There is also a premium currency…if you don’t want to actually use the timer? If setting a timer and putting a dollar in a jar won’t change your life, I don’t think this paid timer will either.
developerResponse: {'id': 22873219, 'body': 'Hi, The main purpose of this app is to help users stay focused on their tasks and the coin mechanism is there to motivate users to stay focused more and unlock the trees that they like. Plant a tree on the app and avoid phubbing during the time period that you have to focus. If you leave the app and use other apps, your tree will wither.', 'modified': '2021-05-18T10:45:14Z'}

title: Good for no distractions
review: I use this on my phone and computer so I don’t have any temptation to be distracted. Works very well. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is struggling to build good study habits.

title: Great app
review: Forest was a greasy download for me because I often have a hard time focusing while studying. First gives me motivation to stay off my phone when I do homework or study.

title: So far (day 1)
review: This app is so cute and it does help me keep off my phone while studying and doing homework. I’ve only had it for one day so I’m not sure how Ill feel about it in the future. So far so good!

title: Love the timer update
review: I’ve been an avid user of Forest for about four years now. I’ve got to say that this new timer update works so much better for my study flow. Thank you so much!

title: Forrest is great!
review: This app is fantastic for study time management. I use it in a study group as well so we can call study together even though we’re not in the same room. It’s fantastic.

title: Great!
review:
I love that I can check how I spend my time in different activities. It helps me keep focused and encourages me to keep working during the time I said I would be working. 

Great app! Totally recommend!

title: Great Focus Therapy
review: This app definitely helps to increase my attention span and productivity. It helps to put the phone down and gives practical focus centered goals to hit! Definitely recommend.

title: One of the best apps for time management
review: Forest game-ifies the often tedious task of focused work... making it, dare I say, FUN! The social feature allows you to connect with friends and keep each other accountable. Perfect for WFH culture. 10/10!

title: Fantastic mindfulness tool
review: This fun and fulfilling app helps me notice my tendency to reach for my phone in moments of boredom or when I crave a distraction from something more important. I’m building better habits. Highly recommend!

title: Great app for focus when working!
review: This app is a fun and creative way to stay focused and on track. It really helps when doing long, tedious tasks as it allows you break the tasks up into manageable chucks.

title: Super helpful
review: I really love this app although I don’t think it will work for everyone. I am personally competitive and empathetic so it’s a challenge to keep the trees alive. If you exit the app the tree dies. Would recommend!

title: Sustained attention with rewards
review: Adorable app that motivates you with visible rewards! I love that it has the option of planting real trees if when you work hard enough/ stay on-task long enough!

title: not u contemplating...download it!!!
review: this app is AMAZING at helping me stay on track with school work. i’m about to go to college so i’m super worried abt my procrastination issues, but this app and all of the cute trees are helping me make sure i do all my work on time! i deff recommend <3

title: LOVE THIS APP
review: I absolutely LOVE this app! It helps me to stay focused on my schoolwork and house chores, and you get a reward out of it! The best part is, when you hit a certain number of coins, you can have a real tree planted in a place in need. It’s definitely worth the purchase!!

title: A good way to build structure in your routine!
review: During the pandemic, it is extremely hard to keep some sort of routine nor have structure. This app helps you with that and I especially love that you can label your various time slots!

title: Great app
review: Fun way to help me stay focused through medical school. Starting this journey over Zoom has been less than ideal and distractions are a plenty. Having the wilt feature in helps immensely to keep me off my phone and focused on Anatomy! Thank you!

title: Productivity
review: This app gives a new meaning to productivity.  It gives your efforts and work more meaning. The concept of your hard work creating life. In the case a tree is very rewarding and I love the different trees you can grow in your works. Well done!!

title: Executive Dysfunction Be-Gone!
review: I have bad ADHD which effects my ability to get chores and stuff done but this app has helped me so much, with the incentive to get tasks done and the mechanics of the tree dying it makes it so much easier to do tasks and focus. Thanks Forest Team!!!

title: Great App
review: I’m terrible at getting work done. I can’t ever put my phone down. Something about my plants dying if I’m not productive makes me feel guilty and motivates me to do my work. This app was a blessing. I never buy apps and I think it was worth it.

title: Helps your mental health and our planet
review: This app is perfect for meditation and has very soothing music. Each tree you plant in your own forest gives you coins so you can plant different kinds of trees in your forest or you can buy a real tree to plant for the future!

title: It’s working
review: This app is actually working for me and wow. I’ve always struggled with focusing and this time I was experiencing it with my job so I was willing to try anything. And this worked, I’m so happy 😭❤️ so rewarding to see actual reflections of my efforts to focus. I love this app!!!

title: So cute!!
review: Covid-19 left me super stressed, & I ended up falling behind in my classes. There is NO WAY I would’ve been able to finish all my homework today without this adorable app!! I love it so much, it encourages me to work so much more than I ever thought it would!!

title: Light in my darkness
review: I’ve been struggling to focus for SO LONG. I often get distracted on my phone during work, class, etc. This has helped me tremendously and I can’t thank it enough! The concept of this app is incredibly smart 🌱  thank you 💚

title: I like this!
review:
Like to use it when I should be reading or doing something that requires me to get off my phone. 

Improvements could be limiting my iPad usage at the same time. Limiting me to one particular app. 

Customizable icons would be cool. 😃

title: I focus better now
review: This isn’t even a game. What should I say, it’s very helpful for people who can’t focus very well. For me I put on put on focus hard mode so if I leave my tree dies but I became more focus when doing that. This is a very useful game/thing....

title: Developers please read!
review: I love the app, it’s very helpful in focusing on my work. For some reason the store keeps crashing and I’m unable to buy new trees which is extremely disappointing and I would love a bug fix on this!

title: Phenomenal
review: The idea of this app is ingenious, and has actually helped me focus.  Instead of feeling like I need to attend to my phone while working, I have been able to frame my work as helping grow my life on my phone as well.

title: So helpful!!!!!!
review: I’m a student and this is so useful for keeping off my phone when I have long or tedious assignments to do, love the addition of different pretty trees to make it more of an incentive to keep it alive. I rely on this 100%, would totally recommend!

title: Helpful
review: This has been helpful for me when studying. The graphics are cute and clean and motivate me to stay off my phone. I also like being able to track how much time I’ve stayed off my phone.

title: the only way stuff gets done
review: my adhd self couldn't stay off my phone if my life depended on it. luckily I love plants and the thought of killing a cute little digital tree makes me set it right back down and keep doing my essay. 10/10

title: Pretty good
review: I think this app is a great idea, but for me, it needs more. I wish the forest were more customizable, and instead of having different forest in relation to time, it would instead be one forest. Maybe there is a good reason for this, but I think I would be more exciting that way.

title: Great app, but could you consider adding a “schedule mode”?
review: I love the forest app, but I often find apps that offer pomodoro timers (eg 25min work 5min rest schedule) to be more effective. Could you consider adding a rest timer that automatically follows a work session?

title: It’s Handy
review: I use it when I’m in classes, at work, and when I am doing things where I don’t need my phone. It is a good tool to have when you procrastinate and really need to focus. 10 out of 10 would recommend

title: Great for productivity
review: I found this while looking for an app that supports the pomodoro technique. This is helpful for splitting up time blocks in to actionable chunks, scheduling breaks, etc. throughout the day. It keeps me from picking up my phone and wasting time when I need to focus.

title: This app is awesome
review: I have been using this app for a while and I use it for when I am studying or having a conversation that way I am not touching my phone! I am truly present and working hard. I love the whole concept. Get it right now!😊

title: Best focus app
review: This app is the only thing that will keep me on track with my work and off of my phone. Deep focus mode is the only thing that will truly help me focus, and I love planting trees! Can’t explain how or why this is so effective but it definitely does the trick!

title: It’s dope
review: I have a hard time studying so while using this app it has help me stay on track and also complete all my work, and it also has an application that you can turn off, so ur tree doesn’t die. It’s an essential for me.

title: Keeps me focused
review: Forest is the best app I’ve found to make myself do the things I don’t want to do. It keeps me off my phone because I don’t want to kill the tree, and the numerous tree species to unlock keeps me motivated. I would most definitely recommend.

title: The only thing that helps with my procrastination
review:
We’ve all been in the situation when you set out to work on a personal project and instead spent all day scrolling.

This app truly helps with focusing and time management!

title: Make you want to build a whole forest without kill any tree.
review: The app is just amazing and cheap. Since I downloaded, my goal was to plant trees and not kill any. It helps me to be focused all the time I'm studying because I know the time I take to study I'm planting my forest.

title: Must Have for College Students
review: I have been using this app for a couple of semesters and it has been a tremendous help in time management and holding myself accountable to a timeline when I am working. 10/10 recommend

title: Focused while helping build our World
review:
Love love love this app, I cant wait till I earn enough leaves to contribute in planting many trees around the world, all while staying focused on my studies. 

Thank you for this app and for what you do across the work for all of us.

title: BEST APP EVER
review: I L O V E  this app so much. It helps me focus for some reason. It’s like it your tree dies then it just stays in your forest and you look at the dead tree and are like why did I kill it. I definitely recommend this app it you can’t focus because your always checking your phone.

title: Incredibly helpful
review: This app has really helped me stay off my phone and laptop (because you can get a chrome extension), especially whenever I have short deadlines. It’s also really helpful for doing the pomodoro technique.

title: Genuinely helps me focus
review: This app really does help and encourage me to stay focused and off my phone. The only annoying thing is if you use the calculator or something from the drop down menu on the iPhone, it says you failed even though you didn’t unlock your phone.

title: The Forest App
review:
In the middle of bar exam prep now, and this app gets the job done. It helps me stay away from my phone and focus all of my attention on the task at hand.

Wish there were an option for emergency contacts, since emergencies do happen, but overall, pretty satisfied with this app.

title: Best app for not touching phone!
review: I have a bad habit of always wanting to be on my phone when I’m trying to be productive, as a HUGE plant enthusiast this app is perfect! I recommend the $1. Worth it and I’m doing much better in my classes and want all the plants with this app!

title: Obsessed!
review: This app is so helpful! Really motivates me to get and stay focused by helping me stay away from my phone! Also, although I don’t usually use the sound feature, it is awesome when I’m trying to read on an airplane! Love this app so much

title: Love it!!
review: I work from home and this app help keeps me on track!! I’m so much more productive and helps me to remember to breaks too. I feel so much better at the end of the day. I even use it after work so I don’t hop on my phone right after work.

title: A cute way to break the phone habit
review:
Recommended by a friend because I wanted to be more productive with my time and not be on my phone so much.
I’m a gamer, and the motivated to build my forest.
Seeing my cherry blossom trees prosper while I’m productive with other things is quite rewarding

title: Such a simple but effective tool
review: This app has helped me hack my brain and get things done by being able to set up times to work and break with positive and negative feedback depending on how I am doing. A pleasant tool to take back control of behavior.

title: This helps me SO much
review: If you’re like me and you’re opposed to hurting things and getting work done this is definitely for you. You have the choice to grow different trees and use different sounds help you focus will you’re working.

title: It’s Magnificent!
review: This is a magnificent app! It really aids you to get your work done, and comes with really relaxing sounds. I also love the fact, that after acquiring a certain amount of seeds, you can actually buy a real life tree to grow it in a forest. It’s just really cool.

title: Requires too much work
review:
Yeah, it keeps you off your phone, but you have to manually plant trees and they only last up to 2 hours. Which means you have to check it every 2 hours. I would rather stay off it the whole day and come back to a beautiful forest.
The one really cool thing is that you can save up “money” to plant real trees across the globe.

title: Effective!
review: this app is actually super great! i used to procrastinate a lot and use my phone when i needed to get stuff done but this app has made me sit down and get it done bc i really don’t wanna kill those cute trees. great app 10/10 would recommend

title: Wonderful for Productivity
review: I love this app so much. My phone is a cancer in my life and Forest helps me separate myself from this device. I also love the feature where you can plant a real tree once you’ve earned enough coins. I’m almost to 2500 to plant my first one!

title: Love this app!
review: Having a hard time just getting it done?!?! This app is for you. Who knew the prospect of killing a fictitious plant could be so motivating? When I m really struggling to do some writing this app helps to keep me focused. Admittedly, the growing plant is enough motivation for me to dig in and get’er done.

title: Cute And Effective!
review: To the plant lover this app really helps keep you off your phone when you need to work. The adorable trees and the potential for them to wither makes keeping on the app and on track in terms of phone app temptations very easy.

title: It’s been a great help
review: Even if I only used this app for a week, I can clearly see how much it helped me to be more focused & high efficiency and stop wasting time on the smart phone. As a college student I really need this and it actually works. Thank for developers!

title: Very good. Worth the 1.99$. Helps me stay off my phone
review: This app is very good. The forest feature is neat and fun as far as staying off the phone and goal setting! Right now it’s 1.99$ and it’s worth it. It feels good that I stay off my phone and see a little tree when I’m done!

title: More achievements please
review: This app is great however, after using it for some time now I’ve unlocked most achievements. Can we possibly get more achievements to unlock soon? I personally think it motivates me a bit more.
developerResponse: {'id': 1720685, 'body': 'Hello,\nWe would put your suggestion into consideration. Thank you for your feedback!', 'modified': '2017-11-10T11:21:21Z'}

title: Super productive and fun on the new iPhone
review: I love the new Home Screen widget on iPhone 14 Pro’s always on display. It’s finally gotten me over the hump to using the app and reaping the benefits of putting my phone down and working.

title: Love it!
review: I was feeling uninspired by the time tracking program I was using and decided I wanted something more game of fire and rewarding. Forrest has been just what I was looking for. It’s a really sweet interface.  Love it!

title: ADHD friendly, autism friendly
review: I have multiple learning and physical disabilities and I use this app to get me through college. Love every moment. Hopefully there are some yucca flowers I can grow or lily of the valley or cool plants I’m excited.

title: This app helps me so much!!
review: Since using this app, I’ve been much more productive with getting things done and completing daily tasks and projects! 10/10 recommend!

title: It’s Great!
review: I’ve been going through a burn out lately, and so I got a bunch of study apps to help me because I was behind on my school work and I get a lot done, definitely recommend!

title: Best Focus of My Life
review: I’m a senior in high school and have been using this app on and off for a few years, and I’ve never not loved this app. It’s smart and actually motivates me to stay on task. I’ve passed tests thanks to this. I love this app.

title: Very motivating
review: Effective and intuitive design! I was able to start using it to focus more within a few minutes of downloading.

title: Wish I could start a timer on my Apple Watch
review: Love this app but I wish I could start a pomodoro timer on my Apple Watch rather than having to go on my phone all the time

title: Great Motivational Study App!
review: Seriously I’ve never enjoyed studying so hard! I suffer from chronic procrastination, but this app helps to keep me focused. Plus I’m really enjoying studying for longer than all my friends😂

title: Affordable, cute and effective system to stay off your phone
review:
Great for people with focusing issues, ADHD and phone addicts. 
Lots of neat plants to choose from in an aesthetically pleasing, cartoon style. 
Nice reward system and collectible features

title: Do you want to be productive?
review: This is great! I paired it with a virtual study group where everyone is using it (with mostly cameras on) and I am SO PRODUCTIVE. I’m actually sitting here and doing my work rather than feeling lonely and getting distracted!

title: Incredibly useful
review: I tend to procrastinate a lot, and this app helps me to manage my time better and get my tasks done better than I could have before

title: Things I love: being less anxious, growing digital trees
review: This app is delightful. I’ve been nervous about doing an application, and setting timers (for productivity and tree growth) has been calming and helped me to focus. Will continue to use!

title: Great
review: I have been changing my time management skills all around, as I’m a college student and needed something to motivate me in keep me up with my studies. It is such a cute and valuing app to have for get things really done!

title: Time management
review: This app is worth it. It helps with time management and makes me more productive with my time. The sounds for the background really set my mind at ease while doing schoolwork.

title: The aesthetic satisfaction
review: The material girl in me really appreciated the aesthetically pleasing visual representation of my efforts! I enjoy watching my virtual plants grow and I also like doing it with my friends. The app is easy to navigate and organized in a logical manner.

title: Love it
review: I had this a while ago and have tried other focus timers, but I keep coming back to this one. The plants are cute and not too hard to earn.

title: It’s good
review: I’m someone who is on my phone wayyy too much. Thankfully this app kind of helps me put my phone down so I don’t get distracted as easily. I do feel like they kinda skimp out on the coins.... I studied for 2 hours and I got 43 coins so that was lame. Other than that, great app.

title: Wonderful
review: I noticed I’ve been spending way too much time on my phone so I re-downloaded it. It hasn’t changed much from about 5 years ago, which I love.

title: Awesome app!
review: I’ve never been a fan of the Pomodoro method but this app has actually motivated me to implement this technique in my life just for the sake of creating a beautiful garden and unlocking new trees and bushes. And don’t get me started on the seasonal special plants.

title: AMAZING!! My suggestions...
review:
I’ve been using forest for the past week and I love it so much! It helps me focus, and I can do a few good deeds by using my study coins to plant a REAL tree! Thanks for making this app!

Suggestions:

-make a chat for the study room, so you can tell your friends what you are studying or if your done

-make more tree changes while it’s growing

-make it so you can save different study rooms, and name them, and have a chat 

That’s all! Thanks for reading! 😁

title: Automatic 5 Stars!
review: This app literally is the best! I have been getting so much work done by this app! I’m in loveee! This app is worth the money! I normally wouldn’t spend money on a focus study app but this definitely was worth the money! Totally recommend!!

title: Room for Improvement
review: I think that each half hour or hour you should receive a tree. When I set my alarm for longer than a half hr I still receive 1 tree, there should be a set time that results in a tree(example- 30 min timer = 1 tree, 60 min timer = 2 trees, etc.) so when you’re off your phone longer more trees are planted.

title: This app is a game changer!
review: I have started using my phone way less. I get more work done. I am more present with friends and family. I get the best satisfaction from seeing the “forests” I grow. I have recommended this to everyone I know!

title: AMAZING
review: this app saved my life. it encourages me to study, read, and do my homework without distractions. and the fact that it is planting trees just makes it 10 times better because i personally care a lot about the environment.

title: Amazing! Cannot recommend it enough.
review:
Thanks to this app, I have stayed focused for long periods of time. Before, I’d always get distracted. But now I don’t even want to reach to my iPhone while studying because I don’t want to kill my forest!
Excellent!!

title: Cute
review: I use this with the sound feature on it helps me stay focused while studying as it sounds like the forest. I can’t put it on deep do I mode which stops the app if you look at your phone but it still helps me stay off my phone when I am taking tests or studying.

title: Nice Simple App to Keep U Off Ur Phone
review: I was frequently distracted by my phone while working at home. Using this app has improved my focus by so much more as well as my productivity.  Will recommend it to my friends and family!👌

title: Helpful!!
review: This a very helpful tool while studying, this truly prevents wasting time on your phone while you are trying to stay focus since you don’t want to kill your trees. It grants you a beautiful tree if you don’t give up.

title: Ironically addicted
review: ... to planting trees. It’s been a few days and I can’t stop planting trees. Gotta make sure you set the duration long, otherwise you keep checking your phone every short 15 minutes, which kinda defeats the purpose. FOCUS!!!

title: I love this app!
review: This app is very helpful when studying or even when you just want to stay off your device but can’t seem to put it down. I love the look of the app as well and it is very easy to use.

title: A good app!
review: I think it’s a wonderful app. It makes it fun to put your phone down when you should be doing more productive things. I think they have great options to work towards spending coins on.  The cat tree is a favorite for me.

title: Get it done while making something pretty
review: This is a slick way of being productive, there’s too much to do and so little time, but planting makes the accomplishment do-able. Try it- then you’ll get what I mean... :)

title: This is a great app!!
review: This is a great app to keep people focused on their work. I used it to help me stay focused on my homework and it WORKED! I didn’t touch my phone at all. I highly recommend this app to anyone who has trouble staying focused on their work!!

title: Super cute but needs the whitelist feature!!
review: the only reason i’m not giving this app a 5/5 is because the whitelist feature isn’t available the iOS system. really hope the developers can figure out how to include it in future updates

title: SO HELPFUL.
review: I work on my phone so it’s easy for me to just pick it up and start working when I should be taking time for myself, or even eating 😂 keeping my tree alive is the only thing that keeps me from reaching for my phone!

title: Love it
review: whenever i study i always get distracted by my phone but this app has helped keep me off my phone while i study. Since i’m not on my phone, i finish my work much faster and i don’t feel so rushed or overwhelmed.

title: No Complaints
review: I’ve had this app for a week at the time of this review and I do like it a lot. I don’t have any complaints. I’m not usually one to write reviews (I should more often though), so that should mean something.

title: Favorite focus app!
review: I've been using this app for years to help train myself sit down and get some focused work done when I'm feeling like I'd rather do anything else... I love planting the trees and the fact that it leads to real trees being planets in our world!

title: Watch my focus garden grow!
review: This app challenges me to stay focus! It’s very gratifying to watch my garden grow & give me something small to reward myself with by staying focused! I love this and would recommend for people who struggle staying off their phones.

title: Makes working easy
review: This app does really work! It’s not so much about growing my forest, even though that is fun, but it’s just a great, tangible timer that makes me focus for short bursts of time. My productivity always increases when I use this!!

title: Best Productivity App Ever!!
review: I am a first year college student and have had to learn how to manage my time in a completely new way. This app is awesome because it allows me to force myself to focus on things I need to get done. Who wants to kill a cute little tree?!

title: Nice to see a forest grow!!!
review: Love it!! Helps keep me focused on studying and I like to look at my forest to see how much time I have put in. I would recommend this to anyone who likes to keep track of their study habits or trying to develop some!

title: Amazing
review: i don't know why but this actually works also i love all the different skins for the trees 10/10 recommend only thing to fix is since we are paying all the skins should be unlocked

title: Nice and easy
review: I think this app is really useful for homework or school or just if you want to stop using your phone. I love the option to buy trees (not with real money of course) and get variations to your forest. For 2020 I want to make the best forest i can.

title: Helps me reward myself after studying!
review: I really like all the options it has for the things you can grow, it sounds a little silly but it makes it a fun little game that keeps motivating you to stay focused 🙂

title: It’s helped but I wish it could lock my phone
review: This app has 1000% helped my focus. My only “negative” is that I wish there was an option to “lock” the phone, no notifications me, no phone calls, no emails, nada. (Is that even possible?) That being said, I love the app and how I “plant” trees.

title: Forest is amazing!
review: I love it because if you accidentally click out of the app it gives you an option to go back immediately and doesn’t penalize you for silly mistakes. I swear this app is what’s getting me through college.

title: Really great for concentration
review: This app is actually really helpful for keeping off my phone when I’m working. In the future it would be really great if there was some way that you could have every tree planted in your forest plant an actual tree, though I don’t know how you’d go about that.

title: Very helpful and cute!
review: This game helps you stay focused and off your phone. There even 2 modes to make your focus deeper and just some chill. You can even add friends and plant trees together. Overall, this app is very helpful and some of the best $2.00 I have ever spent.

title: Cute and useful
review: I enjoy this app, it keeps me off my phone when I’m supposed to be working. I like the background noise it provides and the different type of plants available to choose from

title: Fun, easy
review: This game is easy as it let's you have two modes: serious mode no distractions and allows phone usage mode. Helps build trees if you earn enough coins. Helps me when I'm thinking, I should really be focusing right now.

title: App crashes when I change the tag.
review: I have been using Forest since the beginning of the year and it’s very useful for me to stay focused while I’m studying and not use my phone while I’m sleeping. I use the tags feature a lot to track how I’m using my time. However, with today’s (11/4)  update, I can’t change the tags without the app crashing. Please look into this. Thank you
developerResponse: {'id': 11670717, 'body': 'Hello,\r\nSorry for the inconvenience. This issue has been resolved in the latest version (4.11.2). Please update to the new version and see if the problem is solved. Thank you.\r\n- Forest', 'modified': '2019-11-05T15:43:03Z'}

title: Perfect for studying
review: I honestly didn’t think this app would help me to study, but I was wrong! This app is so amazing at helping me focus and become more engaged in my studies. I turned out to be a very productive person the more I started using it.

title: Good way to stay focused
review: I like that the app gives you that “feel good” after completing a study session w/out interruptions. I honestly think that the app should be free though. I’m not actually getting any real life prizes with the coins I accumulate.... but oh well...

title: Great for curbing my ADD
review: I love this for in class to help keep me off my phone and listening to lecture. I don’t usually buy apps but I’m so glad I got this one. The little incremental rewards and being able to see your progress is super encouraging.

title: Great app for focusing
review: I've used this on and off for a few years but I recently received installed it since I will be very busy my senior year in highschool. It works great, and it is a great motive to get my work done- getting coins to plant trees for focusing? Sounds like a great deal to me.

title: Great app. Worth the money.
review: I purchased this so that I could step away from my phone without getting distracted from class. It really helps. Totally worth purchasing if you are a student who has trouble focusing on the task at hand. 😁👍

title: Wonderfully done
review: I like this app because it is straight forward and easy to understand. It is also very visually pleasing. It’s helped a lot with staying off my phone and I hope to soon end my phone addiction.

title: When I remember to use it, it’s effective!
review: It’s great for helping me stay focused. I only wish the “Work with Phone” option would be on the planting page, because I need to change that often.

title: SO HELPFUL, I’M FINALLY PRODUCTIVE 😅
review: I love this app so much. This helps me rest, read, do homework, and just spend time off my phone in general! I always use this app when I have to do work. I working my way to try and plant a real tree! Thank you for making this a truly amazing app! 😁😁🤗

title: Great app!!
review: I was skeptical about this helping me focus, but the first time a tree died I was so sad. After that I have actually been motivated by the little growing plants and use the app all the time! I definitely recommend this to people who struggle to focus

title: Cute app that works and has neat features
review: I love the music/sounds it has for when you plant a seed. The fact you have to earn coins by actually doing the planting instead of just using real money is great. It does what is advertised.

title: Great but could be better
review: Love this app. But I would love the ability to do a community garden and have each person grow a tree instead of a community tree. This would make it great for work settings where many people would like to use the app but have differing schedules.

title: I don't like writing reviews
review: Wow, thanks you guys and gals and other mortals. This is pretty neat, it's really aesthetic, and I have to work for the sounds and the trees even though I paid already. What a motivator, thank you. You've saved my self taught computer science education.

title: Great
review: Forest is an amazing app. At first I was doubtful that this would actually help me concentrate on my work especially because I have ADHD. But it does actually work and surprising how much. Now I can finish my work max in two hours (before it took me like 5).

title: Hugely helpful app
review: I am just plowing through work with this app. There is no other reason, other than not wanting this little tree to die on me... all of a sudden, two hours have passed and I’ve actually gotten work done

title: Amazing and Helps Me focus.
review: I love this app. Not only does it help you stay off your phone but you’re also helping the earth while doing so. I use it all the time when I’m studying to stay off my phones and it helps me be productive.

title: Great app and helpful to the environment
review: Its a really great up that ensures you that you aren’t using your phone and the knowledge that once you’ve earn a certain amount of money and being able to donate it, is a fantastic feeling.

title: Great App!
review: Honestly this app helps me so much with staying on track with studying for exams! Before I randomly took breaks whenever I felt like it or randomly check my phone but now I have set times and I am restricted from looking at my phone.

title: An app worth downloading
review: I really like this app. The only advise I would give is for this app to allow the usage of particular apps, including text, slack, messager, and probably phone calls under the normal mode, since a lot of people to use their phones for these purposes while focusing.

title: Absolutely great if you want it to
review: It is created for the people who need to have a reason just to get away from their phones everyday and tracking their progress of success just to not miss a day

title: Beautiful app that really keeps me focused
review: Impressed by how well this app works. Keeps me focused and motivated to both spend less time on my phone and watch my trees grow. Definitely worth it if you need an app to keep you off your phone.

title: Crashing
review: I have an iPhone 5s, and this app crashes every. single. time I open it. I have to reopen it 5-10 times EVERYTIME before it goes past the “stay focused, be present” screen. I love this app so this has not stopped me from using it but it is SO frustrating half the time I do end up not using it. This does not happen with any of my other apps so I know it is not because of how old my phone is.
developerResponse: {'id': 7028897, 'body': 'Hi,\nplease provide us the details and the screenshots of the problem via our in-app feedback system or support@forestapp.cc. We could investigate this issue further. (We are sorry that the information left on the review is not enough to know the root cause of the issue ,please contact us via email so that we could clarify all the problems.)  :) Forest', 'modified': '2019-01-27T15:14:03Z'}

title: Pretty good
review:
So far, seems good. The messages  psychologically encourage you to work, and the idea of nurturing a tree helps too. Time tracking is also nice. Mainly just wish you could pause the timer if something unexpected comes up. 

Overall the app is probably one of the better Pomodoro timers.

title: Suggestions
review:
Why don’t you guys make it able to be a widget on the left, like to be able to check how much time we have left in the lock screen. Other than that, I love this app.

Update:
Thanks for responding!

title: Amazing app!! Worth every penny!!!
review: I am a student, who has problems getting distracted easily because of my phone. This app helps me keep focused on my studies while still incorporating break test as well! Definitely buy this app, for your educations sake!

title: Fun To Use
review: I really like using this app. It helps me to stay motivated. One tiny complaint is that I use my phone to reference notes frequently while I’m working and there’s no way to totally disable point deductions for leaving the app.
developerResponse:
{'id': 4723193, 'body': 'Hello,

Due to the limitation of the iOS system, we cannot determine what app the user is currently using. Therefore we cannot implement the whitelist feature for the iOS version. As a workaround, we built a "Work with Phone" feature, which can be enabled in the settings page. This feature enables users to use work related apps during their planting periods, but users will have to be honest with themselves when using this feature. 

The trees planted with this feature enabled will not be counted towards the leaderboard, and users will only receive half the reward if they exit Forest during the planting period. 

Currently, the whitelist feature cannot be implemented for iOS. If you see features similar to whitelist on other apps, please let us know so that we may figure out how it was implemented. 

Thank you for your suggestion. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-08-20T03:03:13Z'}

title: I’ll focus, using Forest
review: This simple and effective interface actually keeps me writing in ways that other programs haven’t. Instead of just preventing me from using my phone, it rewards me for focus (both by gamification of focus and by planting real trees). The rewards system is well balanced for me.

title: Perfect for keeping me off my phone at work
review: This app gives me just enough motivation to keep off my phone. It has significantly increased my productivity and serves as a great visual guide for how much work I actually get done during the week.

title: Works for the right kind of person
review: I enjoy having a cute way to reward my productivity. Makes me happy to have a tree grow when I’m so focused I don’t even remember it’s growing. I needed something like this, just a little reward to keep me motivated.

title: Good app, but some bugs
review: I LOVE this app. I would give it 5 stars but the real tree planting doesn’t work! I have the latest version downloaded onto my iPhone SE and every time I try and plant a real tree, my app crashes and I get an error message :( please help with this??
developerResponse: {'id': 2967390, 'body': 'Hello, please contact us via our built-in feedback system so that we can help solve the problem. Thank you and sorry for the inconvenience. Forest', 'modified': '2018-03-29T06:39:58Z'}

title: Love it!
review: I don’t normally spend money on apps but this was definitely worth it. Often times when I want to use my phone while the tree is growing I feel too guilty to kill it so it definitely helps me stay off my phone.

title: Great for productivity. Better than Pomodoro!
review:
Love this app. Really engages you to focus on what you need to be doing, and I love being able to “track” progress with your forest! Also discourages breaking focus as to not kill your trees.

Great app that totally replaces Pomodoro for me. Love the watch app as well!

title: Amazing
review: I use the app for studying and it really helps. When I open it and have the urge to log out I always remember if I do I won’t be able to save coins to get a tree. Which stops me in my tracks 10/10 recommend

title: Helping me through grad school
review: I have used this app for years. Breaking large tasks into smaller pieces and then tackling them one tree at a time has helped me to complete my master’s thesis, both candidacy exams, and is now instrumental in helping me write my dissertation. In short, I love this app!

title: Really works!
review: I am easily distracted, even without the help of “life”! Working from home is greatly improved with this app. I don’t know why but psychologically it really works. And the trees and forests are lovely and somehow calming!

title: Easy to use
review: I just saw Forest on someone’s blog and I decided to try it for myself I’ve only used it for a few hours but I love the message it brings and the simplicity of the app. Good work.

title: Great way to be productive
review: It’s a fun and creative way to get yourself into the headspace for being productive in all sorts of things. I personally use the Forest app when I’m reading, studying, and even during cooking.

title: Really helps!
review: This app is awesome for whenever I need to get something done! The cute little trees help me stay motivated and the easy switch between break/work times allows me to seamlessly use the Pomodoro method!

title: Amazing!
review: I am truly in love with this app it motivates me so much I love creating things and the fact that I get motivated to grow my forest and get to work hard on my studies, it’s a real two birds and one stone type of deal.
developerResponse: {'id': 26597851, 'body': 'Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope you continue to enjoy Forest! :)', 'modified': '2021-12-02T08:04:18Z'}

title: Deep focus mode is L I F E
review:
I love this app. It’s really fun to use and easy to use and I love deep focus mode (which you can toggle on or off) so you LITERALLY cannot use anything on your phone for however long you have your timer set for. 

It’s awesome.

title: Keeps me off the phone
review: Love this app keeps me away from my phone which is a huge distraction plus love the little tree get to plant on our virtual forest pleaser some 420 additions would be lovely thanks

title: Two thumbs up
review: I love the art and the little messages telling me to put my phone down lol. I also really like that I can choose whether to do a stopwatch or a timer.

title: Rewarding focusing experience
review: I really like way how Forest guides me to stay focused and keep a record on how I use my time. I wish there will be a few more sound effects that can be choose for free.

title: Helps with motivation
review: As a chronic procrastinator I find getting started difficult. Having an additional reward of planing trees has helped me think of ways to work harder

title: The Forest Review
review: This has helped me tremendously with my studies. It keeps me on tasks & I even get excited to study more than the day before. Have not had any issues at all. 10/10

title: Helpful study buddy!
review: I feel more motivated to finish my study session or lecture or homework, and not stop to read text messages or scroll through social media. I like this app a lot!

title: I love this app!
review: It truly helps me stay on task and complete my work! I never thought I would be able to use an app that not only helps me stay focused but helps the environment too!

title: Love it
review: Love this app. I have issues with studying for school and staying on task. However this timer method helps me be productive without burning myself out. I love using this to time myself to read my textbook and review for tests

title: Helpful and beautiful!
review: This app is a great way to help reduce screen time, and also gives you a visual way to mark the time you have spent away from your screens!

title: Great !
review: I love this app, it helps me concentrate when I am trying to study for school. I love that it is helping a cause and helping me at the same time, would definitely recommend buying.

title: A helpful tool to study
review: I really love using this when I study because it limits my time when I would have grabbed my phone to do other things

title: Could be more user friendly, but is helpful overall
review: This app is simple and helpful. However, when planting with friends it is somewhat finicky. I also wish new trees were easier to unlock.

title: LOVE IT
review: i love this app and recommend it to anyone who has trouble staying off their phone while studying! i always feel bad when the plants die so i never leave the app!

title: Helps me focus.
review: If you gonna let yourself be distracted, you might as will be planting cute little trees. This app helps me focus at realistic time intervals, as well as let me still see my progress in the growth of a tree.

title: Helpful motivator
review: This app is helping me cut down on screen time. It’s simple and easy to use, and I actually feel bad “killing” the tree (especially if it’s just to scroll on my phone). A+

title: Love it
review: I never pay for apps but when I saw this I knew I needed this. I would love for it to be maybe more interactive but that’s only a suggestion. If you’re thinking of buying it, DO IT!!

title: Really happy
review: I had heard of this app many times before and was skeptical of it at first. But it has changed my study time a lot, allowing me to focus for longer periods of time to grow a beautiful garden of my own.

title: Lovely app!
review: I like that it gives you the option to still succeed even when leaving the app. I study with flashcards on my phone, so this is a perfect feature for me! Highly recommend

title: Wonderful
review: I love this app. It has helped me get so much work done over the past 4 years that I’ve had it. I love the update as well - a new look and new features. I would recommend this app to any and everyone.

title: Amazing
review: I was not disappointed in using my money on this app because it really is nice! You can work with your friends and family to grow your plants, and the app just looks very appealing overall.

title: Recommend to students!
review: I love the design of this app. I really enjoy the way I can watch my productivity grow cute plants; it’s really nice to get some gratification from studying and homework where the rewards aren’t normally immediately visible.

title: Focus
review: This app has really helped me stay focused on my work. I usually keep it on deep focus mode and I hate quitting because I don’t want to kill the tree. If you’re looking for an app that will help you stay off your phone, this is it.

title: HELPED ME FOCUS
review: probably one of the best apps that helped me focus when i’m studying and taking breaks. i always had a hard time, getting carried away when I am taking breaks. This definitely helped me stay within the time limit

title: 😒 meh.
review: I love the app and how it is constructed but it only allows you to plant 5 trees, after 5 trees you can NOT plant any more trees so basically this app just went from my top list to the bottom because I cannot plant any more trees 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 so disappointing. Please fix that! Because I’m hiding flora and I have planted more than 5 trees and now I love flora even more:) so thanks and bye

title: Title
review:
?
The first version is the only thing you could think to put it out on a couple more minutes of a short documentary about a film festival that will come out in June for more year or more of course

title: A fun way to spice up your productivity
review: This app works like a timer. You set it with the intentions of now using your phone for any other apps or else your plants will wither. It is good for studying and making sure you use your time wisely.

title: Very useful for staying on track! In school and work from home
review: Have been using for years, great for focus and the bonis of tree planting! I did prefer an older version of the app where it was more difficult to leave the app, but I think it was a security thing, oh well.

title: Helps me get through med school reading
review: Have to read a lot for our current block. growing trees while splitting up the reads into 30 or how ever many minutes at a time has been helpful.

title: Loving it!
review: Only on my third day trying this app.. loving it! So far it has helped me to be so much less distracted getting certain tasks in my day done… Obviously I need to work on setting new habits to make it even more successful.. but I feel this app is helping me to gain the momentum I’ve been needing!

title: HUGE FOREST FAN!
review: I guess I was ready for this one! This app has revolutionized my life in just a few days of use! I’ve never felt more focused, productive, positive, or goal oriented with success in my back pocket. Thank you forest! If you’re considering trying it, go for it!

title: I love planting trees!!
review: Creating forests motivates me to stay focused. You can see your productive time throughout the year, and see your habits grow. The trees you can unlock are so cute that I want to be planting trees all the time to unlock more. It’s definitely worth the price.

title: Great app - needs landscape mode for iPad
review: Solid app. Rating it 3 stars because it’s missing landscape mode on the ipad. I typically have the ipad nearby my main computer and constantly having to turn my head sideways is getting old. When using Apple’s ipad keyboard, it doesn’t make sense to take the ipad out each time I want to use this app.

title: Love love love!
review: I STRUGGLE to focus and phones have always been extremely distracting. This app seriously alleviates so much temptation. How could I kill those cute little trees?! If you’re having issues putting your phone down, I highly recommend.

title: Everyone need incentives
review: This app is creative in the way that it’s able to make you WANT to stay off your phone. I go to pick up my phone see me tree and immediately think “oh I can’t kill it I’ll just wait”. I love it.

title: A useful tool
review: This app serves as a good motivator for being productive, every time you sit down to work your forest will grow and give you that nice feeling of gratification that’s generally easier to get from procrastinating than being productive

title: Great App!
review: This app has really helped me stay focused on my school work! I can see a difference in the amount of time it takes me to do my homework. I would set timer on it and be finished before it ends! This app motivates me to do my work!

title: Motivate yourself to do anything timed!
review: I think it’s worth 2$ for sure. I pay a counselor 50$ a week and that hasn’t done anything to help me with productivity. Get this with your friends and have them help keep you in check.

title: Super Helpful
review: I tend to be a procrastinator, so having something the remind me to get back on track is really nice, definitely worth the small amount of money! It’s also nice that while doing this, you’re helping the environment!

title: Forest app is amazing
review: I become so much more productive when utilizing this app while studying. Because I don’t want my trees to die, I never touch my phone while using the app, hence I stay focused and finish everything on my todo list. Thank you!

title: It really works
review: My study habits have never been more productive and the music is really calming and helps you stay focused. I was skeptical at first because of the price. However I really do think it is worth the money. 5 stars

title: I love my trees
review: This app is fun!! I used to just put my phone on do not disturb when studying, but I would always just go back and check for notifications anyways. With this app, I really stay off my phone bc i don’t wanna kill my trees!!!

title: Worth it!
review: Forest has helped me stay off my phone in the simplest and easiest to use way. It has saved me hours of time I could have wasted on social media and such rather than doing work and visiting friends.

title: Super useful during exam season!
review: Recently downloaded this app for exams and I found it really helpful so I don’t constantly check on my social medias! Also joining rooms with people you know but aren’t really close with forces you focus on your studies.

title: Great for studying in college
review: Great app!! I get so much work done. The only thing is I can’t change playlist or anything once I start and my university uses duo mobile so sometimes I have to kill a tree just to log in on my laptop

title: Awesome Productivity App!
review: This literally is the number one reason why I get so much work done in one day! I am actually motivated by growing a lusher forest and the immediate incentives are a huge plus in the app. The wonderful partnership that it has with organizations that plant real trees is so eco friendly.

title: Easy, Simple App
review: I appreciate the simplicity and ease of this app. I’m using it to help keep me focused while I work on my dissertation, and I’m really excited to get to the point where I have enough coins to buy my first tree! Awesome idea - grateful for that real-life addition.

title: Helps me study and be more mindful
review: I can’t just hide my phone away because it causes me extreme anxiety ( what if someone needs to reach me?) so this app has offered me a good solution.. I can have the phone nearby but I can’t touch it. For me, it works.

title: Sustainability Meets Technology
review: I’m a college student studying Sustainability and I’ve found this app so helpful when combined with the Pomodoro technique. The added benefit of being able to plant real trees also means that I’m able to apply what I’m studying and I just love that!

title: Amazing App
review: I’m currently learning German in my free time, and this app has helped me so much in staying on task and working hard. It’s also very rewarding to know that your work will pay off, and you’ll be able to plant a real tree eventually. Great work!

title: You must get this.
review:
I’d love to go into detail, but this app doesn’t need more details.
Buy it, try it. You’ll either love the app or Love that you put money towards something like what this app works to achieve.
Buying this app is just a straight win. 

DOWNLOAD IT ALREADY

title: Best app for finals season!
review: I am the worst about getting distracted on my phone and not getting work done, but with this app, I’m not able to constantly check my phone and get off track. 100% recommend.

title: This app is supportive
review: This app is really helpful for me to focus, not keep checking my phone without special reasons. You know, nobody want to see rotten trees. I strongly recommend people who are struggling to concentrate because of smartphone addiction. It costs, but this app worth it!

title: Great tool for studying!!
review: I’ve been using this app for a long time, and it’s helped me through all my midterms and finals!! I think getting cute trees and building your own little forest is a great incentive to put your phone down and get right to studying.

title: It works, and now I work.
review:
It works. It seems so simple and silly but this app gets me and keeps me focused. I love it and I will get the sleep one for sure.
