I really recommend it for students. I’m a lawyer and I use it when I’m working on my computer all day.

title: Perfect for minimizing distractions at work
review: I love this app. I always used to get distracted at work from checking my phone and this helps eliminate that entirely. It is so gratifying to see the total amount of focused time increase and to watch your forest expand!

title: I love and hate this app at the same time!
review: It helps me stay on track as I write but I think it’s too strict sometimes- especially when you get text messages and just want you to reply quickly

title: Fun way to keep focused
review: A good motivation to keep AWAY from the phone. It definitely helps when I reach for the phone out of habit without even realizing it. I can use all that time and brain power for more productive things :)

title: Just what I needed
review: I love this app for when I’ve hit a mental wall at work!  I’ll set it to 20 minutes to get a helpful push to get focused. I also use it sometimes to ease myself to sleep if I’m especially stressed.  The timer + soothing sounds are great for me!

title: Simple yet effective
review: I love this app; it really has helped me to use my phone for unnecessary things less. I use it as a timer for doing homework, and I keep trees going constantly at work so I'm not tempted to check my phone all the time.

title: Eye candy motivation in 3D!
review:
I’m a visual person.  I HATE “FLAT DESIGN.”  I think it’s a horrible trend that won’t die.  I miss Steve Jobs’s skeuomorphic design.

This app is a time tracker that incorporates skeuomorphic design!  All of the icons and symbols and cartoons are NOT FLAT and ugly and fluorescent and boring, but very much 3D and bold and cute and pop out from the screen!

I actually feel like I’m building something versus gross fluorescent gradient crappy icons that every other focus app uses.  Yuck.

Thank you for being a true artist!   Form and function exist together in this app.

title: Awesome!
review: I love this app. I usually have a hard time focusing while I’m studying due to stuff like twitter and Snapchat on my phone and this helps eliminate that! Also it’s nice to get a tangible reward like a little tree and coins for every amount of time I spend focusing!

title: It Works!
review: It seems like a contradiction to use an app to spend less time on your phone, but it’s 2018 and we’re all addicted to our phones. So here we are. Don’t let your trees die! Stay off your phone. Your happiness will increase.

title: Focus focus focus
review: This app has helped me drive my workflows all the way through. I am consciously trying not to play on my phone when I watch my little tree grow. Inherently I don’t want the tree to die so I focus on my task at hand and let the tree live

title: Great App! So Helpful!
review: This app really helps me get stuff done and not get distracted on my phone. I would highly recommend this app to anyone. It's very rewarding to see how much time I spend focusing on work and makes me want to focus more to grow more trees. I love this app!

title: Peace of mind
review: This app is a wonderful way to break through habitual phone “addiction”. I rarely need to use my phone, and if I’m achieving something by not using it, I’ll be less likely to pick it up unnecessarily. Definitely worth the price of admission!

title: Use it daily!
review: Sometimes I forget about this app and my days are rough, no, seriously! I’m that kind of people who needs somebody or something strong to keep away my laziness! I love the idea of planting trees, even if it’s only digital lol, so it helps me to be productive! THANK YOU FOR CREATING THIS APP!🎄🙏🏼👍🏼

title: Could be better
review:
Forest view should list all forest tiles(days) in one map, so you can see all your accomplishments. (Ok this is a feature - you’ve got to go into the forest view and click the calendar icon)

Also it should keep track of how many breaks you’ve taken and recommend a longer after the fourth (like pomodoro). 

And it would be nice to bind an activity tag to a tree type automatically.

The app and the safari extension sadly don’t count down time together. If they did, I would use the extension.

Bug: in counting exceeded mode, the counter keeps going even after you start the break timer.
developerResponse: {'id': 2681314, 'body': 'Hello, try out our big forest feature, which allows you to see your daily, weekly, monthly and yearly forest! And thank you for the suggestions. We have taken them into consideration. As for the bug, it will be fixed in the next update. Forest', 'modified': '2018-02-27T14:42:45Z'}

title: LOOOVE
review: I absolutely LOVE this app. I’ve had NO problems so far. I use it all the time and it’s so helpful and motivating! The only thing that could make it cooler is if the tree gradually drew instead of just jumping to different things as that time is passed, but it’s still really cool

title: Awesome App!
review: Great app- Forest helps me concentrate when working and eliminated the distraction of my phone, and also keeps you motivated by providing a fun sense of reward and allows to continue building onto your forest. Highly suggest it for anyone who could use help conventrating.

title: Great for encouraging focus
review: I'm a dissertation PhD student and it can be really hard for me to sit down and write. This app has been extremely helpful with providing motivation to push through a work session and stay on task. It's super simple, easy to use, and fun!

title: FOCUS MODE
review: This app has allowed me to keep my focus on my work without interruptions and there are options of sounds to play in the background to get your focus mode on while growing a tree it’s fun!

title: Great App!
review: This app is so nice because it allows me to set down my phone entirely and be productive for as long as I need to. It removes the option to look at texts or anything while studying!

title: Focus
review: Sometimes it helps me focus but when I get off of the app and go back on the tree still grows. This is a good and bad thing because sometimes I use it to my advantage and procrastinate. It’s good though because my plants don’t die.
developerResponse: {'id': 32395026, 'body': 'Hi, sorry about this. Please make sure you have the Deep Focus mode enabled so that your tree will wither when you leave Forest for more than 10 seconds. If you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system where we can provide further support. Thank you! :)', 'modified': '2022-10-05T03:06:19Z'}

title: If you want to study use this app
review: This app is great by maintaining you focus and giving you reward. The only thing I wish to move my plant so I organize it the way that I want it

title: It actually works
review: I feel like this is actually helping me with my dopamine addiction. I’m not constantly picking up my phone and scrolling when I get bored. Saving the planet is nice too

title: My go to app
review: It’s fun and it keeps focused. Especially the ‘deep focus’ because I get sidetracked and leave the app it alerts me right away and I hurry back so my tree doesn’t die. It’s a fun way to stay motivated and focused.

title: Beautiful & Useful Tool!
review: I have ADHD and I have a hard time staying off my phone and getting things done on my days off. This app has helped! It is gorgeous, easy and simple to use, and fun!

title: Best app for studying
review: I use this app all the time!! It’s helped me improve my grades in school so much because it makes studying fun!! I recommend getting this app if you don’t like studying and need to!!

title: I Love This App
review: It’s incredible for helping me focus, which is something that I’ve struggled with for such a long time. I always recommend it to friends, as I’m in university as well. 10/10!

title: What a procrastinator needs.
review: This app is amazing and that you can actually use your earnings to plant real trees. And it’s also cool how you can put it in a mode where your trees die if you touch your phone.

title: A fun way to get yourself to focus more
review: Finally gave in and bought this app. Yes, it’s $2 but let me tell you, it’s money well spent so long as you discipline yourself. This is really helping me get my stuff done:)

title: Family focus
review: Forest gives us something positive to talk about with our teens instead of just telling them to get off their phones.

title: Helpful
review: This app is very helpful to keep me focused while doing homework. It’s definitely worth the price. I only wish that the nicer plants didn’t cost so many coins. It would be nice to be able to grow different trees sometimes.

title: This app has made me so much more productive!
review: Perfect for plant lovers & anyone who needs to become more focused on their work. I loved this app, it’s helped me and all my friends stay productive amongst so many distractions!

title: love
review: it’s simple and i love how it comes with forest sounds so I don’t have to play it on my music app. I love the incentive, if you really want to help save the planet little by little, you can plant trees in real life with enough coins!

title: Forest
review: It’s very good for motivation if you really like satisfying thing,although it could give you more money per tree or lower prices because it takes a lot to get new trees.

title: works wonders!! (surprisingly)
review:
i downloaded this app thinking that it would not stop my constant procrastination, and not help me one bit, but after it being recommended to me so much i gave it a shot.

whenever i’d turn on my timer, id feel genuine guilt when i am about to open my phone. forest has so far never failed to prevent me from getting distracted. and after my timer is done, i’d feel really proud :3

really recommend this app!!

title: Pretty Solid
review: I’ve been able to focus a lot more easily with this app on my school work and just taking time off my phone in general.

title: Cute app that keeps you focused
review: I’ve been using for a couple weeks and I definitely notice a difference in my focus when I use the app. So far I’ve been using it when I read and do Spanish lessons.

title: IOS 14 widget not working as expect
review: I love this app, and I added a widget to keep track my progress. But the widget cannot show the trees and I purchased in store. It can only show those default trees. Hope this can be fixed soon.

title: The customer care team won’t read your message
review: I am having problem with the sync function across devices. I set up tree favorites on my iPad, but wasn’t able to see them on my iPhone app. I contacted Customer service about it. Shirley left me hanging and wouldn’t read my last messages. It’s been 3 weeks and she still haven’t got back to me. Besides that, the contact us function is really hard to find in the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 18547039, 'body': 'Hi, sorry about this, please try manually syncing the app in the settings. We will look into the issue and reply to you as soon as possible.', 'modified': '2020-10-18T13:16:06Z'}

title: Effective but tedious
review: This app is a great way to force yourself to put your phone down while working but I’m not a fan of the coin process to unlock different plants because the plants are overly expensive so it pushes you to using in app purchases which is annoying.

title: Amazing way to study
review: Studied for all my college and graduate exams with this app! A fun way to keep track of how long you need to study, read, or even take a break from your phone! Unlocking all the unique trees is a great motivator to keep going! I love it.

title: Wonderful
review: Keeps me focused on school, hobbies and work. For the first time I feel like I don’t have to stare at my screen mindlessly for hours. It is the perfect reward for doing things I already needed to do without distractions. 100% recommended!

title: This app is basically the best for helping you concentrate
review: I’ve taken to using this app when I read. Not all the time, but usually. It helps me focus for as long as I set the timer to, then when it finishes I know I’m done.

title: Please update the Apple Watch App!
review: I love Forest- Great motivator in my honest opinion. However, the Apple Watch App is useless; as you can't use it to plant trees neither check the progress from the app, not to mention that the widgets are completely out of date. Please give the watch app some attention. Thanks!

title: Day
review: This app is amazing! It’s been helping me a lot recently. I’m frequently on my phone when studying so this app is very helpful when it comes to getting off your phone during your study time.

title: Helpful
review: This app has actually helped me a lot. I struggle with putting my phone down, thanks to this app i can complete my homework without being distracted every 5 seconds. Also the design in beautiful!

title: Eliminates Distractions!
review: great purchase! usually i’ll start my homework and five minutes in i’m already distracted by my phone. this app definitely helps prevent such a distraction and helps me get my homework done within a decent time!

title: Genius!
review:
What an entertaining way to keep busy. 
I use this every day with my boyfriend so we can dedicate about 30 minutes of reading early in the morning. It helps us stay focused. It’s also very handy at work.

title: It works!!!
review: Not using the app for long but it really helps me to concentrate on my current work. I never realized I would turn on the screen so many times while working. The app just saves me from deadline.

title: Forest is great
review: I’ve always struggled with focusing on my homework, especially when there was a device with me. I heard about Forest and when I had tried it I was happy with the results. The app is simple and easy to navigate. Forest is a great app.

title: Fun Concept, Easy to use
review: This app is a fun way to stay productive! Having a cute little tree as an incentive for staying focused totally works for me! It does take a lot of study time to plant a real tree, but having your virtual progress produce tangible world changes is a super awesome idea!!

title: Love this! 😭
review: This app is so cute and simple. But it really motivates me to stay off my phone and do other things with my time then scroll though social media. It’s a good timer, along with the benefits of collecting enough points to plant your own tree!

title: Excellent
review: I like that they changed the part where you couldn’t exit the app to optional, because ei like to change my music and google things while staying focused. Would recommend.

title: TRULY AMAZING!
review: I honestly love this app so much. The trees are adorable, which somehow manages to motivate me more than almost anything else. It’s super fun and easy to use and the break timer is really nice as well. Truly a great a app that I would recommend to anyone that would listen!!

title: Great for Staying Focused
review: It actually helps me stay off my phone! You can still answer texts from your lock screen if needed and it won’t kill your tree. It’s a great app and I use it often to study for classes!

title: Cute Motivation
review: This app is very cute and well designed. I have started groups with friends, and we can study together even if we are apart which is cool. We are separated by 5,867 miles, but we can still study together in Starbucks.

title: Great app, I love it
review: I love this app, it really helps with everything like studying and when I’m reading and it keeps me on track, and I tried thinking of something I could help to improve but I couldn’t’t think of anything

title: Really helpful app
review: I got this app about a week ago and it’s made a big dent in my productivity, and in my kids productivity. I’ll turn it on when it’s time to clean and everyone works hard to earn another tree.

This app is honestly one of my favorites for studying and does help me pass so many tests and classes. I have trouble getting off of my phone and this helps me so much because I don't want to kill the trees and I am helping plant things in real life

title: Keeps me focused at work
review: I’m one of those people that picks up my phone...all the time, too many times a day. This app helps keep my focused at work by reminding me that I shouldn’t be using my phone. Plus no one likes to kill a tree right?

title: I love it
userName: i wrote this for the tree
review: Great app! I recommend it to my friends all the time. I love the study break timer, it helps me manage my time a lot more wisely. If you’re college student and it’s finals week and you can’t get off your phone, this might motivate you.

title: So good for med school
review:
This app really helps me focus and actually makes me want to study by appealing to the collector in me. Also: I can tell my mum now I developed a green thumb!
I like that the price for the trees increases as you go along because it keeps you motivated. 
Pls give us more trees!

title: So cute! So efficient!
review: I actually use this app almost every night when im studying and its just so cute and sleek it makes me want to use it more! Plus the fact that you can plant real trees is amazing! Id recommend it to anyone who need to focus

title: Absolutely in love
review: This app has an amazing community and allows me to discipline myself to study and stay off my phone. The plants are gorgeous and the amount we have to pay makes me want study more and more. Amazing all together

title: Don’t use your phone or you’ll kill your cute lil’ tree
review: A fun pomodoro timer. This is a good way of making myself present in “meat-space.” Timer settings range from 10 minutes to 2 hours. The devs offer new unlockable plants for your forest.

title: Love It!
review: This is a fun way to motivate yourself to stay off your phone. I’m constantly checking my phone even when I have no reason to. This app has me paying more attention to how often I stay off my phone.

title: Actually would rate 3.5 but no option here
review: A bit of a struggle to reach the minimum amounts to unlock the new plants. It would be nice to have them lowered a little bit because now it’s really a monumental effort to get all the coins.  But at least it’s nice to see the plants as I grow them.

title: A good tool
review: Forest is a really good way to help you stay off your phone, however, I wish you could set it so you could use just one or two apps. I usually use forest when I’m studying, and it’s annoying when I can text my friends questions about the material.

title: Great for helping phone addiction
review: Growing trees is a great incentive for not using my phone!  Not just for work but also during movies, chores, before bed, or any other activity where I would reach for my phone when I don’t need to.

title: Great Idea
review: This app is great for helping me get track of my progress with school work over time. Plus, it feels good to have any kind of positive impact, as minimal as it may seem. Ecosia, a search engine, is a similar concept if you are interested helping the environment.

title: Necessary
review: Whenever i use this my productivity drastically increases. It takes a while to get into a good focus, if you pick your phone up every 15 minutes you’ll never achieve it. This will help you get there.

title: Get work done!
review: I use this when doing chores, hanging with friends, doing homework, watching movies, basically when I’m doing anything I don’t want interrupted by me instinctually responding to that text. Amazing app for those who have trouble focussing, like me!

title: So helpful for school and study!
review:
I love this app! I'm in college and use it all the time to track my studying and keep me on track. 

The break feature is really nice. I like how you can unlock different kinds of trees too. Highly recommended!

title: Like it
review: Been using to “commit”. I’ll admit sometimes it makes me anxious but helps me stay on my study plan. Would like some other chill mellow music haven’t seen all the features.

title: Almost perfect
review:
Application is very good, but only option which is missing is to show friend's online status and if they are already in session and for how long untill end of their session.
Keep it up

title: Wow I didn’t know I needed this in my life
review: My friend recently told me to download this app, and it’s been a game changer for me! From study time, to work sessions, I feel I’m more able to focus now. Great job all!

title: Such a great way to track your work
review: I’ve been using this app for a couple months now. It’s amazing. While I’m working I get the satisfaction that I am growing my forest. It’s fun to watch it grow. It makes the effort into my work be that much more rewarding.

title: Aesthetic
review: I’m new to the app and I have to say this thing is super cool! The tree-planting really gives another incentive to study and there are beautiful and interesting trees to unlock. Looking forward to using this app more.

title: Seriously??
review: Will you not provide more sound?? Only five?? Ive been using this app for two years and there was no more sound is available!!! Need more white noises!!! Please!!!

title: Please update app
review:
One suggestion: 

let me view the app in landscape and portrait but rotated to the opposite side of normal portrait, so I can charge my iPad, have it rest in my stomach with the charger cable facing up and work at the same time. 

Thank you! Great app by the way; cool concept!

title: LOVE!
review: This app is such a fun way to keep yourself accountable while studying! I used all through exams this semester after someone referred it to me and I have told everyone I know about it since!

title: Getting my TBR list done!
review: I downloaded this after a tik toker put a video up. My reading tbr is slowly but surely getting done with my need to build up my forest! Can’t wait to unlock more trees and bushes.

title: Great App to help stay focused
review: I really enjoy using the app when I’m studying. The user interface could be a bit better when navigating around the app but overall it really helps and is worth the money.

title: Amazing
review: I honestly love this app. I have such a hard time when studying not relying to notifications or endlessly scrolling on TikTok. This gives me a reason to focus, and it’s supper cool real trees can be planeted. 100% worth the money

title: Thank you for this update!
review: i love forest; it has helped me a ton. just this morning i was thinking oh i wish forest had a stopwatch feature, and bam you did it! thank you! i love you!

title: Review
review: This is a good app to have when you need to really focus on your school work or just need that quit time to get your 30 mins of reading everyday

title: Really Helpful!
review: So far I’m enjoying the app and it really does motivate me to study often. That says something because I’m a huge procrastinator who usually studies last minute.

title: No more individual planting
review: I loved this app because I could use it to stay off my phone. But they have since updated so you can’t plant by yourself. You have to create a room with friends in order to plant. I live by myself, I have no one to use this app with. I’ve been using this app since 2015 and am so bummed out by this; this was my favorite app and it got me though college, now it’s useless to me.
developerResponse: {'id': 21159302, 'body': 'Hello, please turn off the "Plant Together Mode" by tapping the icon on the top of the main page. Then you will be able to plant a tree on your own. Please let us know if you have other questions or suggestions.', 'modified': '2021-02-19T08:29:30Z'}

title: From procrastinator to submitting early
review: The only app I’d spend real money in. I find this app more of an investment than a waste of money. More work done = breaking even for the app + the in-app purchases.

title: Fantastic for productivity
review: I bought this app to establish a consistent writing schedule. I think Forest is great if you’re looking to get serious about productivity and don’t know where to start!

title: Extremely Motivating
review: I’ve only had this app for three days and already feeling more empowered to force myself to be productive and less distracted. Helpful for students, writers, employees, anyone.

title: Really pushes you to focus!
review:
It’s either have ADD or no self lack disciple, however wanting my forest to grow truly pushes me to stay focused and not waste my time aimless scrolling social media apps 

Highly recommend

title: Nice app for focus
review: I am using this app to stay focused for NaNoWriMo and not pick up my phone mindlessly every 5 minutes instead of thinking about what to write. Working very well! Thanks

title: Little extra push
review: When you need some external motivation to stay off of your phone, this is the perfect solution!

title: Cutie
review: I like the concept and idea, but i wished it changed or didn’t develop fully if it did achieve a certain time. Like i read of have i got 10, 30, 60 , or 120 as the same tree. Have it develop the more time spend growing it.

title: When I use it, I stay really focused
review: The app gives me a visual representation of the hard work I’m putting in and helps me work towards something that is more enjoyable than the work itself

title: Obsessed
review: I use this everyday to keep myself busy and on track, I can definitely say my grades have improved along with my ability to focus on studying! Highly recommend 👍🏻

title: Great app!!!
review: I didn’t think that this app would work for me but it actually works really well!!! The guilt of me killing the tree makes me stop from going onto my phone when I’m doing work for school. It helps me out a lot :)

title: Perfect for focusing
review: This app helps me get so much stuff done. It’s also helped me stop using my phone so much even without using the app. Plus the amount of plants you can purchase with your coins is a good incentive as well!

title: Great App
review: After finding forest, the hours spent on my phone dropped significantly and my lifestyle has become much more productive! I love the concept of the app and it really has improved my life for the better! Thank you!

title: I love this app!!!
review: This app changes my life!!! So awesome 👏🏼 The only thing that I don’t like is that I can’t choose which apps I want to be on, because I need to use an app to do homework, but it’s all good because I can do it on my computer. 🙃👌 Get it!!!

title: Easy to use
review: Good app when studying easy to use and very straightforward. The only thing I’d like to see is the timer on your lock screen. I have killed many trees trying to check the time.

title: Only thing that keeps me off my phone
review: I feel like I’m addicted to my phone...when I need to get work done, the motivation to grow a plant helps me stay away from social media. A must-have for everyone!!

title: Stocked.
review: Honestly, I’ve been looking for ways to encourage myself to be more productive and get off my iPad, especially in during this Covid-19. This has really helped. It’s been an encouraging way to be more productive because it’s also a game. Lol.

title: Really helpful
review: “Deep Focus” mode is super helpful in making sure you don’t get distracted by social media or anything else on your phone while you’re trying to work. This has noticeably helped my productivity. Thanks Forest!

title: Amazing for ADHD
review: I have a lot of trouble getting in the zone since I have ADHD but this helps so much! I’ve tried pomodoro and putting my phone in another room but something about the reward of planting a tree makes me extra motivated

title: Simple way to stay motivated
review: My husband and I got this to help us stay focused when we work or study. We create groups so we are accountable for one another’s tree and it works really well!! I don’t regret the purchase

title: I love it
review: I love forest it’s an amazing app and I recommend it to everyone. It helps a lot and you can set goals for yourself. I also think it’s really great for online studying because it’s hard to stay focused and this really helps!

title: Online School
review: This app has really helped me stay focused during online school due to Covid-19. Online school has made me a major procrastinator, however this app helps me stay focused to the task at hand. 10/10 recommend.

title: Suggestion
review: Great app I use it almost everyday!! you guys should consider making the app have themes like different  back grounds and maybe different figures like a little animal you take care of like you do with the tree.

title: Love it!!
review: As someone with ADHD, I find it really hard to keep myself from resisting impulses. This can really hurt during times when I need to be studying. However, with this app, the consequence of killing a tree if I leave the app keeps me studying.

title: A rewarding way to stay in focus!
review: My productivity increases once I get started on using the app. Not only I feel accomplished getting my tasks done, Forest the gives me something to look forward to with the rewards.

title: Very helpful
review: This app is one of the best apps of you want to lock your phone and focus not to mention unlike other apps you get a lot of the things for free. The only thing you have to pay for is the trees.

title: I recommend this app!
review: This app has been very useful helping me getting my homework done fast and efficiently. If you are anything like me and sometimes procrastinate, this app is a must have to get your work finished.

title: Very helpful and keeps me off my phone
review: It’s been good for me. I like seeing my progress over time. Time management is one of my cruxes and overall I think it’s nice to see a timer and have something that reinforces work.

title: Awesome app!
review: I’ve been using it for about a year now and it’s helped me focus tremendously. Only improvement would be selecting the activity before hitting the start button so that it logs my Drawing time and study time more efficiently.

title: Worth the $2
review: I would definitely recommend this. It really helped me focus on my work and made sure that I didn’t go in my phone. Personally, I’ve only had to stop midway once and it made me sad that my trees died.

title: Love it
review: This app is amazing for helping me stay off my phone when I am trying to focus. Instead of picking it up and randomly checking Instagram, I see my growing tree and keep going where I need to be focused instead.

title: Smart, purposeful, and helpful!
review: This app is really smart! It combines both productivity and gaming (in a way) because you can collect coins and unlock new things. The only complaint I have is that it bugs out sometimes (rarely) which can be annoying.

title: Exactly what you’re looking for
review: This app is wonderful as it helps you both by forcing you to study, work, be with friends and by saving the Earth. Helping save the Earth and your grades for one dollar, is a steal. This is a wonderfully ingenious idea!

title: Focus = Awareness
review: Being able to focus and stay focused is awesome. This app makes accountability fun and brings purpose. Being able to give back with my focus time spent as much as the focus time gives to me to be more self-aware is awesome. Great app!

title: Helps me so much
review: I have had so many issues by constantly picking up my phone to “check the time” and then going on social media. This app has helped me become so much more productive, worth the money.

title: Focus
review: I have a lot of problems focusing and staying off my phone to complete my homework. This app has been tremendously helpful in encouraging me to stay focused. Without it I would’ve struggled a lot more to complete my work.

title: Best focus/study app EVER
review: I love Focus!! Literally forces me to remind myself that I don’t need to be checking social media for the 10th time within an hour while I’m trying to be productive. Also, the little trees and the fact that you’re growing a garden is precious.

title: Fun helpful app
review: This app helps me stay off my phone when working on homework or anything really. They also have cute trees you can buy with the tokens you earn, or you could even buy a real tree!

title: Wonderful
review: For someone who always has the urge to pick up their phone insstead of get things done, this app has definitely helped me stay on task. I’ve reccommended it to a few of my friends already. Thank you, Forest!

title: Such a cute idea - and it works!
review: Hard to get distracted when cute little plant is begging me to keep my hands off my phone. Even harder when I know that avoiding my phone can help plant real trees. Simple idea but great app, highly recommend!!

title: It might take a few time to get used to, but really helps productivity
review: I got this my wiener year of college and I wish I had it since the beginning! It works best when pairs the the chrome extension to really prevent distraction.

title: Great for focusing
review:
Provide provides incentive for not going on social media or other time wasting phone apps.  It sometimes is tough when you need to send a text but don’t want your tree to die.  Also,  trees are a bit expensive in relation to how much money you get.   

Good app. Worth the $2.

title: Love the app!
review: This app has allowed me to stay focused and it’s also fun at the same time! Just wish it was more apple watch friendly, so that I won’t even have to reach for my phone and be tempted to loose my progress.

title: focus
review: I really like this app because it gives me a reason to focus on what I have to do. And what I also like is that it has a mode for me to exit the app when I use other apps like Photomath.  I really recommend it :))

title: Great
review: this app is great for keeping me on task and i get so much studying done when i can’t leave the app to try and procrastinate or distract myself. i’m really happy that i purchased this app and i don’t see myself deleting it any time soon.

title: Great App
review:
the app really helps to remind you not to use your phone all the time.
many times i have picked up my phone by habits. seeing the image of trees have alway drag me back to whatever task i was onto or trying to do.

title: It worth every single penny ✨✨
review: The concept is great it keeps me working because I want to have a beautiful garden an also have the ability to plant a real tree, I don’t get distracted and I work longer hours. It’s worth the investment 💕

title: Global Ranks should be based on how many real trees are planted
review: Global ranks have no point bc they are purely based on trees that gamers place and forget about, and none have real trees planted. Making the comp about how many real trees are planted would be awesome, but the company probably is too poor to plant the increase in trees this would bring

title: so helpful!
review: love using this when i study, it’s really such a motivating factor (much harder to procrastinate if you don’t have a phone to waste time on...). Only wish is that it didn’t just go up to 2 hours!!!

title: Super Helpful!
review: I love this app so much! I use it while doing homework, studying, or even just as a timer. I love all of the features this app includes. I can’t think of anything that would improve the app! Totally worth getting!

title: The best focus app!
review: So fun and easy to use. I bought it as a gift for my friend in nursing school after using it to eat my bachelors degree. I would recommend it to anyone for work, school, and even mental health. It’ll cut down your screen time immensely!

title: Ideal for Work and School
review: I’ve been using this for a week now and I’ve seen my attention and time management improve drastically. I would totally recommend this! It starts to become a game which is what’s fun about.

title: Honestly a life hack
review: This app is so great for any distractions from social media I just wish they had this for my computer too (unless they do ... o.o) this has enabled me to be more productive with my studies and honestly I just love collecting the trees and seeing a variation in my forest. Lots of love!!!

title: Mindfulness
review: This app was recommended to me by a health care professional to aid in my mindfulness. It really helps to remind you not to check your phone as much. Has helping me so much in learning to concentrate on what I’m doing and put the phone down!!

title: Really effective
review: This app is really high rated for a reason. I have been able to be more productive ever since I got this app. I like to give my tree people names or names of positive emotions on the notes when you plant a tree so I am motivated to not kill a tree.

title: Has helped me be more productive with work
review: I try to find excuses now to use this app to lessen my screen time and be in the moment for things. I also love all the different trees and bushes and options for custom motivational lines

title: Actually pretty helpful
review: Honestly, there is nothing that can really stop me all the way from getting off my phone, but not looking that adorable baby tree is a pretty good motivator. Plus the ambient sounds are actually really nice and really useful so you don’t have to buy another app.

title: It’s super amazing
review: I love this app so much. It has been instrumental in my studying and the fact that I really want all the trees motivates me to keep using it. Sometimes I forget that I’ve planted and I actually need to use my phone so that’s the sucky part.

title: Very useful!
review: This app has helped me a lot with school and getting things done. Even if it’s not related to school, I use it for something that is productive. It’s a really good motivator and I recommend it to students or people who tend to procrastinate.

title: Favorite focus app
review: I've used a lot of focus apps and pomodoro timers over the years, but nothing is quite as motivating as growing that forest. I'm particularly fond of the snow-covered forest in December, a month when I can always use an extra push to stay on task!

title: Helps time management
review: Definitely delivered what I needed. Simple, clean app, that affords an emotional connection with time management. Very helpful to have to ask yourself “is it really worth it?” when you pick up your phone mindlessly.

title: Productivity that’s fun + addicting
review:
Amazing app that keeps me focused_ the game element makes productivity fun!

 The only feature I would love to have is a daily schedule view of when I grew my trees and the project/category I was working on for time tracking purposes.

title: Great for Students
review: I love this app because it keeps me off me phone when I’m studying! This is really helpful if you always manage to find yourself on your phone when you should be focused on school work.

title: Forest is a huge help!
review: Forest helps keep me motivated to study and by keeping me off my phone helps me study effectively. The drive to unlock more trees and bushes and to have beautiful forests each day is enough to get me started on my work and to keep me in the groove of it!

title: My favorite app!
review: Forest is my favorite app! It’s helped me get through grad school. I’m in my thesis semester now and have used the app to keep myself on track and focused on program requirements. I highly recommend this app to anyone struggling to stay focused and productive!

title: Keeps me motivated and focused with deadlines
review: This app has helped me meet major deadlines by incentivizing focus and distance from my phone while i work. I also like the collaborative feature to set goals of accountability with coworkers and friends.

title: Great study companion!
review: This is an awesome tool to use when you’re studying! Just don’t forget to press the five minute timer when you’re done! In case of an emergency, phone calls can be answered without killing your tree friend (:

title: Worth purchasing!
review: This app motivates you to focus and avoid picking up the phone while planting your tree. It has nice graphics and it is very rewarding to see your forest progress! Working on getting enough coins to unlock different types of trees.

title: Working for me!
review: I get chronically behind in my paperwork at work, forest has been helping me set realistic time limits to try and finish one paper at a time. I also am really motivated by the chance that I might get enough points to plant a real tree!

title: Very useful
review: I noticed I definitely have a problem focusing and that my phone is super distracting. Planting a tree for 25-30 minutes a time really helps me stay focused on my task. Seeing the end goal of my little forest is super pleasing. I really like this app.

title: Great app, could add more though...
review: Great app to not distract yourself, but I was thinking if ya could add redeemable coins. You get money that you you could spend/ send every certain amount of coins/points earned. This is just a thought and I wouldn’t blame ya if ya didn’t do this.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5658613, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app
feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-10-25T09:22:06Z'}

title: Great study tool
review:
I have a lot of studying to do for school, and Forest helps me study in blocks of time so I do not burn out. I love that I can now accomplish my study goals without distractions getting in the way!
This is a prepopulated review. However, it is not inaccurate.

title: Well done!
review: This is one of my favorite apps! My grades thank you. My only wish is that there were more controls in which apps I wanted to blacklist while using instead of the entire phone.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5050658, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-14T12:54:04Z'}

title: BEST APP EVER!!!!
review: I have never written a review until now! This app is a lifesaver for me! I normally keep getting distracted by my phone, family, and video games. But this app motivates me to stay focused on anything! It’s even got me to be self-aware when I’m on my phone too much!

title: Must use app
review: My productivity at work has gone up SO MUCH.  I can’t explain the psychology behind wanting to grow little trees and work towards planting a real tree, but it has driven me so much. Give this app a try if you’re struggling to stay productive and focused.

title: Helping keep me focused and off my phone
review: I love how this app makes me feel good about being off my phone rather than shaming me for the time spent on it. I’ve been using it as much as possible to work toward planting my first real tree!

title: I love it! Gamified pomodoro timer
review: The only thing I struggle with is receiving the notification that my tree has finished growing. If I put my phone on do-not-disturb (for focus) then the Forest notification is also silent and easy to miss. I wonder how to work around this.
developerResponse: {'id': 3154313, 'body': 'Hello, when do-not-disturb is on, all notifications will be turned off. It is thus not possible to receive Forest notifications. -Forest', 'modified': '2018-04-17T04:04:41Z'}

title: So what if it’s a dollar?
review:
People might be skeptical since you have to pay for the app but it really helps out in the long run! 
I’ve been using this app for a while, and it seriously helps me focus as a highschool student

title: Less is More
review: I usually get caught up in apps blasting my head with features. The minimalism is helping me the most. Keeping me off my phone has also helped a lot more than I thought with keeping my flow state and focus.

title: lovely
review: i don’t think i’ve ever been so frustrated about a tree dying. the first time i got this app, i was growing my tree and when i got out of the app, not even 5 seconds later my tree died. i was so sad and mad at myself i almost cried. but trust me, IT ACTUALLY WORKS!!

title: Love it!
review: This app has really improved my relationship with my phone. I use it when I go to sleep, when I'm getting up, and when I want to be more present with my friends and family. Simple, fun, and rewarding to use.

title: So Useful!
review: This is a wonderful little app that keeps me off my other wonderful but time consuming apps when I should be studying. My only suggestion is that there be a much bigger forest from all of your days combined.

title: Overtime Coin Rate
review: Help! Did something change? The coin count used to go higher as I accrued more time past what I set initially, but now it doesn't do so anymore. Is this a bug? Or updated software? Please put it back the way it was!! Love the app!!!

title: Amazing
review: This app is so fun and easy to use, and it’s so effective at keeping me off of my phone. This is totally worth the price, I especially love the lack of ads that keep the app so clean and nice looking. I can’t wait to earn enough leaves to plant a real tree!

title: Satisfying and cute way to stay on track
review: This app game-ifies getting work done by letting you earn points a grow different kinds of trees and plant a beautiful forest. Really satisfying! And you are discouraged from using your phone while it is running.

title: I actually use it!
review:
Out of the many Apps for productivity out there I actually use this one regularly. 

As mentioned in many studies and books out there, my phone is the #1 contributor to distraction.

Forest has been my solution as the feeling of focusing on improvement and literally growing a digital tree puts my restless mind at ease.

The app blocks out my need for outside stimulation and has given greater focus and enjoyment in my studies and work.

title: Amazing!
review: This app is really cool and very motivational! When I use it I feel motivated to study and upgrade my forest! I definitely recommend you should buy it. Totally worth it and safe!

title: Great way to focus
review: Gives you the added push to help put your phone down and do something else

title: Perfect for time management
review: I use this when I study or have a timed activity. It helps me know how long I’ve studied, keeps me focused, and reminds me when it finishes that it’s time for a break.

title: This is worth your money!
review: Update: can you please fix the ipad version. The app just stays vertically, doesnt flip when I put my magic keyboard horizontally (very annoying). Thanks!

title: Such a cute app
review: I love studying with this, I can play music from other apps and then open this one and it will still play so I can study and listen and grow plants!

title: Best Study App
review: I really enjoy this app, when I study and use a timer; I can use this app to collect coins and hopefully plant a tree in the real world. Best investment in a phone application. I highly recommend:)

title: I like it
review: This is my first time trying it, and it really works I focused more, and I really care about my Forest, and that really good so I recommend it if that will help you because it’s helped me.

title: Seems like a $ draining app maybe...?
review: Idea is really cool, trees are pretty awesome, but I’m just so tired of $5 here and paying for everything in these “free” apps. You have to pay for trees, there is one free one. I’m going to keep trying the app and see how it goes but at first glance... I see a lot of dollar sign requests in the app. 😕
developerResponse: {'id': 21901681, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for the feedback. You don\'t actually have to pay money for the trees, you can earn the coins by focusing more. The main purpose of this app is to help users stay focused on their tasks and the coin mechanism is there to motivate users to stay focused more and unlock the trees that they like. If you would like to make the trees grow faster, there are also options such as "Sunshine Elixir" for you to purchase. You can completely decide whether you want to purchase or not on your own. Please let us know if you have any other questions. :)\n', 'modified': '2021-03-27T22:00:53Z'}

title: Fun and engaging
review: I just started to use this app in hopes it will help me write papers (which I struggle to do) for my Doctorate coursework. So far, I am enjoying each time I grow a tree! This may be an answer to my procrastination.

title: surprised me
review: to be honest a lot of productivity apps don’t work for me and my add but i got this after my girlfriend suggested it, even when i was skeptical, and i was surprised at how it actually helped. of course you can’t go into thinking it’s going to be a crutch but it’s certainly a good source of positive/negative reinforcement that will help keep you in the zone. the google crome extension is great too i’d suggest using that and trying it out before getting the app.

title: Great way to stay focused
review: It’s like turning your phone into an hourglass. See seedlings grow into full trees, just as your own work will blossom into results if only you give it the time of day.

title: Wow I actually get work done
review: I’m someone who’s really lazy and gets distracted pretty easily. Putting the app on deep-focus mode, I feel highly responsible for the possibility of killing my tree/bush so I really think this helps. The only gripe I have is how EXPENSIVE the plants are but that’s fair.

title: Fun app could do more
review: I wish there was no options to purchase coins or anything opportunities to use outside money. But it’s a nifty game that when applied to life with commitment can give a little more gratification to every day tasks.

title: Super helpful so far
review: I’ve already started spending longer periods of time studying since downloading this app. It’s a quick adjustment and very rewarding. Plus it helps grow real trees!

title: Great for Study
review: This app helps me study because it has this deep mode where you can’t leave the screen and it forces you to focus on whatever you have to do.

title: Actually helps
review: Usually productivity apps don’t work for me. Being able to grow a tree while getting something done really works!! 10/10 would recommend

title: Actually helpful!
review: This app helps me stay off my phone when I have to do work because if I leave the app, it kills my tree LOL only complaint is that you have to pay to get the app, but it’s totally worth it

title: Helpful
review: This simple interface does keep me focused. It's a gentle reminder that I made a promise to myself and to stay focused. I'd recommend it. Also, there doesn't seem to be any annoying commercials. So that's kinda huge.

title: Fun way to focus
review: It’s really simple but definitely helps. I like to turn it on when I’m studying. It’s a good way to set a timer and force yourself to work on something without getting interrupted by your phone.

title: Helps keep my ADHD in check!
review: Staying on track and focused is a huge struggle for me. I often get sidetracked and will spend hours upon hours finding other things to occupy my time rather than focus on my task. This helps me stay focused and allows me to get my work done!

title: Very Good!
review: I really enjoy this because I can organize the time I spend on certain things while also motivating myself at the same time. Definitely recommend!

title: Good for Boosting Productivty!
review: Using this app has definitely helped me curb looking at my phone while doing a bunch of projects at once. My only wish is calming music would play in the background. Still a great app tho!

title: Helps me power through tasks I normally would drag my feet on!
review: I’ve only used this app a few times to help me focus better since working from home but so far it’s doing the trick!

title: Has really helped me
review: I have the worst attention span issue and sometimes my phone becomes my worst enemy. I’m able to focus better on my remote job as well as summer class work because of this app!

title: Simple and cute
review: I use the free version and I love it. Going to look into how to get more tree varieties, but right now it’s a cute simple way to keep myself off my phone. Productive! That’s the point.  There’s stats but I don’t get deep into ‘em. I just wanna see my trees.

title: Beneficial in all aspects of life!
review: As connected as we are nowadays, I think it’s so important to be able to shut out distractions and focus on tasks at hand. This app is the perfect amount of accountability, and benefits the world at the same time!

title: PRACTICAL AND VERSATILE!
review: I love this app because I get easily distracted. so when I am working out or studying, I can set the timer and focus at the task because I can’t check my social media. I am a third year college student and Ive been using it since high school!

title: Awesome
review: Unlike other focus apps this one makes it not only beautiful but interactive while you still accomplish your goals. Great to have a varying choice of plants and also sounds to accompany your quiet focus hours

title: Truly helps
review: I never wanna make my forest ugly, and I need to put my phone down to work the long hours I work. 60 minutes of my tree growing, 10 minutes of mental rest between work assignments. Great function.

title: Amazing!
review: I absolutely love this app! I’m somebody who gets distracted super easily so having a type of restriction while i’m trying to get work done is super good!! also the app is super cute and interactive which makes it more fun to use :)

title: My girlfriend made me get this
review: As I said in the title I procrastinate a ton so my girlfriend told me to get this app. It helped me pass all my end to the semester exams thank you. I just wish I was easier to get different types of tree when starting out.

title: A good app to study with
review: I don’t typically find apps like this useful but being able to study with friends makes the commitment to doing work more worth it. It’s also very cute which is a nice plus!

title: Awesome app!
review:
This app really keeps me productive as a high school student. I love that I can do my homework productively and study for exams while also doing something for the environment. It makes me feel so pleased and accomplished afterwards! 
Such a great idea to create this app! 
:)

title: Love it
review: This app is helping me to stay off my phone and actually read a book or work on my writing without stopping every few seconds to scroll through Facebook. I’ve got ADD so I needed the help.

title: Productivity master
review: I just downloaded this app before starting school again. And as a person that loves procrastinating and being on social media, this app has helped with that! Changing the way i study!

title: Suggestion for improvement
review: I love this app! It helped me increase my efficiency. I think it would be better if the coins we get when opening the deep focus mode rather than closed to further encourage the “cellphone-free” zone.

title: Really helpful!
review: This app is great! I’m easily distracted and this app helps remove one of those distractions in a way that doesn’t actually lock me out of my phone in case there’s an emergency, but effectively guilts me into not using my phone.

title: Great app
review: It really helps me study! I’ll be in the middle of a reading and think “oh I’ll just check my email” (or Instagram or buzzfeed or...), but when I look at my phone I realize that I have to keep my tree alive! Very helpful for sure

title: Finally!!! 😄🌲
review: This app is great! It stops me from compulsively grabbing my phone every time I’m bored, which is great for a student like me. Finally I can convince myself to focus on what I need to do instead of playing mindless games or surfing the internet.

title: It hlped my procrastination!!
review: I have procrastinated for most of my life. I always put things off or become very distracted when it comes to my phone. Thanks to Forest, I now have incentives to put my phone down and get to work. Thank you for helping me control my procrastination!

title: I like it
review: Being someone who has a really hard time focusing, this app allows for me to focus in on one thing for a period of time and provides a type of incentive for me to focus for that period of time.

title: Love it!
review: Forest helps me focus when I have lots of homework to do. I used to use the background sounds a lot, they have a lot of options too. I’ve had this app for years and will keep using it forevermore 🌲

title: Keeps me focused
review: This app motivates me to put my phone down. It’s sad to see how many kids are mindlessly on their phones and not aware of their surroundings. This app is great and if you get enough coins you can “spend” them to plant a real tree!

title: Game. Changer.
review: Phone addiction and distraction are ruining our lives. Forest is an awesome solution to make our phones work for us and not against us. My productivity is 10x when I use Forest. I love the social aspect to, if you want to work with friends or colleagues.

title: Work great for grad students
review:
I have used this since entering grad school where I don’t have much of a set schedule. This keeps me on track and doing work, as if I were in an office, holding me accountable. 

Plus, I love collecting and gaining all the fun trees, shrubs, etc.

title: A great way to stay productive
review: I have a habit in checking my phone every few minutes. When I’m in a meeting or working on a project with a tight schedule, I always have Forest on to help me stay focus. It’s very easy to use.

title: I love this app.
review: Keeps me away from my phone when I want to focus, and it’s cool seeing how much your forest grows. If you use it regularly you can track your progress, see which months are more productive, see your growth.

title: THIS APP HELPS!!
review: This app has helped me so so so much! I used it in freshman year because I had a phone habit while doing homework and I’m about to be a junior and I still use it! It has helped me get rid of my addiction and I procrastinate less on my homework

title: A must
review: I like the fact you can collect coins when you do not use your phone, promotes the doing of studying and other things. This app allowed be to use my phone less

title: Really helps for me to stay focused
review: I normally have a terrible time staying focused, because my phone is just so accessible, but with this app it just helps remind me to stay focused because I see the timer on my phone

title: Really helps me stay off my phone!
review: Ever since I started using this app, it has helped me not only lower my screen time but helped me stay focus while doing homework/studying all while growing trees, which is amazing!

title: Best App for Focus
review: I find this app amazing when I need to focus on reading my novel for school! I easily get distracted with my phone and the thought of my tree dying makes me not want to go on my phone! I love collecting all the trees and watching my tree grow!

title: Cool Idea!
review: This app finally gives me a reason not to go on my phone when I'm supposed to be working. And, the more time I work, the closer I get to planting a real tree! Although, I do wish they would integrate Siri and Shortcuts into the app so I can set Forest timers using Siri instead of having to go into the app.

title: Super cute!
review: Super helpful and fun! Helps me stay focused and off my phone. And it’s so satisfying to see your little tree Forrest :) and if you earn enough coins you can plant a real tree (my current goal) which I think is such a wonderful touch. Bravo, app people!

title: Excellent focus app
review: I have a lot of issues with focus and have tried many different apps, but Forrest is one of the best.  Having something “living” on the line is much more motivating than a block screen!

title: great app for studying!
review: I’ve been using this app for only about a month or two now, and it’s honestly really helpful to be able to turn on this app and set my phone aside so I’m not being distracted by it!

title: literally my life saver
review: i was falling behind on so many assignment and i was worried i would fail out of high school all together. Not only did this app save me from that, it disciplined me into a better student. i couldn't be any more happier

title: I needed help staying on task at work...
review: There are so many distractions out there, I really needed some help focusing. This (paired with a chrome extension pomodoro timer) seems the best fit. I truly stay focused and work. I don’t know what the magic is, but this is what I needed.

title: Being Productive is MUCH easier
review: I was apprehensive about a game to help me study (college student); however, Forest is AMAZING. I have a much easier time staying focused because I can actually help plant forest around the world by getting my school work done.

title: Really helps
review: I have a terrible addiction to my phone and this really helps me focus when I need to STAY OFF of it. I enjoy watching my little forest grow and hate to kill my trees and bushes so I’m not tempted to “opt out” when I’ve got the app running. 🌲🌳🌱💚

title: Forest
review: This is a very useful app for studying and focusing on other things than our phones. Society has forced people to prioritize their phone and online social life, but this app gives people a break. Once again, very useful. 🌱🌳

title: Legitimately helps me focus!!!
review: This app has been a true blessing. When I really need to buckle down and get work done, it helps motivate me to stay off my phone to prevent my cute little tree from dying. Can’t recommend it enough!

title: Forest Helped Get My Life Back
review: I use several apps to help me stay on track in life and Forest is one of my favorites. I can easily see how my phone usage has gone down since I started using it. Highly recommend.

title: Set down the phone and get to work.
review: This is a helpful program and was worth the money I spent on it. Helps me to reduce the amount of mindless scrolling and keep my phone put away during work hours.

title: BEST APP EVER!!!
review: I am a high school student and this app really keeps me off my phone-I don’t want my cactus to die and therefor I don’t use my phone-and you earn coins for more species! What an incentive! I also recommend SleepTown by the same company-very good apps-super worth the money

title: Great study app
review: This app has helped me a lot get all the studying I need to, I have adhd and often get distracted easily when studying or writing papers the app allows me to stay focused by not allowing me to use my phone or get distracted by it. Truly a lifesaver

title: Innovative and Helpful
review: This app helps me stay on task and makes it fun for me to work. With the added incentive of planting real trees, it makes me want to work hard for long periods of time. Overall, this is a really great app and I highly recommend it.

title: Wonderful
review:
I really enjoy this app. There is a certain thrill of growing a plant and waiting. 
When I have homework and I am getting distracted on my phone this app helps me focus better.
Or when I go to bed and I need to get off my phone? I plant a tree!

title: Really like this one
review: I found this one really helpful and instrumental when I’m doing work. Not only during studying but also when I’m spending times with my friends!!!!!! Definitely recommend it ;)

title: Focus on the important stuff
review:
Forest app helps me put down my phone for prolonged periods of time and keeps me focused on the important things in my life: work, family and good books.

An app that I use to get more done at work and graduate school.

title: Helps so much!
review: I get distracted so easily and this app helps me get off my phone and get my work done. Being a college student means I have a lot of work and studying to get done, and this app helps me buckle down, focus, and accomplish my tasks!

title: Wonderful!
review: This app is amazing! It’s so motivating to stay off of my phone when I need to. I usually use it during class, as my school just implemented a strict no-phones policy in the classrooms. It really puts a positive spin on the situation! Very easy to use & super cute. :)

title: The best Pomodoro method I’ve found so far
review: I love the way this timer is both super helpful for productivity while being whimsical and interesting enough to cheat my mind into doing extra work each day. A definite keeper, highly recommended!

title: Potential additional feature
review: I love the current features of this app, however I think it would be cool if you could also count minutes that you were doing productive work on your phone without killing the tree.
developerResponse:
{'id': 4530520, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-08-06T03:46:38Z'}

title: It works
review: Keeps me off my phone but allows me to answer calls/texts from locked screen (which is useful when you get business calls, etc. that you can't ignore).

title: Great but just one thing
review: Helps me stay focused — almost perfect, but Sometimes you do get an important text or call and it would be nice if you could get a 30 second break option.

title: Study-Time📝🕯
review: It’s a great study app that has a reward based system (which I something I need). It allows me to be able to get something (trees) for studying and not go on my phone. Highly recommend to college students!!!

title: Study tool
review: I have to write a lot and have some writing anxiety. With the app, I can study at 25 minute intervals with 5 minute breaks in between. The app prevents me from wasting time on social media and keep me writing. Plus, being able to plant real trees is awesome!

title: Great For Anyone In School
review: This app is amazing at helping you focus. Whether your in high school, college, graduate school, medical school, or law school this app keeps you off your phone and your head buried in the books. Also, it’s fun being rewarded with new trees for studying.

title: Coming back
review: Nice to see all the new features after years of being away from this app.

title: Fun to Focus!
review: This app truly makes it fun to focus and not get distracted by my phone. I love the funny messages it gives me if I try to break my focus. Makes me laugh and get back to business.

title: Great app
review: I’ve been using it while studying and I’ll pick up my phone for distraction and seeing the app makes me throw the phone away and stay focus

title: Great encouragement!
review: I downloaded this after hearing about it in Nir Eyal’s ‘Indistractable’ and I’ve used it 4 time in the afternoon alone. It’s a great reminder to stay on target and fun to see my progress in my own little forest!

title: Please make a widget that shows the remaining time
review: Please make a widget that shows the remaining time plzzzzzzzzzzzzz it's quite uncomfortable to open the app everytime to see the timer

title: I love this app!
review: It’s easy to use, beautifully designed, and is super effective at keeping me off my phone a a more engaged with my family and my real life. Thank you!

title: Great app little traction
review: The best thing about the app is how easy it is to actually get it going, you can just open it up and hit that time start button.

title: Focus!
review: Great to remind yourself to take breaks.  Be diligent with your work during your time and give yourself 10 min or so to stretch or snack or relax before diving in to another study session.  You got this!

title: Amazing for students!
review: This app really helps me get homework done knowing that if i slack on my phone my precious plants will die! Gives me a good reason to stay off of it! Keep up the good work guys! :)

title: So far good
review: I’ve used it only one one day but so far I like it. Helps don’t touch my phone and gives me vision of how many hours each task takes.

title: Great study app!
review: Its cute, gives subtle messages that tell you to go back to working, keeps you off other apps, and has really relaxing in-app music. I really like it!

title: Giving me my life back
review: This app is a little bit confusing, but it is overall amazing. I feel like I have so many hours of my life back.

title: Great
review: Even tho I still use my laptop doing study unrelated stuff rather than using phone， this still helps me become more productive

title: FREAKING AWESOME!
review: As a plant mom and someone who struggles with focusing this is the perfect study app for me because could never let my plant die so I focus really well with it! Also there are so many beautiful and creative plants to strive for!! Love it!!

title: High schooler struggling through online classes
review: I have the attention span of idk *insert something with a small attention span*. This app really helps and gives me satisfaction after to see my Lil plant. Now gimme my star coral 😌

title: Keeps me motivated to stay focused!
review: It has stopped me from grabbing my phone multiple times while I’m studying. I plan to use this when I’m reading for leisure too!

title: Best Focus App ever!
review: This has *actually* helped me focus and be more productive. It has everything you need to become more effective and it’s the cutest interface. Highly recommend!! 🌱🪴🌿🌲🌴🌳✨

title: Doesn’t get better than THIS!
review:
Fun. Interactive. Motivating. 

WHO doesn’t LOVE planting trees and focusing at the same time. If you do, then this is the app for you. My productivity has increased exponentially since downloading this app.

title: A cute way to keep focused
review: Really enjoying Forest so far. Have only just recently began to use it consistently and it’s really helped me keep on track. Will update later

title: Alway on my home screen
review: It’s the only one which has been on my Home Screen for months other than those productivity apps.

title: Small start, then flow
review: Really helped me focus! It helped me to hold myself accountable for small goals. By the time the small goal was done, I was steadily working on bigger ones w/o setting new timers...maybe it's the "flow state"?😂

title: Great app
review: I use this app all the time to keep me off my phone and doing my work. As a student, I find it very helpful for setting an amount of time to work before giving myself a break. Very useful.

title: Keeps me super on task!
review:
I have a huge problem keeping track of time and figuring out how to manage time, this app helps so much! 
I just wish there was an alarm or something to let me know the time ended instead of just a notification.

title: Great app for productivity
review: I love that I only had to purchase the app once rather than paying for a subscription like many of the other available timer productivity apps. This app is cheap, effective, and fun to use!

title: Love it !
review: This app really helps you stay focused on whatever task you have. I recommend it to students especially who have a hard time resisting the temptation to go on your phone. Great app all around, and the trees are super cute xx

title: Focused!
review: I was in dire need for something to help me focus. I was genuinely losing all hope until I had taken Forest’s personal plant quiz and this app was linked! I genuinely look forward to growing my plants every day. I would recommend!

title: Great App
review: I have always had trouble putting down mu phone to study, work, socialize etc. With the Forest app I’ve been able to focus on the task at hand rather than getting carried away into my phone.

title: For free coral
review: This is my first review for my first “purchased” product. It’s actually barely the third day since I downloaded it but so far I’ve been having good experience with it. Keep up keeping up!!

title: Worth it
review: It’s a great app to focus on all sorts of things. I like how you can add different tags to each timer as well as a short description. It’s also quite nifty how it tracks your trees via day, month, and year.

title: Good motivation
review: I like the fact that you feel your prigreee when you see your forest, but the best is to push on knowing that you’ll be able to work with the purpose of a “real tree”

title: Best Studying app!
review: I’ve never written an app review but this one deserves all praise! Thank you to instagram for this discovery! Wish I discovered this app sooner into my study routine! Love that I’m helping the environment and being productive at the same time!! Thank you!

title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
review: This works for me all day! I use it everyday! I HIGHLY recommend this app. I use it when I’m bored and wanting to look at the subjects to set for. The subjects don’t just set the time for what I want, it also helps me go through boredom.

title: Great for helping me study!!
review: I’m the worst about getting distracted by my phone when studying. This helps me stay off my phone even for short periods of time and is much more entertaining than a timer.

title: Amazing
review: I use this app so much. Especially during this time of quarantine. I finish my classes really early in the day but sometimes I get distracted from apps on my phone but with this app it allows me to focus on homework

title: Great App
review: This a really good app for school it helps me stay focused more. 😊I honestly bought this on accident but I’m so happy I got it. It has helped me keep up my grades because I get easily distracted but if you open a notification or leave the app you kill your plant. 🥀Which affects your forest.🌳🌷

title: Great app!
review: I enjoy this app. It allows me to stay focused on other tasks and to stop using my phone all the time. I highly recommend this to anyone that uses their phone for long periods of time everyday.

title: Simple and effective
review: The layout is simple, and it can become a fun game, I only wish there was a sound it makes when the timer is done, sometimes I go overtime without realizing it.

title: Helping me be Productive During These Times
review: Forest is great. It keeps me productive while I’m indoors due to lack of global leadership. The trees are great so I don’t have to go out and I can count how long the end of the world will be by the number of trees I’ve grown. Thanks Developers.

title: Great for focus!
review: Due to the pandemic currently going on. I have gathered quite a bit of work to do over the time, this app keeps me focused knowing that if I don’t finish it it could kill a tiny life🥺. This app is definitely the best for focus

title: Concentration while helping the world
review: It’s amazing to use, very easy to understand, has helpful statistics of time on the different devices and all while earning coins to plant a real tree. This app couldn’t get any better

title: A must-have for the phone addict!
review: As a procrastinator, I need whatever I can to get me off my phone to concentrate. Even if it's in social situations, I use this app so I can concentrate what matters most: people. Plus, you can help plant real life trees by using this app! So awesome

title: Very Useful
review: I get distracted easily by my phone! This app helps me discipline myself and the cute trees/plants/fungi that grow at the end of your task is very cute! I 100% recommend for those who can’t seem to put your phone down like me!

title: Great for productivity—even better for the planet.
review: This app knows how to make you feel guilty for being on your phone... but in the best way! They’ll plant real trees if you gather enough coins from staying productive. Highly recommend.

title: Helped me a ton!
review: Even though I don’t use the app as much as I should, it’s helped a lot! Especially with the pressure of mastering time management in college, this app has helped me stay on track in a fun way. :) will keep using!

title: Great app
review: Love this app! It really helps to keep focused and study, the only thing I wish I could do is have a setting that allows you to go to music, while still in deep focus mode. Other than that it’s amazing!

title: Forest Review by October
review: very useful.i always end up using my phone while doing something else(homeworks) but with this app, I finish my works more. I even recommended it many of my friends and they really enjoy it.

title: Get work done with Forest
review: Forest stops the procrastination and starts clearing your to do list wether at home or at the office. Easy and fun to use with results that makes one feel better about themselves at the end of the day.

title: I hate studying
review: This app has a nice positive reinforcement way to help me study! It’s not real but making a small forest is really satisfying and it’s fun to get points and keeps me from getting distracted with my phone when I have to study!

title: It’s amazing I wouldn’t get anything done without it
review: I am a very distracted person and tend to go on my phone when I want to distract myself. But forest allows me to stay on track and keep my focus aligned with what I want to do.

title: Best work timer out there
review: Love this app! Definitely worth the purchase, it’s so cute and makes work more fun by “planting” adorable crazy trees. I love that they now have an option to spend your hard-earned coins on planting a real tree!!

title: 집중에 최고
review:
It’s really helpful to focus on my study. 
I already recommended this app to my friends. They also like it. This app is a kind of game so that’s why it is interesting and useful I think.
I hope various types of trees will be there.

title: It’s really helpful!
review: This app has helped me put my phone down and go to work. I’ve gotten a lot of things done due to this app. But the update made the app a little weird? Getting a call, even if I don’t answer the call, kills my tree. :// what can I do to fix this?

title: Fun visual motivator to put your phone away
review: I love the variety of trees! It is really hard to not constantly check your phone but this app gives you a beautiful motivation to do just that! Love it! New trees are added too.

title: 10/10 recommend
review: I absolutely love this app! It keeps me focused on my work and allows me to block myself from using my phone when I’m with friends as well. I also love the fact that it plants trees!!

title: Great App!
review: I’ve only had the app for two days, and in those two days, I have spent 6 hours writing, studying and getting things done without my phone. This is a great app that forces procrastinators to get up and move.

title: Love it
review: This app is truly so great for focusing the only bad part is that you really don’t know how much time to put to complete a task so I think an additional time button should be allowed. In addition, to a play button.

title: Great to help keep you off your phone
review: Forest really helped me stay concentrated on my notes and other jobs needed to be done around the house. I really love forest and looking at all the trees I have grown just makes me feel complete.

title: A Fantastic App for Students
review: I have a lot of trouble putting down my phone to get working, this app makes it so much easier because you’re rewarded for every session. Truly something I needed.

title: Great app
