review: This app is great, but I wish there was a punishment for even checking to see how much time you have left until the tree is planted. For every 10 seconds you spend on the screen with the timer a weed should grow, that’d be encourage to leave your tree alone.

title: Love this app!
review: A cute way to visually reward yourself for being productive. This helps me finish my homework and study. It’s sometimes hard to put my phone down. It’s a nice way to bond too with friends and family to focus!

title: helps me focus
review: I often tell myself that I could stop using my phone if i wanted to, it’s just that i don’t have a reason to. This app helps give me an actual incentive to stay off my phone. Very helpful :)

title: Useful and pretty!
review: I actually use this daily, versus other apps that do the same thing. Best one I’ve found so far - easy to use, pretty, witty, and I can see the results of my focus (both in my work and in the Forest). ❤️

title: Perfect homework tool
review: I use this all the time for both in class and during homework. The Chrome extension is super useful and keeps me focused. The idea of growing a little forest is more motivating than one might think. But it really is a fun, good app.

title: A much needed return to simplicity!
review: Forest has helped me pull my head out of my phone! I hadn't realized how much time I spend with it until I pulled away again. Thank you, Forest, for helping me connect to the world around me again!

title: This is a fantastic app.
review:
This is a great app. It’s simple and effective.

However, I recently purchased new trees with my coins and I haven’t seen them in my forest yet. Is the type of tree that is built random? 

Thank you so much for this app. It helps me focus!

title: A great app to reduce screen time
review: If you have some sort of OCD to check your phone, sometimes even checking the icons for nothing, this app turns your OCD into planting trees. Yes, I am one of those people who will spend 60 coins to remove dead trees.

title: Best Studying App
review: I never realized how much time I wasted by merely having my phone available. Making a cute forest has made me much more effective in my studies since I don’t bother to concern myself with my phone. I recommended it to any student.

title: amazing for studying!
review:
I’ll admit, the only reason I fail to get things done is due to the fact that I get insanely distracted by the fun of scrolling on Instagram. I got this app in hopes of becoming more focused, and get my grades up. 
This app has made me incredibly aware of how dependent I am of my phone. Hyper aware of how much I live behind a screen. 

I now constantly use it for more than just studying, more to live in the moment and socialize! 🌵

it also feels super accomplishing to see your little forrest grow 🌱

title: Awesome
review: Helps you focus on studies or anything else you need to focus on without using your phone.  It also makes you feel like you’re helping the world too by being able to plant real trees. Totally gnarly bro

title: Actually Works
review: It really does work. Trust me, I’m a stranger on the internet. Every time I catch myself scrolling and scrolling and scrolling and scrolling, I think, “Hey! I should grow a tree and move on with my life.” And then I grow a tree and move on with my life.

title: Great for Students!
review: I love this app because I am so bad about finishing my readings for classes. For some reason I'm less likely to get on my phone and kill the little tree than I would be if I just turned my phone on airplane mode.

title: This app has been helpful with focus training
review: I love this app! It took some practice to get things moving, but it’s fun once you start to get things unlocked.

title: Effective and Fun
review: You can get points for staying focused and buy cute trees to spice out ur forest…so cute, so fun, so effective. This is coming from someone with major focus issues when it comes to my phone. Love it!!

title: Been using this for years and love it
review: Tracking all your trees over time is great and also the ability to plant real tree is a nice option.

title: Good
review: I used to check updates on my phone frequently which I got used to and I used to loose focus. With this app it can focus better

title: Motivates my ADD Brain to stay on task
review: This little app may seem silly on the outset, but I have found it to be just the motivation I need to set small goals, stay focused, and increase productivity at work.

title: Fun app that helps me focus
review: I’ve been using for a few years -it always helps when you need to focus and get something done!

title: Enjoying it!
review: Really enjoying this app. Has helped w my discipline and  makes focusing fun . Love to see my Forrest grow and also reminds me how much time and Focus I’ve given to my projects   :)

title: A helpful tool
review: Being able to “get a reward” for taking time off of my phone has been great. I use this app often.

title: Helpful!
review: This app is really helping focus while studying at the same time I am not distracted by any notification coming up on my phone. Great app to use for studying!

title: LOVE!!
review: I love this app! Really helps me focus. The only thing I would change is the ability to keep some apps unblocked such as phone or messages, in case you need to make an emergency call or text. Otherwise, it’s great!!

title: Love this app!
review: Makes studying a little more fun!(: the app also keeps track of the times you’ve studied/ how long and puts everything in a nice graph for you!(:

title: Exactly what I needed
review: It does what it says and it’s simple to use. Definitely helps with studying and using pomodoro technique. Helps to set study goals and prevents me from using my phone.

title: So good
review: You generally get so much work done while using this app. I also love the satisfaction of growing my own garden, and seeing all the progress that I have come from.

title: Amazing
review: I absolutely love this app! Its keeps me on track and has a feature that really keeps me off my phone when I am doing school work!

title: Great focus app
review: I love seeing the daily progress and being able to compare it to the amount of time I spent working on previous days. Very visually appealing app as well!

title: Getting more work done!
review: This is definitely helping me focus and not end up scrolling social media when I should be studying!

title: Helpful app for someone with ADHD
review: I really like that I can block myself from distractions while also measuring the amount of time that I’m actually spending focused. It’s really helpful for me.

title: Helpful
review: It definitely keeps me on task and the extra trees are for sure an incentive to keep using it to get more coins. I like that you can do it with friends too!

title: Great so far!
review:
I never realized until I got forest and turned on deep focus mode how much I pick up my phone during class!
This app helps me be more mindful and focus really well!

title: Amazing
review: This app has helped me focus so well. I use it when I’m studying cleaning. I love that I can do it with my friends and can even go into deep study mode where I can’t touch my phone at all. Highly recommend. Worth the money.

title: Break the addiction
review: I’ve tried all the apps to help break the screen addiction and this has been the best by far! I’ve cut my phone usage down drastically.

title: Love it !
review: Amazing app, it’s very aesthetically pleasing and definitely helps me focus, especially lately with online school. Gives me motivation and rewards, so I think it’s worth the dollar :)

title: Fun way to focus your focus
review: We all need to stop living on our screens during the day, know we have a fun yet chill way to increase our deep focus time. Turn off and plant a tree!

title: Very good for students
review: As an honors student in high school with lots of stressful classes, this app really helps me buckle down and get work done. I even use it when I read to make sure I’m really getting the full experience.

title: Helpful
review: I love this app and I have not even started looking at the multi person features, I just love at th end of the day being able to review the Forrest I grew that day over the different trees and activities I did.

title: I love this app!!!
review: This app has helped me in so many ways! I can finally use time management properly and prioritize my time a lot better. I highly recommend getting this app! It changed my life!

title: Got me to study more!
review: This app is great, I generally don’t like paying for apps but Forest was worth it! It made me study more and study effectively. Plus I get to see how long I’m actually studying for. I recommend it for all students

title: Focus
review: What an awesome and I’m great know for being wasting a lot of time and always procrastinating on many things!  This app help me prevent from touching iPhone and help speed up my important projects and assignments for my graduate program!

title: Very helpful
review: This app I find is very helpful when I need to write a paper because of course I would rather finish the paper then see my little tree die to try and answer some text.

title: Great for students!
review: I just started law school and have been using this app nonstop! I feel like I’m achieving so much studying, avoiding my phone, and making a forest! Super helpful since I have issue setting down my phone haha

title: A must when working from home
review: Working from home is so hard. I’m balancing personal and work simultaneously. This app helps me divide my time evenly between the two. And who doesn’t like helping the planet?!

title: Great execution!
review:
This has been very helpful in keeping track of productivity for me!

It would be perfect if the developer would only implement a widget so that I don’t have to launch the app to check the remaining time.

title: Focus
review: As someone with ADHD, this app REALLY helps me. I’m always distracted, but I sometimes hyperfixate on my phone, and this Forest helps remind me I had a task to do - so it’s easier to not get involved until my task is complete.

title: This app works!
review: I am definitely more productive in my writing since I started using this app for writing sprints! I love the option to wither your trees if you use other apps in your phone while working!

title: It’ll help you!
review: It helps you to stay focus in terms of staying off social media and other apps. You still gotta put it in that work! I like that it grows into your own little landscape 🥰

title: Good App, Great Concept
review:
It does its job in  giving you a dedicated timer to focus on whatever you are doing without the distraction of your phone.

I do wish a brilliant investor would buy out this app, Calm, and Fabulous and combine them into a Zen Central app.

title: Great
review: Ive been slacking due to the panfemic, and so I decided to use Forest (I bought it but never used it) it had helped me tremendously, I’ve now been getting work down and I’m almost all caught up again! Sooo thank you Forest! :)

title: Love this!
review: When trying to focus on something I tend to get distracted super easily, but this really helps me put down my phone and focus. It’s also fun to plant trees and see how big your forest grows. Definitely recommend!

title: Great Motivation!
review: This app has substantially increased my motivation and productivity! My husband and I will “grow a tree” together, and it keeps us both on task. It also keeps me motivated knowing that I can unlock more trees to plant in my forest. Worth the purchase!!

title: It works
review: It’s not gonna help everyone, as people with serious addictions and self-control problems will probably still struggle, but it works well for me. The only complaint I’d have is that it takes way too many hours to plant a real tree

title: Delightful and Useful
review: I love Forest— I’ve used it for a number of years now, and it is consistently one of the best ways of focusing I’ve found. It’s cheerful and gently encourages you to stay on track without being too mean. I love this app.

title: It really does help
review: Something about this app helps you to be psychologically free from wanting to pick up your phone and zone out while trying to be productive. I don’t know how it works, but I like it.

title: Helpful tool
review: This app has helped me concentrate on my assignments throughout my college courses. Before I began using it, my phone was a major distraction and now I won’t close the app because I don’t want to kill the tree! Love this app!

title: Keeps Me Productive!
review: It’s hard for me personally to keep productive, especially with school work. This app is great because I don’t want my tree to die so I dint go on my phone, and I get my school work done! It was very worth the purchase!

title: This is super useful
review: I am in eighth grade, and this app really helps me focus in class and when I am studying/doing homework! I would really recommend this app for anyone who would like to be more focused and make a difference! 😇😇

Honestly I love this app, it’s easy free to use and I use it for homework and anytime I need to study or meditate, there’s a setting for deep focus so you don’t have to have it set so you can’t use your phone. I really adore this app.

title: BEST APP EVER
review: I love this app, it’s so useful. I usually use it for studying but I occasionally use it to clean so I won’t get on my phone. On my iPhone I can play music on the Apple Music app and my tree won’t die as long as I start the music before. Best $2 I’ve ever spent!!!

title: fulfilling
review: As a visual worker it is so nice to have something to look at to show time and progress. And it is done in a simple and refreshing figure. Would recommend for anyone who is a looking for an appealing visual representation of their focus goals.

title: A helpful app!
review: Really motivating to keep going so that my tree grows. Social media is definitely a big distraction for me when I’m trying to focus (especially if the content is not interesting) so this app is definitely welcomed!

title: Pretty helpful if you actually try your best and have the right mindset!
review: I love this app so far because I find it easier to stay away from my phone by doing it through this app.

title: Such an amazing app!
review: This app has helped me so much with my homework, and it makes me feel good seeing how much I’ve gotten done. I love the music, it’s super calming and helps me relax while doing my homework! 10/10 would recommend.

title: Great for Phone Procrastinators!
review: The perfect way to get me off my phone to focus on whatever productive thing I should be doing. Also, with enough points you can plant real trees which is easily the best feature for me.

title: Motivates you to stay focused!
review: I was having a hard time concentrating on my hw but this app has definitely encouraged me to stay focused and get my hw done within a specific time frame. Thank you for making this app!

title: Gets rid of bad habits!
review: I am a high performer, but have scatterbrained tendencies and want to work multiple projects at once during the day. This app helped me drive intentional focus into one thing at a time, proving to add more efficiency throughout my day.

title: More productive than ever!
review: It’s my first semester of college and social media can be a huge temptation and unconscious distraction while studying for long periods. This app has helped me increase productivity and spend far less time on social media!!

title: Love this app!
review: This is a great timer for studying! I am a nursing student and when I need to put my phone down without any distractions I can rely on forest. The best is that once you receive 2500 points you can actually help plant a real tree! Awesome!

title: Amazing for Studying!
review: I downloaded this before I had my semester exams. The graphics and the little plants are adorable and this really helps me stay focused. Would recommend to any student, or anyone who wants to get good work done.

title: Great app
review: Really helps me stay off my phone. I can still use Siri to start podcasts, make calls or send texts without killing a tree if I need to. The trees are so cute! This company has another app called SleepTown that I also use.

title: So worth it!!!
review:
this app is amazing, it got me to do so much stuff. And being present in the moment. It’s amazing what 2$ can get you.

Thank you developers, you have change my life a bit for the better❤️

title: Glad to push myself and do for something greater!
review: It can be hard at first, but it will get better from time to time when you finish the tasks!

title: Best productive app ever!
review: Awesome app! I don’t generally write reviews but for this app I’m inspired to! I wish I could have discovered this earlier. It really helps me focus and be productive to get much more done. Much appreciated to the ingenuity of this app and greatly recommend!

title: Helped me not procrastinate!
review: I have such a hard time with getting my work done. I mean, I still do. I procrastinated writing this review! But I’m so so glad that there’s a support system like “Forest” to keep me on top of my stuff. By the way, this is NOT sponsored.

title: Keeps me on track
review: I try to use this app every morning during my routine to make sure I don’t get distracted by my phone. It helps me to stay focused and get things done faster so I’m not stressed later in the day.

title: Amazing, but hard to unlock
review: Love this app because it makes me stay on top of things and makes me not check my phone. However, a lot of the trees are really hard to unlock and it's kind of frustrating and makes me not wanna use it.

title: Growth!
review: I didn’t get it much in the beginning but now that I’ve made a habit out of using Forest, I’m stunned by how much better I’ve been doing in terms of schoolwork and general life things. This is a lovely idea and an even better execution!

title: This is Just Great
review: I don’t think I have ever been so focused on my tasks before. When I am using this app i stay focused on what I am supposed to be doing and not wondering around the rabbit hole that social media has become.

title: All time productivity app!!
review: My productivity has sky rocketed since I’ve been using forest. When I focus precisely on a task I end up finishing faster and being more effective than I was at first. I’m saving my coins to start planting real trees. Thanks!

title: Good App
review: Cute and colorful way to keep you off your phone so you can stay focus. Nothing makes me feel guiltiest than seeing a dead bush because I couldn’t stay off my phone for 10 seconds.

title: Forest is great
review: Forest is really great because it allows you to tangibly see your progress. (I like seeing a forest of trees where each tree represents a certain amount of time focused). It’s easy to use and absolutely would recommend!

title: pretty good
review: keeps me off my phone really well. only issue is sometimes I will turn my phone on after I have grown my tree and it will open to just my home screen, killing the tree because I have “left the app”. but overall, does its job.

title: Must Have
review: This app is everything! I’m often distracted, but when I turn on Forest I’m able to focus on tasks in efficient intervals. I’m also a professor and routinely recommend this to my students. Thank you.

title: Makes me productive
review: I am terrible for always being on my phone but with this app I am able to stay off my phone and force myself to get things done! The trees are so cute and I love the idea behind it.

title: Keeps me on task!
review: I have recently been suing my phone less when studying thanks to this app! The guilt of being able to kill a tree just by being on my phones keeps me from being off task!

title: Only way I get work done
review: If you, too, struggle to put down your phone and focus on your work, and ALSO feel weirdly guilty about killing pixel plants, this is the app for you! I swear it’s the only reason I haven’t failed grad school.

title: Excellent for Keeping on Task
review: Does what it says on the tin and helps keep you focused on tasks for whatever chunk of time you want to use. Always works well, and they add new trees to keep things interesting. Definitely recommend!

title: Productivity and a little more responsibility
review: After about a week after downloading Forest I see some decent improvements in productivity. I appreciate that in-app currency can be converted to tree-planting and the that the aesthetic (visual and audio) is polished.

title: So much better than I thought
review: I was skeptical about paying two dollars for this app, but it has made me so much more focused, and I love seeing my progress being tracked through trees. I am much more focused and productive!!

title: Best for focus
review: I love using Forest to keep me focused during the workday. I’ve tried other Pomodoro timers and this one beats them for flexibility and theme. It’s exciting to unlock new trees and I appreciate their environmentalism. Also it’s great to use with friends working together remotely.

title: Best productivity app ever!
review: Forest has helped me stay focus on so many of my assignments for school and for studying! It has a very cute and neat aesthetic that makes me want to plant a tree constantly. The group focus feature is also a lot of fun for me and my friends!

title: Best App for Studying!!
review: I’m a college student who is well known for procrastination and being on my phone when I need to focus! This app helps me to stop checking my phone and to focus on my work and it has really helped my grades!

title: Great for focusing
review: I have been using this app for a few months now and have really enjoyed it. It helps you stay focused and set timers for working. I specially like that you can use it with friends to grow trees together!

title: Great app.
review: Very effective in making me put down my phone and getting some work done. I love seeing the amount of work that I’ve put in made into a forest. Very cool idea. Helps with time management as well, for me at least.

title: The struggle is real and Forest helps
review: I love this app. I work from home and struggle with time management. Forest leverages my creativity and love for beauty to help me stay on task. And the labels and timeline feature can even function as time tracking for invoicing etc.

title: SO useful!
review: I really do well with this method (Pomodoro) of staying on task. It is a powerful productivity tool. FOREST takes it up to a higher level with the motivation and visual reward of the forest and the variety of trees and bushes that can be bought with reward points.

title: This is great!
review: This is so much fun.  A game like rewards for staying in the moment. I love the selection of trees and foliage...the ONLY way to improve on this is to let me design my forest...but I don’t have to because it changes every time I look at it.  <3

title: Really helpful!
review: This app has really helped me focus at work. It made me realize just how often I pick up my phone and get distracted. It is up to you to set it but if you actively use the app you get a lot from it.

title: Something wrong with the time on each day
review: Seems to be something wrong with the time on each day display. Maybe because of the IOS 12?
developerResponse: {'id': 5171887, 'body': 'Hi,\n\nPlease provide us the details and the screenshots of the problem via our in-app feedback system. We will look into this issue. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-22T09:36:28Z'}

title: GREAT FOR STUDENTS
review: Hi! I’m a current college student and this app forces me to stay focused and actually work on assignments. When I get frustrated, I normally just get on my phone, but now I actually work out the problem and figure it out because of this app. Love it

title: Keeps me on task!
review:
Weirdly utilizes the same impulse that usually leads me to candy crush. I need more coins to grow different kinds of trees in my forest! ...and I earn those coins by NOT playing on my phone. 

A+ productivity app. Goodbye forever, you dastardly candy crushing machine.

title: Get your life back
review: Tired of mindlessly scrolling? Start a productivity timer, spend more time with family and friends, being a real human, while growing real trees to support our planet. Excellent idea, please sponsors, don’t give up on it

title: Review
review: I enjoy this app because the idea of being able to plant real trees and sometimes a digital forest motivates me to focus and I’m much more productive. Having to work to get the other ambient sounds makes me work much harder.

title: The app needs an update to accommodate AirPods
review: When I remove an AirPod, the app’s sounds begin playing via my phone’s speaker, which is not cool when you’re sharing office space with colleagues. Please update the app to turn off the sounds when a user takes off their AirPods.
developerResponse: {'id': 3002769, 'body': 'Hello, thank you for the suggestion. We will improve our app in the next update. Forest', 'modified': '2018-04-02T12:09:20Z'}

title: Forest app review
review: This app has helped me so much! I have been trying to get off my phone and computer, and the forest app has helped me monitor that. I highly recommend it if you want to manage your time on screens.

title: Really does help productivity!
review: This app seemed a little silly at first, but I’ve grown to absolutely love it. It really does force you to concentrate and overall reduces your attachment to your phone even when not working. Plus they plant real trees, everyone wins!

title: This app was a godsend
review: I needed Forest so badly and I never realized it until I got it. This app helps me stay present and focused better than any other app or productivity tool I’ve ever used! Truly a gift! And the social responsibly aspect- planting trees, REAL trees! Couldn’t get any better.

title: Almost there
review: It's a great way to avoid phone distractions. However, it could be improved upon by having the app give better notifications of when the period concludes. As it is know you have to keep your own time.

title: Creative approach to productivity
review: Who knew that the key to being productive was to incentivize time well spent with a garden of digital trees? I certainly didn’t, but I took a chance with this app and have been marvelously rewarded by a sharp increase in my productivity! I love this app!

title: Helps me study
review: Easiest way to not procrastinate. I’m experimenting with apps that have the same features that Forest does, so it certainly won’t be the only one I use.

title: Love this game
review: This game is soo cute and helps me actually focus, I’m so bad with sitting still and wanting to check my phone but I don’t want my cute little plants to die so it helps a lot :))

title: Very useful
review: Bought it a long time ago, not even sure how much it was, but whatever the price was it was worth it.

title: Awesome app
review: Useful and a creative way to have my phone near me, while having a reminder not to go on it for trivial things while I’m trying to be productive! Thanks Forest App Team!

title: Winter mode!!!!!
review:
This is a good app, cute trees and it keeps me from my phone. However the winter mode is beautiful and I want it back!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! At leas an option to change the theme would be perfect!!

Thank you!!

title: This App is the Best For Unfocused Studiers
review: This app really helped me get through the phase of always getting distracted while doing my homework. It also encourages me to study for more time with more focus.

title: Been using for years
review: I used this when I was in med school and stopped during residency only to come right back. Love this app. Super cute. Keeps me on track

title: Very Helpful App!
review: The app is definitely worth it. It has helped me concentrate more and I am able to track my progress. Overall, very helpful little app 🌲

title: Actually works
review: I don’t ever leave app reviews but this app is great. Really great way to stay focused and feel like you’re doing something. Very much recommend.

title: Delightful
review: This app is a simple, yet fun way for me to stay focused on my work and actually feeling a bit extra motivation from seeing my progress displayed in a growing garden. :)

title: Great app!
review: I had been using Flora for a while, but I wanted to add friends, so I finally bought Forest. I wish it was free, but it’s effective. Something about keeping those little plants alive...

title: Adorable and Helpful
review: This app is wonderful. It's easy to use and has a lot of awesome flexible features for staying focused. The art design for the trees and plants is so freaking cute. Definitely worth the price.

title: PERFECT FOR ONLINE SCHOOL
review: I was getting a little behind on work and this app helped me focus for a set amount of time of my choice. I use it everyday to motivate me and by studying you help plan real trees in our world

title: LOVE THIS APP
review: It has helped me through studying pretty hard and not being on my phone so much. You’ll feel accomplished after getting rewards.

title: Fun way to focus
review: It’s a simple app with a timers, but clearly a fun way to focus and also see what you’re focusing on. If you like metrics and a reason to stay concentrated on a specific task, this is a great way to do jt

title: Great
review: It helps to stay focused when working and it actually makes me be more productive instead of just procrastinating all the time.

title: So useful
review: I have had this app for years and it’s been so helpful whether i’m watching a movie, working or need to study! Best app on my phone hands down.

title: Amazing!!!
review: This is such a great app, it was recommended by the TA in my section and I have used it everyday since. IT IS SO WORTH THE $1.99!!! It motivates me to stay focused on my task and just seeing my forest brings me joy when I’m done with my task <3.

title: love this app
review: honestly I use this app whenever I don’t want to be on my phone, however, specifically when I want to study. unlocking new trees motivates me to study as well :))

title: Easy to use
review: I found this last night & have used this morning.  I really enjoy it.  I like the deep focus & the music options

title: Focus!!
review: This app really helped me focus and stay off my phone while doing tasks. I use it and do the Pomodoro Technique, which combined has made my productivity at an all time high!

title: Great!!
review: I’ve used other studying time recording apps but this is the best. This make me forbid myself using phone while I’m studying. And growing trees according to my focusing time have me want to study.

title: Great app
review: Really good for focusing if your phone is a problem. I also use this to track my work hours because I am working from home. I only wish there were more free tree types.

title: Love this app!
review:
I love forest! I have been using it for years! It is the cutest and by far the most effective way i have found to get off my phone when I am doing homework.
Highly recommend!

title: Cool so far!
review: I got this to focus more in college because YIKES I have to study 4-8 hrs a day on top of work and classes. This app has been motivating and keeps me on track. I spent some time exploring the bells and whistles of the app and it’s really cool and customizable!!!

title: Great for focusing
review: My drive to have a beautiful virtual forest keeps me focused when using this app. These tiny trees rule my conscious world and push me to be a better self. No devastation matches my own when I accidentally exit the app and kill a tree.

title: awesome!
review: been using this app for 2 years. it’s nice to use when I need to stay off my phone, to sleep, or meditate, or do work. and there’s something about seeing the trees you grow that is satisfying too.

title: Adorable, effective, and user-friendly!
review: Aesthetically pleasing and for a good cause. It’s very nice to have an app that keeps me focus and to remind myself to take frequent breaks. The music and the little quotes are nice additions. The personal flower quiz is also very nice and so beautiful.

title: So far so good!
review: I’ve been using focus for a few weeks now and it surprisingly is curbing my phone usage/distractions more than I thought it would. Look forward to more updates and additional tagging options for metric purposes.

title: Oddly, surprising, it works
review:
I guess because I feel like I am not doing enough for the rest of the world. It feels right to be bettering myself and the world at the same time. Granted, what is the worth of one tree? 

Some one life, save the world entirely.

title: Giving back
review: This app is amazing. Not only does it help me stay on track while doing my school work, I'm also going back to the environment. The app is easy to understand and use.

title: Love the app but..
review:
Is there a way to edit and change the notification sound on this app for iPad ( I havE the iPad mini 5). I would like to have a sound that calls my attention. The current notification sound is too low. Please let me know if this is considered in an update.

Also please add Landscape mode for iPads. It’s weird to constantly have this upright.

title: Good app for focusing
review: Killing a tree is a hard thing to do, so threatening me with the death of a cute little digital tree is pretty effective. There’s the extra incentive of getting enough coins to plant a tree IRL. If you’re nice but have trouble focusing this is the perfect app for you.

title: 100% works
review: I have been able to complete more in the two days that I’ve had this app vs. the two weeks I’ve been trying to get things done

title: Aesthetic and does its job
review: So far it’s been a good experience— I don’t want to check my phone as often and I love the trees. But it would be nice if we can more easily allow access for 2FA during deep focus mode.

title: Remote work focus gem
review:
I have been using this to keep focused during remote work during this virus crisis.

It has been helpful for me and my family to get through the days!

title: Super helpful
review: whenever i’m doing work for school, i am always distracted by my phone. This app has helped me remove all distractions and has actually improved my grades. 100% recommended to anyone.

title: Such a fun way to keep track of productivity
review: I already use apps like Focus timer to track my pomodoros while working. This app removes the temptation from breaking my work flow altogether. Don’t know how I worked without it!

title: Plant a real tree
review: This app has been useful for studying. I like the different trees you can choose and the fact that they grow based on how long you set your timer. Love that you can trade in points to plant a real tree.

title: Easier to study
review: I find this app really helpful since it gives incentive to not use your phone while studying! It’s fun to collect trees and plants and then be able to grow them.

title: Fun & super helpful! 😆
review:
I love building my forest 🌳 It’s VERY motivating to know that I will have withered plants & trees if I get on my phone during a session. 
I also really love ❤️ that I can label & write notes about the sessions to see where my focus is being spent!

title: Greatly improved my focus
review: Who would’ve thought an app could help me stop using my phone huh? I feel good about  how much forest has helped me and the fact that you can plant real trees is absolutely amazing.

title: Worth the money
review: This is more a challenge to see how many trees I can grow and then I might as well study to make the tree growth more satisfying. I did more work in two hours than I did all week

title: Study Buddy!
review: I’m in college and this app helps keep me focused on homework for classes that I’m required to take but don’t have interest in. I also love that they give you the option to save your coins to plant a real tree!!

title: Actually helped
review: I really struggle focusing on work when I have my phone nearby, but this app total changed that! I have spent a lot more time getting work done now then ever! 10/10

title: sooo good
review: this app is amazing. i had it when i had a Samsung and it was free and on e i switched to apple the fact that it wasn’t was i initially daunting but i was such a good decision to buy. it is so good for time management and it also helps support the environment

title: Great way to remove distractions
review: Simply put this is a great app if you want to get off your phone and focus on anything other than your phone. Can’t recommend highly enough!

title: I love this app!!
review: this app forest makes me want to be productive and study!!!! It is great for people who like to procrastinate on doing things they need to do, like  me.I also love the sounds that help me focus it makes it so much better and healthy.

title: You need this app if you distracted by your phone
review: This app help me staying away from phone while working, I think it is very effective if you are wasting too much time on your phone.

title: Love the impact
review: When you can do a deed for the planet or other people by not touching your phone, it makes you really focus. I love the app and the help it gives me by staying focus on my dissertation, whilst helping to plant a tree. Thanks to the developers!

title: Recent update subpar
review: Always loved this app, but the recent update has made it impossible for me to grow a tree while keeping the lock screen OFF. The “don’t wither tree when lock screen off” option is now nowhere to be found.

title: A great tool - if you remember to use it
review: I’ve used Forest on and off for a few years mostly to help me focus at work: I use the audio to drown out background noise. It’s been very effective when I remember to use it.

title: Great app :)
review: I invested in this app about a year ago in order to focus on homework and it works well for me as a way to unplug and do my homework without the constant stimulus of my phone nearby. Definitely recommend

title: Focus help!
review: Very useful in helping you focus. I enjoy the music as it is not distracting. Building a forest is weirdly a great motivator in focusing while studying! I love the deep focus mode because then I truly don’t get sidetracked in other apps while trying to study.

title: Great app for time management
review: The app helped me a lot on time management especially during finals! The desire to collect all different beautiful trees is also a good motivation to keep using the app! Overall, I really like the design.

title: Fight fire with fire
review: Forest is great. It is very game-like and somewhat addicting, which is perfect because that pulls me away from other apps that are genuinely a waste of time and, in the end,helps me spend less time on my phone. Best $2 I ever spent

title: Great App for Focusing
review: Forest has been my daily app should I need to devote hours into a work or task that I should accomplish. Highly recommended for students and those who are already working. Will keep you focused for hours.

title: More productivity for less than I would pay for a cup of coffee
review: Sometimes there are tasks I need to get done on my phone and I can’t use this app to act like a timer for those things.

title: Great App!
review: App works smoothly. no annoying ads popping up. have been using for few months and helps me keep my focus but also reminds me to take breaks to refresh my mind. Kudos to the developers. 👍

title: Highly recommend for pomodoro system
review: Creative take on the pomodoro technique that adds a small risk/reward system in the form of a virtual garden. Your success and failures are put on display giving you apt motivation to stay on target

title: Focus at Work
review: I use this app mostly at work to try and not got distracted by other things on my phone. For me, it helps tremendously. I stay more focused using this app and therefore am more productive with my work tasks.

title: Works because you don’t want the trees to die
review: The best pomodoro/timer app I’ve found. Suggestion to the devs: make it possible to go from one timer to another without pressing the back button
Honestly such a good app. It has helped me with getting my sleeping schedule back on track multiple times. I’ve been using it for the last two years and im so happy I got it:)

title: Earth day love for Forest!!
review: This app is great for forcing me off my phone for finals week. I’m motivated to use it so I can plant a real tree one day. I’m halfway there and OFF my phone more. Only suggestion is allow a whitelist for changing music but that’s about it!

title: Soothing Version of a Pomodoro Timer
review:
The only thing I wish is that I could exempt certain apps, like the kid’s daycare app, which sends us notifications if we need to pick them up. 

Otherwise, I enjoy this app and its graphics.

title: Focus fix
review: I have a serious phone addiction, setting up forest helps keep me off of my phone and makes me realize how much time I’m spending on things. Helps with breaks etc. best study time tracking app.

title: The best app to keep me focus
review: I just love this app! It’s so fun and really helps me with my struggles on being focus during my work and away from my cellphone. Also, it’s rewarding to be able to see my progress afterwards as a beautiful forest!

title: Forest
review: Forest has been very helpful with keeping focus so far. The art is attractive, and new reward is difficult enough to feel worthwhile without feeling like a push to buy anything. And, I now know what phubbing means!

title: Best pomodoro app
review: I’ve tried lots of pomodoro and timeboxing apps over the years and Forest is by far my favorite. The gamification makes it fun to use (meaning I’m more likely to actually stick to it) and the nature sounds help drown out background distractions.

title: Great way to stay focused
review: Forest is a simple app. You set a timer, and an electronic tree grows while you work or do whatever isn’t on your phone. Use the phone and the tree dies. Easy to learn, easy to use, no glitches, effective.

title: Love it!
review: Have been using forest from 2 yrs ago till now. The total hours is already more than 46 days length. Thanks Forest helps me to focus on study again from a extremely lazy condition! Will continue to use...

title: Perfectly simple
review: I actually enjoy my practice of carving time away from my phone. It may just be a trick of the light, but it gets me to put down the phone... at least a little more ;)

title: Love it!
review: I use this to track working and studying hours. I did drop one star only because it once crashes when I was minutes away from completing a 2-hr study block, but that is the only time I have had issues.

title: Forest
review: I just hope they really are planting real trees. I think the CEO’s should engage more with the people who play this game and give us updates on how’s going on with the trees on our emails. I personaly would love that. Other than this, the game is perfect!

title: Great!
review: I enjoy the game feel and the interface is clean. It’s hard to figure out how to switch the trees and bushes though. Took me a few days to find out. I’d also want to know how much coins I get from a session without having to go thru the hour and a half.

title: Great for kicking the bedtime screen habit
review: I set this for 2 hours at bedtime so I can’t scroll mindlessly at bed time. I wish you could do longer times to keep me off it all night, but it does help. The trees are really pretty.

title: it really helps!
review: this app truly does help me stay focused & off my phone! the last thing I want to do is be responsible for a cute little tree dying because I decided to look @ twitter instead of focusing on my homework.

title: If you really need to get ish done...
review:
I wouldn’t hesitate to download this app. Forest has helped me keep on task with major priorities that I have at work. I feel motivated to use it more so that I can save coins in order to plant a tree in real life. 

Great app with a great cause.

title: Productivity increased
review: I’ve been looking for ways to reduce phone time and increase productivity. This app is the first real success I’ve had in more than 2 years. Phone time cut in half. Highly recommend.

title: This App is so helpful for me
review: It’s really hard for me to concentrate on schoolwork and I’ve tried other pomodoro timers to compact this. However, this one is the most effective. I especially like the plant aspect that keep you off your phone.

title: Great way to game my productivity
review: I’m really enjoying using Forest. I used to use a timer on my phone to employ the « pomodoro » method but with Forest I have extra motivation because I’m earning trees and hope to one day earn enough virtual trees to plant a real one!

title: Very nice!
review: Helpful for putting the phone down and has appealing design. I enjoy the slightly sassy messages it gives you if you look at your phone before you complete the allotted time.

title: It really helped me bring up my grades
review: It just helps to give me a reminder that I am supposed to be working or sending one Snapchat is going to mess up my flow.  It really helped me study without my phone calling me

title: Trees in Developing Countries!
review: I am in love with this application! It allows me to set time aside and focus on things other than my telephone. It also contributes to the forestation of developing countries! Maybe one day this application can add a water contribution as well as trees for countries in need!

title: Amazing app!
review: I love this app. It personally helps me avoid procrastination just by the euphony within the app! Beautiful noises of rain, rain forests, or the beach. If I had any complaint, it’d be the time scale. I wish it had a greater time range that supports the hours of sleep. Would still recommend to anyone!

title: Best study app
review: This app really helped me focus on work/ college work. There are so many cute plants to grow and it encourages me to keep putting more minutes in the timer.

title: split screen please
review: I want to increase the split screen mode on the ipad. Now, the split screen is not supported on the ipad whether it is landscape or portrait, which is very inconvenient.

title: Beautiful design & my productivity is improved!
review: This app is so well crafted and I get so much homework done. Highly recommended if you’re a student at any level

title: screen color
review: I would try using the app again if it was possible to change the color of the screen.

title: Helpful with productivity
review: This app has such a great interface and love seeing how many trees I plant in a day or over time. Really helps with my focus too. Thank you for this app

title: Helpful
review: really helps keeping me on track when i’m studying because even though it’s literally virtual, not real trees, i feel really bad if they die 😭

title: Writing
review: Been using this for getting into writing and doing research- times when I need no interruptions. It gives me great motivation to stay focused since I’d hate to kill a tree!!

title: Game-changer!!
review: Love the easy motivation this app gives me, worth it if you need help focusing for a big test or any thing that requires you to be off your phone!

title: Now focusing better
review:
This app is great and his helping me better.

I wish there was a way to see day-2-day focus time. Currently it only shows time in pieces.

title: Gamification of Studying
review: This app has encouraged me to study constantly. I was struggling before. It’s a good little boost to see the times you set your phone down and was productive.

title: Motivational!
review: Love forest so much. My friends and I are studying a lot in med school and it’s hard with everything online to stay off my phone and focused. We all compete to grow trees!

title: Helps increase my productivity a lot
review: This app really helps me focus on tasks while simultaneously giving me the feeling of instant gratification when I get to plant a lil tree. Especially since I love plants irl.

title: Still figuring it out but it’s great so far
review: I am a productivity snob and sometimes try to do too much at once. This app helps me stay on one thing at a time to ensure my tasks are being completed and not left undone.

title: Very simple study tool
review: I didn’t quite understand the appeal at first, but I’m hooked now. Even the first day, there was such an improvement w/ my time management.

title: Love this app!
review: I love the ability to refocus myself and have fun in the process. I’m looking forward to unlocking new plants as I become more productive and focused as time goes on. My forest is full!

title: Helpful
review: This app definitely helps me to stay focused! I like being able to set aside a certain amount of time to work on something without my phone as a distraction.

title: Very cute
review: I got the app on a whim from a recommendation from a friend. I love it. I can set it and do my thing and then there's a little tree or bush! The app is very user friendly and intuitive. It's very cute

title: Helps with working from home with ADHD
review: I’ve only been using this for a few days and it’s already helped me manage my workload so muxh better.

title: 8 dead trees 🤷🏻‍♂️
review: Good for getting you to focus but also set priorities. I’ve only killed 8 trees. Sometimes I just need/need my phone sometimes seeing the app running helps me refocus.

title: Very cool app
review: It helped me focus and get stuff done more than other apps. I wish it had the ability to stack timers one after another without having to set after each one.

title: Great, but not perfect.
review: I really like the app because it’s cute and you can set your own timer, but I wish it would allow some apps. I accidentally killed a tree when I left the app to make a call for work while I had Deep Focus Mode on. Other than that, it’s been nice.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19833396, 'body': 'Hi,
Because of the limitation of the iOS system, we cannot detect which app the user is using, and therefore we are unable to implement the whitelist feature in the iOS version.
As a workaround, we've made the "Deep focus mode" which you can turn on in the Settings page.

With the "Deep focus mode" off, you'll be able to use your phone without killing the tree, but you will also have to refrain yourself from using distracting apps.
With the mode on, you're expected to stay fully focused while planting, and thus you won't be able to use other apps. The mode can only be enabled when your device is secured with a password.

If you see features like a whitelist in other iOS apps, please let us know and we will try to figure out how they did it.
Feel free to contact us again if you have any other questions or suggestions. Thank you. :) ', 'modified': '2020-12-17T14:55:07Z'}

title: Saved my productivity
review: Since I paid for the app, I feel obliged to use it now, which is a great motivator in my opinion! Can’t wait to use this more

title: Love love love
review: I honestly love this app it make studying much. More enjoyable and you feel like your working for something and also making a difference in the planet!!!

title: Such an amazing app!!
review: This app is so amazing! I never spend money on apps but it was 100% worth it!! It’s super helpful to keep me focused especially with school being online!! This app is the perfect reminder to keep you studying!

title: Productivity Plus
review: I was skeptical of this app before I got it, but once I started using it, wow! My productivity went up a ton because I don’t have the heart to kill little virtual trees. This app is going to get me through grad school! ❤️

title: Everyone needs this app
review: AMAZING !! I have severe depression and was hospitalized for two years because of it, and thanks to this app, I can do school work again ! I love plants which also helps. thank you for this blessed app

title: Amazing
review: It helps you stay focused and on track if you’re willing to do put in the effort. Would most highly recommend, especially for people like me who commonly procrastinate!

title: Keeps me off my phone!
review: It is so tempting to check my phone while I study. Forest helps keep me from checking messages until the timer is up and has helped me stay on task!

title: Rewarding
review: Simple and rewarding for being able to put your phone down no matter how many times you pick it up and see you’re tree growing.

title: Very helpful
review: Great studying app if you can have a couple bucks to spare. You can use the app just fine without it charging you after a certain amount of time.

title: Productivity visual
review: This app has one of the best visual that enable you see how product your day plus the virtual coins you earn from being productive can be used to purchase new tree sidlings. I feel motivated to be productive.
