review: I don’t know what it is about this super simple app, but somehow I always am able to stay off my phone knowing that I’ll kill an innocent lil tree if I wanna take a look at instagram while I’m studying!!!

title: Seems to help! But maybe too soon to tell
review: Hoping I can come back and revise this to five stars. Seeing something grow and build because I’m concentrating is satisfying and the incentive not to good on my phone helps. Hoping that keeps up for the long term.

title: Helpful!
review: This has been great during our time stuck at home because it helps us see how much work and progress we are making!

title: Functions well
review: App features function well once you’ve played with them and understand them. Takes a bit of exploration of the app which is the opposite of the reason I downloaded it 🤣

title: Love this app
review: I love this app! It really helps me to stay focused while doing homework. I work with the incentive that if I work enough myself then one day I’ll be able to plant a tree somewhere for someone less fortunate than me.

title: Able to get more done.
review: When I use the Forest app I’m able to get homework, work, and lots of other stuff done. The only thing I wish the app included would be that every time you successfully plant your tree or bush, they plant a tree in real life.

title: 5 STARS
review: i have never had an app motivate me so much! this let's you plant real trees and fake trees just by studying? its just great i've had it for only a day and improved my studying X2!!! i would recommend everyone to get the app!!!

title: Great focus app!
review: Our whole office uses it as a fun way to stay focused and keep us accountable. Plus we’re helping plant real trees! My screen time went down 15% the first week of just playing around with the app!

title: I love plants y’all
review: It’s honestly a really cool app that helps you focus on studying. I can sometimes get distracted and check to see the progression of my tree but my friend and I use to together! It’s fun for study groups or just for yourself.

title: Incredible
review: Love this app! I’ve been using a time tracking app to monitor my productivity, but this one is better. It’s definitely more motivating than a standard dashboard. So much more focused. Thank you to the Forest team! 🙏

title: Super useful
review: This app has been a game changer for studying for me. I get easily distracted and bored while studying, but having a timer and a cute tree at the end gets me to power through. Definitely worth it!

title: It’s good.
review: It’s helpful, but you have to pay for it. Honestly, it’s no different from a normal timer, but it helps you stay off your phone while you’re supposed to be on task. But that doesn’t really seem worth paying for for that much.

title: I love this!
review: I love this app, because you could just use it to not be on your phone, or you could use it to actually focus on something. I like how you can actually plant a tree eventually, too.

title: I love Forest!
review: I’m a college student, and this app has really helped me stay off my phone and force myself to focus when it’s needed! It can be so tempting to avoid responsibility, but the trees are just too cute to kill by leaving the app! Thanks, Forest 🌲💚

title: Yay trees
review: I really enjoy this app. One of my roommates showed it to me and now every time we are in the library we plant a tree together. The deep focus mode is great because it keeps me from getting on my phone. And I like how I can plant trees with friends

title: Excellent Focus App
review: This app has helped me focus on completely assignments quite easily than before. I highly recommend this app for those that tend to procrastinate or simply get distracted through their electronics!

title: Great way to study
review: I’m never able to actually study properly without this app. It helps me control my phone addiction without turning it off. Would recommend!

title: Helpful
review: Since I started to use forest, being productive started to sound like fun and easy. Love using the app and has great features that helps making your study/work sessions more attractive.

title: Forest app review
review: I use this app every time I do homework and it is so helpful. It keeps me off my phone and focused on my work. It’s also a very cute version of your regular old timer. I would highly recommend.

title: Keeps me focused
review: I really do need an app on my phone to keep me off my phone, and Forest does the trick. I like how it rewards you and gives you an additional incentive to stay off your phone, besides the obvious benefits.

title: Helps keep me on track
review: I downloaded Forest because I just started my freshman year of college. It has helped keep me off my phone and focused on my work. Couldn’t ask for anything more!

title: Great for studying
review: I’ve had this app for a while and I am pleasantly surprised by how much I use it. Mainly as a student I use it for studying, great for keeping myself on task. I also use it when I clean and do other chores to keep me focused.

title: Excelente App
review:
Over the course of time that i’ve used this application, my productivity has increased significantly. I’ve highly benefited from the use of this application and would not hesitate to share it with a friend or a comrade. Best regards from france. 

Jeun

title: Digital Break Time with Trees
review: Forest is such a lovely app. It really increases my productivity time as well as my distance from my phone to reduce my screen time. Such a pleasant way to seek distance from things whole focusing on important tasks. A+

title: Amazing
review: I love having this app! It is so worth it! I’m in a rigorous program in high school and this helps me stay focused! I really recommend if you want to stay focused on your work! It’s and amazing app and I love seeing my progress and my tress growing!

title: Surprisingly motivational app for putting my phone down
review: I thought this would be too juvenile for my tastes, but i’m off my phone for longer and longer periods every day. Thank you, devs!

title: A fun way to stay focused
review: I have the bad habit of picking up my phone every few minutes, even when I’m trying to stay focused. This app reminds you to stay on task. And it’s fun to try to fill up your forest :)

title: Productivity Hack!
review: This app is such a great way to get off the phone and get to work. It keeps you in the zone and gives you some initiative to keep off your phone. The moment you get off your plant dies.

title: Super helpful for limiting screen time!
review: I set timers a few times a day in order to limit the amount of screen time I have on my own. It’s super satisfying to complete each day, and I love my little collection of trees!

title: Planting a tree is fun
review: This app rocks. I downloaded it a few days ago so I’m still learning how to work with it. I can tell you that I am challenged to keep my focus by using this app. I feel calmer and it feels good to see my tree grow.

title: It’s actually working for me
review: I finally started using the app after having it on my phone for several months and it’s really working for me and helping me to focus!

title: Brilliant tool in the fight against procrastination
review: This app is great. I can't sing it's praises enough. Since I've got this app I've been more productive and finished more projects that would have just faded away to the land of forgotten dreams. Thank you, Forest!

title: So focusing
review: This app is great! You’d think that a virtual tree wouldn’t motivate you to stay focused, but it totally does 😂. The one downside of Forest is that you can exit the app without the tree dying as long as it’s for 15-ish seconds or less, so that would be something for the developers to work on.

title: I love this app
review:
I seriously love this app. So easy to use, and allows you to tag each tree you grow with a category and tagline so you remember what you did. 

IB Kids — Get this App. Seriously. Makes a difference while writing your EE.

title: What a GEM of an app!
review: My friend showed me this app and it is such a cute way to stay focused while studying or doing tasks. My little forest is adorable and I love using the app keeping in mind that my focus efforts can go to a good cause. Highly recommend!

title: It’s Great
review: Forest manages to keep me focused when studying and off my phone, achieving the grown trees and being able to track my where I spend my time is something I love. The only issue I have is the inability to answer a phone call which causes the tree to die.

title: The best there is!!!!
review: This app changed the meaning of time management for me!!! The simple notion of focused time for getting coins and achieving different goals really helped me change the way I study. I don’t know where I’d be without it!!

title: Surprisingly helpful
review: I didn’t think this would help me focus, but I have been able to complete tasks more efficiently by planting a tree and being reminded by that any time I pick up my phone.

title: Productivity rose to the occasion
review: I like the app, it gives me some sense of needing to earn something in the digital world, but keeps me off my phone or not just sitting looking at it. A few things I would change like the earning system but overall great app

title: Really helpful on self-control and environmentally friendly
review: I like this app because it helps me to stay away from my phone. I can also compete with my friends on self-control. Planting trees is fun as well!

title: Adorably helps me stay off my phone!
review: When I’m at work and need to remind myself not to waste time checking my phone, Forest is a great help. The trees are cute and I would be sad if I killed one by looking at other apps.

title: Forest
review: I love this app! I wish the in-app prices of trees (bought with virtual money) were slightly lower or that you got a little more money for amount of time spent, but I love he feature that lets you buy a real tree to be planted!

title: Adorable and helpful app
review: I use Forest every day to study for university. The adorable trees keep me focused, and the break timer reminds me when it’s time to rest. Super helpful for students with ADHD as well. Seriously can’t recommend this enough. ❤️

title: every college student needs this app
review: This has helped me to sit in the library and ACTUALLY BE PRODUCTIVE. Now I sit as my friends are constantly distracted by their phones every 5 minutes and feel blessed to have broken the habit!

title: Love this little app
review: This helps me stay focused for time stretches at work. Love that it doesn’t completely lock me out from being able to access, but incentivizes me to stay off phone :-)

title: Compelling
review: Somehow it just makes me stay off my phone, even though I know nothing would happen for some reason this is able to control me and keep me focused.

title: Amazing!
review: This app has saved me from endless procrastination sessions on numerous occasions. With a simple interface and design, it’s fairly easy to start studying without having to worry about bad habits getting in the way.

title: So helpful for test prep
review: I STRONGLY RECOMMEND FOR STUDENTS!! I first downloaded Forest thinking it’s not gonna be that useful, but when I tried to complete the accomplishments, it became a habit to turn on forest before I study for SAT stuff. Looking at the trees I’ve grown, I feel really accomplished and grateful.

title: Love the app
review: Aside from helping me keep off my phone, the app has a simple and cute design. I could either exchange coins earned to unlock new trees or save to plant a real tree! How cool is that! New tree update is frequency enough to push me use the app more.

title: Makes a game out of NOT using your phone
review: My whole family is now competing with each other to grow the biggest forest each day! Please keep adding new trees and bushes for us to unlock!

title: Loving the idea and implementation
review: The only thing i wish they would add is the ability to add projects to make it a bit more like a Pomodoro app. Also, the micro transactions are genius and the best implementation I've seen so far.

title: Great app if you study all day long
review: I study all day long. This app is good for that. It keeps me off my phone and all of my classmates use it. It’s almost like social media for people who don’t have anything going on in life

title: Awesome!
review: I tend to use my phone to procrastinate all the time, so this app keeps me from constantly checking it so I can focus on other things, like school or reading. I love all the new kinds of trees that keep coming!

title: Great app
review: Helpful for motivation to spend stretches of time off-phone. If you have a bad habit of picking up your phone and getting distracted by it too often, get this app and watch your lovely forest grow over time!

title: Exceptional
review: I could never bare to kill a cute little tree so this is the only thing that motivates me to study and not procrastinate. I've tried so many apps and videos, but this is the only thing that works. Nice job on the app guys!

title: Great app, has all the basics and then some
review: Watching my forest grow does motivate me to keep studying. I also like that you can compete with friends and your account can sync across multiple devices

title: A gentle nudge toward productivity
review: I use this app to encourage myself to read in 20 or 25 minute bursts or complete other tasks while avoiding distractions. It works well for me. I'm always happy to see my tree or shrub grow and am loath to murder it by giving in to distractions.

title: Love this app!
review: This app keeps me on track when I should be focusing on school work. And I get excited to continue using it because the more I use it the more coins I earn so I can buy new plants to grow ☺️.

title: Study
review: Great app. Helps keep you off the phone. I like that it records the time you’ve studied and that you can compete with friends online. The best part is you can plant a real tree after you study hard.

title: Yes!
review: Whenever I am studying or doing homework I plant a tree, after a while I get distracted and want to get on my phone then I remember I planted a tree and I get back to my work, super helpful! It's pretty easy to use at first and it's just a really good app!!!

title: Notability compatability
review: Although I love this app, I mainly take notes on my iPad Pro in Notability. I really wish the developers would somehow make it compatible with Notability because when I look at any of my notes on Notability, it kills my tree in forest. Therefore, this app has pretty much been a dud for me.
developerResponse: {'id': 2897518, 'body': 'Hello, please try the "Work with Phone" option. It lets you exit the app without killing your tree, which is suitable for your case. Forest', 'modified': '2018-03-22T07:55:14Z'}

title: Study Sessions
review: I personally cannot study for long periods of time. This app is great to set 20-30 mins sessions! I feel a lot more productive and seeing my forest grow definitely motivates me more!

title: Amazing app
review: Great app! It really helps me keep focus and engaged in my work! The fear of not getting of one my trees is a real motivator. The deep focus function is especially important for me as it prevents me from going on any other media and becoming distracted!

title: This app gives back what you give it ☝️👍
review: However much fun and satisfaction you want is up to you. Cool visual/symbolic way to show you how productive you are being.

title: Better than a check list!
review:
It takes a bit to set up- 
Not quite as intuitive as I'd like
Trees are great reward
Popping the bubbles is satisfying

title: Good
review: it would be better if you guys add 12 hours stats feature to the app. i tried to switch time to 12 hours many times but i couldn't figure out how.

title: I love it!
review: I love this app! It’s such a fun way for me to focus on my studies but also not let it consume me. I have the bad habit of studying for hours without any breaks so this reminds me to take care of myself and I also get some cute trees along the way :)

title: Great!
review: I've been using this app for so many years. It just works so fine! It's a psychological trick but is less stressful than putting on a regular alarm.

title: this app + lofi
review: I was able to study non stop for 3 hours using this app and some lo-if music playing in the back ground. definitely recommend :)

title: Love the new trees!!
review:
I get so excited when I see all the colorful new plants/trees that are released. And recently the developers have been releasing new species every few weeks and I love that!

I’m too addicted to my phone but I’ll put my phone down to plant a tree because I love looking at my colorful forest daily!!

Def worth the $2. 

Developers— try to bring back planting the REAL tree for every few thousand points. That was a really great initiative!

title: I’m being productive now
review: With this app I have now been productive these trees are amazing and it makes me want to do more work and have my own little forest

title: I love this app
review: Unlike other app, I don’t have to worry about struggling with any advertisement during studying. Additionally, planting is so encouraging for me to study more. That’s so nice productive app, I recommend.

title: Helped me study for medical school exams
review: I can’t wait to use the feature where I can grow plants with friends, that’s even more accountability.

title: Too many functions are restricted to iPhone users
review:
I wanted to block specific apps while I use the app. But well.. It’s restricted. I’m not sure It’s worth to pay money w/o using that function.
I liked the trees anyway so cute.

title: forest is my new favorite app
review: Forest really helps me focus knowing that if I don’t work productively my tree will die. I also love how well your tree is growing you cannot go on your phone.

title: I love this app
review: It’s a wonderful app gets you to focus and use your phone less.. while you aren’t using your phone you create your own forest.

title: Helpful
review: This app works great! It helps me to stay on track while I’m doing my homework, because sometimes my phone can be a real distraction.

title: Love it 🌲
review: I love this app! It’s honestly super helpful, I’ve noticed that I don’t have the urge to grab my phone when I have it running. So far it’s helped me tackle some monster projects 🙌🏼

title: Keeps my focus on
review: It does exactly what it’s been made for. Having the count down available keeps me aware of the time.

title: Amazing
review: This has helped me to stay off my phone while studying. It has also helped me stay concentrated on online learning.

title: just a really good way to keep me focused
review: when I need to grind in the office this app not only keeps me from wanting to procrastinate on twitter, it also rewards me for doing so! love it, love the UI

title: Something to look forward to
review: I can see the hours I put into studying as a Forest of knowledge. Great app I would recommend to any of my friends.

title: Get this app!
review: My productivity has never been greater. I don’t feel bad for taking breaks from work anymore because I know I focused for a long time!

title: Helping me block out my time
review: I have adhd and this really helps to block out my time but still let me jump around projects.

title: Improved focus
review: My focus on working on tasks is much better with this app. It really incentivized you to not use your phone if you care about ur trees.

title: Nursing/Medical Students’ Dream!
review: Me and my nursing buddies who are easily distracted get more studying done because we use this app!! Graphics are so cute as well. 10/10 will recommend! Worth the $2. ❤️❤️❤️

title: This app is great!
review: I really love having the option to study diligently while also growing cute plants! It’s great for keeping off my phone which is one of the greatest  distractions in my life! 10/10 app!

title: Fun app, keeps me focused
review:
Developers are very responsive and let me know about an update after it had been crashing. 

Would love an Apple Watch integration that let me start a timer from the watch, but apparently they are working on it.
developerResponse: {'id': 18210416, 'body': 'Hi, we have fixed this bug in the latest update. Please update the app to version 4.25.1. If the problem still exists, please email support@forestapp.cc. Please provide screenshots or videos of the problem and your Forest account details. Thanks!\nCurrently you cannot start a planting session from your watch because we cannot sync the planting progress on phones and watches simultaneously, meaning that users could still use their phones if they started planting on their watch.\nWe will continue to work on syncing these plant sessions nevertheless. Thank you for the feedback! :)', 'modified': '2020-10-01T15:36:02Z'}

title: Totally worth paying for.
review: I have a really hard time focusing with my phone nearby, but also need to know if someone is trying to contact me. This app is a game changer—really helps me stay on task.

title: Forgetful
review: Sometimes I forget to put this on when I’m studying, 3 hours would pass and I would have forgotten to plant my tree. I wish there was a way to input time but I feel like that would just go against the whole point of this app lol 😅

title: LOVE THIS APP
review: This app is so helpful! It’s motivational (because I definitely don’t want to kill my trees) and really helpful whenever I’m studying or trying to stay away from the screen. I would totally recommend it!!

title: Great app but there’s a bug
review: It’s a great app to control screen time! But I found a bug after the recent update: the app will freeze if I click on the “forest” option and then click on the left arrow as I try to see previous records.

title: Keeps me focused!
review: Fun way to stay focused! I love the rewards and achievements, they make me feel more accomplished. I also love challenging a friend with the friend mode. It makes me feel more accountable because it’s not just my trees in jeopardy!

title: Great productivity app
review:
I have to keep my phone with me for log in authentication in this online learning environment. But having a phone right next to me is a huge risk. I get distracted super easily.
Having the forest app on, specially on deep mode is a great motivator for not touching the phone while working.

title: Get it!
review: Honestly I’m bad at trying to study, so this really challenges me to study. Especially when it’s on deep focus mode. I don’t like dead trees, I don’t want to be a tree killer! So I keep going!

title: A fun way to keep yourself focused and off your screen.
review: If this is the way I need to keep myself off my screen so be it! It’s a fun app. Reward yourself with fake trees for reducing your screen time and not picking up your phone.

title: Great for anxious procrastinators!
review: I deal with anxiety. Anytime I have to put in actual work for school and on projects I freeze and panic. Using this app has truly helped me focus.  I was able to finish a long research paper and got 65/65 on it! :)

title: Excellent
review: Sometimes I have problem with concentration and that app motive me to be focus also is great the fact of “plant tree” on the time you are focusing. Also the sound of the forest is something that help me to stay relax.

title: I love this app
review: I got this app a few days ago and it has really been helping me not use my phone while I work on homework, scholarships, work, or anytime I just don’t want to be on my phone.

title: Fantastic way to get off your phone
review: I recommend! It’s great for schoolwork and I still use it at work and for personal activities like reading/hanging with family/etc.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
review: After I set time up to I plant a tree there is no going back. This app guilt trips me into being productive, it’s great. You can also toggle the settings if you want to make it not guilt trip you but then you might not be as productive.

title: Studying
review: Super helpful because this way you keep going even after you’re done with an assignment, that way you get things started ahead of time.

title: Forest works well from 8th grade to freshman year
review: I think I used forest as far back as 2014. As a freshman in college, I still do. I don’t use it to avoid going on my phone- I don’t need that. Instead, the tree serves as a nice reward!

title: Makes all the difference when I’m studying
review: I love the music feature in this app, and the app does work in keeping me away from my phone. Highly recommend!

title: Good app for getting things done
review: Works for me when I have tasks that needs to be done, but it’s really hard for me to start. Knowing finishing time makes it a lot easier to start.

title: Favorite timer
review: I love this app! I can chunk out my work day better, and I get instant gratification with the cute plants. I’ve found that I focus much more intently when I know I’ll be rewarded immediately for staying focused on a task.

title: Cute
review: I love the pomodoro method but would find myself on my phone wasting time or answering notifications. The forest app gives me something to work towards and I love seeing a new sprout and looking back on my progress!

title: Cute
review: Love this app it’s adorable and keeps me focused. Also you can get sounds to play while using it which I find much more productive than music. 10/10 highly recommend.

title: Cute
review: Cute app that helps me stay focused on my important work such as school work and also at time when I’m trying to not look at my phone for such a long time. Keep up the good work!!

title: Makes me productive
review: I can’t focus for the life of me but when I use this app it helps me stay off my phone and get my work done! Also has cool features like music rainforest sounds and rain.

title: Extremely helpful
review: Especially when using the ‘deep focus’ tool, this app really helps with resisting the urge to look at my phone while studying and doing work. This app keeps me on task, and that is all that I need. Great app!

title: Love it!
review: I love this app! Totally worth the $1.99. It keeps me focused and my grades have proven it. I love being able to do it with other people at the same time because you can hold each other accountable!

title: Forest
review: This app really gives me motivation to focus and stay off my phone. Half the time I go to check something, I realize can definitely wait. Plus, I don’t want a dead tree in my forest!

title: I didn’t get it at the beginning, but..
review: After few month of not using it I came back and really liked it this time! Highly recommend 👍

title: Wonderful
review: I really like being able to study with friends and have this competitive feel among my friends. I would highly recommend.

title: Great app
review: Cost is cheap (most apps require a subscription) and the quality is amazing! Helps keep me focused. I would like to see more sub grouping options and maybe a more customizable tags, but for the cost it’s amazing!

title: Fun and rewarding
review: This game truly helps me focus. I tend to spend too much time on my phone instead of focusing on a task at hand. Being rewarded with a cute little plants motivates me to put my phone down and stay productive.

title: This app helps me focus much more
review:
I always reach out for my phone in the middle of a task because procrastination wants to kick in, but, if I have a cool looking tree growing on my phone, I think twice about canceling out of the app.

Great idea.

title: Great study tool
review: I find myself getting distracted during the times I should be studying. It helps to get to grow a cute little tree and the knowledge that I’ll kill it if I leave the app. It’s doing wonders for finals studying where every second counts and I can’t afford to get distracted!

title: Great App for Focusing!
review: I use this app to keep track of my study time along with the time I spend each day reading. It keeps me consistent with motivation to accomplish each of these goals every day.

title: Amazing for focus
review:
Forest is an amazing app for focus. I used when studying for finals and it was such a life saver; keeping me focused for many hours. It also silences notifications to resist urges to use your device.

I recommend this app to anyone! :)

title: Cute, helpful app
review: This application does help me focus on more work, especially in short spurts of 30 minutes and under. I noticed today they plant real trees once you’ve earned enough coins, which is very cool!

title: Forest app
review: Forest is really good to prevent you from using your phone while studying. As it is helping you it is also helping the environment which is even better and it works really well as an app!

title: Super helpful
review: This really helps when I need to study because I used to always look at my phone before I found Forest. It makes studying and doing homework so much easier.

title: Helps me focus!
review: I’m a full-time student and this app has really helped to keep me off my phone and be productive. It’s fun to watch my little forest grow and listen to relaxing sounds in the process. So happy I found this app!

title: Really helpful
review: The app is truly successful in increasing focus. My boyfriend and I both use it while we work on homework or when we want to spend time together without phone distractions.

title: A game changer
review: Being able to maintain focus is so important, and Forest helps with that. I could get other apps that lock me out of my phone, sure, but Forest encourages me to make the conscious effort to not open my phone.

title: So helpful!
review: Without Forrest I would never be able to finish my essays or get through studying for finals! And their sleep town app is the only way I’ve been able to have a consistent bedtime 😊

title: Great app to increase productivity!
review: I am a psychologist and recommend this app to so many of my clients! This is a wonderful alternative to the pomodoro technique and offers more flexibility for different levels of attention spans and varying lengths of activities.

title: Highly Recommend
review: As a fellow college student, I highly recommend purchasing this app because it helps me put down my phone screen and focus on any school or work assignments.

title: Has saved my academic career
review: I can honestly say that the Forest app has improved my grades so much as no matter how bad I wanna use my phone instead of writing a paper, I never have it in me to kill those little trees.

title: Helps lessen my phone usage
review: Overall lovely app, have been using it for months now and it really does help me focus and stay productive by keeping me from checking my phone all the time

title: Very Useful
review: I use this app constantly. Whether it’s a quick ten minute phone time-our or a lengthy work session, this app is a fantastic way to break away from the magnetic force of the phone!

title: Great for staying present
review: I use the app to help stay present and focused, especially when I find myself wandering at work or at home. Great to use at bedtime to encourage you to put down the phone and just sleep.

title: Worth the small price!!
review: This app has helped me so much to focus on my studies and I love the motivation of growing your own forest! Also I love the rainforest sounds you can listen to, this feature helps me stay focused if I’m in a noisy place!

title: Love it!
review: I’ve had this for only 4 days and it has really helped my productivity! With Forest now I have more of an insensitive to be studying. I’m growing my little trees of productivity while I’m saving up to plant a real tree in Africa. Would recommend.

title: Keeps Me Focused
review:
You will not be disappointed.

I have decreased screen time to a minimum. I now only use my phone for things I need, rather than it sucking up my tome. 

I also just like seeing my forest grow!

title: Gives me the drive to focus
review: I am someone who is trying to get better at focusing and studying and this app is amazing! I saw a YouTuber called Anna Lenkovska use this in a video and got it for myself and I can not recommend it enough!

title: Forest fun.
review: Great app. I would like to see more options to purchase in game items as to make donating more fun and easy. More trees and shrubs. Remember that there are millions of living animals in a forest. They would be fun to purchase. Keep up the good work love it.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5154078, 'body': 'Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. 
We will forward your suggestions to our team.

Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-21T07:21:53Z'}

title: Inspiring
review: I adore this app. It keeps me productive and not wasting time on instagram when I am trying to write. Not only that, but it does so in a fun and imaginative way. It adds an almost tamagotchi like component and make me strive to keep my trees alive and myself working!

title: Can’t start timer from watch
review: This app is gorgeous and beautifully designed but I just purchased it intending to start and manage timers from my watch, to avoid the distraction of the phone. However you can only see the trees in the watch but you need your phone to control timers. Honestly the watch app is not useful or functional (though it looks great).

title: Helps me focus
review: It took a while for me to actually make myself use it. But trying to develop a study habit is so much easier with this app. I’m making little progress but progress nonetheless.

title: This app is great!
review: I am enjoying using this app to force me to limit my time on the phone. I am especially impressed by the opportunity which it gives to help in the real world. Keep up the good work.

title: Great for increased productivity
review: This application has really helped me tremendously. I use a planner called the “Productivity Planner” that mirrors this concept, but the app made it so much more alive and fun. I would highly recommend for anyone looking to really level up.

title: It works!
review: Great app, does just what it says. I've found it really helpful not just for blocking phone use but for setting specific times when I have to write or work on projects.

title: Great design. Would love interval timer feature
review: Love the design and the ‘plant a real tree’ feature. The only thing I have a little problem with is I don’t think it’s very productive working for 2 hours without stop... Thus those very beautiful full-grown trees are ‘unavailable’ for me as a result.
developerResponse:
{'id': 3445790, 'body': "Hello,
We'll consider implementing this feature in future updates. 
Thanks for the feedback.
Please feel free to contact us if you have further questions or suggestions. :)", 'modified': '2018-05-13T08:37:56Z'}

title: Very Useful
review: This is a good way to keep track of a variety of habits. I use it to create a visual representation of my time spent study. Seeing my hard work paid off in the form of trees. It is kind of awesome, and different in a good way.

title: Best app I’ve used in a long time
review: This app has changed my life. As an ENFP personality I have struggled with time management. Forest helps me conceptualize my productivity and helps build positive momentum with motivation. Thank you for creating such a practical tool!

title: I highly recommend you purchase Forest
review: Great app, really helps me stay motivated to do homework and study! I told my friend to get this app and now whenever we’re in study hall we joke, “I don’t want to study without growing a tree!”

title: Productivity is up the roof
review: The only app so far that has worked for me. I’ve finished reading a book in 3 days when it usually takes me a few months (if I ever finish it)

title: So simple and fun. Love you can plant real trees too!
review: It’s such a simple concept, and this app has seriously helped me not pick up my phone as much at work and at home. A great lesson in mindfulness :)

title: Like it a lot!
review: It keeps me off instagram! I can actually get stuff done and it is fairly pleasant. I wish extra things didn't cost more money- I really dislike in app purchases.
developerResponse: {'id': 32395011, 'body': "Hi, thank you so much for supporting Forest. As independent developers, we have to strive hard for Forest's operation and provide services, and thus, we need revenues from the app. To provide more stable and better user experience, as well as for the long-term product plan, we implement in-app purchases to maintain the company's financial support. Hope you understand! Thank you again for the feedback. Have a nice focused day! :)", 'modified': '2022-10-05T03:03:48Z'}

title: Beautifully designed in every way.
review: The attention to detail in this app blows me away and I make apps for living 😂 so worth the price.

title: Love it
review: This app has been great in improving how I spend my time. I always need a little extra motivation and this has been super helpful!

title: I love this app
review: This app is easy to use. It has helped me to focus especially since you can do it with friends that can help to keep you accountable.

title: Wonderfully creative and effective app
review:
Fantastic creative idea
I can take the same mentality as when playing video games and really grind out a forest of productivity

title: Highly recommend
review: I love this app. It has allowed me to use my phone less. Building a forest has also being rewarding.

title: Amazing App
review: Ever since I used this its been helping me be really productive and efficient. Also the feature for friends allows for competition and fun.

title: Helpful
review: I’ve been using this app for years and it is the only way that I’m able to focus while I study

title: Love this app!!
review: Just got it a few days ago and it’s so helpful!! I don’t want to stop working because I don’t want to kill my trees. Beautiful message & beautiful results 💕

title: Love it
review: Great app, only complaint is that digital gifts should be a separate currency than the real trees, I shouldn't have to choose between the two.

title: It’s a pretty good app👍🏼
review: I am easily distracted and this app helped guilt trip me into not being on my phone. I wish there were more rewards or more variants of trees that could be for free :)

title: Very nice w/ ADHD
review: Even as someone with ADHD I do like this app esp when I don’t get penalized for leaving the app to look something up, and getting little rewards and seeing the nice Forrest hit create is rewarding.

title: So cute!
review: My best friend and I study consistently together and being able to plant trees together makes it more exciting to stay focused. Definitely recommend.

title: Fun way to get focused!
review: I started using this app as a way to help me stop grabbing my phone after every page I read. It’s worked like a charm!

title: Best app to reduce my distractions and stay focused throughout the day.
review: Honestly I love using this app for productivity purposes. Whether I am working on assignments or working on projects this app has truly helped me.

title: I love it
review: This app really helps me track my time and stops me from picking up my phone every 2 seconds.  It’s also really cute, which helps.

title: Great app
review: Little confusing to navigate everything at first, but once you get the hang of it it’s super useful! Been studying hard ever since I got it.

title: I love it!
review: As a hard procrastinator this app has really helped me. It helps me stay on track and use my time wisely. With cool plants and the addition of background nature sounds it makes being productive even more exiting.

title: I love this
review: Amazing! It helps me work so much more efficiently! I don’t know how I studied without this before! Totally worth the money! I usually don’t write reviews, but this one is an exception!

title: Bad at Time Management
review: I love this app because I’m able to put my phone down just to grow some trees. I’m terrible at time management otherwise.

title: This helped me a lot
review: This little app helped me get focused again I wasn’t going to my class then someone told me to get the app so I got it and I tell you my grades want up.

title: Great app, better on chrome
review: I like the app it does help me focus. I would definitely recommend the browser extension (its free) and that one has a block and allowlist.
Great app overall - the design and user interface is clean and easy to use. The implementation of planting real life trees makes completing time intervals that much more rewarding too.

title: Great for productivity!
review: When I’m in a productive mood, I pull out this app and get to work. I love how my distractions are all gone with this app. It keeps me accountable for productivity. I truly recommend it!

title: Could we have a tree about books/reading?
review: Could we have a tree about books/reading?

title: An all round do gooder app!
review: My teenager talked to me about planting and soon it became a family verb that meant our alone time to focus (together) on our work or passion projects. And plant a treee at the same time! How can it get any better...;)

title: Don’t let your trees die!
review: Setting this timer helps me stay focused on my work. I’m surprised how effective it is at keeping me off my phone. The peaceful sounds and motivating quotes help me relax. Plus, who doesn’t love growing some tree?

title: Very Useful
review: I love this app because I don’t have to hide my phone somewhere random, and yet I know I can still focus, and not use my phone unproductively because I can’t leave the app :)

title: Don’t kill trees!
review: Just started using this and I love the user interface. Super clean and since I have ADHD (the reason behind getting the app) it’s nice to get to work fast. Whoever labeled the button ‘Give Up’ is a genius! Happy planting 🌲

title: Highly recommend this app
review: This app has been really helpful in my study and test prep. Would recommend to anyone who needs a little help to concentrate. Worth the money for sure!

title: My Deep Focus Game is on Point!
review: This is an amazing app, it adds a level of accountability and motivation to my workday that I usually only get from working with other people. I highly recommend this app!

title: Great app to concentrate
review: I have used this app for the past weeks and I have felt that it has helped me accomplish by college task faster with greater efficiency. Everyone who wants to accomplish more should try it out!

title: Very helpful
review: It really helps with keeping track of how much time I’ve studied through the day, and throughout the whole week.

title: Study
review: I love using it to keep me off my phone while I need to study since I do online school it’s super easy for me to slack off this way I don’t get on my phone and end up going down the rabbit hole of looking at my Instagram feed for hours

title: Helpful af
review: I love this app because I put it on super focused mode that helps me not even touch my phone when I’m studying - it’s so fun to make study rooms with friends too it keeps us all responsible for our time

title: So exciting to get new trees
review: I really like the app it allows me to stay focused and track my progress! Getting new trees for my forest is also very exciting. I use app when I’m reading, studying, cleaning and it helped me a lot :)

title: Love it!
review: I love this app! It feels a little childish but I like seeing that I’ve planted so many trees after hours of studying. It makes me feel accomplished so the next day I can put in more hours towards my studies :)

title: Makes pomodoro fun
review: Gamifying the pomodoro technique is an excellent idea. Having your phone essentially locked so you need to focus during the 25 minute sprints works much better than regular timers that you can ignore! And it plants trees!!

title: Great app!
userName: c l y t e a
review: I’m a middle school student and this app has helped me a lot with being productive and even decreasing my screen time! I would totally recommend this app and it’s definitely worth the $1.99 :)

title: Solid app for study
review: I really like Forest as it keeps me off my phone and gets me studying. However, and this is more on my part, it’s very difficult for me to use it consistently. I don’t find it motivating enough, but when I do utilize this app I like it.

title: Love this app!!
review: This has really helped me put my phone down and study for school. It’s broken my addiction to my phone too :) I feel so much better after using this app.

title: Great app but more trees would be nice
review: The app works very well and is very helpful with studying and work. The variety of trees is very limited which is upsetting. More options would be more entertaining to look at

title: I’m mad at how well this works
review: I can’t tell you how the thought of how killing an IMAGINARY PLANT really does keep me off my phone, but I have zero dead trees in my forest and I’m on the Dean’s List at my school so if you want to focus this app will do the trick.

title: love this app!
review:
i often forget i have this app to use, and i wish i wouldn’t. it’s very helpful in terms of getting things done. i also highly recommend their chrome extension. 

if you’re looking for something to help keep you on track this might be it for you. if you’re weary about the app, try out the chrome extension first! 

i love all the cute trees and bushes there are. i just don’t like how expensive (with coins earned in the app) they are.

title: Great way to stay focused!
review: As a student and writer I prefer to work in blocks so the pomodoro method works great! I find myself staying focused, feeling less stressed because I’m thinking about one task at a time and getting my work done.

title: Would recommend
review: Wonderful App. Truly helps me stay focused while doing things around the house or even just staying off of my phone while I’m at work.

title: Good
review: I’m a junior in high and a busy one too. I always use this when I needa get work done. Works like a charm. I’d say make an update where instead of trees you paste say a family member to further incentivize and increase productivity but oh well. Recommend 8/10

title: Incremental focus win
review: This app really helped me stay focused and on task when I was in college and I still find myself using it at my job. Incremental focus is the way to go and what fun when you get to grow a tree?!

title: It actually helps!
review:
My screen time was down 70% compared to last week. Amazing! 

This app utilized the empathy of the users(not wanting to kill the growing trees) to achieve control. And overtime self control will be established.

title: Great!!
review: I’ve only had this app for about a week and I’m already feeling more productive - as someone who struggles to put down my phone, this is a great way to fix the problem.

title: Focus
review: I have really bad adhd and am always looking for a distraction from homework or work. This helps me remember that I am supposed to be focusing on homework and it keeps me from going through my phone.

title: Love this amazing app
review: I fell in love with this app from the first day I started to use it. It really promoted my efficiency. I don't want to kill my trees. Now I have a nice little forest and I feel so accomplished every time I see it. Definately recommend this app.

title: Great for studying
review: As a college student, time management is super important. I like this app because it forces me to focus and has some great tools to help me manage my time. Plus, the animations are adorable. Overall, I’ve been loving using Forest!

title: Love the app
review:
I love this app, and I recommend it for anyone who procrastinates or can’t stay focused on a task long term, or who has trouble starting a task they don’t really want to do. 
I use it for studying for college courses. 
Wonderful app! So cute too.

title: Easy and great
review: I love Forest because it's an easy study app to keep you on track. You can adjust the study time to fit you and you can also study with friends which I find fun.

title: Wonderful help
review: I’ve tried many other methods of getting off of my phone before, and this is the only one that has helped for more than a day.

title: Great and challenging
review: I love how it actually takes time to build up points, not pay to play! And i also saw i suggestion for a “pause setting” for legitimate reasons, that would be super nice

title: Really fun
review: I love this app it helps me stay focused and I get to finish all my homework. It helps me stay on track and keeps me motivated because I want more trees. I love the sharing option, me and my friends can plant trees together.

title: Awesome app
review: I’ve been using this app for a few days and it really keeps me off my phone while I work on my homework!  I’m a doctoral student so I have lots of distractions and one less helps a lot.

title: Amazing
review: Great app, it helps you maintain good focus with the “Deep focus mode”. Believe me, it gives you a great sense of achievement went you see your full grown tree. Also, you will feel guilty if you let it die. Don’t let the cute tree die.

title: Helped me reduce screen time!
review: As a student, I really struggle with prioritizing my tasks and just getting off my phone! Purchasing forest has really helped motivate me to stay on task and leave my phone behind!

title: One of the best things I’ve ever downloaded
review: It’s been helping me stay focused and be more aware of my family and significant other, and get off my phone when I’m in it too much.

title: My favorite productivity app ever
review: I don’t know if it’s the idea of timing myself while working is new or it’s just the package. But no matter what, can thank this app for incredible progress in my own personal productivity. Great execution

title: Best productivity app!
review: I love this app!! I use it all the time for studying and writing and it really does encourage me not to use my phone. Definitely better than any other app on the store, and worth paying for!

title: Really helpful for keeping me on task for my college courses
review: It’s been great to have something to keep me away from my distractions while I’m working, and I’ve noticed a significant difference in my productivity!

title: Great App
review: I mostly use this for background noise while I study. I absolutely love the rainy soundtracks on here and the fact that I’m deterred from opening my phone and wasting time, rather than focusing on what I need to do.

title: Amazing
review: Just crazy how attaching a consequence to not focus can change study habits! This app works like a charm and has helped my focus and stay away from hours of mindless scrolling through my phone.

title: 👌 everybody likes trees
review: I really like this app! I do wish there was an options to allow access to certain apps while you are staying focused. Sometimes I need to get into my social accounts on my phone for work. but! Overall I love it!

title: This app saved my life
review: I'm a medical student and I have to stay this app kept me on track and helped me stay focused. No more Facebook or texting. It trained my brain to stay focused for long periods of time with the goal to make trees.

title: Putting down your phone made easy
review: Forest is very helpful at helping me avoid distractions on my phone and focus on more important tasks. Thanks for a well designed and easy to use app!

title: Forest is great
review: I love this app! I recommend it to students all the time! I wish there was a better way to connect with friends as there is no push notification but it’s great regardless of this.

title: Actually helps!
review: I’m studying for the mcat and this definitely helps every time I’m tempted to pick up my phone. I don’t know why I care about a virtual forest, but I do, and I don’t want to kill the plant by using my phone. Great app!
This app is seriously amazing. I always recommend it to my friends that have a problem with procrastination. I have a better hold of my time after using it.

title: Best app I have
review: the only beneficial app I have that I never feel guilty for using. Really helps my time management and being self aware of how much I use my phone. Helps me reevaluate my values and really stay focused on what’s important

title: Helpful app!
review: This app has really helped me as a college student! The app was recommended to me by a friend at school. Planting a tree helps me to ignore my phone and get homework done, as well as to put my phone down and go to bed at a decent time.

title: Phone down!
review: Love that this app encourages me to stay off my phone, while still allowing access if I absolutely need it, and that they regularly offer up new trees to keep me entertained 😊

title: Helps me stay focused
review: This app motivates me to be stay on task by creating an incentive to not look at my phone. And it’s so fun to get different trees and work up enough points to plant a real tree! I was so happy to learn about this app and glad it exists.

title: Helps you focus, especially when you use with others
review: The only downfall is that you can use your messaging apps when you hold down on the notification on the lock screen

title: best app
review:
ahhh i love this app. i’m really bad about picking up my phone when i’m supposed to be working and this is the first timer type thing i’ve used that actually helps with that. i love that you can set shorter or longer time increments and tag different activities so i can see how much time i spent working, studying, etc. i wish there were
more seasonal/regional tree options? like i feel weird planting grasses/apple trees in january but that’s a personal preference.

title: Love it! And it helps
review: Whenever I catch myself being caught up on my device instead of being productive I remind myself that I could be growing trees and open this app up! I'm really enjoying it :)

title: Very effective
review: This is the perfect app I’ve been looking for to help me stay off my phone so I can get my school work done. Earning achievements also makes me want to use the app and study more

title: Forest is the Ultimate Pomodoro app!
review: Love love love this app! The growing of each forest is a clever visualization of the steady progress I make over the course of a day away from phone distractions. Can’t wait to diversify the different plants and maximize growth. A must-have for productivity!

title: Limit procrastination
review: I have really noticed a habit of picking up my phone for no purpose other than to waste time or procrastinate doing what I know I need to do. I find myself getting more done in a day.

title: Best app!!!
review: I’m a thirteen year old and I used my babysitting money to buy this app. Totally worth the dollar or whatever!! Helps me stay focused and the calming noises are so relaxing!!! It’s also so fun to see your daily forest grow!!! Great for adults and teens of all ages!!!!

title: Best app for beginning to control phone use
review: This app is, in my opinion, the best app out there for controlling phone use. An "addiction" to this app means using it sparsely and having more time for the real world. That's what good technology should do.

title: Cool app. Definitely helps focusing on what needs to be done
review: I barely spend money on apps but this one is worth it. Keeps track of how much time you spend studying and motivates you to work harder.

title: Super Cute!
review: I absolutely love the app! It’s super helpful for studying and definitely a motivator to keep going. I always have temptations to get on my phone and get easily sidetracked, but with the app it disciplines me (I’m on my break now as we speak, lol.) 5/5 Stars! 🤩❤️

title: Worth it
review: Y’all, I am the cheapest person to live. But this is the only app i will ever pay for. For studying this is so perfect because you can earn coins and it’s interactive so in the end it motivates you to study!

title: The Best App for Students
review: This app has helped improve my concentration even when I'm not actually using it- checking my phone less, paying attention more in all situations

title: This app really works - I avoid my phone
review:
This app is simple, but it does exactly what I need it to do;

—Stop my phone from distracting me—

When I turn it on, I see on the screen comments such as  “stop looking at me” which is exactly what I need to tell myself I should not be looking at my phone.

Ironically there have been times where I want to make a work related call but, I just can’t stand the thought of killing that tree!!

Worth every penny, and really works!

title: Keeps me focused
review: I've got ADD and I used to have such a hard time keeping off my phone whenever my mind wandered and now when I see that my tree is growing, it turns my attention back to my studying

title: Five stars
review: I’ve been thoroughly enjoying this app. It helps remind me to put my phone down while I am studying for this MAJOR exam I have coming up.

title: Need more sounds
review: Feedback: It would be great if we have bunch of clock ticking sounds as an option to increase our focus!!!! Thank you so much for making this platform!

title: Great job! Maintains focus, as advertised! 👏🏻
review: This app has been a big help for scheduling focus time without distractions. Thank you for an excellent product. Keep up the good work.

title: Simply genius!
review: This app has made it really fun to get things done!  Simple interface and adorable graphics make productivity a lot more enjoyable ☺️!

title: Time tracker
review: Would love to see this app double as a time tracker so that even if I spent the last 10 minutes on a call, I could track it and review time spent at the end of the day.

title: Amazing! Apple shortcut?
review: I love this app so much! I have a recommendation though. Would you please set an Apple shortcut to automatically start planting when I do a certain thing?

title: Vertical Layout My Favorite
review: I currently use this app on my iPad and although it’s lovely and gets the job done, I REALLY wish it can be used in a horizontal layout. I have a keyboard on my iPad and use my iPad horizontally 99% of the time.

title: Great at its job!
review: This app helps me concentrate and having my friends on the app helps keep me in check so I can study just as hard as them!

title: Fun concept
review: Great idea to connect us with “planting” time for ourselves and away from our devices which also paradoxically helps us to be more “productive.”
This app was perfect for nursing school students who need the extra push to study during this difficult time.

title: Love it
review: I had bought this app a while back and forgot about it but now that I am distance learning it come in handy a lot.

title: Holiday trees don’t show on yearly forest overview
review: I love the holiday trees so much. But on the yearly forest overview where it shows all the trees you planted in a year, the holiday trees just show as their normal tree version. This oddly infuriates me because I am obsessed with doing different themes for each month, and it ruins my forest to have all those mismatched trees. Please for the love of god make it so that holiday trees still are holiday themed on the yearly forest overview.

title: I want to give this 5 stars but
review: It would be so much better if it worked with Shortcuts, especially because this is a time management app. Set a timer, do not disturb and then this app opens

title: Relaxing and satisfying and I don’t have to touch my phone.
review: The app gives satisfying results for my real world tasks instead of me looking at a screen the whole time I’m chasing a reward.

title: Keeps me focused
review: I have a unconscious habit of grabbing my phone and looking at social media or anything really while studying. This app has helped me so much with leaving my phone alone. It keeps me focused and goal oriented.

title: Enjoying so far
review: I enjoy apps that feel gimmicky or simple on the surface, but are able to use that playful nature to effectuate actual behavior change. Looking forward to sheparding my forest and becoming an ent

title: Must have for procrastinators
review: Forest doesn’t solve all your procrastination problems, but it helps eliminate your distractions and put you into focus mode. I wish that I could pause the timer sometimes though but I don’t regret buying.

title: Helpful for time keeping
review: I love that I can I can set the time I want to focus and get to watch the tree slowly grow. Satisfying and the thought of killing the tree does make me not want to click away!

title: Beautiful app with a wonderful cause.
review: The sheer idea is fantastic! So happy to at least believe I might contribute to cleaning the air with a new tree. It will take time, dedication, focus and steadfastness—qualities I hope to become stronger in and eventually mirror that of a forest!

title: Love it
review: This app not just helps with your phone usage, but helps save the planet all at once. This is an innovative way to find a new hobby and studying has never been easier. I just love it.

title: They removed individual sessions??? Why
review: You can only use the app when you join with others now. Very stupid update

title: Helpful App
review: I love that this app helps you concentrate on whatever work you need to be doing, I really do, but it doesn’t lock you out of other apps which is what I thought it did. My mistake! I still really enjoy using it, though.

title: Fun app with a worthy cause
review: I’m actually scrolling on social media LESS OFTEN since installing this app. I’ve actually recommended it to two friends. I don’t often recommend apps.

title: Love this app!
review: It’s a super cute and fun way to stay productive while working or when you need to be off your phone for a while. I love coming back to this app later and seeing the flowers and trees grown.

title: Really useful!
review: I find it useful to have something to “motivate” me to stay away from my phone during study sessions and homework. I’m a college student, and I find this app to be really helpful.

title: Love this app!
review: For real, this app is cute and sweet and definitely worth two dollars. You get coins fairly quick and nothing is super hard to unlock. Definitely worth it and very motivating if you love plants!

title: Awesome app
review: This app has been aesthetically pleasing to keep my mind focused on my work and allows me to see how productive I am becoming by looking at full my forest is!  I enjoy this app a lot and I’m definitely happy I invested in this app!

title: It somehow works
review: A friend recommended it to me and its been really helpful in helping me stay productive and on top of my assignments. After suffering from severe procrastination disorder for many years, I’m finally on the road to recovery.

title: Awesome app!
review: Really helps me stay focused on school work! Every time I look at my phone it has a message telling me to get back to work. Really fun and interactive way to track study hours!

title: GREAT
review: awesome if you need something to keep you on task on off your phone! everytime you decide to look at your phone it will give you a reminder to get back to work!

title: Love this app!!
review: I love that it gives me a chance to come back to the app if I accidentally go out of it on autopilot, and growing trees and other things makes me feel better, even if I’m not sure why! Haha.

title: GREAT
review: i frequently get tempted to check my phone when doing homework so this helps me feel less of an urge to check it! Notifications really aren’t that important!

title: honestly helps me focus & study
review: i was skeptical about this app & having to pay for it. but sacrifice that boba you were gonna have (not even) or the extra shot of espresso and instead invest. i recommend turning on the deep study to make it more of a commitment to keep the plant instead of spending too much time on other apps to distract you!  helps me keep track of time and how much work i'm putting in -- helps me stay productive. 10/10!

title: I don't want to kill the trees
review: This app is really effective because once you plant a tree, you don't want to kill it, so you're forced to not use your phone until the time is up.

title: A must have one！
review: When I want to study hard and without being disturbed, I use it. It makes me focus on my work, and, at the same time, do something useful——planting

title: Helping me survive nursing school
review: Honestly this is great. I love it. I put on the timer and it stops me from wanting to look at my phone. I bought it during finials and it blessed me. I RECOMMEND 100%. Seeing your forest grow is such a good feeling.

title: Helpful tool
review: During my free time, if i have work that i need to get done, this app helps me so much, it helps me not use any other app (besides music) while i work. when using this app i tend to get my work done faster and more efficiently.

title: Cute and effective.
review: Helped me study through nursing school. Gives you a little extra incentive not to use your phone when trying to get work done.

title: This app is great! 😄😁
review: If you want a great way to stay motivated to do your work, this may be the app for you! The only reason I am giving a four star is because I think it’d be cool if you could chose which plant you’d like from the beginning. Great app, thanks! :)

title: HELPFUL TREES
review:
This app is wonderful and super effective/rewarding. I do wish you could grow different varieties of trees maybe (varietrees?) to correspond with different amounts of time, but honestly I'm grateful that it exists at all. 10/10 would recommend. :-)

EDIT: YOU CAN NOW GROW DIFFERENT KINDS OF TREES!!!!!!! TREEHAW!!!!!!!!!

title: Great way to stay focused
review: I had a hard time getting into deep focus mode but it worked now and like the notifications to help you stay off other, distracting apps.

title: It works
review: As strange as this sounds, but I do find Motivationen waiting until the timer allows me to distract myself. So I can say that I AM studying uninterruptedly for 30 minutes at a time. Thank y’all for that

title: This app has changed my life!!
review: It is so easy for me to pick up my phone and scroll through Instagram or Facebook for hours and disregard my studying. But this app forces me to study and it helps me so so much!! I love it!!

title: Really helps!
review: I don’t know if it’s just me but this app, was really what I needed to sit down and stop procrastinating. And you can plant a real tree by being productive! 10/10 would buy again

title: Trouble concentrating? Start here
review: If you struggle to stay on task like me this is the perfect app for you. The background sounds and app lock perfectly align to keep you off your phone and focused on your work.

title: perfect app for school!
review: this app is hands down, the best for school! This makes you focused on your homework and has sounds on the app for you to focus on your homework. Leaving the app with kill your tree. But I love this app!

title: I APPRECIATE FOREST
review: I really appreciate how this app doesn’t truly limit you to your phone, but at the same time really does keep you focused by reminding you that you are meant to be doing something productive or social.

title: Love it!
review: As a person who finds it really difficult to focus, this app makes me feel like I have an objective in studying and it makes focusing a lot easier and in a way therapeutic.

title: Actually keeps me off my phone
review: This is honestly the only app that actually keeps me off my phone. Something about killing trees makes you feel obligated to keep it alive

title: A MUST NEED!!
review: as someone with adhd i’ve always had trouble focusing, and this app manages to keep my off my phone, saving me so much time i used to spend scrolling through social media. it really works!!

title: Love it
review: It is really easy to quit it if you want so it is pretty reliant on the individual to be strong and not want to kill the tree they started to grow. I find that it is very useful for me though! I love trying to plant different types of trees and making my months forest super cute.

title: Does the Job and Helps the Earth!
review: I love that you have the ability to do something tangible and helpful just by committing to focusing and getting your work done. Sometimes finding the incentive to focus can be hard. This app helps me stay on task!

title: Great
review: My daughter and I use this app together to track time spent on her homeschool classes. It helps her to focus and stay on task and helps me track the time she spends on each subject. She sends me a tree when she begins each class.

title: One of the best study apps!
review: I have been using this for the past month and the app has been a great tool for helping me focus while studying or relaxing me with rain sounds before I sleep

title: Love it!
review: I use this to keep me from checking stuff on my phone while studying.  I love that there aren't a million in-app purchases (that require real money); they actually want you to earn cool trees and bushes!

title: No problems, keeps me focused
review: I use Forest to keep me off of my phone and productive during study sessions. I’ve used it for the last 6 years and haven’t had any issues.

title: Great app!
review: I can not separate myself from social media when I have to do school work - especially school work I find boring. This app helps me ignore my phone while “planting” something pretty.

title: Surprisingly effective
review: The app has been great for my productivity. It really does make an impact when I have to kill my tree in order to check something. Turns out Reddit can wait

title: Good way to stay focused
review: Initially I was a little hesitant about this app. I’ve used it for a week and really like it a lot. It’s great to watch my forest grow. It motivates me to put my phone down & leave it there. It’s especially helpful in maintaining screen free time before bed.

title: Cute and studious
review: Love this app so much! There are so many cute trees and bushes that motivate me to study all of the time because I want to buy them all. This app helps me a lot with my study sessions and I couldn’t ask for a better one.

title: Awesome!
review: Great app. I had trouble staying on task until I tried this. Even if I forget and my tree dies then I still immediately put the phone down and continue my original task. Great way to stay focused!

title: Great tool for productivity
review: Forest is an excellent tool to use while studying and the interface is absolutely gorgeous as well!! Would definitely recommend even if it is a paid app.

title: supercharge your productivity!
review:
You’ll get more done in 2 hours than most people get done in 2 days!

I love using the timer with the pomodoro technique. it works great together.

oh, and the trees are absolutely adorable! I love planting them!!

title: Very friendly and effective
review: This app gave me a lovely coral and immediately asked me to review afterward. So here I am. It was too cute to resist... But seriously, this app is super helpful and, at least for me, it really works well. It's also super aesthetically pleasing and cute.

title: Such a great app!
review: I mostly just use it when I’m studying, it completely turns off any temptation to use my phone and I get so much work done because of it! Totally worth the dollar

title: My forest encourages me to stay on track!
review: Ever since downloading this app I have become obsessed with growing my forest and limiting my “distractions” at work (mostly social media). I can honestly say I’m a more dedicated worker because of this app.

title: Favorite Productivity App
review:
This is my favorite productivity app. I use it everyday. It feels rewarding planting the digital trees, and actually does keep me mindful about staying on task.

I’m hoping for more features in the future on the iPhone and Apple Watch.

title: Great and Fun
review: I love this app because it makes me feel good to log off my phone. Call me sentimental, but I feel sadness when I kill my growing plants and joy when I see my massive forest at the end of a long work session!

title: Great app, really improved my focus!
review: I use this app when I’m studying so that way I can actually be forced off my phone. I found that it helps me focus longer and that I easily surpass the time goal!

title: Great way to stay off the phone
review:
You get to plant cute trees in the app, and in real life! I just wish that they let us plant more than 5 real trees, even if we had to pay real cash...

Really though, this is a useful app!

title: Love this app for productivity
review: This app is great for productivity and accomplishes it in the most adorable way. I appreciate that they plant a tree for a certain number of hours you remain off your phone. Beneficial for my work efficiency and the environment!

title: I love this app
review: This is one of the most effective apps I have ever used in regards to focusing. I use it for when I’m in class, for studying, for staying off my phone and engaged in society. Overall a 10/10.

title: This app REALLY does keep you away from your phone
review: This app has helped me so much with my procrastination, I can finally study without pausing in between and scrolling through my social medias!

title: Need louder finishing tone and lock screen timer.
review: A recommendation is that show the timer in lock screen. I don’t know how much time left and the finishing tone is so low that I often cant hear it. So please add a louder tone.
developerResponse:

Thank you for your feedback.

title: Beautiful and easy to use
review: Beautiful design and great app to concentrate or just stop looking at your phone. The only thing that could be improved is better synchronizing between the chrome version and phone version.

Thank you for your feedback.
