title: Totally worth it !
review: I never like to spend money on apps, but this one is awesome ! I have a terrible time with concentrating on school stuff but when I use this app I’m able to hold myself accountable. Such a great tool !

title: It works
review: If you like games like animal crossing but want to be productive the. This app is for you. By forcing you to stay in app and giving you gamified rewards it gives you no choice but to get to work.

title: My JD will plant a Forest
review: I study all day anyway but usually it’s 30 minutes reading 50 minutes on Instagram. But now my crushing guilt for not letting the tree die might get me through law school and plant a few real trees along the way.

title: Best productivity app
review: I was using Moment before but Forest is the only app that keeps me on task and off my phone. The reward you get when you’re not on your phone motivates you to stay off it.

title: Great app!
review: This app is reallly helpful when you need to not procrastinate on homework or other work or if you want to get away full your phone but keep picking it back up. Would recommend!👍

title: Thanks for keeping me out of my phone!
review: One of my favorite environmentally conscious, guilt-inducing productivity apps. I really enjoy reviewing the time invested growing the forest although sometimes I forget to reset the timer after a tree has grown!

title: Love
review: Makes the time fly by! Also really helps you stay focused and not use your phone (optional) while it’s on (lest you have your precious greenery die) if you need to REALLY not be distracted. Helps with self-discipline. And it’s so freaking adorable.

title: This app rocks
review: This app is so great! The fact that my actions can have a real world impact through this app is really motivating me to stay focused on a way I hadn’t thought possible
developerResponse: {'id': 31121843, 'body': 'Hi, thank you so much for the feedback! Glad to hear that Forest has been helpful through your focus journey. Forest team will also keep striving hard to improve the app and provide better operation and services. Thank you again for the support :)-Forest', 'modified': '2022-07-27T09:15:54Z'}

title: Great app for staying motivated and accountable
review: I enjoyed the features to stay accountable while working long stretches of time. I would recommend

title: Great!
review: I have a hard time focusing on homework & studying but this app has really helped me & motivated me to do better in school! Plus I like growing the trees & different plants in the app :-)

title: Helped me overcome burnout
review: studying for my MCAT has been hard these past couple weeks, but this app helped me jump back on the study train!

title: Really useful!
review: I am really bad at thoughtlessly picking up my phone in the middle of tasks, so putting this on is just a gentle reminder to stay focused while rewarding me with cute digital trees.

title: Highly recommend for studying
review: This app has helped me stay on task to complete assignments. It has a great variety of trees to plant and helps with focus. Highly recommend!

title: add plant profile pictures
review:
review part:
i love the app! helps me focus and get my work done.

plant profile pictures:
i would love it if we could have plant profile pictures. as in we can pick any plant we want as a profile picture then pick a color for the background. kind of like the way you can pick a (m)emoji as someone’s picture and pick a background color in messages.

title: So cute and helpful!
review: This app has helped me to stay focused because I get excited to see the plant growth and then feel proud of myself for my personal growth too.

title: This app_must_ be installed
review: I first learned about this app, and it is a real motivating app that requires attention. While iOS cannot pick and choose apps for deep focus, the trees are awesome. Recommended. So Much.

title: Yes
review: As someone who has the attention span of a nat and is easily distracted and a lover of plants I can hereby say that this app is a good one. I especially like the background sounds they have.

title: Wish iPad interface was a bit better
review: I’m just starting to use this app and really enjoying so far. However, I really wish it translated better to the iPad.
developerResponse: {'id': 24829840, 'body': 'Hi, thank you so much for your support and suggestion! We will relay your suggestion to our team. Have a nice day. :)', 'modified': '2021-08-31T14:26:08Z'}

title: Super helpful app and cute trees!
review: I’m really enjoying using this and the incentive to build a forest as well as earn coins to unlock other trees. It feels like playing a game while focusing.

title: Amazing
review: I have a lot of problem because I cannot concentrate while studying, I am so addicted to my phone, this app helps me a lot!!! Thank you!

title: The most attractive focus app
review: I love all the different trees and plants you can earn by tracking your focus time. Can’t wait to see my forest flourish!

title: Helps a lot
review: Definitely feel way more motivated to stay focused on homework when using this app!

title: Exciting
review: I’m super excited to see what all I can do with this. Still haven’t figured out the friend feature though

title: Good apps no bug
review: I was able to go from one device to another pretty easily and I love how you can categorize your tasks.

title: Great for ADHD & timed writing
review: I have ADHD and I love using this app to help me work in 20min “sprints.” It also helps me keep track of my paid hourly work, and the simplicity and sweet graphics help keep me motivated. Thank you!

title: Makes Productivity Addictive
review: I cannot rave enough. This app gamifies productivity in a visually appealing way. The positive feedback of watching my forest grow helps immensely to keep me on track with my goals.
This was exactly what I was looking for. It’s nice that you’re able to categorize what you’re focusing on, and even create your own categories

title: Amazing love the detail and really fun and interactive.
review: There are so many features that I am amazed by considering the low price, and the continuation to our planet at the same time. 5/5!!!!

title: Still Going Strong
review: I’ve been using this app for four years and it is still very helpful in keeping me focused.

title: Amazing app
review: This app lets me focus more while I do my work and has reduced the amount of time I spend on my phone. Highly recommend it!

title: Great for getting work done
review: When a plant’s life is at stake, you will do whatever it takes to keep it alive. In this case, it’s staying off your phone. Nothing keeps me as motivated as this app.

title: I love this!
review: Honestly this is like a fun game in my head that helps my productivity! It makes me wanna add to my forest and I can’t use my phone to do that so I have to get other things done, honestly recommend!

title: Love this app!
review: Forest has helped me a lot with staying focused on homework assignments. I’ve struggled lately with trying to find motivation to complete assignments for online classes but with Forest it’s been so much easier.

title: LOVE IT
review: keeps me staying productive and off my phone lol i don’t have a well balanced self-discipline so being able to stay off my phone and concentrate for a good amount of time thru the day is such an accomplishment for me HAHA

title: Good for studying
review: It really helps you stay focused when you are studying . I am some what addicted to my phone so it really helps me not go into social media when I am supposed to be studying.

title: Thank you!
review:
Lovely and well made app, helps me put my phone down to study/rest because I just can’t kill the little trees :)

No complaints!

title: Awesome!
review: I had such a difficult time focusing on my work, so I procrastinated a lot. But this app helped me to stop looking at my phone when I didn’t want to do my work, and get it all done. Amazing app!

title: I can do homework finally
review: This app gives me the wall I need between my homework and distractions.  It allows me to work in time blocks and has improved my efficiency greatly.

title: Love it!
review: I have been using this app for about a year and a half now and I love it so much!! It really helps me focus when I am studying (uni student here) and when I need to get other things done.

title: Cute app to help you stay focused
review: The little trees and plants are cute.  The quiz “what tree are you” was cute.  And the app encourages me to stay focused.  I just wish the arrow to go back and stay focused for more time after I plant a tree was more obvious.

title: Really helpful and beautiful
review: This app really is beautiful and super helpful when trying to focus, especially when work is at home and there’s not set time for that

title: It Works
review: Every productivity app has its quirks, but none of them are juuuust right. I tried over a dozen free / trial subscription timer apps. In the end, the $2 for Forest was worth it. Good balance of features and simplicity.

title: Helps me concentrate and get things done!
review: I’ve been using this now for 2 weeks and I’ve been loving it. Really love the deep focus mode. I also recommend the sleep app this company makes.

title: Focusing made simple
review: As someone who is constantly checking her phone, this app gives me a really good motivation to stay focused on my activities! It’s a mixture of the pomodoro technique with a pretty game! Motivation made easy ☺️

title: Cute
review: I took a personality test and bought this app and it’s really cute. As a plant lover and someone who needs an incentive to be productive, having an app that has a point system to buy pretty trees and plants is really motivating

title: Great app if you want some accountability while focusing!!
review: Awesome app! The only thing I would change is to create more bright trees. Most of them are dark and dull. Low key depressing. Other than that, I love it!

title: Great app
review: This app helps me stay on track with what I’m focusing on, and seeing an empty Forrest encourages me to plant more trees. I also love being able to see a number on the amount of time I have spent focusing on things!

title: Pomodoro Method compatible
review: Great for 5 min stretch in the sun after 25 min the tedious part of art. Repeat 5 times. The app is the cutest and the custom phrases when you succeed or fail...  aced it! Can we get an unlocked tomato plant please? Thanks for the free one ❤️ people are good.

title: Love it!!
review: Keeps me off my phone. For sure. Usually I’ll start with checking a notification, and then I’ll be playing on my phone for 2 hours ... now I’m way more focused.

title: Yes!
review: This is cute and fun! Helps me focus for sure, BUT I did get distracted in the beginning trying to figure out how the app worked and how I could get different types of plants. Other than its a fun way to stay focused

title: Amazing
review: Because of the corona I have been home and dong my work at home and this app helps me stay focused on my work and not procrastinating on my phone I totally recommend 10/10

title: Great to keep distraction away
review: My roommate gone gives me more distraction than I expected. Having this app can help me keep my phone away during study and focus better

title: cured my phone addiction!
review:
As a teenager, I’m always on my phone. It’s unhealthy and distracting.

This app solved this problem.

Planting trees is such a genius incentive, because the guilt you feel when your tree dies is unmeasurable. Plus, each time you plant a tree successfully, you get coins, and you can use those coins to plant a REAL tree. 

It helped me sleep too- just plant a tree before bed and you won’t be on your phone all night.

anyways this is worth the 2 bucks trust me

title: Best focus app!
review: I’ve tried a few different pomodoro type apps to focus and this is my favorite by far. I love that you can adjust the time and it gives you rewards as you go. Love it!

title: Love my forest
review: If you check my records you can find how many years I’ve used it(though not every month). I really love how simple it is and how much inner peace/motivation it brings to me. Keep going!

title: So far so good!
review: I want my trees to grow, it gives me a focal point for that moment when I sit back and just want to check my email or the news headlines, and I don’t because...my tree!

title: Very useful
review: Forest is very useful for those phone lovers who cannot stop touching cell phone all the time😂 Thanks to it, I can save time to work and study. I highly recommend it!

title: Stay Focused
review: It’s really a great app to stay focused on a task and not sneak every few minutes to check your phone. The missing star is because my phone heats up when I use the app without locking my screen. I have IOS 13.3.1 running on iPhone 6S

title: Incentive to remain focused !
review: Not wanting my tree to die is the biggest motivator to put my phone down for however long I set the timer for and not open any other apps !!

title: So effective
review: I use this timer to keep me from reaching for my phone during social situations, reading, and work. I love selecting different trees for different topics and it allows you to keep notes.

title: Amazing study tool
review: This is an amazing tool to help you focus! I use this as a high school student, and it really works like a charm, especially with the group focus feature, which is great for partner and group studying.

title: It really works!
review: Found myself much more productive and incentivized to not get distracted by my phone constantly while I try to complete my work. Highly recommend!

title: Great App !
review: I love this app, it helps me (a student) study and do homework. I am a person who is easily distracted and I’ve become a lot more productive, because this stops me from getting distracted by my phone.

title: Simple and effective!
review:
My boyfriend and I have the app- he can still use his phone, while I put mine on deep focus mode! If I exit the app our tree baby will die (and he’ll get notified I’m not studying)! 😭

Deep focus mode only allowed if you have a lock on your phone, worth using deep focus for anyone who doesn’t have self control (Ahem *me*)

Can listen to music in background and lock phone without killing tree when in deep focus

10/10 recommend 😄👍🏻

title: an amazing app for time management
review: so easy and cute to use, the interface is easy to get around. Just wished i could see more of an overview of my trees just generally and not day by day

title: Love the App, Not the Buffering
review: I really, really liked Forest. However, with the due process of time, buffering and syncing times lengthened significantly. I noticed some days my forest wouldn't even show up.
developerResponse:
{'id': 12598380, 'body': 'Hello,
Sorry for the inconvenience. We have identified the cause where newly registered users are experiencing troubles synchronising their data, thus the inability to sync their planting records, access the 'Store' page and/or the 'Real Forest' page, etc. Please do NOT uninstall Forest if this has happened to you, lest unsynced data is lost.

We have resolved the problem and submitted an update to App Store. However, App Store Connect is currently shut down during the holiday season, not accepting any releases. Therefore, the issue cannot be fixed until December 29 at the earliest. 

For further information, please refer to the announcement in the in-app "News" page. Should you have any questions, contact us via the in-app feedback system. Thank you for your understanding.', 'modified': '2019-12-26T16:02:07Z'}

title: Who knew?
review: I never would have guessed that this app would work, but it does!  I am a student who has trouble not reaching for the phone while studying. This solved my problem. Works like a charm.

title: Great App for Getting Started on Work
review: I have trouble starting on work, whether it be from procrastinating or anxieties from school. Setting aside 25 min, at least 25 minutes, gets me on my way.

title: great app
review: This app is useful for control phone usage when I’m study or doing something require deep focus. My study quality increased ever since I started to use this app. Highly recommended!

title: Great Focus Tool
review: The app is well designed to suit the purpose I need it for. I have ADHD and find it hard to focus when with technology this app has really helped me with staying on track as well tracking breaks. I would highly recommend.

title: No regrets
review: This app did end up making me focus more not gonna lie and I believe it’s because this technique really fits me.I do recommend it plus you get to plant real trees??? Nothing to loose so why not give it a shot?

title: Great focus tool for students
review: I’ve been using this app for a while and it’s easily the best focus tool I’ve found. I’m autistic, so I tend to get easily distracted. This app helped me better than any other method

title: Needs Siri shortcuts!
review: Great app I’ve been using for a while! One thing that would vastly improve the app would be to add shortcuts for planting trees of various lengths. I dream of the day I can tap an nfc tag or connect to my work headphones and automatically pop into a focus session.

title: Great app
review: My friends were raving about this app and I never believed that it would actually keep me focused. But I was very wrong. The sounds are very soothing and deep focus mode is weirdly incentivizing. I highly recommend this app to anyone.

title: Amazing, certainly worth those $2!!!
review: If you want to improve your focus and study skills this app is a must. I have been using it for a weak and my grades already went up!

title: Great for studying
review: I am horrible about going on my phone when I study or do homework and this app actually has helped and made staying off my phone seem more fun and reasonable. Great app

title: Amazing App
review: This app helps me do all my homework with motivation! It also helps me complete my chores without being distracted by my phone. 100% recommend and the “down payment” goes towards planting trees!!!!

title: Good but there’s one thing
review: I wish it wouldn’t have to be so expensive to buy new trees and bushes or I wish you could could earn more coins when you do 30-35 minutes. Otherwise I love using it for when I do my homework. Thanks!

title: Helps me focus
review: This app has been great to keep me on task and to not keep going on my phone. Having some type of consequence (forest dying) is really helpful in keeping off my phone for periods of time.

title: highly recommend!
review: I’ve never been this well off with my homework load. This app makes it so easy to focus and it is so rewarding to see your forest. Worth every penny.

title: Love this App
review: I love this app. I have a hard time staying off my phone when trying to focus on things, and Forest puts a stop that that. Plus it’s super fun to grow trees in a little virtual garden and potentially help out in the real world.

title: I JUST WANNA FOCUS
review: I’m glad I’ve gotten this app cause over time.. while getting things done.. it’s a nice feeling to see your path GROW and when you look back... you’ve got a record of what you have done.

title: Great app
review: This app has really been beneficial in challenging me to stay focused on the task at hand and offers just the right amount of motivation to keep me coming back when I become distracted.

title: Good
review: Very useful app! Wish there was a counter displayed on the lock screen but otherwise I’ve managed to spend more time off of my phone already!

title: A lovely time manager
review: Ever since starting to use Forest my time management has gotten much better and I’ve been able to actually properly set things aside.

title: Good for you and for the earth
review: I love this app. Its real world impact - a tree planted for every successfully completed session, motivate me to stay off my phone. Try it while driving to keep yourself from texting!

title: I love Forest!!!
review: This app is amazing and helps me stay focused and less distracted from my phone. I can go hours studying or drawing while this app is on, and for some reason it kinda makes me want to work harder 😂😂😂.

title: Life changing
review: This app is amazing! It gives me just enough reason not to look at my phone every 5 minutes while trying to be productive

title: good!
review: other than the cost, I would recommend this to anyone. I think this should be a free app but I bought it anyways and I love it! It really motivates me to do my work so I can get more coins and get trees to decorate my forest. super helpful the past few months☺️

title: Wonderful
review: A wonderful app that makes sure I don’t get on my phone. It’s really fun trying to get all of the trees!! I hope to use this more and look forward to the new updates

title: Starts slow, then progress comes fast.
review:
Uses gamification to encourage phone free (and desktop) productivity by keeping you focused AND rewards you (and the planet) for your focus. 

More fun the longer you engage. If this company can respect our data this is a win/win!

title: This is so cute and fun
review: I really enjoy this app, and I only wish that iPhone cooperated with this type of app better so that I could make exclusions for useful apps like kindle or my library app. But forest itself is lovely and I appreciate that I can benefit a charity as well! So motivational.

title: Always on task
review: I can't tell you how many times I've picked up my phone out of habit just to put it back down as I watch my tree grow. It's really helped me be a lot more minful! Recommend!

title: Simple and helpful
review: After using this app, I had more time to spend on reading books and sharing with my family.

title: Love this app
review: No one wants to kill a tree, even a virtual one. I love that this app lets you set different times for your session. Makes it easy to focus on a quick project or something longer.

title: Phenomenal
review: As someone with a low attention span, this app has saved my grades and I love the cute trees that incentivize you to spend more time away from your phone. 10/10 would recommended.

title: Fantastic productivity app
review:
Great way to encourage you to put your phone down and focus! It’s fun to track your progress in different methods and to see how long you can detach! 

Definitely recommend!

title: Motivating!
review: This is such a helpful tool for me because I’m sad when the trees die. Helps to focus on homework and cleaning! It also helps me put down my phone when I have to go to bed. I recommend!

title: Game-changer for procrastinator like me
review: This app helps me to get straight into work instead of going through all my social networking apps. It’s simple and easy to be focused and I love the concept of planting trees and unlocking different plants.

title: Productive
review: I enjoy using this app it helps to not use my phone while studying or doing homework. I like that I can spend my coins to plant a real tree therefore I’m getting work done while helping to plant real trees.

title: Super helpful
review: Provides just the right amount of incentive not to use my phone while studying. Kinda addictive, which is, for once, a good thing - I actually WANT to study while using this app.

title: Love the tags!
review: I love this app! I especially love the ability to “tag” your work, and the ways that data is presented! It helps me track how much time I’m spending on each project and it’s so helpful!

title: Keeps me on track
review: Never thought an app would be so useful. I use this for concentration and holding myself and others accountable to our goals. It’s also fun to work towards new trees!

title: Helpful
review: I have had problems with focusing because I was on my phone most of the time, and this app has really helped me to stay off of my phone and focus on studying.

title: Excellent
review: It is an excellent app for aiding and rewarding focus. It's simple, which keeps those of us who are procrastinators or easily-distracted from being overwhelmed with choice. Its few white noise sounds are varied enough that at the least one should work for you.

title: Simple, but very useful and effective app
review: Was skeptical, but buying it definitely made me realize how much time I truly spent on my phone rather than studying. Kept me on task and have been more effective!

title: Great App
review: Works great, has never crashed, and I particularly like the notifications sent to the Apple Watch. Use this if you want some accountability while working/studying. Highly recommended.

title: So helpful
review: I was already using a timed method to work, but this takes it to the next level. I also love being able to work with friends remotely. It’s wonderful!

title: So affirming!
review: As a grad student, I have a very flexible work schedule. This app helps me impose some structure on my day. It also provides a sense of accomplishment and affirmation that I don’t often get from my mostly isolated work.

title: Strangely helpful!
review: Not sure how long my use of this will last. Seems I find something new to track time and progress every few months. But this app is well designed to keep you on point.

title: Forest is life changing
review:
This app helped me do 4+ hours of intensely focused studying today. The gamification component is very satisfying, and having the ability to track your studying habits is great! 

I hope more content is yet to come.

title: Excellent app for staying focused
review: I love using this app to help me stay focused on studying. As simple as it seems, the “consequence” of having a dead tree in my forest is motivating enough to keep me from mindlessly picking up and checking my phone.

title: Motivating
review: I actually want to do homework when I can see all the little trees im planting in my forest! It’s super cute and simple and makes me feel like I can always just plant one more and get a little more done

title: A life saver
review: I’ve been using this since starting to study for the GRE and mg productivity has sky-rocketed. Great app. Also, I enjoy that once you reach a certain amount of study time, you can actually plant a real tree.

title: So worth
review: I never write reviews for apps I purchase or download but this is an exception. Being able to get away from my phone while also doing some good is unique. Love it

title: Great time management app
review: I like the concept of a “tree” and how the tree can be dying when you open other apps during a mission time. This is a very intuitive and effective time management app.

title: Manna from heaven
review: Just what this adhd overwhelmed mom needed to stop procrastinating and be present in my family. I recommend using the chrome plugin to stop you from bypassing your phone with the computer

title: Cool but takes too long
review: I like this little app for timing and training me to focus, but it takes almost a full day of focus time to earn even one upgrade reward. That means it’ll take me a month to earn even one more kind of plant. Makes the app way less enjoyable as a reward system.
developerResponse: {'id': 3002806, 'body': 'Hello, we designed it this way to encourage users to use the app more. We hope you understand. In addition, unlocking achievements can be a great way to earn coins! Forest', 'modified': '2018-04-02T12:15:00Z'}

title: Helps me track my progress
review: Love this app! It keeps me on track, and gives me something to be proud of when I see I’ve reached a goal.

title: fun app
review: Great app! You can tell that the team behind it put a lot of soul in the app. It help me focus and growing trees are fun! My favorites are animals: you can grow a cat, dog, octopus…Try it! Highly recommend!

title: Super helpful with studying
review: It’s very disappointing to see a sparse little forest, plus I get very motivated to unlock new trees! Love this app for studying, I don’t know how I used to study without it.

title: Great App Help Me to Study and Focus
review: I have a good experience with this app it helps me to stay productive and on time on my schedule when it comes to studying and doing assignments.

title: Use this app all the time
review: This is honestly a life-saver for when I’m trying to stay off my phone for any reason.

title: Worth the money 💵
review: I’m very happy with this purchase, and would recommend it for anyone struggling with focus and/or screen time!

title: Helpful with study and anxiety
review: I have a tendency to get on my phone when I get anxious while studying and this helps me stay on track

title: I don’t want to kill the tree
review: I thought I’d just ignore the app, but I genuinely don’t want to kill the tree! Thanks for helping me to put my phone down and read my darn textbook.

title: Helped
review: It has helped me stay away from my phone and focus more on school,life, and more important things in general

title: Pretty Great!
review:
So like as a college student procrastination sometimes likes to hold us hostage but this app really helps with staying accountable and productive:) 
-definitely worth it though!

title: Great app!
review: Not a complicated app to use and a unique way to motivate you to stay productive. Using the app with a group is a neat function that I’ve found to be a lot of fun as well!

title: really cool study app
review: definitely worth the investment! It really forces you to sit down and grind away on the homework you’ve been putting off

title: Cute study tool!
review: Starting using this for nursing school and I love it! It is very cute to watch your forest grow as you study. Seeing it grow motivates me to study more. Best study tool I have to maintain focus!

title: Awesome
review: i love this app! I have the tendency to constantly check my phone even when I am not studying! This made me mindful to not look at it or touch it :)

title: Great app
review: This app is really great. It really motivates me to stay focused on my work because i don’t want to kill the plants that I’m growing 😭 definitely download and give it a try!!

title: Focus
review: I really enjoy this app. I love the way and  how it keeps you focus by giving you little reminders that make you laugh.

title: It’s fun to do!
review: It’s almost like a virtual garden.  it encourages me leave my phone alone so that I can’t plant more things and there for I do more studying or work, meditate, workout and other things to pass the time.

title: Great incentive for studying!
review: I just started school this past Monday and this app has greatly helped me increase my focus during tasks and limited my distractions!

title: Great app to help free up distractions.
review: Been using it for a week now, and I am really enjoying it how it is shutting down distractions, allowing me to fully concentrate on my work.

title: Love!
review: I love this app,it really helps me to focus and get things done. I do wish that unlocking new trees didn’t cost so many coins. Other than that it is great!

title: Huge Fan
review: This app has been perfect at forcing me to put my phone down and focus and the UI is just gorgeous. Completely worth it.

title: AMAZING
review: I love this app! It is so good for keeping off my phone during school and study time. The trees are so cute and it actually motivates me to do things. I use this everyday, no joke, it’s amazing.

title: Good way to log hours!
review: I like the app. I turn it on my phone and start working. Sometimes, I work around it though bc I’m working on my computer. If I “cheat” I just kill the tree to keep myself honest.

title: Love it
review: This is absolutely useful. Holds you accountable for staying focused. Highly recommend for those who struggle staying focused on any type of activity or even for studying !

title: Fun way to stay productive and off of your phone!
review: Forest allows you to plant a forest of trees while the app is open, encouraging you to stay off your phone and on task! 5/5 stars for this fun little productivity game!

title: Great app for focus
review: I love this app. It helps me focus on my schoolwork and put away my phone to allow for the best concentration. The overall design is cute and makes it easier and more fun to to study.

title: Online work/learning
review: Perfect for the current times where a lot is happening from home and online. It helps reduce the amount of distractions.

title: Definitely need this app for studying!
review: I love this app! It’s so cute and offers so many tree options that it keeps it interesting. This is the only thing that keeps me accountable to my studying.

title: Beautiful app but needs iPad support
review: This app is incredible, and I love it so so much, but the truth is, it’s rather impossible to use on a large tablet that is intended to be used in landscape mode. Please, please, get this feature!

title: Breaking the habit
review: I didn't even realize how often I reach for my phone and how hard it makes being productive until I had this app (way more than I thought!). A good way to help get it under control!

title: Great app!
review: i was skeptical of this app at first because ones similar to it typically have tons of hidden in-app purchases but i love this one! i stay focused without being distracted by my phone :)

title: One improvement
review: I think it would be the best if the countdown is running by this app itself instead of the setting time in iPhone.

title: Focused
review: After getting this app, I now have self-control on getting my phone and stopped scrolling through social media, games, etc.

title: Great fun app
review: I have heard of this app for such a long time and I finally got it. Is a pretty cool app and somewhat fun. I don’t specifically have problem ignoring my phone so for me Im just enjoying the different trees you can plan!

title: GREAT APP!
review: For a while now it seems like my phone never leaves my hand. I realize it is getting out of control so I downloaded Forest to see if it would help....and....I LOVE IT! Thank you for your hard work!

title: A buy you won’t regret!
review: You get what you put into it, of course, but even 2 years after I first downloaded the app, I’m excited to use it to promote my productivity.

title: The missing link in my productivity journey
review: This app has given me a reason to focus. It allows me to stay on task and accomplish the goals I lay out for myself. This app serves as the glue that keeps my productivity regime on track.

title: Helps me a ton
review:
This app has helped me break my multitasking habit and focus on the assignments I have on hand since I have an issue in regards to balancing
Also I enjoy seeing my forest grow as I keep using the app :)

title: Great app for staying focused
review: This app helps me stay offline and focus on my studies, especially with the deep focus option. And what’s even better is that it’s going to help plant real trees which this world needs.

title: Seriously love
review: I have been using this app for around two years now and I love it. I also recently started using the desktop version and it’s just as great!

title: Love this app!
review: I love how fun this app makes tracking chunks of time. I use it as a timer for the Pomodoro technique while writing because it makes it fun to receive a small reward for the time spent working.

title: AMAZING! really encourages me to stay off my phone!
review: I love this app! I first got it off a youtuber because I love study with me’s so basically one youtuber talked about this app and I’ve been obsessed using this all the time for studying!

title: Wonderful
review: Helps me focus while working on school projects and homework. Super simple and adorable, minimalistic yet perfect in every aspect. No ads and it’s helped me keep my grades up more than any other app, method, or tutor.

title: Helpful
review: The app is worth it for those who have trouble getting off their phones. Although it may not help everyone, it’s definitely worth a try.

title: Amazing app
review: Honestly, this is the best app for productivity that I’ve found. I have a problem with staying off my phone when studying, so this has made success in college achievable!

title: Make me productive
review: Now the only obstacle to hardworking for me is to open this app. It is my own problem though, this app is awesome in how much guilty you feel when you kill a tree by your laziness.

title: Keeps me focus!
review: I recently been using this app to keep myself focus and motivated while studying for my oracle database certification. It actually really rewarding and addictive. I wake up each day preparing to use it!

title: Productivity!!
review: This app helps me so much with being productive throughout the day. I’m enrolled in online courses and I’ve been struggling to stay motivated and building a forest has definitely been motivation for me!!

title: Awesome
review: Great app to help you keep focused. It has stopped me from wasting time checking social media when I am at work. It’s still flexible enough for me to check work related matters without penalizing me.

title: Helps me avoid procrastination!
review: Forest helps be avoid opening my phone whenever I get notifications, keeping me focused solely on my homework. I would recommend you guys to try it!!!!

title: Actually forced me to become productive (in a good way)
review: I’ve been using this app for over two weeks and I love how it pushes me to become productive. Unlocking the various trees and bushes is addicting. Watching your plant grow is rewarding and encourages you to be more productive! I recommend.

title: Gets it done
review: I’ve been trying to study for certification exams on my own, and Forest has been the key to keeping me doing what I’m doing instead of playing on my phone.

title: Liking it so far
review: The only issue I have is with the  size of the forest, is very small.. it just doesn't look authentic, so it's hard to perceive a " real world forest" experience. Also, I don't actually feel like I'm being rewarded with a real reinforcer...

title: Forest is invaluable
review: Forest is one of the most used apps on my phone and I can’t imagine using a phone without it. It helps me put my phone down and focus on what is important.

title: Surprisingly helpful
review: I stumbled upon this while looking for another study app, it turned out to be a fun & helpful way to avoid being distracted by my phone while studying!

title: Actually helps
review: Surprisingly it has helped me focus on my work. Now that I’m in college, the work is a little harder for me to understand and with the app, I’m starting to build a routine.

title: Nice
review: This app helps you stay focused, if you really want to. Instead of listening to music which often distracts me further, I play the other soft tones it has to offer. Not bad.

title: Perfect!
review: This app is the only way I can stay off my phone when I’m doing my homework! I’m so much more focused and I get so much more done! Plus I love the fact that I am helping plant trees around the world!

title: Big Fan
review: Forest has helped me so much with concentration- especially with Deep Focus Mode, I am forced to do my work instead of going on my phone. I only wish it cost less coins to plant real trees- otherwise, this app would be perfect in every way!

title: It works
review: I thought it was silly till I did it. I am as add as it gets but I don’t kill trees so there I am returning to my work again and again rather than fail.  The result ? Some serious productivity.

title: Great for Concentration
review: This app is great because it helps me stay on task. Every time I open up my phone while working, I see this app and am reminded to put my phone done and finish what I started. Love it!!

title: Loving it so far!
review: It really helps me focus. As someone who just loves texting back as soon as I get a message, it helps me schedule a nice chunk of time dedicated to my studies. I can’t text till I finish what I started.☺️

title: Strong time management tool
review: This app helps a lot busy people who struggle with time management and procrastination. Many of my big projects were completed when I used Forest!

title: Love this app
review: This apps serves as a physical reminder for me to stay focused. I am a mom, wife, and graduate student. I split my time everywhere and it gets hard to focus. When I can physically see a tree growing I buckle in to finish the task at hand!

title: So helpful!
review: I really enjoy this app. Helps me stay focused. I like the option to leave the screen on so I don’t even bother picking up my phone to check how far along I am on time.

title: Great for getting past procrastination
review: Once the timer goes of, leaving the app kills the tree. This feature is really useful in at the very least begin doing work.

title: Best app for procrastinators
review: I not only use this app for studying, but anything that I need to get done. For me and most people, phones are a major distraction so an app the holds you responsible for staying off of your phone is perfect.

title: Great app for keeping on track
review: This app is great for staying focused on the task at hand and it keeps me from going to social media when I’m ready to quit and give up. I love that I can contribute to actually planting real trees!!

title: Fun(:
review: This is a fun way to help stay focused. And the fact that you can do it in increments makes it a little easier. I know if I can just study for 25 minutes, I can then take a break!

title: Really great app!
review: I’ve been using this app for a while to keep me from using my phone when I’m doing my homework and it definitely helps! Would recommend!

title: Worth it!
review: This app is totally worth the price point it helps so much to keep me off of my phone while doing homework, highly recommend if you have trouble focusing

title: Nice app
review: One of the only apps on my phone that keeps me productive. I wish the trees were more like a tamagotchi and alive, I would feel way worse for switching to Facebook and letting it die. When it’s just a tree? Meh I can’t keep plants alive in real life anyway.

title: motivating!
review: this app really helps keep me motivated and productive, especially around exam season! I love the cute trees and shrubs! it’s super helpful to see how much time I’m spending on each subject and stuff! definitely recommend!

title: Great for focus and staying off your phone
review: I love this app. It is very satisfying to grow your forest and it keeps you off your phone because you don’t want it to look ugly because your tree died.

title: Helps Me Get Work Done
review: If you’re a procrastinator like me and get distracted easily, this app really helps me get my work done. If you exit the application, your tree dies which I think is a great way to motivate people to stay on task.

title: A very helpful app
review: Forest helps me disconnect from my phone when I really need to focus on important tasks. In a time where we are all on a screen for most of the day, this app helps me regain my attention span.

title: Great app for focusing!
review:
I enjoy using this app especially because it keeps me from using my phone (which I'm seriously attached to)- allowing for more productivity. Seeing all the trees and bushes I plant gives me a sense of satisfaction.

Thank you for creating such a great app!

title: BEST APP EVER
review: I have used this app consistently for 3 years!! Great app for high school or college students! Also use it for chores and when I am with friends and don't want to be on my phone, love that you can eventually plant a real tree!

title: Terrific app
review: I’m a college student, and I often find myself on my phone rather than working. This app is helping me to be able to focus on my work, and it is a must have.

title: This app is amazing!
review: Forest has help my productivity in ways that I would have never imagined. Looks like a “game” at first, but then you get the hang of everything and start focusing completely on the task at hand. Love it!

title: Great App
review: Great app, Its very effective when using with friends. Wish they could add functionality where it pairs you with someone in your level and challenges you for a week.

title: Waste of money :(
review:
I couldn’t get features to work. When I tried to use the FAQ feature for help, it would never load. Basically, it’s not worth money. There are plenty of free apps that are easier and more beneficial to use. 

I hope they fix the feature glitches in the future. It’s very frustrating for a first time user who is trying to use the app but can’t access tools for help.

title: Great price and functionality
review: Good price for this useful tool. It keeps me from getting distracted and messing around on my phone. It’s been a lifesaver at keeping me from wandering onto Facebook during faculty meetings!

title: Can’t kill the tree!
review: I really enjoy the app and the beautiful types of plants. I only wish that it was possible to move the trees around once they’re grown or choose where on the forest plot they’re located.

title: Perfect!
review: This app keeps me motivated! I have a limited time to study for my licensure exams and Forest not only keeps me in track but also allows me to review how much time I spent studying a day compared to other days. Very very nice!!

title: Great when I remember to use it
review: I really enjoy this app, and it does help me stay concentrated on whatever I’m doing, I just forget to turn it on most of the time. This of course isn’t the app’s fault. Good work guys 🌲

title: So Useful, So Interactive, So Reformative.
review: I’m in a situation that I have to study hard for university entering exam and this app Made me stay focused during studying and it formed good habits of studying in me, btw knowing that if you focus for a period you can plant a real tree, is so motivating!

title: Forest
review: This app has helped me tremendously! I don’t have the urge to check my phone as much when studying anymore . It has helped me focused and I study more effectively now . Thank you to the creators of this app . 5 star APP!

title: Significant help with focus
review: Dramatically improved my focus on my work. I combine this app with an accessibility feature on my phone to turn the colors to grayscale.

title: It actually works
review: Such a simple idea, but it keeps me so focused! I wish it didn’t redirect me to an entire other login / page to download different styles of plants though

title: Very helpful
review: I use this whenever I just can’t seem to put my phone down but have lots to do.

title: Shadooneh
review: I’ve downloaded the app today so far I’ve been trying to stay focused. I’m hoping focusing is always this easy.

title: I do love it :)
review: It’s an app with a lot to offer on productivity however I would like a bit more benefit on coins and more options on labeling but other than that I appreciate this!

title: Efficiency improved
review: This is a great App. I just started use it but I can feel already that my studying and working efficiency is improving!

title: When can we use this app on iwatch?
review: I sincerely hope you can release an iwatch version which allows us to start a promodora on iwatch directly. It would be much more convenient!
developerResponse: {'id': 24239866, 'body': 'Hi,\nCurrently, you cannot start a planting session from your watch because we cannot sync the planting progress on phones and watches simultaneously, meaning that users could still use their phones if they started planting on their watch.\nWe will continue to work on syncing these plant sessions nevertheless. Thank you for the feedback! :)', 'modified': '2021-08-01T12:03:14Z'}

title: So far so good
review: I have only been working with this app for a day; but I have no complaints as of yet. It works well, is fun, and helps me to be productive.

title: A great way to unwind
review: I really appreciate the simplicity of this app. It helps me focus on writing, work, and school when my ADHD makes it feel impossible.

title: savior for productivity!
review: I’ve used Forest off and on for several years and LOVE it. It keeps me off my phone and super productive. If you struggle with distractions or have ADHD like me, you need this app.

title: Focused
review: This has really helped me stay focused especially during the pandemic. The tree aspect gives you a visual and incentive to stay on track.

title: Love it
review: It’s a great app and actually helps me stay focused especially with their Deep Focus mode. Best thing is after you get enough coins you can actually plant a real tree.

title: Helping me to write my dissertation!
review: This app is so helpful for me to log my time, and stay efficient. I highly recommend it for anyone who seeks for self-discipline and success.

title: Pretty nice
review: Honestly I forget to use it a lot because I just forget my phone somewhere. I think the app is pretty great, it just takes a long time to get coins to get a new type of tree/plant.

title: Perfect!
review: I really enjoy this app, keeps me focus when it’s time to do my school work or study. I would honestly recommend it to anybody!

title: Love this app!
review: I would normally give this five stars, but I wish that I could do increments of one minute, and I would like the timer to make a noise when the time is up. Overall, great app!

title: Love it!
review: Such a cute way to encourage focus! I often just use the timer on my phone, so this app is a great addition to something I already do.

title: Love the Forest App
review: Just started using it and already getting a lot of things done! Makes me not want to touch my phone!

title: Helps
review: I love this when I get stressed out about study schedules. I used it as an undergraduate student but now I continue to use it into my masters program

title: Perfect!
review: It makes me stay concentrated on my assignments and study sessions. Definitely worth paying for it. Plus is not pricey at all. Recommend it 100%.

title: Love it
review: It gives me motivation to actually get my school work done or other things done that I have trouble with.

title: Easy to cheat
review: I’m always distracted by my phone so I love the concept of this app. The only downside is that I can still switch between apps without killing my tree, which kind of defeats the purpose.

title: Great for focusing!
review: I love this app, and that there is a setting where the tree will die if you leave and get distracted (like I do often). It’s been a lot of help so far.

title: Worth it
review: I’m a college student and this app has already made a big difference in my productivity levels.

title: Pretty cool
review: So far I am enjoying it. I really do think it is helping me stay off my phone during times I need to study or work.

title: Love this
review: Helps me focus and stay off my phone. I have started learning and being present again!

title: highly recommend to use
review: This app totally makes me feel good to focus on my individual works.

title: Wonderful app!
review: This app has helped given me motivation to stay on task! It’s so cute, and it gives me that extra push to get away from my phone sometimes.

title: Amazing!
review: Really helps me stay on track! My favorite feature is the sound button whenever I need some background noise.

title: Awesome
review: Been using this ap sense I first started college been a great help in keeping me off my phone. Would like some more features or customization options but other than that it gets the job done!

title: Makes working from home bearable.
review: This app keeps me from wandering from one app to another when trying to get work done. Super simple interface.

title: Cute and productive
review: The app is cute so far. I find myself not wanting to let my forest (or me in a sense) down, so I’m actively staying productive to avoid a wither. Would recommend to anyone who needs some help focusing.

title: Forest is Awesome!
review: I have a hard time focusing on work and I tend to procrastinate on my phone. This app allows me to disconnect from my phone and get work done! Would highly recommend :)

title: A return User
review: I haven’t used this app for a while and just decided to use it again. I think it’s been changed a lot (in a good way) since the last time I used it. It now promotes more kinds of plants/flowers.

title: Yes, it works!
review: I have tried other Pomodoro techniques in the past. This is the first that really works for me keeping me focused. Been a long time procrastinator but this is magic. Thanks to Barbara Oakley’s book for introducing it to me.

title: Amazing!
review: I always used the Pomodoro technique in my daily life to get tasks done and this app allows me to use the technique but in a fun and awarding way. Definitely recommend this app if you want to be productive!

title: Great way to stay focused
review: This app is a great way to keep me focused, which is something I have trouble with. Having a forest that shows how I have focused, and having a tree rely on my focus really helps.

title: It really works!
review: I just realized how many times I have been picking up my phone during work or class. It really works and keeps me on my track.

title: Loving it!
review: To keep it short, the tool I’ve been needing. It’s fun and keeps you focused and engaged with staying on top of your work. One suggestion, there should be more repeating alarms/reminders allowed to do.

title: 10/10 Actually works!
review: I just got this app to help me stay focused on my schoolwork and not be on my phone constantly. So far it’s worked great! Definitely worth the money.

title: Really transformed my way to study
review: Forest has really helped me to buckle down and get work done. It’s been difficult to stay focused, but with the forest app I can now dedicate time to get work done.

title: Worth it
review: Honestly I thought about downloading this app for years but now that I have it I know I should have done it sooner. I actually use it because I had to pay for it. At least that is how it works for me.

title: Oddly effective
review: I mean it shouldn’t work but it actually does. If you are skeptical grab it and try it out. I have thoroughly enjoyed this app and would highly recommend it.

title: Love love love!!!
review: I’ve only had forest for a few weeks but it’s been so helpful!!! I’m a huge plant girl and the format of this app totally speaks to me :) I also love the feature where you can actually plant trees with coins!!!

title: Incredibly helpful
review: If I ever unlock my phone mindlessly while doing homework, the sad thought of killing a tree becomes overwhelming and I continue my work. Overall, 10/10

title: Have used for EDIT: three years
review: This is hands down the best way to stay off FB when I am in reach of my phone.  It lets me concentrate using the pomodoro technique.  I strongly suggest you try it.

title: Great
review: Pretty good. Works well because of its game mechanic, but only if you’re willing to take it seriously. It’s sort of like a challenge, and you get some type of reward out of it.

title: Great for a PhD student
review: Hard time focusing on writing my dissertation. Especially with the artificial deadlines. Turning my phone off or on do not disturb hasn’t helped, but this app is great for setting focus time and allowing for 5 min breaks!

title: Amazing
review: The idea is kind of dumb but once you start doing it you get invested to commit to the growing of the tree and don’t leave the app. I have been able to study more in the time that I have gotten this application then any time ever. Worth the price tbh!

title: Love this app
review: It helps me realize how addicted I am to this phone and I love that it plants trees in real life after studying for a long time and receiving fake coins and then with that you can plant a tree. I just love my little forest!

title: I love this concept
review: Thank you for such a cute friend that keeps me on track. The app has room for creative growth when it comes to the plant life but they are always cute as a button!

title: Changed the way I studied
review: I used to be very bad at focusing while I study but this app really helps me center in on the work I’m doing and I am way more efficient when I am using it

title: it’s extremely good
review: It helps me a lot to not to use my phone while working or studying. Also, I’ve been reading a lot since using this app.

title: This app is great
review: So far it has helped me focus on my work and I haven’t been tempted to use my phone since I used this app. I really think you should give it a try!

title: Great studying app
review: I’m able to cut off distractions on my phone and it’s very helpful when I’m studying, helps to build self control bc i find it sad to let the forestry die if I quit out of the app :)

title: Super helpful & motivating
review: I always have problems staying on my phone and getting distracted, this is such a great app in helping me stay off it - plus you can actually help reforestation!

title: perfect for deep work
review: Deep work was a concept which i read about from Cal Newport and this app really allows me to indulge in deep work without the distraction of other things and the satisfaction of growing a cute virtual tree is an added

title: Great in helping me be more productive
review: I turn this on whenever I need to study or want to be really focused on a conversation with friends and family. The motivation to plant trees, virtual and real, is a huge encouragement for me to stay on task.

title: Amazing App!
review: This app really helps me focus and I like that it has a new feature where I can go to another app like going to check my courses assignments without my tree dying. I love this app!

title: Love it
review: Great app! I’m a student who’s a little phone addicted and this is a great way to force myself to stay on task, even when I need to just have a little bit of off phone time.

title: Great
review: I desperately needed an app to keep me off my phone while studying, and this makes me feel productive. The trees are cute. It’s user friendly. It motivates me to stay off my phone, so it does what I want it to do.

title: Good vision but super difficult to get the goal
review: The app motivates you to be concentrated since you are promised to plant a real tree, however I haven been using this app for about a year and I haven’t be able to plant my real tree yet. It is super difficult and requires a lot of concentration, more than needed for my typical day.
developerResponse: {'id': 10188492, 'body': 'Hello, thank you for the feedback. You can earn more coins by extending the planting sessions and unlocking achievements. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2019-08-15T19:04:08Z'}

title: Fun and helpful
review: Definitely gives me a decent incentive to stay away from my phone. Though I do feel it could use a bit more to ensure I don’t use it and maybe just a few more fun features that incentivize me to do so.

title: Useful and fun —a suggestion
review: I love this app, very useful and beautiful. I wish one could choose where to plant each tree. This would make it funnier to build the garden and therefore add motivation to keep focusing and planting.

title: Rly great but
review: I only wish it didn’t put a notification and sound at the end so u would keep working instead of wanting to go back to ur phone

title: Love at first grow!
review: I am astonished how addicted I have become to my phone. This app is really open my eyes and kept me on track during important work assignments. I cannot rave about it enough!

title: Amazing so far,
review: Been using this app for few months now. Really helped me stay focused during my senior year finals and now I use it to focus on my work from home business. Super helpful!!!

title: Forest
review: This app has helped me so much. Because whenever I have to study or do homework I don’t want to kill my little tree so I block off social media and do my work! Recommend this app!!

title: Absolutely in love with this app
review: I ALWAYS suggest this app to everyone who struggles with getting easily distracted by their cellphone. It helps keep me focused and helps with managing my time, with the added benefits of adding cute things to my “Forest” 🍄🌱🌲🌸

title: Great app for productivity!
review: I really adore forest. I’ve used it for a very long time and it’s helped a lot with my staying off of the phone; I love plants, so forest is so cute and perfect for me! Showed it to my friends and they all got it too.

title: Love this app!!
review: This app is really helpful for people who keeps looking at their phones during homework or work. I been using this app for 2 years, and it helped me a lot for focusing on my homework.

title: Needs the whitelist, perfect app
review: As the title says, the whitelist feature needs to work on the latest firmware or at the very least iOS 12.1.2 (my firmware). It’ll help so much if it ends up working. Nonetheless love the app

title: Life Changing!!!
review: Hi admire the team behind Forest because they have helped me so much. As well as everything that they do to provide a better system for anyone who needs help in time management.

title: Quite literally changed up my study habits
review: Very happy with this app, thank you. Can’t wait to get some more plants and more importantly finish learning music production with the help of this phone-keeper-outer

title: Amazing!
review: A fantastic way to train yourself out of constantly looking at your phone. Great for students as well, specially with all the background sound options. And you get to plant trees too!!

title: Easy and works
review: Honestly, I love this app. It’s helping me focus more and I aim to grow plants 5-10 hours a day. I don’t usually make it, but this definitely is keeping me on task when I decide to use it.

title: Great but limited to 5 real trees
review: Love the app, but it'd be great if they added a way to plant more than 5 trees for the entire lifetime of a user. Perhaps they could allow users to opt-in to viewing ads that'd pay for more.

title: Excellent study aid
review: Highly recommend this app to keep you on track with studying! Great interface and simple to use. Also a very proactive way to give back to the environment.
I love this app so much, it helps me stay off my phone with the added bonus of saving up points to plant a real tree and aid a good cause. I never buy apps but this one was definitely worth it!

title: Fun and cute!
review: Haven’t had it for very long but it’s super cute! And I love that it helps plant real trees. Do wish it was a little easier to get coins though. Maybe the trees you successfully plant could generate some coins every day or something—more motivation to plant them!

title: i love this app😎
review: I have been using it for 3  years and it really makes me want to study more. It has made me a better student. The tree planting aspect is a great incentive in timing my productivity as well. It was worth the cost

title: 5 stars
review: I am 13 and I get distracted by my phone very easily. But when I use this app yells at me to put my phone down. I have found since I got this app I have been so much more productive.

title: Currently on a break!
review:
I love this app for its simplicity and true focus on what the user needs! I’ve been using it for 3 days now and have been conquering my work! 

Brilliant app! Highly recommend!

title: My new best friend
review: This app is allowing me to focus on another level in my life, getting more stuff done then I ever have before. It’s creative, it’s smart, it uses foundational psychological principles to help me stay on track and be motivated. Yes yes yes

title: Will save your brain
review: This app is so simple yet so effective. It makes putting your phone down and focusing on what you should be focusing on fun and you get to plant actual trees!! I use this every day.

title: Most helpful app
review: I don’t have words to describe how much my phone distracts me. I’m writing this review in between growing trees as it is the time I’m allowed on my phone but for all the rest of the time, I grow trees and I focus. Brilliant app!

title: Great for students!!
review: I love this app! So great for helping a physics student keep focused and off Tumblr when trying to read dry textbooks. It's also motivating-- growing a forest is fun and makes sitting down to be productive a little more appealing.

title: Best app ever!
review: It is super helpful to study and be off your phone. My goal is to be off my phone for at least 7 hours a day. Forest let’s me do that and accomplish these things! Super helpful- 5 star all around!

title: I need to use it now!
review: I love that I can go this this app and just start the timer whenever I need to get off my phone and get things done. Like right now, I need to finish my paper.

title: Great app
review: This app does a well job of keeping you off your phone. I’ve gotten my homework done a lot faster, mostly because of the motivation of the app and not killing the tree.

title: Increased my ability to study!
review: I've been using this app to keep track of how many hours I have studied. It's a lot of fun, and has helped me stay focused. I think growing the forests is quite cute!

title: Blessed
review: Anatomy and physiology I and II are the second easiest classes I’ve taken in college. Chemistry 103 and 104 are the first easiest classes. All other classes are just that simple. Thanks to Forest 🌳 💕💕. I feel blessed

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
review: have been using this app since middle school and haven’t looked back! constantly keeps me motivated when i feel unproductive and the cute animations are perfect!

title: The app is pretty cool!
review: I think it’s a helpful app. Sometimes the UX design feels a little lacking as the navigation doesn’t always feel intuitive. Good for what it’s designed for though!

title: Great app
review: This app is so motivating to keep me not only off my phone but focused on my school work. Definitely recommend if you can spare the $2

title: Great Encouragement
review: I just got the app and it really encourages me to study , I love the messages that say "stay focused" and "don't look at me" so you don't look at your phone , it's great!😂

title: Love it :)
review: Nothing else has worked for me, but I saw this on Instagram and decided to try it out! It’s worked well for me so far!

title: Really the best app for studying
review: I cannot describe why, but killing that tree if I lose focus is successful every time. This app is totally worth the money, and really is effective! My fav

title: Love!!
review: This app has been a life saver when it comes to keeping me off my phone while doing homework. It’s also fun to watch my lil forrest grow :)

title: Helping me get through research!
review: I use this app to study with my friends via zoom and it makes working on research so much more fun!

title: So helpful
review: I love the little reward system and I love challenging myself to stay focused for longer in order to get a more complex version of my plant.

title: So cute!
review: I find this app to be a cute version of this service. However, I wish there were more plant options available for free, or within an attainable point range.

title: The best of the best!
review: Forest is an amazing app. It motivates you and makes working more fun! I’m keeping this review short and sweet but without a doubt you should definately get it. The price is worth it.🌲

title: Helps me stay on track
review: This app helps me stay away from my phone and not check it aimlessly every awake minute of my life.

title: Motivating
review: This gamifies pomodoro in a way that helps me keep from just turning it off.  This is proving to be much more effective than my last app.

title: Cute app
review: Really improved my focus especially after having college online. Worth it!

title: Good but there should be a pause option
review: Amazing app, however I would prefer if there were a pause option when growing a tree.

title: Great look and feel!!
review: Does what it says, has a focus timer and it’s really nice seeing the tree grow again! Really happy with the widgets too!

title: Would recommend
review: Helps me focus on my schoolwork when I’m struggling. Really like how we can write down what’s on our mind too

title: Helps a lot if you hav adhd.
review: As someone who struggles with adhd this helps me to study better for sure. That paired with it being a game that is genuinely enjoyable. Great idea, highly recommend.

title: Great for online classes during quarantine
review: This app rocks, online classes are hard if you aren’t disciplined with your phone usage :)

title: It WORKS!
review: It is not only good when your keeping yourself accountable but also when your working as a group.

title: Worth it
review: Best two dollar app I ever bought! It really helps me be more productive and not get on my phone. This is just the right app for that bit of inspiration that you need!!

title: Great to help focus
review: Really good app for helping me put down my phone and concentrate on other things for a bit.  I enjoy growing the trees and I’m looking forward to earning enough coins to plant one in real life.

title: Sign up problem!
review:
This is a good app and all, but the big problem is I can not sign up! 

When I tap to enter my birth date, the keyboard goes down and nothing else shows up that I can type my birthdate! And there is no Gmail or Facebook sign up option in the app which I really was expecting from the ‘best app in two years’ which I have just pay two bucks for.

title: Good but not perfect
review: Great app, but I’d really like an option to add time to an already existing timer. I’d also like a more pertinent notice that your timer has ended, because I’ll have my phone on the side and have no idea I need to reset it.

title: love it
review: Love this app i especially appreciate the note tool so that when i’m working and get a random thought i can jot it down rather than lose focus

title: Keeps me on track!
review: Absolutely recommend especially for students that need to stay off their device! And you can plant a real tree!

title: Definitely helped me focus on my task
review: Cute graphics. Makes me earn those cute plants and trees in my forrest lol kind of like farmville but you earn the plants by doing your task and not picking up your phone.

title: Helps Me Focus
review: I love seeing my trees grow and I have become a productive worker through this app! I manage to stay off my phone because I am determined to grow as many trees as possible.

review: I have ASD and ADHD, and executive dysfunction is a huge issue for me. Forest has helped me immensely when it comes time to actually sit down and work by keeping me off my phone and iPad.

title: Amazing
review: I️ never focused so much in my life, it allows me to focus both inside and out of school, and it is very cute because I️ am able to grow my own tree, while supporting a good cause

title: Great app

title: Definitely Helps!
review: It’s helping me to avoid going back to my phone every 5 minutes. The white noise feature is super helpful in drowning the noise of my roommates.

title: Nice visual reminder
review: Good way to keep yourself on task. I’m still learning how to use the feature of the app but I like that the timer keeps me from mindlessly checking my phone

title: Awesome procrastination distraction
review: Been procrastinating for months now but this app helps me overcome that habit.  Although there’s other apps out there like this one- the UI on this really helps limit my distractions; kuddos to the devs! :)

title: Helps me focus!
review: Amazing app that lets you change your work pattern by putting down your phone! Only thing is the app somehow exits for no reason sometimes

title: Excellent for time management
review: Such a creative way to help those who need to focus on something but get distracted by their phones (which is me 😂). I’m glad I made the $2 purchase for this app!

review: She has had a problem with focus and now, she is getting homework done and reading more. I got the app just for fun to support her AND it is helping me, too!

title: Great for motivation issues
review: As a person that struggles to stay on task and to get motivated when it comes to doing homework or general studying, this app helps me quite a bit !

title: JauntyJanan14
review:
Good self-motivator.
Not sure if it’s worth $1.99, but most self-help management apps are that price, so it’s reasonable.
It provides a fun incentive to get your work done.
If your someone like me, you have a desire to be disciplined but no incentive or drive. This app is the answer to that!

title: Great app
review: This app helped me a lot with focusing on studying and schoolwork. The only downside is that the whitelist option isn’t compatible with my iPad, but other than that I highlighted recommend it!

title: So great for students!
review: Seriously, it helps that compulsive need to check THE APPS. Would highly recommend for when you need time to focus on something.

title: Simple and effective
review: This is one of my favorite apps. I use it every day while I work. It's simple and effective. I love the feature to plant actual trees somewhere in the world. The earth needs the help.

title: So cute!
review: This really helps me with staying productive. I have focusing issues and have a bad habit of aimlessly scrolling on my phone. This app kind of feels like a game, and really forces me to do productive things like read.

title: Great for adhd
review: I have adhd and I get very distracted by my phone, and this helps keep me from using it too much when I have something to do because I don’t want to kill my tree

title: Great app that serves a purpose - keeping me off my phone
review: That’s about all there is to it - it incentivizes me to not looking at my phone by killing a digital tree every time I look at my phone. Save the trees!

title: So helpful!!!
review: This app has been amazing to use during finals week! It helps me focus and finally sit down and study without procrastinating and checking my phone!

title: LOVE THIS APP!!
review: I downloaded this app because I thought it looked interesting and now it’s one of my favorite apps! Helps me to stay focused on work. It also helps the environment! 10/10 stars for sure!!!

title: i like the point and it really does help
review: it helps me stay focused and i don’t even look at my phone.I use it mainly when i’m studying to keep me from going into apps.

title: Week start on ?
review:
Hello, 
The application has the option of “week start on Monday” but there is no way to set the start of the week on Saturday :) please add this option too. Thank you 🙏🏻

title: Love it
review: I use this anytime I study. Makes you feel guilty when you kill a tree because you tried to play on your phone. Great for students & anyone that’s studying.

title: Amazing!
review: This app is so useful it really helps when I'm trying to get work in for an exam and it couldn't be happier. Just wish i could unlock new trees a bit faster.

title: Great if you’re a procrastinator like me
review: I always find myself getting distracted by my phone when I need to do work. This app is awesome in helping restore motivation and eliminating distractions. Plus the trees are cute.

title: Really helps during studying
review: I use this all the time when studying for long periods of time. It helps me focus as well as not want to kill the cute little trees! I’ve found it sooo helpful! 🌳🌲

title: I’m here for the tree
review: I was promised a free tree if I wrote a review and honestly I got nothing bad to say about the app. It motivates me to work and keeps me focused with the promise of both fake and real trees. I’ve been saving up my coins to purchase a real tree and am super close to getting it

title: Love
review: I love this app. I am very easily distracted, but also when I get absorbed into something I find it hard to get out. This app helps me find balance and encourages me to be productive. Plus, it’s design is cute.

title: Love this app!
review: It’s helped me track how much I do and don’t focus and it’s helped keep me motivated to see my little forest grow alongside everything on my to do list getting checked off!

title: Keeps me on track
review: Motivates me to study because I want my forest to be pretty and nice 😅 Makes me also want to study in longer increments for the coins so I can unlock more trees and shrubs. Dont forget to take breaks!

title: Fun and Useful
review: I find this app useful for focus and fun to use. The tree planting theme is motivating in a way I find more engaging than other pomodoro apps. That probably won't be the case for everyone, but it works for me.

title: Fantastic
review: Really helps me study and focus, I love the cute trees so much that I study a lot more! And I hate killing trees! Overall I think there is literally nothing wrong with this app! I definitely recommend!

title: the best app ever
review:
This is a great app ,but if you open camera from lock screen while counting, the count will stop. Be careful.
You can quit stop count function from settings.

title: Love this app
review: It’s simple. However, it makes you feel like to need to keep working. If a problem shows up and you need to exit out. No Big Deal

title: Finally a fun “game” to help me focus
review: Making my own little forest, collecting coins by staying focused is really motivating to keep studying, keep buying new trees and competing with friends on who has the biggest, most beautiful forest.

title: Definitely suggest
review: Not only are you being more productive, but you’re also working to make the planet a better place!

title: Still the Best
review: Ive been using this app for several years now whenever I need to stay focused. Simple, to the point, but with the added benefit of saving trees and the environment as you go.

title: A great app for concentration!
review: This app really helps me stay focused when I’m trying to get my work done. It has helped me stay less stressed and attached to using my phone and social media.

title: Amazing App
review: This app is really good for when you wanna take time to do something without procrastinating on your Phone or just want to take time away from your phone.

title: Awesome!
userName: わたしのきんぜるです
review: This app is fantastic for people who are motivated by keeping streaks and hate losing rewards when they fail. I have noticed a significant change in my focus since I have used Forest. Great work!

title: Best way to focus!

title: Review
