title: Love this app!
review: I really love this app. I’ve been using it for a few years now and it’s extremely helpful for getting work done. The trees and bushes the offer are all really pretty or cute too!

title: Great!
review: It does what it is set out to do! As long as I turn it on I can accomplish the task I have at hand. My only complaint is to get a different tree you must have 500 coins but at the end of every session you only receive 9 coins.

title: Helps me focus on critical tasks.
review: Time spent on my phone has dropped drastically thanks to the silly, yet effective desire to grow more trees and have a flourishing forest that signifies work I’ve done in other areas of my life.

title: Super helpful!
review: I love this app, it really helps me get off my phone and get work done! If you leave the app you kill the tree And Since I am a major plant lover I absolutely can’t kill the trees. So it works really well. Love love love it!!

title: Love this app
review: This app has changed the way I study and work, I can actually label and record what I do during the day and then reflect on where I need to put more of my efforts.

title: Love it!
review: I really live this app. It's very helpful and thr UI has improved since the first time I started using it! I just don't like the restriction it has on not letting the timer to go above 2 hours!

title: Helping me stay focused
review: This app is amazing! It helps me stay off my phone by giving me the incentive to plant my own little forest and providing goals for me the reach. Plus, the option to plant real trees is a huge motivator

review: I’m a college student who struggles to get work done; I get distracted so easily, but having this app definitely helps keep me in the zone (mainly because I feel guilty when I kill a bush/tree 😂)

title: Productivity at its finest
review: It’s an enjoyable app packed with delightful features. I simply adore how one is able to plant r e a l trees. Not only does this app encourage its’ users to be productive, they also work to fight against deforestation a n d poverty! I’d rate it 6/5 if I could :)

title: So helpful!
review: This is a perfect app to use in conjunction with Bookly (reading tracker app). I definitely enjoy earning enough to plant trees, but wish that it didn’t take so many coins to get to one. (I forego using coins on the cosmetic, in-game plants in order to save for actual tree planting.)

title: My new favorite app

title: So helpful

title: Incredibly useful.
review: If you’re like me and have Adult ADHD, give this a try. The key for me is it’s simplicity, and yes – i’m motivated by it’s silly but cute positive reinforcement. I hope it works as well for you. One World - We’re all in this together!

title: Highly recommended!

title: Brilliant!

Fantastic concept, well executed. It’s free, but, has affordable in-app purchases that make staying focused, FUN and rewarding.

I’m a huge fan! I’ve been more focused and productive!

title: Awesome App!

review: I tend to chase shiny objects or hyper-focus and forget to come up for air. It’s early in implementation, but the achievement motivators are helping me stay on task and the “take a break” clock reminds me to step away and return refreshed.

title: Cure my adhd
review: So good this app has helped my life and saved me and my concentration bc I have adhd and my brain doesn’t work that well so this app basically cures it and I don’t even need medicine or anything.

title: Building your garden of focus
review: I’ve always had trouble not being distracted while reading or working. This app gamifies my experience and gets me eager to read and write.

title: Great way to take a break from your phone
review: Love watching my forest grow, and seeing how much more I’m getting accomplished, while also supporting a company that’s helping the environment.

title: best app for being focused for the long run
review: I’ve had this app for a while, i thought i would not use it anymore. It’s been a year and it’s become a habit. love this!!

title: Need to have the ability to re-adjust time
review:
This app is very, very great. Definitely 5/5 stars to the majority of people. But, 3/5 stars for me.

I want the ability to re-adjust each time spent on focusing. 

For example: I enabled “count exceeded time” in the app setting and used 30 mins timer for studying. Then after studying for only 30 minutes, I forgot to stop the timer and, instead, went 50+ minutes rather than 30 mins. This ruins the accuracy of my tracked time. 

Perhaps take back my 1 coin for every 6 min re-adjustment.
developerResponse: {'id': 16239406, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for the advice. We will take it into consideration. Please feel free to let us know if you have other questions or suggestions. -Forest', 'modified': '2020-06-26T12:56:50Z'}

title: LOVE THIS APP
review: First of all, It really helps me focus when I’m doing work and there are lots of cool features like different skins and other things and if I were you I would buy this app too!

title: Review
review: I love this app makes me feel productive. Wish it would tell you when you unlock the other diversity and would include Forrest life and have different terrain like dessert would be cool.

title: Love this app
review: I really love this app because I personally use it to stay off of my phone. With the incentive to plant trees, I love plants and nature. The idea is brilliant, but seriously; it gets me OFF my phone, my biggest distraction. Big love

title: I LOVE this app!
review: This app has been such a game changer for me when studying. If you have a hard time not reaching for your phone while studying you need this, and it’s worth the $2. :)

title: Super helpful
review: E learning has left me super unfocused, but this app has helped me get back on track. I feel really bad killing the little tree so it’s honestly been the only thing to keep me on task

title: Helps me
review:
This app helps me focus most of the time. And keeps me off my phone when doing work. I wish there was a worse consequence when canceling the time so I feel even more motivated.

Still great though!

title: Works wonders!
review: I have actually been getting work done using this app. Especially now with e-school, staying focused has never been this easy!

title: Great app
review: Helped keep me focused on college and not on my phone when I was studying. I still use it when my screen time gets high on any given week.

title: Amazing
review: This app has keep me focusing throughout teaching during the coronavirus pandemic. Not only does it allow to pace my lessons but also allows to focus all my thoughts on what I am doing.

title: Very helpful
review: I only just started using this today, and it has already been so helpful. I have gotten so much more work that, and I get a cute plant reward.

title: No alarm
review: This app is great but it won’t make an alarm noise when my tree is done growing unless I turn off do not disturb. I want do not disturb on when I’m trying to work, obviously, so that I’m not distracted by messages but would like to be notified when my focus time is up. This is a big detractor from the app. Will change my review if this is fixed because I love it otherwise.

title: Worth it!
review: This helps me keep focused on all of my work, especially now that I’ve been converted to online courses. 10/10 would so recommend 🤩

title: My Honest Review
review: As a young scholar, I appreciate this app. It provides me focus when studying and I love the tree feature. For the most part, I don't have any complaints this app is very beneficial and great to use.

title: I LOVE THIS
review: suuuuuper good for trying to stay on task working on homework or studying!! highly recommend!!!! i love being able to just let my phone sit aside and grow a little tree it’s my favorite!

title: Love it
review: I like how this app can make you more productive and get you off your phone to focus on something other than social media or videos

title: It pretty good
review: The only thing I would do is have a mode when u lock yourself into the app and they only app u can use is messages and text but on there wide it really helps me get my homework done pretty fast

title: Has helped for years!
review: I love this app because it has helped me stay focused: especially in school. I think it really works, I wish there were ways to set the clock until a certain time (i.e. 10:00 PM or 10:00 AM).

title: Keeps me focused
review: I try to keep myself focused with this app and whenever I pull up my phone while studying I see the tree and remind myself not to get off track.

title: Great app
review: Good way to set up a habit reward system. Before a habit is established it’s nice to have a reward for a routine that tracks progress and also isn’t something like a candy bar.

title: So fun!
review: My study buddy and I use this app to help keep focused. It’s also turned into a friendly competition to see whose Forest is better. Only downside is the app is kind of slow sometimes. But 10/10 would recommend

title: I love it!
review: It really help me focus on my important work I need to do. I get really interested on growing my trees which motivates me more!! 10/10 would recommend to my friends and family! ❤️

title: Works
review: I’m easily distracted by my phone during study time. This app helps me stay on track and is rewarding. My productivity level has increased and it is nice to see progress.

title: Forest Really Helps!
review: Some “productivity” apps I’ve tried have only added more distractions to my day. But Forest is simple, lightweight, and fun. I recommend it to anyone who struggles with staying on track.

title: Perfect for gaming life
review: I was playing mobile games more than a days worth of work hours each week. Forest has helped me to level up at life.

title: Helps me focus!
review: Such an amazing, simple app. Helps me remember that I should focus on only the task at hand. Definitely recommend for people who want to keep track of their progress.

title: Helps me focus
review: I’ve been using forest for a few years now and there is a noticeable change in the amount of idle time I spend on my phone!

title: Love love love
review: I love using this app while studying. It really kept me off my phone which has been the hardest thing to do during my study session.  Thanks to you I get my homework done!

title: Great Study Tool
review: This is an incredibly useful utility for students who are looking to get the most out of their study time. Using this for a difficult or lengthy test study session is motivational and timely.

title: Productivity Game Changer
review: This app has made me so productive. It keeps me off my phone when I need to study and is so rewarding. Love to see how much I stayed focused for a day and makes me strive for more the next day.

title: Keep me focus
review: Great app to keep your phone away when studying & challenge with your friends who also have the app. I would recommend.

title: Love this!
review: I totally recommend this to anyone looking for extra motivation to stay focused on schoolwork! Keeps me off my phone, which can be a huge issue for me. 5 stars😍

title: Love it
review: I am writing my dissertation and this helps me stay focused and keep track of how much time I've spent working. I really like all the different kinds of trees they offer for your digital forest.

title: Nice app
review: I downloaded this app from a recommendation from another college student. It’s a very simple app and give you something to work for while keeping you on task. The sounds are also a great feature to use.

title: This is my most favorite app ever!
review: This app allows me to be productive and genuinely motivates me because through using this app, I can eventually plant a tree. I am so ecstatic to continue living a more productive life towards my dream!!!

title: Love It!!!
review: I truly love this app. It keeps me on task and is easy to use. I love the group build functionality and the possibility of building real trees with the coins I amass from staying focused. This is the one time I don’t miss the forest for the trees. 😊

title: Simple, elegant, useful
review:
I love this app! I’ve used it for years and it’s simple design allows you to use it but not get dragged into it. 

And what a simple but effective way to stay focused: keep this little tree alive — I love it!

title: Love this app
review: This app has helped me stay focused and on task as well as see the value in the time I spend working, through tracking . I love the mission and purpose behind this app!

title: Best studying tool
review: I struggle from getting my self to study and this app forces me to because I like the see the progress of the tree growing and that there is a countdown to when I can take a break.

title: Weirdly works
review: I love this app. It helps me focus while working at home. My only complaint is sometimes I need access to my emails via my phone, but it does it’s job. So 5-stars from me!

title: Very Helpful
review: This app has been very helpful with keeping me from distracting myself with my phone when I’m doing work. Something about killing the tree makes me hesitate.

title: Must have
review: Being a college student, there are many things to do, but also so many distractions. This app allows me to be much more productive while helping to plant trees!

title: Love it!
review: This app is so simple and really helps me stay on task. I can just set it and focus on my work. It’s really motivating to make it to the end of my timer because I don’t want to see my tree die!

title: Forest is the best
review: Honestly it keeps me motivated and on track when I have a lot to get done and I don’t want to do it. The tree options are so cute and the sound effects are relaxing.

title: Such a brilliant app!
review: Because of this app, I have been motivated to get everything done, just because I don’t want any dead trees in my garden. 10/10 would recommend

title: Forest is great!
review: It helps me get focused and stay focused; my only complaint is that you can only set a timer for up to two hours! Maybe that’s a good thing for some but I would appreciate a longer timespan. Otherwise I love the app to pieces!

title: This is the best app idea ever
review: I have never felt the need to write a review before. I think this app is brilliant. It speaks to a person’s emotions - I never want to kill my tree. It’s effective and fun and all my friends love it - thanks so much 🌸

title: Focus made easy
review: I started using Forest after receiving a Traumatic Brain Injury. One side effect of recovery is focus. This app allows me to track my time and gives me motivation to get my work done.

title: Staying focused
review: This app has helped me to not only stay focused when doing homework and studying, but to stay focused in other aspects of life and to be present! I love this app and it is worth the download

title: Useful for productivity and very pleasing
review: This helps me not just focus but also to lower how many times I check my messages, which is something I need very desperately

title: Very good
review: I like this app a lot. It helps me focus and I like that it has sound to help concentrate. But what I don’t like is that it only has one type of sound and the others u have to pay for. But other than that an amazing app.

title: Amazing !
review: Finals are coming up and this app has really helped me stay concentrated! It also keeps me motivated. I also love how we get a chance to build enough money to plant an actual tree.

title: Its really useful!
review: I like that it keeps me focused on my own projects. I realize I glance at my phone a little too often and this is really useful in keeping me more focus on my work.

title: Pretty good!
review: Honestly, I had my doubts but it really helps if you want to focus on something but impulsively pull up certain apps whenever you open your phone

title: Effective app that gives back!
review: Forest is an amazing app that helps you focus on tasks while planting trees. They help you and give back to the earth. I highly recommend this app to everyone!

title: Motivational, but growing forests with friends need improvement.
review: Please improve the ‘create room’ function. When working with friends, the prompt to join a room only appears ~25% of the time. Entering the room codes is a pain. But overall a nice app!

title: Amazing, fun, motivational
review: Been on this app for a few months. It has helped so much with my phone usage habits. I recommend to anyone looking for a motivational tool that will help you be more present.

title: Great app
review: I wish that it were easier to earn points to unlock more tree varieties - and I strongly feel that bushes (for <20 min timeouts) should cost less to unlock than trees - but this app is very effective at helping users break phone attachment/addiction.

title: Super helpful!!!
review: Although I hate to admit it... I am quite addicted to my phone. Forest makes me forget about my phone and focus on homework, friends, etc. I definitely recommend this!! (P.s. the trees are adorable)

title: Fun way to put down my phone
review: I love creating my forest each day and week. I donated as many real trees as the app would allow, and now I just have fun picking different trees and bushes to decorate my forest.

title: Fantastic app
review: This is one of my favorite and most used apps. I have a hard time concentrating and this app makes me WANT to put my phone down and be productive. Also I love plants. So it’s a win win.

title: Helps my focus and does some good for the world.
review: I love this app. I just was able to plant my first real tree and couldn’t be happier. The more you use the more you are motivated to be off your phone.

title: Grad School
review: This app has helped me stay focused and off my phone during long study sessions for grad school. It has help keep me motivated and allows me to record how long I study each week.

title: Forest
review: I love Forest. For someone who procrastinated a lot it helps me stay focused and on task. I do think you should get more coins every time you grow a tree though, but overall it is totally worth the money!

title: Productive

title: So glad I found this!
review: It’s a fun and interactive way to be productive.  I’ve gotten to know what time chunks work best for me with all the alerts it gives too.  Overall it’s a well executed app!

title: Very helpful
review: This app really does give you the motivation to set down and get work done with no distraction. After all, who wants to kill their own tree to reply to a text!!

title: Miracles!
review: It works miracles! The sound is only an additional helpful factor. I am more productive than ever before and it’s so satisfying knowing I am contributing to the environment by being efficient and focused!! Such a cool concept that fortunately saw reality!

title: Perfect study tool
review: In love using this app to focus on studying for boards. Not only does this keep you accountable for a set period of time, but it has the added bonus of working toward planting a real tree 💚

title: Best Concentration Tool
review: Honestly looking at my phone while try to complete a task has been a problem. Using this app has really helped me concentrate because I’m mostly afraid to kill the tree I’m growing.

title: Great for staying focused
review: I have adhd and I need all the help to stay focused. So when I check my phone and I see a little sapling growing it’s great. It’s so simple but impactful, and it reminds me to return back to work.

title: Good, but could be better
review: This app does keep me focused, but would be better with an in app calculator and notepad, I did pay money for this app and think i deserve to be able to use a calculator when studying and doing homework

title: Definitely a 5 star app
review: I love this app!! Everything is very neat and organized and really helps you get things done! 10 out of 10 do recommend!

title: Starcoral

It good

It’s actually made me put away my phone, so it does exactly as advertised 
I just kinda wish it gave you more coins so that you can get an actual tree growing

review: I’m always on my phone it seems like so it’s really nice to finally find an app that helps with that problem!

title: Love this app!
review: Helps me focus, which is just astounding for college. Also makes me feel good to see a visual representation of my productivity (at least, one that isn't measured in my homework)

title: Pretty good
review: I like it, I just wish it was more interactive and addicting because tbh I don’t feel motivated to use the app that often, and as a result I am not productive. If I felt compelled to use the app more often, I would be way more productive!

title: Great little app!
review: This app allows me to not only stay focused in the moment, but look back on how much time I’ve spent working hard In the past and it’s a perfect motivator!!

title: So freaking cute!
review: I love this app, it helps keep me on track to do what I need to. And the little garden is such a cute reward! I got so much done today after weeks of procrastinating and feeling unmotivated.... wow! 💕

title: Best app
review: This app is really really really helpful to me to focus on my work. Can I ask you to add fire sound in this app?? Rain sound also good but I hope there’re more asmr sound to help study😆

title: Great app but a bit pricey
review: Fun app, helps keep me off my phone, but I wish there was a way to integrate into laptops. For the current way the app is, I think the price is a bit steep because you can find this kind of program for free.

title: Helps me take a break from my phone
review: This is a great app, simple to use, helps me stay mindful in the moment, rather than always checking my phone

title: Helps me stay focused and helps the planet
review: I have ADHD, and Focus helps me stay off my phone for a while while I try to focus on important stuff. I love that there are real-word benefits to our planet as well.

title: Learn to manage your time
review: This is an excellent app to force me to follow my principle to manage my time. Plus, I can use my virtual coins to plane a real tree. I am earning my coins and looking forward to that!

title: Too hard to get new plants
review: I like this app but I wish you could earn more coins per hour. It takes a lot of hours to earn enough coins for a new plant (each plant is worth 700 coins and you can only get around 20 per hour)-it’s kinda discouraging. Unfortunately, there aren’t many similar apps out there.

title: Great App
review: It’s the perfect app for me, the simple concept of a timer helps me focus and buckle down to get things done. Would recommend to anyone trying to lead a productive life. Amazing product!

title: Wonderful app
review: This app has been a revelation for increasing my productivity. I will never let that poor tree die, so I soldier on. Reddit be damned for that hour. Would recommend to anyone needing to get their head into a focused state

title: Very useful
review: This app has been super helpful for me, and has kept me accountable. I highly recommended it if you have had trouble getting distracted by your phone.

title: The Most Useful App
review: A simple app that uses a simple incentive to keep you off your phone and it works!! I love this app. It’s effective and actually makes a difference in the world too.

title: I stay on task
review: It seemed silly at first, just staying on task so you can have a forest that grows. But I really do care about this forest. It’s kind of like a game. So far it’s helped me a lot in college for getting work done.

title: Keeps me productive
review: I use this app whenever I have to study or do homework and it keeps me accountable. It helps me resist the urge to open my notifications and reply to my messages.

title: Achieving
review: I love the fact that on top of already getting our little wins for the time focused. We can then take our points and achieve more plants.

title: Awesome App
review: For the first time I’m actually happy to tear my eyes away from a screen. Definitely helps me spend my time on something more useful than scrolling aimlessly on social media.

title: Helps me stay focused and help the earth
review: It is an easy to use app. Hardly any flaws and you can plant an actual tree! Most of the trees planted help with the Great Green Wall and other locations. Highly recommend!!!!!

title: Keeps me focused
review: I love how the app reminds you that your tree will die if you stray away from the app for more than 10 seconds. Highly recommend for people with ADD/ get distracted easily.

title: Just get the app
review: I really like the app , help me a lot leaving my phone and focus on things that need to be do , this is my first time to write a review but I really want to be cause it is nice , i which it was free 😆

title: Really like!
review: This app is nice if you have trouble focusing. If you pick up your phone and leave the app your tree will die! It seems silly but it does help in its own little way!

title: So simple yet so effective
review: Giving you a reason to not take the phone actually works. Keeps you motivated and rewarded for your “effort”. Highly recommended

title: So far so good
review: Enjoying it so far. It’s useful for when my alarm goes off and I just sit in bed doing nothing but waiting until I’m running so late I can’t procrastinate anymore.

title: This app rules
review: It’s a great app. Gamification always seemed lame to me, but this is perfect - non-intrusive, but effective. I wish you had at least a few types of trees at the beginning though.

title: Fun
review: It’s a fun way to use Pomodoro technique. I love that you CAN spend some money to get trees sooner but you don’t have to. Also love the idea of real trees being planted. Simple and effective. Isn’t that what an app should be?

title: LOVE this app
review: I don’t even have words to describe my love for this app, it has helped me outrageously when it comes to homework. Not only does it help me stay focused on my homework, but it encourages me to study too!

title: Love it!
review: As a freelancer who spends a lot of time on my phone / social media for work, this has been a big help in making sure I spend time phone free & still productive!

title: Productivity
review: This App is really good and allows me to stay way from my phone while doing important tasks. Recommend spending the few dollars it costs.

title: Love it!
review: This app is great for productivity. The trees are great and the way it weaves in psychology to keep you away from distractions and working on important stuff is awesome. Plus if you do it enough you get to plant real trees which is nice too.

title: Overall great app
review: The concept and design is so cute and it really does keep me focused when I’m reading or trying to get things done so I’m not constantly distracted by my phone!

title: Review
review: Love this app! It helps me focus more when I’m writing. I love the concept of being able to plant a real tree after a certain amount of coins. It was well worth the $2 I paid.

title: Fun and useful!
review: I use Forest somewhat infrequently, but whenever I really need to focus, I pull up the app. I love the “reward” of growing trees, rather than just setting a timer and not getting anything at the end.

title: 10 out of 10 would recommend
review: Honestly, this app so useful to me. I am a regular procrastinator but when I got this app, it changed my studying habits and my stress level.

title: Highly recommend the app for someone who is too attached to the phone
review: Highly recommend the app for someone who is too attached to the phone

developerResponse:
{'id': 5683381, 'body': 'Hello,

Due to the limitation of the iOS system, we cannot determine what app the user is currently using. Therefore we cannot implement the whitelist feature for the iOS version. As a workaround, we built a "Work with Phone" feature, which can be enabled in the settings page. This feature enables users to use work related apps during their planting periods, but users will have to be honest with themselves when using this feature. 

The trees planted with this feature enabled will not be counted towards the leaderboard, and users will only receive half the reward if they exit Forest during the planting period. 

Currently, the whitelist feature cannot be implemented for iOS. If you see features similar to whitelist on other apps, please let us know so that we may figure out how it was implemented. 

Thank you for your suggestion. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2018-10-27T11:40:55Z'}

title: Great motivation
review: Helps me when I am not feeling like doing anything. Would like more rewards when completing a session to keep the whole motivation up
developerResponse: {'id': 5246052, 'body': 'Hi,\nWe will consider modifying the formula of earning coins in future updates. Currently, you can earn extra rewards by unlocking achievements! Feel free to contact us via our in-app feedback system if you have further questions or suggestions! :) Forest', 'modified': '2018-09-26T16:35:05Z'}

title: Useless for anyone but phone addicts
review: The app makes a lot of assumptions about who you are that made it impossible for me to use. It assumes your phone is always a distraction, and so will do things like kill your tree when you text someone to inform them that you completed something for them. I can’t give a productivity app that hurts my productivity anything more than one star.
developerResponse: {'id': 9729210, 'body': 'Hi, thank you for the feedback. As plenty of people nowadays have experienced phone addiction, Forest aims to help users stay away from their phone and focus on what they\'re doing, be it studying, working or other activities. If you really need to user your phone, please turn on the "Work with phone" mode in Forest\'s Settings page, and you\'ll be capable of using your phone while planting a tree. If you have further questions or suggestions, please contact us via the in-app feedback system. :) - Forest', 'modified': '2019-07-18T13:51:29Z'}

review: I primarily use this app to keep myself from getting distracted while studying or doing homework and I think it does the job pretty well to keep my focused. Good app.

title: Great App
review:
I love this app! It’s helping me visualize what I spend my time on.

I hope that they can add some integration features in the future, like a google cal or iCal integration.

title: Cute app
review: Cute idea to help stay focused. I struggle with checking my phone as soon as I don’t want to do something. This is one piece of my productivity and mental health journey

title: I love the app
review: It’s a great app in terms of aesthetic and optimal study time. You’re persuaded to continue working to create an amazing habitat. I wish there was default encouragement though and maybe some animals.

title: Great way to stay motivated
review: You know that Tik Tok sound thats like “b**** I’m a mother! No drama!” Well that is how I feel when growing trees while studying. Very fun, definitely recommend.

title: Helps focusing
review: This has been great to get studying done and times I just need to put my phone down.

title: Helps me so much

title: Great for literally everything. Time your day to day routine

review: The time counted by Stopwatch mode is not accurate! Usually after long time only to get less than half minutes counted.

title: Good focus app
review: I use this app most often when I need to study or read my textbooks. It’s the only way I can read for school now without getting distracted.

title: Very Helpful

title: Love it !!
review: I love this app !! It helps me stay in track in school and stops me from using my phone during lectures and study sessions

title: Cute app for productivity
review: Cute app. I like that it tells me when I got distracted if I back out of it. Sometimes I do that without even thinking. Bad habit.

title: Helps me
review: This app really helps me get on track. It makes you feel guilty for cutting a study sesh short cuz ur tree will die! 😂 would recommend

title: Love Forest!
review: This is great for studying in medical school. My friend and I both use it and we keep each other accountable by doing team mode.

title: Just started using
review: Just starting using to help study for midterms it seems to be going well so far!

title: Great!!
review: I highly encourage playing around with the settings! Writing your own form of motivation can keep you focused

title: Super helpful
review: Keeps you on track with your time. It’s fun to try to get as many coins as possible to buy new trees!

title: Great App
review: This is a great app, I love how you can study with friends and my productivity has definitely gone up after downloading it.

title: wish the app was free
review: I remember getting this for free and honestly, it still should be a free app. I wish be able to get more friends on this app with me!! I also wish the tree costs were lower, but I still love enjoy it.

title: Ok.
review:
I wish there was an alarm setting so I know when time is up. And if there is such a setting I wish the app were easier to navigate because I looked for one and can’t easily find it. 
So I just say this app is ok.

title: Focus

title: Keeps me excited to be off my phone!
review: Perfect for trying to break the pick up your phone habit when you need to be focusing.

title: Fantastic Study Tool
review: With online learning, this app has been a fantastic tool to help me stay focused while still being on my device!

title: It’s a great way to reduce screen time
review: This app is really helpful in keeping me off my phone during zoom meetings and when I’m studying! And the plants are really cute 😊

title: Helps you focus
review: Use this at work for times when I am having trouble focusing. I even set the break timers so I don’t get sucked down a social media rabbit hole.

title: Awesome way to stay on track

title: I love the app’s idea and functionality

title: Love this app
review:
I use it sometimes and along with my willpower I was able to stop myself from going on my phone and not studying for Multivariable. 
It’s cute to have!

title: Basically the Pomodoro technique
review: Each focus time is set to 25min by default. A cute way to utilize the pomodoro technique (work25min, rest5min repeat). Nice to be “growing” plants while staying off the phone and focused elsewhere. Kinda like a Pomodoro Tamagachi app for plant lovers :)

title: Awesome App, want more opportunities

title: Highly recommended
review: i love this app it helps me focus so much and i definitely recommend to everyone who has trouble with getting distracted

title: A great app
review: This app can keep you focused so you know what time to get off your  Device, by planting trees! And if you need to go outside of the app for a bit you can do that to! What a great app.

title: I love it!
review: This app is so amazing for studying! I recommend it to everyone! I have my friends added on here so we can all plant together and hold each other accountable. It’s great!

title: Love this app
review: Just downloaded it and it helps a lot. I was able to concentrate for two hours without anything in the way.

title: So good!!
review: This app motivates me to stay off of my phone when I’m studying. Planting trees and keeping them alive is a nice and cute reward, and it has so many features to help enhance studying. Totally worth it

title: Nice

review: A cute way to keep you attention away from your phone. Wish there were more ways to regularly schedule work periods.

review: Sorry to say but this won’t make you motivated or force you to do your work, but it definitely helps to be able to do more than visualize your efforts

title: Useful

review: This is one of the best purchases i’ve ever made. It has helped me to focus so much and has motivated me to work so much as well. Fantastic job, and thank you.

title: Great App
review: It’s just a good app for studying overall. With the trees (both virtual and in real life), there’s additional motivation to study. I’m also really glad that the deep focus mode became optional. Thank you very much!

title: App is awesome!
review: This is a amazing app it helps me study,concentrate, and it gets me A’s you should totally buy this app it’s only $1.99 I recommend you this app for productivity so you don’t procrastinate buy it!

title: Best app to focus

title: Very cute

review: I love this app, it helps me sit down and enjoy my homeschool work without getting distracted and enjoy the ambient sounds to help keep it not boring, should really buy this app!!!

review: Love how it keeps me on track. Also nice to see when I get most of my work done and how much I accomplished by the end of the week/month etc.

title: Good app
review: Good app for getting rid of your phone addiction and getting to the things that matter, it’s worth the money. The question is, will you use it correctly?

title: Amazing

review: I really appreciate having an app that helps me be a more organized and driven person while also helping the earth being a better place! I love the though of using my work ethic to build trees

title: Very fun and satisfying

title: Best app

review: This app has positively improved my work habits better than anything else I’ve tried. A really great and useful thing.

title: Best App to get you off your phone

title: Great app!!
review: I use this app when I do my homework to stay focused and it keeps me so focused, i also love how you can grow a tree with your friends and can use it with study groups

title: It helps!
review: For those of us who are focused-challenged, this tool can be helpful. I’m still trying to get myself more disciplined with using it, but I’m getting better.

title: Definitely helps me stay off my phone

title: One of my most used apps

Keep up the good work :)

title: Love it

title: Best focus app

title: Forest App
review:
Forest App has helped me stay focus for
25 minutes at a time. Keeps me off social media, and keeps me focus long enough to complete goals for the day. Highly recommend this app!

title: Good reminder to stay on task.

title: Keeps my work on track.
review: Amazingly simple to use. If you are easily distracted, and not self aware, this is a huge step in the right direction.

Please make a Mac App

title: Everyone Should Have This!
review: I love this app. It can be used for anything that involves staying off of your device, and is very encouraging! And if you save up your coins you can plant a real tree!!

title: Avoid Being a Phone Zombie
review: Forest has allowed me to stop staring at my phone and start being present! As an added bonus, after 2,500 points, Forest plants a real tree!

title: favorite app
review: surprisingly, my favorite app is one that makes me use my phone less! this is the best way to focus and get things done without distractions. my favorite aspect is that unlike a timer, i can simply turn on a calming sound to tell me when it’s up instead of a loud jarring noise (esp great for meditation). ofc helping the environment is also a huge plus, and i really appreciate the small details design wise. a wonderful app!

title: Helping with ADD
review: This app has basically saved me from my ADD and executive dysfunction. It stops me from using my phone when I should be getting work done and I’m so happy it exists.

title: Options to allow taking phone calls
review:
I really like this app! 

But I think it will be better if there is an option to allow us to take phone calls, including WhatsApp voice calls.

I’m so sad when my almost 2hr grown tree died because I answered a job call....

Update:
Just found out there is a ‘work from phone’ option.... will have only have the reward though....

title: Fun Focus!
review: It really is a fun way to stay focused and grow a little garden/forest at the same time. It works because you can earn coins to buy real tread for developing nations or different kinds of digital trees. I enjoy it!

title: I bought the app, why are there microtransactions?
review: I bought the app. I shouldn’t have to pay money for the app after buying it. If you want to make it a lump some of 10$ or whatever sure but I shouldn’t have to watch advertisements to get “crystals” to buy trees. I already paid for the app. Got a refund
developerResponse: {'id': 19720758, 'body': "Hi, thank you for the feedback. You don't actually have to pay money for the trees, you can earn the coins by focusing more. You will only have to pay money if you want to buy time crystals. The trees that you have to unlock with time crystals are event-limited trees. The idea is that if you missed the trees during the event but you really want them, you can get them by using time crystals.", 'modified': '2020-12-13T09:25:08Z'}

title: Super Helpful
review: This app always helps me stay focused while doing work for school! I would definitely recommend it to anyone in need of some focus.

title: Great for focus, designed well
review: This app really helps me set aside my distractions and work deeply. I can already tell how much more productive I am being. Definitely worth it.

title: Great app!
review: Helps me focus a lot during school and work, and keeps me off other apps. Turn on music, turn on do not disturb, and turn on forest to keep yourself productive

title: What a cool way to stay on task
review: I enjoy this—the longer you stay on task the more trees you can grow. It is a good visual reminder and I like that eventually you get to plant actual trees by staying on task. That’s pretty awesome.

title: Love it
review: This app has been really helpful in getting me to stay off my phone when I should be focusing on other things.

title: Great tool to keep my mind concentrated!
review: This tool has greatly improved my concentration and productivity.  I am so thankful for knowing this tool and able to make my life more productively!

title: Grade Saver
review: Honestly this is such a motivator for me to study for finals! It’s so nice to have a little tree or bush grow when I’m studying-it’s a great representation for me to see how long I’ve studied for the day and if I should do more.

title: Love it!
review: I use this app to track how long I study and to keep my off my phone! The trees are so cute & if you like the listen to nature sounds to focus they have that too!

title: Amazing for work
review: I really recommend this app, although the amount of time required to earn new trees is unrealistic, it’s still his a cool tool to work and give procrastination.

title: Love!
review: Helps keep me focused and on track when I study or even during short tasks. An aesthetic reminder to stop multitasking and improve my focus.

title: Love this app!
review: Keeps me off my phone for when I’m studying or spending time with my loved ones. Allows me to be more aware of how much time I spend on my phone.

title: Great app to get stuff done!
review: I like using forest when I have to do something and couldn't get off my phone. It makes me accountable and less distracted.

title: Great for ADHD
review: I absolutely love this app it’s so useful and easy !! I highly recommend it for people with ADHD like me !! It helps me stay on track and I feel more organized and I get my homework done ✅

title: Track your time in a fun way
review: This app is great for time blocking with a twist to get a visual of your time. You can even share your forest with your friends and gamify in a team environment.

title: Helps me focused + adds competition
review: As a competitive, type A person... I Love that I can track my study habits + be in competition with my classmates to motivate my studying by seeing how many minutes they’ve done (great for medical school)

title: inspiring
review: good app for concentration while doing work.  we look at our phones way too many times. time to let the Spirit lead our elecronics usage.

title: AMAZING
review: This has helped me with getting on task when I want to go on my phone but have homework to do. And it also helped me because of the plants like I don’t want the plant to die :(.

title: Fantastic
review: This app has gone a long way to improving the quality of my studying and my time spent with friends and family! Great app for needing a little extra help breaking away from their screens.

title: Disappointing
review: I bought numerous sounds from this app a few months ago while I had finals. I just began school again, so I am using this app once again. But I noticed that the sounds I purchased with my coins have disappeared. I’m very frustrated and disappointed. I want my sounds back. It’s not fair because it took A LONG TIME COLLECTING ALL THOSE COINS. I used to love this app a lot. Very disappointed and upset.
developerResponse: {'id': 10953959, 'body': 'Hello,\r\nPlease synchronize your data manually in the Settings. If the problem still remains, please contact us via the in-app feedback system. Thank you!\n- Forest', 'modified': '2019-09-29T13:20:50Z'}

title: Great app
review: This app is so extremely helpful! I have a hard time focusing and not getting distracted but having that visual representation of all my hard work is so helpful!!

title: Reach your goals
review: It really helps. I couldn’t study efficiently without it. I‘ve been using it for more than a 1 year. This is a must have app

title: Love it
review: I love growing my forest by devoting my time to things that need to get done. Having this app run on my phone while I work is a nice little reminder that I’m doing good things with my time!

title: Love it
review: I love the app and the concept of gaining enough study time to eventually plant a real life tree but it takes so so much time and coins . I wish the pay off was better (in planting real life trees) ... but the virtual forest keeps me motivated to keep studying !

title: I honestly like it.
review: I have a bad habit of getting distracted and going into college I didn’t know what I was going to do. Now that I have this app, I can plant trees and stay focused which is a win-win situation.

title: Use for School!
review: I have a really hard time staying focused on homework and projects, and this helps me put my phone down and work in satisfying bursts.

title: Love it
review: I have issues staying focused sometimes and this is an immense help, if only because it keeps me off my phone which forces me to go back to my tasks!

title: Better than pomodoro
review: A lot of other apps seem like they’ll work, but then you find yourself procrastinating. This one is different!

title: Great App
review: I have boosted my productivity because simply I do not want to touch my phone. Happy I paid for the app because it is paying large amounts for me at work and studying.

title: Wonderful focus app!
review: I love Forest for helping me stay focused and unconcerned about what’s going on with my phone (ie- social media and texts). It’s so satisfying to see my personalized forest after a long day of work/studying.

title: Fun way to stay focused
review: I use this as an incentive to stay focused while studying. Also, when I finish growing a tree I use that to remind myself to take a quick break. Cute app!

title: A very simple thing that makes me actually do homework
review: I just need a gentle reminder to stop looking at my phone every 7 minutes as a reflex so it is very helpful to unlock my phone and be met with a tree friend!!!

title: A great help for procrastinators
review: This app has helped me concentrate so much. Who knew killing a fake tree would push me to avoid opening my phone even when the urge to escape tasks is too great.

title: Well designed
review: You will love it，that saves you more time on your work instead of playing phone

title: I love it!!!
review: This has helped me with my studies. I put it at 25min and take a 5min break doing whatever and get back at it. I love unlocking the different trees and hope to help plant real ones soon!!!! 💙💙

title: Love it
review: A friend recommended this all to me and it has helped me so much to focus. I would recommend to anyone who has trouble outing down their phone or electronic device.

title: Finally have free time!
review: i love this app and it keeps me off my phone! it allows me to get work done without getting distracted. i also finally have some much needed free time. but i don’t like the in app purchases.

title: Handy little app
review: I like this app because I’m so distractible.  I get off task so easily.  But when my little tree is growing, I don’t want to kill it.  I want to keep working.  It’s a pretty simplistic thing, but I dig it. ❤️

title: Great app
review: The app has a clean user interface and pleasant graphics. However, the coin system is a bit confusing and takes forever to build up to planting and actual tree.

title: I love forest
review: I am a student with social media when I start forest. Turn of my notification and listen to the rain noise it really helps me focus and get all my work done

title: One of the best apps that I purchased
review: This is the only application I use when studying! For people with OCD, turn on the flight mode, open this app, set the time and start growing trees!

title: Amazing
review: I have this app to thank for my good grades. I study at cafes and use my phone for music but often get distracted by it, this app is super cute and easy to used but most importantly it is very effective.

title: Forest
review: The app was well created, yet to access the app with facebook is impossible. I been hearing how good the app is, but the free app hasn't developed a way to access with an email. Although I did purchase the app, I been studying more perfoundly.

title: Favorite app!
review: I love using this app when I need to focus and decrease the amount of distraction from my phone! There are different kinds of trees and bushes that you can plant and they’re all cute!

title: Cute app for focusing
review: This is a really cute, easy to use, and helpful app for staying off my phone when I need to get things done. Plus, it has the added benefit of helping plant trees!

title: favorite app
review: i love this app so much and i recommend it to all my friends. i love the simplicity of the app and how rewarding it is when you are being productive because you have the potential to actually help the environment and it motivates you to also not only be more productive but put your phone down and seamlessly enjoy everyday life moments. hands down worth the cost and it is by far my favorite app :))

title: Helpful for studying
review: This app keeps me off my phone to help me stay focused. Also has different background noises you can unlock which is a plus.

title: Amazing!!
review: I am a college student, that didn’t have no clue on how to study in high school or middle school but this app has helped me do a whole 360º by just sticking to a specific amount of time!!

title: Helps me stay on productive.
review: Let me say this: it is fun to see hundreds of trees on my screen because it is a colorful, gamified representation of all the hard work I’ve managed to complete.

title: Fun
review: This app keeps me from my phone distractions at work. For some reason I just cannot kill these little trees. It’s a perfect app for nature lovers that need a break from the cell phone

title: Best app to help me stay focused and productive!
review: This is a fun and motivating app that has helped me stay productive in my college courses and life in general. I highly recommend it! Plus building and seeing your forest is encouraging!

title: Love it
review: Best app to separate different categories of productivity I track my work, meditation, gratitude, school, and just self care with the different trees / bushes I plant each time I start something new

title: THE BEST APP EVER
review: literally the greatest app i’ve ever downloaded. my grades have gone up so much because of this, and my friends are all jealous that i can get my homework done so early because i stay focused!!

title: Some tips
review: Simple to use but it should offer the option to enable phone usage when setting the timer. Some of us work using the phone or read.

title: Excellent
review: I really like using a timer for work, and this is one is very nice in particular. Only thing extra is I wish it had a countdown for taking breaks as well.

title: Forest rocks!
review: Forest has significantly improved my productivity by keeping me off my phone and helping me visualize the hours I work through different trees. Highly recommend!

title: Good for productivity
review: Good for keeping you off your phone. Has a lot of things to work for, like donating a tree or buying new tree types. Could use more achievements.

title: Fun to focus
review: It’s nice to feel like I’m working towards something by staying off my phone. Even if the rewards of new tree species and new white noise options are rather arbitrary, I really love it

title: So fun!
review:
I find myself getting more done in allotted times than I've done in whole days! 
Task managing app is fun and addictive-I've been tracking everything to grow a fun tree and distraction-free!
Thanks!

title: It is perfect!!
review: This is a really fun app that is making me a better person. I am addicted to this app that makes me not use my phone! I am addicted to not using my phone!!! I love it!

title: Simple to use!
review: Great purchase that is easy to use in locking me out of my phone. My productivity is noticeably better when using Forrest and helping plants trees is a bonus!

title: Lovely app
review: It really helps me to not stay on my phone. I’m an online student, and social media is a distraction, so if I have a lot of homework to do, I’ll just plant a tree to help me scroll down on instagram. ❤️

title: super helpful
review: i am a high schooler and i have found trouble in getting my homework done because my phone always caught my attention. with this app it is super helpful and convenient with anyone who has my problem. it comes with a nice option to play “music”, it is rain sounds and many more. i play it in the background as i work and it helps me concentrate better! i highly recommend!!!

title: Helps studying and the environment!
review: Setting mini goals is so much fun now and it keeps me on track. Also once you earn enough coins, you can plant an actual tree. How cool is that?!

title: 5 stars
review: This app really helps especially with me coming from a generation that is constantly on my phone. This helps me stay off my phone.

title: Get back to the real world
review: This is a great idea and a fun little app to help you put your phone down. I love that you can plant a real tree by being present. The UI is a little clunky but very good looking.

title: Good but not the best
review: The one feature Forest is missing is the ability to give a notification when do not disturb is on. There is another Pomodoro app that does this, and makes it much more useful when you don’t want to be disturbed while working.
developerResponse: {'id': 2897405, 'body': 'Hello, Do not disturb was designed to block notifications. Forest is not able to disable this function while Do not disturb is activate. Could you tell us which Pomodoro app makes it possible? Thank you and we apologize for the inconvenience. Forest', 'modified': '2018-03-22T07:47:20Z'}

title: Thanks for forcing me into a better lifestyle!
review: I am terrible at keeping myself away from my phone and this app does just that. Definitely worth it!

title: Essential for Studying
review: I’m completely addicted to my phone, it’s hard to sit down for 10 min without checking it and breaking my concentration. This saves me.

title: Really helps
review: I love this app. It does exactly what it promises, keeps you focused. It has helped tremendously not only with studying but also when I am around my friends. Fantastic app

title: Great motivating timer and tracker
review: Graphics are great, so satisfying to plant virtual -- and real!!! -- trees. A little tricky to navigate for extra features but tags help track how you spend your time. Great and well worth the 1.99

title: A gem
review: A gem in the age of social media. I use this everyday to get away from excessive and uncontrollable social media use. Being productive, focused, and be in the present moment feels great again

title: So helpful!
review: Really increasing my productivity, and I just started using it! You feel guilty even thinking about letting the tree die 🥲

title: So simple and effective!
review: This app is so simple and easy that I actually use it, and somehow the fact that it’s so cute is motivating. It makes me smile.

title: review
review: Make a better option for tree selection . make more interactive opportunities with other people. make it more social . Allow us to use points earned on limited edition trees. make everything more customizable . background , type of forrest.
developerResponse: {'id': 31990123, 'body': 'Hi there,\nThank you for the feedback. We will forward your request to our development team and see if we can work on any of these features in the future and keep improving the app. Thank you again for supporting Forest :)', 'modified': '2022-09-13T09:11:41Z'}

title: Optimal productivity tool
review: Forest is a fantastic tool to improve focus and productivity. The behavioral design approach makes it fun to use and is one of my absolute favorite apps to use.

title: The app is amazing
review: this app is helping me focus when I’m studying with school and I need to clean my room or do stuff around the house

title: Worth It
review: I totally love this app and the features it holds! It took me a bit to get used to, but once you get the hang of it, it’s perfect.

title: Decent but needs a landscape view
review: Forest is pretty great; I don't have problems with it's functionalities, but while using my iPad, which is always on landscape mode, I get annoyed because it doesn't adjust to it.
developerResponse: {'id': 24991395, 'body': 'Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please answer the following questions to help us develop the feature? Which page do you need the landscape mode for? Do you use split screen? Thank you! have a good day.', 'modified': '2021-09-09T01:07:42Z'}

title: I Own an 800 Dollar Phone...
review: And the best app I own doesn't let me use it. But I do have a very colorful Forest filled with fake beautiful trees and my PhD dissertation is almost done.

title: YESSS
review: Florets keeps me so focused and motivated through all my homework. I keeps me from procrastinating and I definitely get my work done faster now!! :))

title: It’s great for me
review: I have problems focusing and this helps because if I can focus I get a reward immediately

title: Having fun with friends
review: Just Vibin rn tbh. If you solo it’s hard to stay consistent because at that point you just disciplining yourself. It’s more fun with friends.

title: Has helped me
review: Personally, as someone who uses their phone a lot, this app has helped me. It allows me to grow plants (which i love)

title: So helpful!
review: I have such a hard time focusing, and this app has helped me so much! I recommend it to all my friends!

title: Pretty dope ngl
review: One of my fav studying apps, and by one of i mean my only one. It keeps me off my phone for the most part and the little trees are v cute. 11/10 recommend.

title: Cute App
review: I am really enjoying this app. It is helping me with my time management and also decreasing my screen time on my phone!

title: Love the app
review: It really does keep me focused. Especially if you put on certain settings that really keep you focused.

title: It helps
review: I gotta gamify things these days and this is helping me incentivize, even though it’s just little cartoon trees that I earn

title: Pretty fun way to get off your phone for ADHD
review: I’ve got ADHD and this apps effective in getting me to put my phone down cause I want a big pretty forest!

title: Finally an app that keeps me off my phone
review: And it’s fun. Especially if you get at least one friend to plant trees with you.

title: Pretty Nice
review: Very good app to practice self-control while staying productive. Although, I wish the time was more adjustable, rather than the already set time that is given.

title: Funny way to keep hands far from the phone
review: A nice tool to help stay focus while working!

title: Worse app ever
review: Seriously , what’s the point of this app ?  It’s not just timer , it’s worse than a timer , cuz it doesn’t remind you anything when the time is up. Furthermore , it doesn’t even do what it says it would do: I can actually use my phone as normal and my trees grow as normal , it doesn’t even know I’m using my phone.
developerResponse: {'id': 20293790, 'body': 'Hi,\nPlease make sure the "Deep focus mode" is turned on so that your trees will wither when you leave Forest. You can turn it on at the top of the main page. When you\'re planting a tree in Forest but goes to another app, there should be a full-screen notification that tells you to go back to Forest. If that isn\'t the case, please contact us again.', 'modified': '2021-01-10T15:49:35Z'}

title: Focusing
review: Normally I have trouble focusing on work etc but this app has awesome features like the deep study mode and the study room mode..! So amazing love this!

title: Very useful
review: I recommend this for anyone who needs to focus it helps quite a lot.

title: My Plant Corey
review: Love this app. The plants are cute and helps me stay productive. I have I plant and I named him Corey. You should get this app and start your own forest:)) the plants will make you happy

title: Still trying it out
review: Love the idea behind this, but having trouble figuring out all of the features. I’m thinking it will be very helpful once I’ve got it rolling!

title: Satisfyingly Helpful
review: I find myself excited to plant a tree. Being a student and having to study and knowing I will have a beautiful lush forest that I have grown! This is a keeper!! ~CoderChic~

title: Problem
review: The application is great, but there is a problem when it finished it does not appear loud and I don’t know sometimes that the tree has grown

title: Keeps me focused
review: I’ve really enjoyed this app because it keeps me honest and on track. Highly recommended

title: Great app for getting things done
review: It’s great it helps you just put down your phone and not touch it.

title: Love this
review: I love this app and is worth every penny. It really makes me focus while doing college work with I have had problems with in the past.

title: I love this!
review: This app is great and I love the concept. I do wish that it could be more specific about what apps will kill the tree if I put on the deep mode, but other than that I love it.

title: Helpful
review: Very helpful especially when you do deep mode(it’s when you can’t leave the app or your plant will die) I like this app very much and I deem my money well spent.

title: Wonderful app but has some bugs
review: I really like this app but my ipad can not open store and real forest, can you guys help fix the problem please?

title: Works great!
review: This app works better than any of the others I’ve tried for keeping me off my phone so I can get stuff done.

title: Productive!
review: So far this app has helped me stayed focus so that I’m able to study. I wish there were more options for free sounds instead of having to pay for them.

title: Suggestions
review:
Love the app. Perfect for someone with ADHD. I use it a lot for studying and have a few suggestions.

- Add a “Random Tree” option when starting a timer. 
- Allow for the user to move trees around in their forest. 
- Add a couple more soundscapes. The ones available already are very nice but something like a fireplace crackling or such would be awesome.

Please never stop updating this app! Thank you : )

title: Love it!
review: I love this app so much. I’m a college student and I use this app when I’m doing my homework. Especially now with doing school at home, this app helps me stay on task with my work.

title: Very excellent app
review: I’ve used for several years. I love the function that planting a real tree. This concept is very good. And it helps me stay away from the cell phone.

title: Phenomenal
review: This app is truly fantastic! It keeps me on track with my studies while also providing me with a cute little incentive to keep me motivated. I highly recommend this app!

title: Forest App
review: This app keeps me from constantly picking up my phone when I need to focus, I love this app. The design is straight to the point & the rain sound is a nice plus, great job UX/UI team!

title: Planet saving app
review: I fell in love with the idea of this app and when I downloaded it and tried it out I fell in love with the whole concept. Not only does this app help me stay focused but I feel motivated to plant real trees.

title: Very helpful, fun app
review: It’s fun to have a visible reward and it really has helped me focus and put my phone down. Simple app, nothing fancy but I’m already glad I spent the money on it.

title: Focus!!!
review: This app provides a great excuse to get work done. Once you click the begin button, all procrastination disappears. Definitely recommend.

title: Cute and productive app!
review: I love this app because it helps me stay focus ed on things other than my phone while also being able to plant trees🌲🌳🌴

title: Very Helpful
review: I just started using the app today and it’s good for concentration and its very motivating to not want your plant to die. So if you have trouble studying or staying on task, this is the app for you

title: Keep on track
review: Great little tool to help remind you that you have more important things than your phone.

title: Helps me focus
review: When I need to sit down and do schoolwork, there’s no other app that makes me put my phone down. Love the interaction of watching the first grow

title: Would recommended!!!
review: Very cute app that gives simple but creative (for studying and for the environment) incentive to put your phone down and get to work!

title: Works so well!
review: This has improved my concentration at work SO MUCH, and it doesn’t even feel like I’m expending effort. I love this app and can’t recommend it enough.

title: Amazing but it could use more features
review: Amazing app but it could really use a break feature. I love this app other than that.

title: Wonderful way to stay on track
review: Love the app!! I can def tell that I used to waste so much time. I know can better quantify my day and therefor my productivity has sky rocketed

title: Studying made easy
review: I love this app. It make me put my phone down and study because I know that if I get off the app I kill the plant I worked so hard to plant

title: Good for my phone addiction
review: Studying for an important exam & it helps me to forget about picking up my phone constantly while I study. More efficient study time!

title: Game Changer!
review: I’m what you may call a serial procrastinator. But using Forest helps me focus exponentially. I’m actually able to get work done! Thank you a million to whomever created this app!

title: Writing a book
review: What a lovely way to stay motivated. Hopefully on the other end of this year I’ll have a full forest and a book to show for it.

title: My favorite app!
review: This is the best app, not only did it help me focus in college but it’s helped me in my personal and professional life as well! Would recommend 10/10!

title: Love this app but…
review: I love this app so much that it sits on my main screen. It deserves 5 stars but I’m knocking it down to 3 because they have forced the Santa hat. Typically when app devs get all pushy with their celebrations of axial tilt they bury some setting somewhere to default back to the regular iconography. Not here. So three stars it is
developerResponse:
{'id': 13587995, 'body': 'Hi,
Thank you for your support. We respect all religions and are well aware that some people don't celebrate Christmas. The Santa hat icon could be converted in the Settings page of Forest by turning off the "Christmas theme." Now that December is over, the entire theme, along with the Christmas icon, has been removed from the app. Please update to the latest version (4.13.1) if that doesn't happen.
Any further feedback? Send us a ticket via the in-app feedback system! :)
- Forest', 'modified': '2020-02-19T17:45:51Z'}

title: Cool
review: Nice little motivation to build a forest while being productive, esp when you’re feeling burnt out studying! My friends and I all joined so we can see each other’s garden! Yeeeeee

title: Glad I have this, my life is better with it
review: My teenager recommended, glad he did, for his and my sake.  Compromise on time is too easy in our just-in time lifestyle.

title: Amazing app!
review: I’ve been using this app for some time and I love it. It really helps me get my work completed in a timely manner. I recommend anyone who is on the fence to try it!

title: The app crashes
review: I recently updated the app and now every time I try to tag a tree it kicks me out of the app. Love the app, can this be fixed please?
developerResponse: {'id': 11677754, 'body': 'Hello,\nThis issue has been resolved in the latest version. Could you please update your app to v.4.11.2? Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience caused. -Forest', 'modified': '2019-11-06T02:07:10Z'}

title: Great way to get things done
review: As a college student I love how forest helps me to stay focused when working on my assignments. It’s been a huge help in making my grades better.

title: Great App for a Good cause
review: I use forest as my pomodoro time keeping application ! And i could not be any more happier. Growing your forest feels great and enough trees will help you plant a real one. Which i look forward to.

title: Great App To Focus!
review: Allows me to get all of my studying done in a productive manner. I love how I can see all of the study sessions that I’ve done and see what I’ve accomplished! Trees are super motivational and I really support helping out the environment by planting trees in real life too!

title: Really good for studying
review: I’ve been using this app for the past 4 years and it’s helped me with staying off my phone. Also, I’m enjoying all the trees and bushes they add!

title: Motivation
review: ‘‘This won’t only make you focused it will motivate you to focus because you grow trees and if you won’t focus you kill the tree. You killing your own focus plus a tree now that motivation not to be called a murderer.

title: Best app!
review: I use this to help me study and stay focused. The deep focus mode is amazing to keep yourself from browsing social media on your phone when you should be focusing on your task!

title: Great App! (Especially when used with friends)
review: I’ve silent for a while and it’s proving to be very good especially good when my friends and I use it together.

title: Excellent
review: A beautiful little app that has helped me put my phone down. If you’re striving for excellence, you must focus. If you have a hard time focusing, get Forest.

title: Really enjoying it!!
review: I have trouble focusing sometimes and this app really helps me get my work done. I’ve already recommended it to friends!!

title: AmaZing
review: This app honestly helps me study because I actually really like aesthetics and the trees and bushes are very cute. The only downfall is that the app doesn’t notify me when my tree is done growing.

title: Pretty cool app
review: I like that this app motivates you to stay focused however sometimes we unexpectedly need to take care of something and doesn't have a pause function in those cases but I get why. Nonetheless I like it :)

title: Ambitious
review: My life’s goal is to learn as many skills an experience as much as possible. Most of what I want to do requires focus and patience... this app has been a godsend. Absolutely amazing.

title: Helps me focus!
review: This app helps me work more productively and go to sleep on time. Earning coins is really difficult, though — I wish you would get more or that things would cost less.

title: Awesome
review: I used to have a huge procrastination problem but this app definitely helped me solve it by stop going on my phone so I can focus on school work!!!!

title: Love this app!
review: It really helps me set my phone aside while I get into deep studying. Often, I pass my original time and continue forward with studying.

title: Make like a tree...
review: What an incredible concept to ensure you leave your little electronic master behind you while the deep focus mode sheds the shackles created by nefarious corporations. 10/10 guys.

title: Thank you for my masters degree!
review: I literally would not have finished my masters thesis without this app.  Thank you!!  I’m also a therapist and I recommend this app to many of my clients (and colleagues!)

title: Keeps me on track for grad work
review: There’s something about the risk of killing imaginary trees that keeps me on task! And you also get to measure your progress over the course of time. Works great!

title: Incredibly Helpful
review: I take my classes online and it can be really difficult to not pick up my phone and get distracted from my coursework. Forest keeps me focused!

title: Love this app!
review: It’s really helped me be more productive. I use it whenever I’m reading, studying, working, etc. Plus the “real forest” feature lets you give back by planting trees in real life!

title: Bug report
review: I use this app a lot and helps me to concentrate but in birthday tree, it has a bug. I plant the last piece of cake more than 5 times but still it needs to plant

title: Great for studying!
review: I got the app to help me get off my phone and I’ve been so productive lately, especially since it’s finals week! Definitely worth the buy!

title: Great app- increases productivity
review: I love this app. I use it to for my pomodoro method but it also helped me increase my concentration. It’s super easy to use and collecting different types of plants and trees to grow provides a fun motivation.

title: Great for those with ADHD
review: Sometimes it just takes a little more than the usual incentive to pry your eyes away from your social media feed. This does the trick

review: I feel pretty terrible when I kill a tree, so it pretty much does get me off my phone and be productive.

review: I use the forest app with my students all the time.  I set a timer and say that they have to work for that long or the tree will die.  They get the name the tree as well.

title: Best app for focusing!
review: I 100% recommend this app. I use it constantly to help keep me off my phone while studying, and it’s just so cute! I love all the little trees and the noise effects.

title: Love it!
review: I've been using this app for years and it definitely increases my productivity. 😌  It's a great way of holding yourself accountable, and it keeps you from getting distracted by unnecessary bs.

title: If you want to focus on a task, this is it!
review: I use this app to study for my medical board exams. I literally set a 45 min block and go ham! You can too. Invest in things that will give you 2x the return. Cheers!

title: Very Cute App!
review: This app really makes me want to focus and be present in life. I feel more rewarded using it. I just wish that I didn’t feel so guilty when going to the bathroom or tending to someone’s needs while growing a tree/studying!

title: Love!
review: This app really keeps me focused. I love it because it keeps me off of my phone and staying productive. I wish the trees and bushes were not as expensive though, it is hard to unlock things and to plant actual trees on this earth.

title: Love this app
review: I get really distracted by my phone when I have to study and this app has helped A LOT. Would recommend this to anyone needing a bit of motivation

title: This app is so convinient!
review: I love how you can stay focused and then gain enough coins to plant a tree for our environment! I just wish you could have a sound for when your tree is done planting and have a wider variety of minutes.😁

title: Highly recommend!
review: BEST. STUDYING. APP. EVER!!!! I highly recommend for those who have trouble focusing on work/school work. Also, it’s great for the environment by being able to grow your own, real tree!!

title: Wonderful app
review: Forest incentivizes staying focused like no other app can! I’m so interested in compiling data about time spent away from my phone. Forest makes this so easy to do. Thanks!

title: Helps me stay focused
review: I’ve been using the app for two years now ( I think?) It’s helped me a lot with time management. Also, the design of the app is adorable.

title: Game changer
review: Never spent money on a mobile app before, so this one was the first. No regrets! I’m a visual person and the super cute interface and interactions really helps me focus and get my tasks done.

title: Great App
review: Just started using forest and it’s definitely helped me start getting into a mental “focus” mode to do work/study. Great to also keep track of my studying as well!

title: Fun and encouraging time management
review: Love the friendly illustrations. This app has been helpful in staying focused and organized for both professional and personal tasks.

title: Gradesaver
review: I get so much more done with this App when I use it on my browser and my phone when I need to study! So glad to have discovered this app

title: Helpful
review: Overall pretty good for helping stay off phone and focus.  Sometimes has bugs with counting overtime which is disappointing and demotivating.

title: Miracle for desk job
review: Being a millennial with a desk job, I’m constantly distracted by my phone. Now with forest I have a goal (no dead trees) and I leave me phone alone! Productivity has never been this high

title: Great motivational tool
review: I'm currently in law school and sometimes staying 100% focused on casebooks can get to be less than enthralling. However, no matter how dull the case, I can't let the tree die!

title: Focused!
review: Keeps me focused and the fact that I can plant actual trees always encourages too. If you need to get off your phone to get it together, this isn’t a bad way to do so.

title: Needs Shortcuts Support
review: Being able to start a time block with Siri would be amazing. Maybe also be able to check time remaining from shortcuts as well. Please consider

title: Good for focusing
review:
Here’s a short list of what things I use forest for:
- doing homework without getting distracted
- focusing on my game without checking my phone between rounds
- working out
- staying off my phone in general
- sleeping (set it right before bed (or even before that) for an hour or two so you are not tempted to be up all night)

In short, love this app for how simplistic and useful it is. Be creative

title: Don’t get much
review:
This app is extremely boring and could be so much better. It kept me interested for a day. You only get a choice of two trees and they barely even show any growth over time. 

You don’t even get to keep your plants from previous days, you start a new garden everyday. Waste of money for me, but maybe I wanted it to be more of a fun way to motivate me.

title: Focused with Forest
